Summary Heading: Worth a try if on a budget
Summary: I was given the room with disability access and amenities, hence room wasn’t designed for tall able body. Please ask for normal room if possible. I could here the next room using their bathroom/shower whenever near my bathroom.  Rate was reasonable that came with complimentary standard breakfast… come early or the bacon can go quickly.  Walking distance to Outlet Stores - a bonus.
Room tip: No airport shuttle, but reception was quick to suggest Uber - which worked out to be cheaper than...
Manager Response: none

Summary: We found this place to just be ok. Elevators are older and could be updated. Room is fine to sleep in and be out for the day. Breakfast was just ok too…the restaurant area didn’t feel super clean and options were basic. We stayed at other places during this trip that had complimentary breakfast and they all surpassed this. In general the place just felt tired. It’s fine if you’re out at Disney all day, but not so great if you’re going to be there all day.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review! Although we wish you had a 5-star visit we appreciate your feedback on our hotel accommodations and our complimentary breakfast. Our goal is to provide exceptional experiences and it is with feedback such as this that we can improve for the future. If you are ever in the area again, we hope to have the chance to welcome you back for a satisfactory stay.  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: Nothing outstanding. Nothing bad. Just an average hotel that felt safe and the staff was very friendly and helpful. Great on-site parking. Convenient bus stop out front to go to Disneyland. They let us keep our car there all day while at Disney even though we were not staying again that night.
Manager Response: Dear Debbie H,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review based on your recent stay! We are pleased you found our team to be friendly and helpful. Although we wish you had a 5-star experience, we appreciate your feedback and hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back for an improved visit the next time you're in the area.  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary Heading: Clean and comfortable stay for a cheaper Disneyland holiday
Summary: This is a great, modern, clean and comfortable option for those looking for a cheaper place to stay. Our room and beds were clean and comfortable, spacious enough for 3-4 people (double queen-sized room). The complimentary breakfast was fine – not too many options, however enough to fill you up for the morning (potatoes, yoghurt, fruit, muffins, etc...) and having Starbucks down the road was a plus! The ART shuttle was great considering the hotel is a while away from Disneyland, however, keep in mind that the hotel is not on the shuttle route, so you have to order one to pick you up specially. The shuttle was usually quick and made it easy to travel around Anaheim, however, we would recommend taking early trips in the morning and trips after 10:30 night to avoid long trips,
Manager Response: none

Summary: The staff are friendly and the rooms are clean. However, the air conditioning in every room (this was confirmed by the front desk) makes a ringing sound for about five of every ten minutes. Recommend bringing earplugs to sleep. Also, instead of putting a hold on your card for incidentals, they charge the card at check in. Upon checkout they refund it, but you will not receive the refund for 7-10 days depending on your bank. Something to be aware of.
Manager Response: Dear TravelerLAX,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review based on your recent stay! We are pleased to see that you were satisfied with the friendliness of our team and the cleanliness of our guest rooms. I would like to extend my sincere apology for any inconvenience you may have encountered in regards to the air condition unit. Our goal is to provide the most exceptional experiences and appreciate your feedback as we can use it as a tool to better improve for the future. If you are ever in the area again, we would love to have the chance to welcome you back for an improved visit.  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: I stayed here for 1 night and I’m definitely looking forward to returning.  Front desk staff was super friendly and all employees wore face coverings. Check in was super fast. I was given a room on the 2nd floor, the room was clean and modern looking. Free parking  and hot breakfast. Right next door is a Wendy’s for a quick bite to eat. There is also a Starbucks right next to Wendy’s. All your essentials in one close location.   The price was great, $137.00 for a Saturday night.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel markets itself by offering preferred rates to medical travelers. One would think they would realize that medical travelers often have heightened risks to COVID and would try to create a safe environment. Unfortunately, the opposite was true.  Half of the staff were not wearing masks. More than half of the guests were not either. No signage encouraging mask use. Very small elevators packed full of unmasked folks. This all during a time when masks are required indoors.  I came here accompanying a family member who was visiting a nearby medical facility. This person cannot afford to get COVID. Seeing the lack of consideration for the health of such guests was very disappointing.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is a solid budget hotel, not huge problems and was a great value for the price. Came for one night between Disneyland days. It is 3-4 miles from the hotel, but the trade-off for the distance is no parking fee and free breakfast, so it was worth it for us.   The rooms were Fine, beds comfortable, free breakfast was good.   Knocking off 1 star for two main reasons. First, the showerhead was completely unadjustable. Couldn't aim it in any way, and if you're tall you'll have to crouch. Kind of unacceptable all things considered, have never been able to even re-aim one before. The other problem was only one vending machine for six floors, and it was nearly empty.   Also of note, despite what their website implies the ART shuttle does not stop at the hotel, it's a ten minute
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great staff.. But that’s about it.
Summary: We started in room 611. I asked the staff member checking me us if I could have a room with a nice view for my niece and nephew because it was their first time going to Disneyland.   The staff member(s) were amazing in accommodating us but the room was an HORRIBLE disappointment. Our room was so disgusting. It smelled. There was hair (that we knew wasn’t ours) stuck to the walls, bathroom floor the shower curtain and pillowcases. Speaking of pillowcases my nephew was getting ready to go to bed and notice some unknown “brownish red” stains on his pillow. Unacceptable.   When I called the front desk they were accommodating again and moved us across the hall. To room 610. Better but still needed work.   I chose this hotel based on reviews and was VERY disappointed. Which sucked
Manager Response: none

Summary: Hotel is nice but no microwaves in rooms. The hotel actually charges the full incidental fee and charges it to your bank and issues a refund in 5-7 business days. This was not clear to me as a consumer and had to contact my bank for a refund and credit as well as the hotel to see what happened. I have never had a hotel do a full charge and a refund for incidentals even high end hotels like the Hilton. I spent over 1 hour calling bank and hotel to see if there were charges to room as we always take a video of the room when leaving the property for our records. No issues with room but charge debited my account and have to wait a week for $100 incidental charge to be refunded. Just FYI. I have never seen this happen.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I am in the middle of a relatively long stay at the ALO yet again . I will choose this property over 11 or 12 other properties that I have stayed in the area,  including Anaheim , Orange and Garden Grove , over the last two years . My daughter attends Chapman University so I visit about once a month and I am also an annual Disney pass holder . The staff here is all excellent , particularly the night crew ( . Very clean and convenient hotel with excellent breakfast free parking but again the stupendous staff is what makes the grade .  Thank you as always for your hospitality !
Manager Response: none

Summary: I had VIP seating for one of the most egregious displays inferior customer service ever performed.  My friend and I were charged an early check-in fee of $30, even though our room was ready. When we confronted the stuff with this preposterous policy, they defended it in a way that was neither convincing you were satisfactory. There are plenty of hotels in the area. Select another.
Manager Response: none

Summary: From check in to check out the experience was great.  The reception staff were always lovely and helpful. The room was very clean and well presented like it says on the internet. Breakfast was a little basic however was still good.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great hotel worth the shuttle to Disneyland
Summary: This was our fifth trip to Disneyland but the first time we’d stayed outside the precinct of walking distance and it was well worth it.  Not only far better value than a lot of tired hotels around Disneyland the hotel rooms were modern with lots of natural light and a good sized pool. Breakfast was good with fresh fruit and hot options.  Plus only a short stroll to an outlet Mall.  Shuttle to Disneyland was efficient
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Don’t understand the reviews or rating
Summary: I’ve stayed at this hotel many times when I would travel down for work (maybe 10-15 times(, albeit it many years ago and when it was just the Ayres. With a family trip to Disneyland on the horizon, I felt comfortable booking two rooms. I just don’t get the reviews, as our experience has been unacceptable in both service and condition of the accommodation.   Here’s where it started: I booked two rooms. When we arrived, I attempted to pay for the room I booked for my mother in law since they would arrive after midnight and the front desk girl said she could not, I would have to come back when they arrive. What? To our then for a room I’ve already booked with my name and credit card? The young man working with her finally found a work around and we were able to get checked in.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stay at least one night here every time we come to California.  The place is always clean.  The employees are nice and friendly.  The beds are comfortable with soft pillows.  The breakfast is yummy.  It is an actual hot breakfast.  They also have a pastry that tastes like bisquick coffee cake.  Delicious.  Also they have free parking!  We will definitely stay again, and again, and again....
Manager Response: Dear Karen M,  Thank you for your kind rating and review! We are pleased to see that you have stayed with us each time you come to California and that you had an overall comfortable experience. It is a pleasure to provide exceptional experiences for our valued guests and we look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: Stayed here last week for three nights while visiting the Disneyland resort - it was perfect - the rooms are large and very clean. The hotel is only a 6-8 minute drive from Disneyland and also close to lots of shops and restaurants. All of the staff we encountered were absolutely charming. Free parking is a great plus.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed here for a night during our extended weekend in the LA area. Chose this place due to its proximity to Angel Stadium, and after a 10 minute walk across some busy streets there we were!  Rooms are well-appointed, spacious and clean. Hospitality and front desk staff were nice and knowledgeable - signs of a well-run establishment.  Enjoyed our stay - would consider this and other Ayers properties when in the area.
Manager Response: Dear MKB1701,  Thank you for your kind rating and review based on your recent experience with us! We are delighted to see that you enjoyed your overnight stay with us while attending a game at the Angel Stadium and that you were satisfied with the service provided by our team members. We hope to welcome you back sometime soon!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: First, I loved all the customer service, they welcomed us with a beautiful smile, we also loved our hotel room, the breakfast was great, and everything was nice and clean! Easy to go out into the city and come back in. Just amazing!
Manager Response: Dear Ariel C,  Thank you for your thoughtful review! We are thrilled you were satisfied with the service you received from our team members and that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast. If you are ever in the area again, we would love to welcome you back for another 5-star experience!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: Good location. Not too far from the attractions that the family had planned for. Room was okay. One of the rooms we had, the tub had a drainage problem but they were able to exchange the room for us which was nice. The bed is comfortable. People can easily be heard if in the hallway which is a bummer, woke up a few times. Morning breakfast was a plus, many things to choose from. A couple of charging stations in the garage parking lot. The pool was nice but small, 20 people max capacity.
Manager Response: Dear Keryang123,  Thank you for taking the time to rate and review your recent stay! We are pleased to see that you found our hotel to be in a great location and that found our beds comfortable. I would like to extend my sincere apology for any inconvenience you may have experienced in regards to the tub drainage. We are glad, however, to see that we were able to get you settled in another room to better fit your needs. Your feedback is appreciated as we strive to provide exceptional experiences and we hope to welcome you back soon!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: I loved the experience at the ALO hotel ! Great rates . A shuttle bus to disney. Super Clean hotel . Fast and hospitable service.  Spacious room with the king size bed and pull out . Would stay again!  Continental breakfast included . If you want a nice hotel with great rates !
Manager Response: Dear Torrey702,  Thank you for your kind rating based on your recent stay. We are pleased to see that you had an exceptional stay with us and we hope to welcome you back soon!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: I had stayed at the Ayers in Anaheim, near Angel Stadium and loved it.   This hotel didn't live up to my expectations.   Staff was very pleasant.   The room was adequate. Bed was comfortable. I was surprised that there wasn't even one USB port in the entire room.  Breakfast did have hot entrees available.  Breakfast room presentation was lacking.   I was able to secure room last minute with points - that was nice.
Manager Response: Dear joanner8360,  Thank you for your thoughtful review based on your recent stay with us! We are glad you found our beds to be comfortable and that you were satisfied with the service you received from our team members. Your feedback regarding our breakfast room and the availability of USB ports in our guestrooms are appreciated as we strive to provide exceptional experiences and will keep these items in mind when looking to add amenities to our hotel. We hope to be able to welcome you back again!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: When we first got to the hotel, parking was easy.  McKenzie checked us in and was very helpful.  The room had everything we needed, you know the essentials. The beds were very comfy and my husband is picky about plows, and he slept very well.  When we went to the pool, McKenzie was so nice and attentive.  The hotel was so quiet the whole night. The hotel is only 9 minutes away from Disneyland.  I really liked this hotel and would highly recommend it.  Thank you Alo.  A great stay and we had so much fun on our trip, staying this hotel was part of that. Cheers
Manager Response: Dear Daisy91SR,  Thank you for your thoughtful review based on your recent experience with us. We are delighted to see that you found our guestrooms to be comfortable and that McKenzie was a very helpful team member. We strive to provide exceptional experiences for our valued guests and hope to welcome you back for another stellar experience sometime soon!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: It wasn't great and it wasn't bad.  The price was good for us but the cleanliness was okay.  Breakfast was okay, it didn't have a lot of option.  By the end of the 5th day we were sick of the same breakfast.  However, we like the little cookies that were available by the front desk.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed here for 5 nights, 15mins from Disney land. Yes you could stay in the Disney hotels for triple the cost, but it's only a $5.50/person ride on the ART bus. And you can use this ticket all day long if you wanted.  Staff here are extremely welcoming and friendly and can't do enough to make your stay a comfortable one.  Their Spoons resteraunt is delicous and fresh hand made, and run entirely by 1 chef! (Gordon Ramsey would be proud of you son).  When busy you might have to wait a while if you have a big group, but I like that as some resteraunts are bringing your mains to the table while still eating your appys.  You won't feel rushed here and a pleasant dining experience again with very attentive and friendly servers.  The pool and spa is very welcoming after a long day
Manager Response: none

Summary: Beds comfortable however air conditioner sounded like a truck! Door to room had no weather stripping and light came in all around the door.  With the name Ayers you would have expected a little more for the price!
Manager Response: Dear 1948happy,  Thank you for taking the time to rate and review your recent stay with us. We are glad that you found our beds to be comfortable, however, disappointed to see that your stay with us was less than exceptional. I would like to extend my sincere apology for any inconvenience you experienced in regards to our air conditioning units and the doors to our guestrooms. Your feedback is appreciated as we are always open to hearing ways in which we can better improve for the future. If you are ever in the area again, we would love to be able to welcome you back.  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: Hotel was a good deal. We were part of a group and enjoyed free parking and breakfast.  Room was very comfortable and the A/C worked great.   Only suggestion is maybe an update to the elevators. I would rate our stay a solid 8.
Manager Response: Dear Tsunamis,  Thank you for your kind review! We are pleased to see that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast and had an overall comfortable stay. Your feedback regarding our elevators is appreciated as we are always open to hearing of ways in which we can better improve for our valued guests. We hope to welcome you back sometime soon!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: The hotel is clean and well-kept with friendly staff. It’s on a fairly busy intersection, but it is convenient to get on the freeway. We requested a room with views of the Disney fireworks, so it was neat to watch them nightly. The pool is on the small side, but clean and never busy. The breakfast was good and the free parking was nice! We would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear 754si,  Thank you for your kind rating and review! We are delighted to see that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast, spending time at our pool, along with the Disneyland fireworks view from your room. If you are ever in the area again, we would love to have the opportunity to welcome you back!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: We asked to change rooms after the first night and the hotel staff did so without question. Our room was too small for our family of 4. They were warm and friendly and did a great job making us feel at home. The breakfast was good - the eggs better than most places we've been. We enjoyed the pool, even ate our dinner by the pool one night. The only glitch was that one of the rooms on our floor flooded one night and there was water in the hall. You couldn't get thru without soaking your shoes. Maybe they could have put down something on top of the carpet.... All in all, it was a great stay.
Manager Response: Dear Butteco,  Thank you for your thoughtful review based on your recent stay! We are glad we were able to get your family situated in a room better fitting for your needs and that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast. I would like to extend my sincere apology for any inconvenience you experienced in regards to the floors getting wet. Your feedback is appreciated and we hope to be able to welcome you back to your new home away from home sometime soon!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: Lived in a double queens bedroom. The day time staff is very nice and even let my family check in early. The night time staff are not as friendly; most of the time they don’t even look at you and say hi.  The hotel is old. Absolutely not what the pictures showed you. The ceiling looked like it was repair but not with good quality and the paint is not smooth. The bathroom has no working vent. Even though most of the surface looks clean, however there are some spots that show corrosion or mold. Other than that, the cleaning crew do a good job, replenish plenty of towels. Water pressure is good.  Noise cancelation is none in this hotel. We constantly hear noise from above us, outside in the corridor. We even hear upstairs guests flushing LOL Parking is free and safe. Complimentary
Manager Response: Dear WN719,  Thank you for taking the time to write a thoughtful review based on your recent stay with us. We are pleased to see that you found our team members were friendly and that we were able to get you checked in early. Your feedback regarding our complimentary breakfast, guestrooms, and overall experience is appreciated as we strive to provide the best stays for our valued guests. If you are ever in the area again, we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: For the price, I would’ve been disappointed. Since I got it for less on Priceline, it was ok. I had two major issues. The rooms themselves were fine, the bed was clean and slept well enough. Sadly, my three year old was disappointed with the TV selection as there was no Disney junior, but too bad. Lol. The sofa sat well, and there was plenty of room for an adult and a toddler. I did have to contact the desk once about getting towels after the had taken them when they cleaned the room and forgot to replace them, but the desk took care of it easily. My issues came with other stuff. The first issue I had was with the bathrooms.  They were clean and such, but i am a taller person. The tubs had been refitted, and so it raised the floor in it. This meant that the pipe for the shower
Manager Response: Dear Manmountain23,  Thank you for taking the time to rate and review your recent experience with us. We are pleased to see that you had an overall enjoyable rest in our guestrooms. It is disappointed to see that you experienced any type of inconvenience in regards to the configuration of our bathrooms and the way our complimentary breakfast is set up, as well as our selection of breakfast offerings. We value your candid feedback as it helps us to better improve for our valued guests. If you are ever in the area again, we would love to be able to welcome you back!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: This is a very well appointed and comfortable hotel.  Priced reasonably for the area.  A bit of a drive away from Disneyland, but you are also away from the noise of the hotels close to the park.  Its a great location!
Manager Response: Dear Doug S,  Thank you for taking the time to rate and review your recent stay! We are pleased to see that you found our guestrooms to be comfortable and our hotel to be in a great location. We would love to welcome you back for another exceptional stay the next time you're in town!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary Heading: Comfortable stay in a budget hotel
Summary: Most families staying in Anaheim would be there for Disneyland or maybe Orange premium outlet mall and it was at a perfect location for these.  Even the fireworks could be seen from the room window, if you had a higher floor room and the window opened on Disney side  Beds, pillows were comfy and room and hotel were super clean.  Ample parking space was available.  Breakfast was good and better than many other hotels.  We stayed here for  2 nights and were so satisfied that at the end of the trip we had option of staying at a couple of other hotels, but we decided to stay in ALO, as our first stay was very satisfying  One problem which i would like to raise and bring it to the attention of the management was that, at our 2nd stay, we encountered some problem in our credit card
Manager Response: Dear asimm76,  Thank you for taking the time to write a thoughtful review based on your recent stay with us. We are pleased to see that you had an overall wonderful stay with us and that you enjoyed the Disneyland fireworks, our complimentary breakfast, and our stellar location. I would like to apologize for any inconvenience you may have experienced in regards to our payment policy, however, we are not able to accept foreign currency as a form of payment. We accept all major credit cards, bank cards, traveler's check and USD. Thank you again for your feedback and we hope to welcome you back for another great stay sometime soon!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: Room: We felt pretty crammed in such a small room; very small bathroom. This is why no mention of sq ft of the rooms on Priceline. I paid a good price of the room on Priceline for 3.5 stars hotel. This hotel is on par with 2.5 stars. For this and all other reasons stated below I can't rate our stay more than 2 Location: 15 minutes from Disneyland parking lot but do not park in Buzz, Woody Disney parking lot for the Disney bus shuttle takes another 15 to 20 minutes to entrance.  Amenities: Pretty small swimming pool, No microwaves in rooms, one elevator smelled like someone smoked, better breakfast for family. Issues: Dear Drew Horton, please provide a second microwave on that second floor ice room and build a counter top to host those two good size better microwaves. Think that
Manager Response: Dear tfnavia,  Thank you for taking the time to rate and review your recent stay with us. I would like to extend my sincere apology for any inconvenience you encountered in regards to using our microwave, the size of our guestrooms, and your overall experience at our hotel. It is important that we provide our valued guests with exceptional stays and we appreciate your feedback as it helps us to better improve for the future. Additionally, to ensure future guests are not surprised at the sizing of our guestrooms, I went ahead and verified that the square footage is listed on Priceline. Once again, thank you for your candid feedback and we hope your future accommodations are satisfying.  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: I really enjoyed my stay. Room was vary cleaned, breakfast was great, front desk were too nice and friendly, and even the pool was too clean. My daughter was too happy.Thank you so much I will come back soon.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Part of the Ayres Hotels but their "economy", more affordable hotel branch.  Compared to the Ayres, it's still a very nice, upscale hotel with nearly all the same amenities.    I've stayed here several times when I've visited Disneyland.  It's right next door to the Ayres Orange Hotel and only 1-2 exits away from Disneyland.  The rooms are nice.  Not quite as large and nice as the rooms in Ayres, but still on the "upscale" side.  There's plenty of parking, which is also FREE!  Most of the hotels around the Disneyland resort charge parking.  A bit annoying and can get a bit expensive if you're paying parking at the park and the hotel.    Breakfast is included.  It's the same breakfast that's served over at the Ayres Hotel next door.  Honestly, it's probably the BEST complimentary
Manager Response: none

Summary: I’ve been coming to ALO for the past five years, and it is always a great stay. The rooms, the amenities, and the location are the best. It is close to Disneyland with shuttle service, close to the outlets at The Block, and close to the UCI Hospital. The rooms are super modern and clean, breakfast is included, and the staff are the best, helpful and friendly.
Manager Response: Dear Karholta,  Thank you for your kind rating and review! We are pleased to see that you have returned to stay with us over the last 5 years and that each of your experiences were exceptional. We strive to provide 5-star experiences for our valued guests and are thrilled to see that we have been able to successfully do that for you. We look forward to welcoming you back sometime soon!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: Staff was courteous, room very clean and well maintained, housekeeping services were great and hot breakfast was tasty. Love the crumb coffee cake slices at breakfast and the storage nices in the entry of the guest room.  Overall a very nice, small hotel...will be back!
Manager Response: Dear Dee B,  Thank you for your thoughtful review! I am pleased to see that you were satisfied with the exceptional service you received from our team and that you enjoyed the tasty coffee cake at our complimentary breakfast. It will be a pleasure to welcome you back for another exceptional stay sometime soon!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: Can’t imagine a more convenient location. We have family spread around Orange County and this spot is convenient to all of them when we gather. Professional and helpful staff, especially at the desk, coupled with a good and hearty breakfast. We took our meal on the patio because we had our small dog with us. She’s part of the family too
Manager Response: Dear mikek794,  Thank you for taking the time to write a thoughtful review based on your experiences with us. We are pleased to see that we are your chosen hotel while visiting your family in the area and that we are able to welcome your dog to stay with us as well. We strive to provide exceptional stays for our valued guests and look forward to welcoming you back for another great stay soon!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: I won a trip to Disney through my credit Union Silver State Credit Union of Las Vega,NV and the Alo was the hotel I selected because they offered breakfast. The breakfast was DELICIOUS! It was real pancakes, eggs, and sausage with orange juice. The room was very clean and overlooked the swimming pool which was just gorgeous! My kids and I truly enjoyed our stay.
Manager Response: Dear Tanya T,  Thank you for your kind review! We are pleased to see that you have chosen our hotel for your dream vacation and that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast. It is with great pleasure that we provide exceptional experiences for our valued guests and we hope to welcome you back the next time you're in the area!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary Heading: Enjoyed staying in a small-chain hotel for a change--
Summary: Everyone was friendly.  An excellent restaurant was part of the complex.  The free breakfast included a menu with food that is supposed to be hot and was just that way.  The hotel was well appointed both in the lobby area and in the rooms.
Manager Response: Dear Anne S,  Thank you for your kind review! We are pleased to see that you enjoyed our complimentary hot American breakfast buffet and that you were satisfied with the service you received from our team members. If you are ever in the area again, we would love to welcome you back!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: Our ground floor room was very comfortable - the bed was great.  We especially appreciated the friendly service during check-in and check-out.  Parking was close to the building and free!  Breakfast was the standard powdered eggs with very good sausage.
Manager Response: Dear nousername1013,  Thank you for your kind review! We are thrilled to see that you had a comfortable stay with us and you enjoyed the exceptional service you received from our team members. We hope to welcome you back the next time you're in the area!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: Great location next to Wendy's/Starbucks/Best Buy and short walk to Outlets at Orange with many shops, restaurants, and AMC 30 theater.  Modern rooms with comfortable beds/pillows, bright white clean bathrooms, mini fridge, and handy shelving unit with open closet.  Reasonable rates.  Friendly staff.  Convenient ART shuttle service to Disneyland every 40 minutes with pickup directly in front of hotel on West Chapman Avenue (note: only two other nearby hotel stops on this route, so a short route).  By far my favorite place to stay when visiting Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear brentinregina,  Thank you for taking the time to rate and review your recent stay with us! We are pleased to see that you found our hotel to be in a stellar location, our team members friendly, and that you had an overall comfortable experience. It is an honor to be your chosen hotel while visiting the area, and we all look forward to welcoming you again!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: We stayed for two nights midweek for a trip to Disneyland.  We had stayed at the Ayers property right next door so we knew there would be some freeway noise, but we've never been that bothered by it - we're so tired from a full day at the park that it doesn't keep us up.  We left the room at 9am and returned at midnight, exhausted, to find that our room had not been cleaned at all. Towels were on the floor, beds unmade. We tried to call down to housekeeping to at least get some clean towels, but the phone didn't connect. I tried to call the main line of the hotel to get the front desk on my cell phone, it just rang and rang and then put me on hold with a recording about how wonderful the service was.  Irony.  I ended up going down to the lobby to get towels (and heard the phone
Manager Response: Dear LMaier209,  Thank you for taking the time to rate and review your recent stay. I would like to send my sincere apology for any inconvenience you experienced in regards to your room not being cleaned while you were away and with the difficulty in getting in touch with our front desk team member late in the night. These unusual occurrences are not what we wish to provide for our valued guests and we appreciate your feedback as it will help our team to better improve for the future. Thank you again for your feedback and if you are ever in the area again, we hope to be able to welcome you back for the stellar experience you deserve.  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: We were traveling to see our kids compete at los Ali alimitos high school. Looked around for decent priced clean hotels and came across this gem. Reasonable price, our room was very clean. The location was convenient to get on the highway and close to shopping. Was nice to travel 20 hours from home and have a nice comfortable room. Would definitely suggest to friends
Manager Response: Dear Showchoirdad,  Thank you for your kind review and rating! We are pleased to see that you had a comfortable stay with us and that you found our hotel to be in a stellar location. If you are ever in the area again, we would love to welcome you back!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: We were not able to sleep because our room was facing a busy street all night long and sometimes sirens because of a hospital across the street. Otherwise the staff is friendly and accommodating. They offered us to move when we complained but we were too busy in a conference and too tired to pack and unpack again. They did not have earplugs. Breakfast had fresh fruit which sometimes was rotten. Otherwise good location because bus picks you up to Disneyland in front of hotel. You then have to change to another bus to go to convention center. They originally told us the first bus can take us directly.
Manager Response: Dear maso61,  Thank you for taking the time to rate and review your recent stay with us. I would like to send my sincere apology for any inconvenience you experienced in regards to the surrounding noise and our breakfast offerings. Your feedback is appreciated as we strive to provide our valued guests with exceptional experiences. If you are ever in the area again, we would love to welcome you back for an improved stay!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: Based on the prior reviews, I expected more from this property. Disappointed to find a 3 ½ star hotel with plastic water glasses, no in-room safe and a tiny bathroom. My husband and I had a hard time being in the bathroom together. To open the door one of us had to step over by the toilet. The breakfast was included and did have bacon and scrambled eggs but to get decaf coffee you had to use a packet of instant coffee and hot water. Very minimal amenities for this level hotel. To be fair, we are used to staying in 4 and 5 star hotels, so the comparison is pretty drastic. Nevertheless, I did not expect a 3 ½ star property to be this far below the  standards. The capper was that one day we found a housekeeper’s phone on the nightstand, plugged into our charging cord! Free Wi-Fi
Manager Response: Dear Ral W,  Thank you for taking the time to rate and review your recent stay with us. I would like to extend my sincere apology for any inconvenience you experienced in regards to the size of the restroom in our guestrooms as well as the offerings at our complimentary breakfast. We strive to provide exceptional experiences for our valued guests and truly appreciate your feedback. We will absolutely use the concerns you've shared as a training tool to better improve for the future. If you are ever in the area again, we hope to be able to welcome you back.  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: The hotel staff were amazing!  They helped us plan all our outtings and give us great tips to have a good time!  The rooms were great!  A little dated but very clean and sound proof!  The court yard is beautiful!  The breakfast was yummy and there was always lots even when we went down close to closing!
Manager Response: Dear Cherry R,  Thank you for taking the time to rate and review your recent stay at ALO Hotel by Ayres. It is wonderful to know that you enjoyed our exceptional service, clean and quiet accommodations, complimentary breakfast, as well as our peaceful courtyard. We hope to welcome you back soon!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: The hotel was very clean and accommodating. The front desk staff was extremely nice and the breakfast was great! The hotel is in a great location and you avoid all the Disney prices. It took us 8 minutes to get to Disney.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed here for 4 days while on vacation to go to Disneyland. The whole stay was great! The staff was very kind and accommodating, their breakfast buffet was included and a lifesaver for our family of 3 growing boys, and there is a shuttle right to Disneyland that picks up outside. We will definitely be coming back.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I'm a weekly visitor on business and stay at the ALO because it provides everything you would want from a hotel.  Especially the entire staff, they are very pleasant and helpful.  If your looking for a place to stay I highly recommend it.... You will not be disappointed!!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Perfect ending to a family trip
Summary: Booking was easy, they took care of the amenities I requested (pack n play for baby) well in advance before we arrived, allowed us to alter our check-in time. Overall a pleasant experience. Would definitely book a room here on our next trip to Orange County.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The Alo Hotel in Orange Co. is the best  it is clean  comfy, smells good and they trully care about their customers they definently look out for you if i could rate higher i definetly would will continue to go there when need be ,keep up your great service
Manager Response: Dear Maria H,  Thank you for your kind review! We are glad you had a comfortable and overall exceptional stay with us. If you are ever in the area again, we would love to welcome you back!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary Heading: Good accomodations but poor attention to detail at check in
Summary: I booked a room at ALO through a room block for a conference in Orange. I arrive only to find that they gave my room away to another guest likely at the same conference. I booked a king bed and they offered me a double queen that was available instead. They honored the rate but this us poor registration policy to not verify the identity of the person you are checking a room for. Ironically enough, I am writing this review after receiving an email to my email address but addressed to the guest who unknowingly stole my room. I hope she enjoyed her stay. The room itself was spacious and clean and the poor guy who did actually check me in did his best. Don't know his name but it would be best to train all other front desk staff adequately to prevent these issues in the future and
Manager Response: Dear Shimi S,  Thank you for taking the time to rate and review your recent stay with us. We are glad to see that you found our guestrooms to be spacious and that you had an overall enjoyable stay. I would like to send my sincere apologies for any inconvenience you experienced upon check-in with the room you were assigned to. We strive to provide our valued guests with exceptional experiences and will use your feedback as a tool to better improve for our future guests. If you are ever in the area again, we would love to be able to welcome you back for the stellar experience you deserve!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary Heading: Clean, friendly, helpful staff. Restaurants on property are excellent.
Summary: Clean, friendly, helpful staff. Restaurants on property are excellent. Location is good. Near highway but quiet if you have a room away from the highway side. Can't speak to the rooms on the other side but I did ask specifically to be away from any highway noise.
Manager Response: Dear RWATX,  Thank you for your kind review! We are pleased to see that you enjoyed our onsite restaurant and that you found our hotel to be in a stellar location. If you are ever in the area again, we would love to welcome you back!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary Heading: Plumbing issues, and broken ice machines
Summary: I was informed by the shuttle driver, that this Hotel was once pretty bad, until the remodel last year. It’s bascially, a new paint job, and new decor and bedding, but still showing it’s ghetto side. Our room was filthy! It looked like they hadn’t dusted the room in months. It made me think, what else did they miss? Don’t rely on their breakfast either. Food was old tasting, and I witnessed many guests, using their dirty plate for seconds and thirds, and nobody working there, said a thing.  I’m staying away from this brand of Hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Ashley C,  Thank you for taking the time to rate and review your recent stay with us. I would like to extend my sincere apologies for any inconvenience you may have experienced in regards to the plumbing and ice machines throughout our hotel. We strive to provide our valued guests with exceptional experiences and will absolutely use your feedback to better improve for our valued guests. Thank you again for your candid feedback and we hope your future accommodations are comfortable and satisfying.  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: Recently stayed in one of their king suites. The room is spacious, clean and the bed is very comfortable. Good breakfast selection and sufficient seating area in their dining space.   Their staff are warm and friendly. We checked in very late at night and were well received. We will definitely stay here again for our next Disney trip.
Manager Response: Dear Sunflower_216,  Thank you for your kind review and excellent rating. We are pleased to see that you had an overall comfortable stay and that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast. If you are ever in the area again, we would love to welcome you back for another exceptional experience!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: We had a great stay. The location is close to Disneyland, there is a shuttle station right in front of the hotel. Breakfast is included. The room is spacious and they even had a dog bed ready for our two pets!
Manager Response: Dear ebr32,  Thank you for your kind review! We are glad to see that you had an overall great stay and that you found our guestrooms to be spacious. If you are ever in the area again, we would love to welcome you and your pets back!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary Heading: Everything we wanted and more....great service!!
Summary: We thoroughly enjoyed our 7 night stay at the ALO Hotel for our California getaway April 24-May 1, 2019.    We did it all...Disneyland, Anaheim Angels ballgame, Universal Studios, San Diego Zoo, Huntington Beach and LA/Hollywood.  The hotel is very clean, comfortable and the best part would be the friendly staff.  The front desk staff were always so very knowledgeable and helpful.  We also really enjoyed watching the Disney fireworks from our room every night at 9:30 AM and we were 10 mins drive from the park!!    Our other favourites at this hotel included:  the included full HOT breakfast, no parking fees, free wifi (worked excellent), convenient Anaheim Resort Transportation shuttle right outside the front of the hotel - passes are charged to the room - which ran from 6AM
Manager Response: Dear LisaLuvsVacations,  Thank you for taking the time to write a thoughtful review and rate your recent experience with us! We are pleased to see that you had an overall great stay and that you found our hotel to be in a stellar location for visiting the various attractions in the area. It is with great pleasure that we provide our valued guests with exceptional experiences and we look forward to welcoming you back in the near future!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: Everything about this hotel was convenient for our Disneyland trip. The ART shuttle they provided to and from the park was very useful. Between the clean rooms, friendly staff and convenience I’ll definitely be staying at ALO again in the future.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I spent 3 nights at the ALO Hotel and I had a great experience! The breakfast was fantastic - they had so much selection! I had no problems with my check-in, check-out, or any other part of my stay.  Thanks to the staff for their great hospitality!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We enjoyed our stay at ALO. Staff was very helpful and professional. We loved the breakfast which had good variety. There are many eating places around the hotel. Shuttle to Disneyland was very comfortable.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at the ALO Hotel.  It's proximity to the UC Medical Center on The City Way was really convenient.  They did have a special rate for those of us who were having to stay for a procedure at the hospital.  The one thing I did not find great was the air-conditioning it just didn't work right.  We complained and they said the State of California won't let them set it below 69 degrees which I found kind of odd, but otherwise the location was perfect, the room was great, beds comfortable and service was terrific.  The Mexican restaurant next door was fabulous and the Margaritas at happy hour at the nearby Ayres hotel were the best we had ever had!  All in all a great stay, with one caveat, bring your own fan.  That will help the air conditioner problem I
Manager Response: Dear vickialamo,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review based on your recent stay with us. We are pleased to see that you found our hotel to be in a convenient location and that you had an overall comfortable experience. I would like to extend my most sincere apologies for any inconvenience you may have experienced in regards to the air conditioning in your room. We strive to provide exceptional experiences for our valued guests and appreciate your feedback as it helps us to better improve for the future. If you are ever in the area again, we would love to welcome you again!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: It was a pleasurable experience staying at AOL. We we were able to check in early and very grateful. We traveled from Las Vegas for my son's birthday. Front desk answered all of our questions. The rooms were very clean, Free parking,Free of resort fees, and complimentary breakfast. Once you consider all of these factors, you can understand that there are still hotels out there, not many, that strive on customer service by accommodating guests without feeling as though you have just left the car dealership and been sold a car. These are the differences when hotels are family owned verses large corporations. We would like to thank you for the memorable experience and we look forward to staying with you in the future. Thank you Barbara Carter
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Easy and Accessible Hotel in the Disneyland Area!
Summary: We ended up checking in early and got into a room right away! Huge room by the way! The service was awesome, and the front desk rep was able to give us a lot of information regarding getting to Disneyland from their location (Cheap option to use Disney specific bus! This location was also easy to access the freeway and get around to many different areas in the OC area! You can't go wrong with free parking, free breakfast buffet and free WiFi! It was definitely a great place to stay! Would have rated the property a 5/5 STAR, but the elevator smelled like fresh varnish that was really strong and there was a hospital across the street (the walls are pretty thin - so we heard ambulances quite often). Would definitely stay there again!
Manager Response: none

Summary: The complimentary breakfast they serve is the best I have had anywhere. The staff are always willing to help and answer questions.  They also offer shuttle to some local attractions This is not the first time I have stayed at Alo and won't be the last.  I always refer ALO and Ayres to my family and friends.
Manager Response: Dear Mary D,  Thank you for your kind review! We are glad you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast and had a great first stay with us. We look forward to welcoming you back sometime soon!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: It is unfair if you compare this hotel with expensive hotels like Hilton. I give five stars given its cost.  Pros: Cheap.   Shuttle to Disneyland (12 mins): It was great for the bus to drop us right off the main gate. Free breakfast (not fancy, but fine) Free parking (note that many others around Disneyland charge parking) No extra charges or resort fees  Cons: No microwave in the room A bit old room.  Overall, we are very satisfied. Given the price, it was great. If you plan to visit Disneyland, it would be a very cost-efficient place.
Manager Response: Dear hheyoung,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review based on your recent stay with us! We are happy to see that you found our hotel to be of great value and in a stellar location. Your feedback regarding our guestrooms is appreciated as we are open to ways in which we can improve for our valued guests. We hope to welcome you back sometime soon!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: My family and I stayed here for 4 nights just this past week during our trip to Disneyland. We had never stayed here before and was pleasantly surprised. The room was clean and very nice. The beds were comfy. The shower head was a little low so my son and husband felt like Will Ferrell as "Elf" while trying to shower but all in all a great choice. My kids enjoyed the pool and hot tub. After reading other reviews prior to our stay, others mentioned the thin walls. You could hear people in the hallway from time to time but nothing terrible or too late. The breakfast was pleasant and enjoyable. Eggs, pancakes, potatoes, bacon or sausage along with cereal, yogurt, fruit, bagels, pastries... It was fantastic. Oh and the front desk staff was always very helpful and nice. Would
Manager Response: Dear faith6997,  Thank you for your thoughtful review! It is with great pleasure that we provide exceptional experiences for our valued guests and we hope to welcome you back sometime soon!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: Always our go-to hotel for our Disneyland trips! love that despite its location it is about a 7 minute drive from hotel parking to the Disney parking structure!!!  Staff always pleasant and attentive!!!  Rooms were recently updated too.
Manager Response: Dear Janelle J,  Thank you for your kind review! We are happy to see that we are your chosen hotel when visiting the area. We strive to provide our valued guests with exceptional experiences and look forward to seeing you again!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: ホンダセンターでフィギュアスケートの四大陸選手権を観戦の為、6日間滞在しました。1人でも快適に過ごせるホテルです。バス停前なのでウーバーやバスを利用すれば便利な場所です。ディズニーランドへもバス一本で行けます。水やコーヒーがいつもロビーに用意してあるので、助かりました。 I  stayed 6 days to watch figure skating competition at Honda Center from Japan.Clean,quiet,safe,and easy access to everywhere.Water,tea,and coffee is always at the lobby.I enjoyed comfortable stay.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Amazaing find for a great price!
Summary: I booked this hotel after finding it online. Our destination was Disneyland and it was, myself, my two daughters, my nephew, and my disabled mother (she uses a cane and sometimes a wheelchair). The hotel was simple to get to. The lobby was clean and open. We were greeted by a friendly front desk agent. They were able to get us connected rooms. The decor in the rooma was modern and spacious.  The tub was an easy step in with a handle bar. The breakfast was served in a large room with plenty of selection,  from cereal to eggs and pancakes. There was also overdlow seating in the restaurant area. Every time we passed through the lobby or met an employee, we were greeted with smiles and a "Goodmorning ". Although there was some construction,  the rooms were quiet and the beds were
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great Location, very clean and Very Nice Staff
Summary: Rooms were very spacious and very clean. The  staff was very very nice. Breakfast was good, everything was great! The location was great, easy access to freeway and places, they offered a shuttle if needed to Disneyland, we did not use. We were there for a sporting event. There was a  Mall across the street with plenty of restaurant options. The Mexican restaurant at the hotel was a bit pricey and not the best in my opinion.
Manager Response: Dear danak801,  Thank you for your kind review! We are glad you found our guestrooms to be spacious and that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast. If you are ever in the area again, we would love to welcome you back for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: Its located right off the highway and only a 5 minute drive from the park. The hotel was clean and the beds were very comfortable. My only complaint was the vending machines had microwavable foods available but no utensils to eat any of them. (3rd world problem i know) But it isn't even a big deal. There are a lot of places to eat real food near by. Would definitely stay there again on our next family trip to the happiest place on earth.
Manager Response: Dear inqmato,  Thank you for your kind review! We are pleased to see that you had a comfortable stay with us and found our hotel to be in a great location. Your feedback regarding our vending machines is appreciated as we strive to provide exceptional experiences for our valued guests. If you are ever in need of anything during your time with us, please let our team members know and we will do our best to assist you. We hope to welcome you back the next time you're in the area!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: Very nice front desk experience, good bed and pillows, good shower, clean room and lobby, and wonderful hot breakfast with a great hostess. The actual room was smaller than it looks in the photos, and we had to ask for more towels to accommodate all of us every day. The outside noise was excessive to us, but we are from a small town with little street noise, so it might be our problem, not the hotel’s. This hotel has no shuttle, but has an ART city bus stop right in front, and the front desk sells daily passes for no profit. March 2019 the pass was 5.50. We were sad to miss breakfast on the early “magic morning “ day because the bus came before the hotel opened the breakfast room.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Helpful and lovely staff! Cozy stay!
Summary: We came to California to spend our 3rd anniversary at Disneyland Parks. Our room at ALO was cozy and intimate. We were able to see the fireworks from the parks out our window. The staff was helpful and very friendly. Our room was clean and nice. If I had one small gripe it would be the shower. The water pressure wasn't great and it was difficult to get the shower pin in place.
Manager Response: Dear Freedom718133,  Thank you for your kind review! We are happy that you had a cozy stay with us and that you had an overall enjoyable anniversary trip. We strive to provide our valued guests with exceptional experiences and appreciate your feedback regarding the water pressure in our showers. If you are ever in the area again, we would love to welcome you again!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: I would recommend this hotel in a second. The staff was professional and friendly. The property was very clean and comfortable. The breakfast was substantial and had something for all ages. The restraunt was like going to a friends house to dinner. The food was great! If you stay there to go to Disney it's a straight 5min. drive. I highly recommend ALO.
Manager Response: Dear Christina L,  Thank you for your kind review! We are pleased to see that you had a comfortable stay at ALO Hotel by Ayres and that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast. We appreciate your recommendation of our hotel and look forward to welcoming you again!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary Heading: Excellent Stay! Wonderful breakfast and friendly staff, muchos gracias!
Summary: Had a fantastic time staying at ALO hotel! wonderful hot and fresh breakfast selection (not sure what others are talking about as they offer free breakfast already what more can you ask for?), a wonderful ambiance (I felt like I was transported to a different place in the restaurant), hotel concierges were always there to assist and checked us in even though we arrived 11pm. Bed was super comfy and no sign of any pests. A definite recommend! Thanks for a wonderful experience :)
Manager Response: none

Summary: We've stayed here for an Expo for 2 years in a row because it's such a great spot. It's about the little things in my opinion: the water/coffee/cookies in the lobby, the great Mexican restaurant, and easy location for bus/uber pick-up. Nice squish-factor on the pillows. It's close to the Convention Center, Angel Stadium, and Disneyland without being crazy expensive. Only thing that was an issue was the showerhead being quite low (not a big deal) but trust me on the coffee & cookies!
Manager Response: Dear Farrah B,  Thank you for your thoughtful review based on your recent stay! We are pleased to see that you have returned to stay with us and had an overall great experience. We appreciate your feedback regarding the shower head in our guest restrooms and hope to welcome you back the next time you're in town!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: My family and I stayed in ALO Hotel. Will not stay in said location again. Next door room was very noisy, called front desk was advised they will send security but no security showed up and noise continued until about 2:30AM.

Summary: Great hotel! The hotel rooms were clean and the staff was courteous.  Hotel was walking distance to some restaurants and to stores.  Loved the fact that you could pick up the shuttle to Disney and not have to worry about parking.  Parking garage provided for guest cars which was also great.
Manager Response: Dear Karla P,  Thank you for your kind review! Summary: Great hotel, very clean, friendly staff, good breakfast and ideal location close to Disneyland, Honda center and Angel stadium. I would definitely recommend. Room is modern has a very comfortable bed, is quiet and has black out curtains.
Manager Response: Dear 355K2,  Thank you for your kind review! We are delighted to know that you found our hotel to be in a stellar location and that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast. If you are ever in the area again, we would love to welcome you back!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: My husband and I stayed at the ALO by Aryes in Orange County California and it was beyond amazing! Everything was super clean and organized, and it included free breakfast for every day we stayed there! 100% would recommend this hotel to anyone!
Manager Response: Dear Kianakaslis16,  Thank you for your thoughtful review based on your recent stay. We are glad you had an enjoyable honeymoon vacation with us and that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast. If you are ever in the area again, we would love to welcome you back!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: We booked this hotel as it looked great online, had very good reviews, and was across the street from a much higher priced chain hosting a conference my wife was attending.   We were very pleased with the look and cleanliness of the hotel (recently completely renovated) and especially the staff who were friendly, courteous, and helpful. Super comfy beds.  The attached highly rated Anepalco Mexican/French restaurant is also staffed with genuinely friendly, professional staff and serves delicious food. Sports bar right next door at parent company Ayres hotel, also well staffed and great property.  10 minute shuttle bus to Disneyland, and a few blocks (5 minute walk) to Orange Outlet centre shopping, restaurants, and theatres.  We’ll definitely be back.
Manager Response: Dear thebestavailable,  Thank you for your thoughtful review based on your recent stay! We are pleased to see that you found our beds to be comfortable and that you had an overall exceptional experience. If you are ever in the area again, we would love to welcome you back!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: Third visit. This stay five nights. . Convenient location. Comfortable room - clean, orderly, attractive. Staff exceptional. Kudos to Front Desk employee Angeli who went far beyond responsibilities to assist and meet our needs.
Manager Response: Dear Gerald T,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review regarding your recent stay at ALO Hotel. I am thrilled to know that you enjoyed your experience as our guests. Your compliments regarding our optimal location, comfortable accommodations, and attentive team members are greatly appreciated. Thank you so much for your feedback, I hope to welcome you back soon!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: In the area on business, the ALO hotel has reasonably priced rooms. Friendly staff, clean and quiet rooms in a safe area. Parking which can be $18 a day is included as well as breakfast and internet. Highly recommend.
Manager Response: Dear FrankOjaiCa,  I am pleased to see that you enjoyed your stay at ALO Hotel. It is wonderful to read about your experience and I greatly appreciate your compliments regarding our excellent value. Thank you again for your feedback and for recommending our hotel. We hope to welcome you back soon!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary Heading: My stay at the ALO hotel.
Summary: Wonderful and pleasant stay.  Employees were warm and welcoming.  Definitely staying here again!!  Room was amazing and spacious, bed was comfortable and all the essential amenities you need.  Check in and out was easy enough and no hassle.
Manager Response: Dear Dominic L,  Thank you so much for your candid review. Your compliments regarding our attentive team members, spacious accommodations and premium amenities are greatly appreciated. Thank you again for your feedback, I hope you choose ALO Hotel the next time you are in the area!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: I booked the room last minute and was incredibly pleased. Rooms were clean and quiet. Every staff member we encountered (front desk, housekeeping, etc) was friendly, courteous, and helpful. My husband and I grabbed a quick dinner in the restaurant and the food was fabulous! We had the veggie tacos and they were great. I would definitely stop back just for the tacos.  When we checked out, we found out they offer a shuttle to Disneyland that drops off in front of the park. We regularly visit Anaheim and we can see this becoming our regular hotel! Thanks again for a wonderful stay.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The staff is super friendly and the rooms are really really clean. Close to everything, enjoyed my stay here. The beds were really comfortable and big. And I’m a big shower person and that exceeded my expectations.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Overall the hotel was "ok" and served its purpose.  The front desk was friendly but not overly helpful. The hotel overall seemed a bit more modern in pictures -- in person it's quite old and in desperate need of a renovation. The elevators are small -- we barely fit our family of 5 with our luggage inside. Rooms are just ok -- seriously outdated and the walls are done with this weird stucco paint stuff that looks terribly unfinished. Beds weren't uncomfortable but weren't comfortable either. Our room had a HORRIBLE perfume smell when we first walked in -- like knock you over so overwhelming. We had to sleep with both windows open all night long the first night so it was quite cold. Bathrooms are small and not well appointed -- shower is old and uncomfortable. Not much room for
Manager Response: Dear Michelle,  Thank you kindly for your review. Though our lobby was renovated about a year ago and our guestrooms were refreshed just this past summer, your candid input is greatly appreciated. I am saddened that your experience fell short of exceptional and that our complimentary breakfast was not up to par for you and your family. We strive to provide attentive service and a top-notch guest experience, but it is apparent we fell short of that during your stay. Thank you again for your sincere feedback and the concerns you have shared.  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary Heading: Close to Disney, Free Parking, Complimentary Breakfast
Summary: We stayed in this hotel for 4 nights. We visited Disneyland and did an LA tour so we were really only in the hotel in the early morning and late evening. It was a great stay. We requested a king bed which is what we received. Beautiful room and very clean. The staff was very friendly and knowledgeable of the area. A woman at the front desk helped us get ART bus tickets as soon as we arrive. The bus picks up right outside of the hotel and takes about 10-15 minutes to get to Disney. We also loved the free parking and complimentary breakfast. Breakfast was great - eggs, sausage, potatoes, pancakes, and a yogurt bar. Thanks for a fantastic stay, we would love to come back.
Manager Response: none

Summary: First time and I was really surprised with the room and friendly staff.  Also the breakfast was good and the parking is included, wich is a huge plus!  I would definetely stay again on my next trip to Disneyland!
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel clean, front desk friendly. Only draw backs is you may not enter from the West, due to islands in street. From Harbor Blvd and Chapman you must make 2 right turns, wait thru 3 low signals to get into hotel. The elevators are extra small, only hold two people with luggage at a time.  One person and luggage must exit elevator if your floor comes up first. Breakfast was limited to scramble eggs or scrambled eggs with ham, pancakes freezer take cold. .
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Friendly staff, clean and modern room
Summary: My husband and I stayed four nights at the ALO while we were on vacation visiting Disneyland. We checked in later than expected due to travel constraints and despite my apologies they insisted they wouldn’t consider us a late check in until around 2am. Plenty of buffer room! My husband parked the car and the desk staff was happy to point out the best doors to take to get to different parts of the parking lot, and let us know that they share the parking structure with Ayres in case the open lot was full.  Room amenities worth mentioning are a mini fridge, pretty sweet closet/cubby setup with plenty of storage, comfortable beds and a comfy loveseat, iron and ironing board, laundry service. The only thing I looked for and didn’t find was a shower cap.  The hotel is a quick drive to
Manager Response: none

Summary: My husband and I stayed here while he attended a conference at Chapman University while I got to play. We loved the room—roomy with a great view for sunsets or reflections of sunrises, the hot breakfasts—plenty of choices, the pool and hot tub——enclosed in the hotel courtyard, the location—$5 shuttle to Disneyland and other attractions, and just the general atmosphere. Pricing was reasonable and staff were friendly. Highly recommend.

Summary: For medical reasons I had to travel to Irvine, CA for treatment.  When I called to book a hotel, one of three recommended responded immediately.  Location to the hospital was a plus and proximity to Mall Outlet was fantastic.  The hotel is immaculate, decor attractive, and amenities (ex. free parking and delicious continental breakfasts) highly appreciated.  My one complaint is we were put in a room (617) that was at the end of the hallway and seemed located next to the heating system. Occasionally,  bumping and thumping through the night was quite disturbing.  I will definitely stay there again should I have the need but will also definitely request a different room location.
Manager Response: Dear may2866,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review regarding your recent stay. I am glad that you enjoyed your experience at ALO Hotel. Your comments regarding our optimal location and well-appointed hotel are greatly appreciated. Thank you so much for your candid feedback, I hope to welcome you back soon.  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: I slept for 1 night in the ALO hotel. It has a great location for people who want to go to Disneyland. My room was big, clean and I had a nice view. Not too fancy but good! Thank you for your hospitality!
Manager Response: Dear 787adahs,  Thank you so much for reviewing our hotel. I am pleased to see that you enjoyed your stay at our hotel as well as our optimal location. Thank you for the feedback you have shared and the compliments regarding our comfortable accommodations and premium amenities. We hope to welcome you back soon.  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: I can't say enough about the front desk staff of ALO. They were all extremely helpful. I wish all hotels and organizations would follow this model and lead and empower their employees to provide genuine service.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Needed a hotel for an Anaheim CA visit but the music convention wa in town and everything was booked and the ALO was available. It’s consider city of Orange but it’s less than 10 minutes to Anaheim in an Uber Room was very clean. Hotel staff was excellent. Hotel was quiet and had normal amenities. Great Mexican restaurant attached for quick eats and breakfast is included and was standard fare of eggs pancakes bacon etc. Just a one night stay so was very happy with the choice. Wendys fast food and Starbucks 2 min walk.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Nice Rooms for relax , pleasant , comfort  and clean. .breakfast was  good but should have few more items  Location is very good near shopping area and restaurants  good Staff. Overall I recommend this hotel and will be back.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Clean, bright hotel with spacious rooms and nice staff. Restaurant was an unexpected bonus. Fabulous French/Mexican fusion food for lunches and dinners. Free breakfast was really well cooked with good options.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I have no idea how this place gets good ratings. There are plenty of nice hotels in the area you don’t need this place. Room was suppose to be ready at 3:00 didn’t get the call until 4:00. Everything here is just off. The bed sheets smelled like the haven’t been washed. The pillows smelled so bad they where unuseable. The whole place needs a complete remodel not just a paint job. They also had me sign all kinds of documents that basicly accuse you of being a lier. I was also told i couldn’t check in after midnight. What the hell is that? I prepaid for the room. If I went so tired and it wasn’t so late I would have gone somewhere else. Needless to say we will not be back.
Manager Response: Dear Joe I,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review to let others know about your recent stay. Summary: Hotel is well managed, clean and hosting is great. Has a small gym with a treadmill, recumbent bike, elliptical and weights. Breakfast room lacks ambiance, but breakfast was very good. Overall we recommend this hotel and will be back.

I hope to welcome you back soon.  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: Great option when looking for a clean and nice hotel overall. Staff is very friendly and helpful.  Can't beat the price either.  Cookies,parking and breakfast included is a nice touch. Thanks again for everything.
Manager Response: Dea Charles H,  Thank you so much for your excellent review. I am thrilled to see that you enjoyed your stay at ALO Hotel. Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary Heading: BEST HOTEL IN OC IF YOU HAVE A KID
Summary: I HATE staying in hotels b/c I'm such a light sleeper. I've been to the orange county area many times and have stayed in multiple types of hotels and airbnb. This was the best experience b/c it was sooo quiet. Breakfast was provided which was awesome b/c our kid woke up so early since she wasn't used to time change. Bed was comfy and everyone was so nice. Def will be staying here again!
Manager Response: Dear Rose Hoa D,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review to inform others about your recent stay. I am thrilled to read about your experience at ALO Hotel. Your compliments regarding our premium amenities and comfortable accommodations are greatly appreciated. Thank you again for the wonderful feedback, I hope to welcome you back soon.  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary Heading: Great location for a visit to Disneyland
Summary: Check In was quick. The room was spacious, neat and clean. The bathroom was clean and the shower pressure was fine. Wifi is free and the speed was good. We could see the evening fireworks at Disney from our room - that was really awesome :) Breakfast was included in the price and they offered a good selection- great pancakes! My one recommendation to the the hotel team would be that the breakfast area be updated, it feels very cold and has a work canteen vibe - maybe add some color, so that it is more welcoming. The Disney shuttle picks up and drops off every hour to and from the hotel.  Tickets can be purchased from the reception desk. There is a Wendy's and Best Buy next door to the hotel. This hotel is a great option when visiting Disneyland.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Room was clean and as expected after reading other reviews. Bathroom is small but clean and well supplied. Beds were comfortable and the overall room was spacious. Parking was free and easy. Free breakfast had a good variety of food choices and was very good for a free option. I would stay again.
Manager Response: Dear hskrjed,  Thank you so much for the great review of our hotel. I am pleased to see that you enjoyed your recent stay at ALO Hotel. Summary Heading: Good service but accomodations need improvement
Summary: Bed is uncomfortable with a thin blanket. I had to ask for another blanket. The drain in my tub didn't work properly til the last day (I was there for 4). Otherwise, the service and everything else was great.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Decent rooms but some obvious annoyances
Summary: The room was nice and decent, The bathroom seemed a bit cheap and spartan, though.  There were also some very obvious annoyances that, while small, would bother anyone. The bathroom floor was surprisingly slippery. The fridge would periodically whine very loudly and the AC/heater was quite loud - either of which was loud enough to make it difficult to sleep without ear plugs. The heater also blew onto the desk, which was also a little annoying when I was sitting at it.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Really enjoyed the complementary breakfasts.food was excellent,well prepared and had a great variety for your selection
Summary: We stayed at this hotel during our first trip to LA. Service was excellent. Our room was very spacious clean and comfortable. The smaller style of hotel allowed us to get to know  the helpful and professional  staff. Slept very well on the comfortable bed. Hall ways were always quiet.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is actually our second time staying at the ALO Hotel. We usually dont stay at the same location twice but the accommodations are great! Our last stay was a couple of years ago and it was a great surprise to see remodeled rooms. The beds are super comfortable, the staff is very friendly, and the location is pretty close to Disneyland. You can always take the park shuttle. I would most likely stay here a third time!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We had a great stay at this hotel. The staff is probably the major highlight here. they were super helpful and friendly. The hotel itself was very clean and comfortable. The breakfast could have used some variety day to day, but it was pretty good for hotel breakfast. The housekeeping staff were very good about replacing our towels even if we didn't really need them and cleaning up our room. It is very well located and near a lot of shops and food. Easy drive to other places nearby including Disney and the Convention Center. We would definitely stay again.
