Summary: We had a great room, very clean, and comfortable.   The staff was very accomodating.  We arrived before normal check in time from the Amtrac and they were able to get a room for us early.  We will definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Hotel was very clean and the staff was super friendly and helpful.  A big factor was that a full breakfast was included in the stay, but would have preferred a bit more variety but was still excellent.  Loved that the hotel was close to shopping at The Outlets at Orange and plenty of great restaurants.  It was our second time staying at the ALO and we will definitely stay again.  My daughter loved the fresh baked cookies every night.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed there because it was close to our relatives who lived in Orange.  The hotel staff were extremely polite and helpful.  I just wish the breakfast hours were extended to 10.00am as we were always late home and up late missing the breakfast time.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I was very impressed with this property. All the desk personnel were extremely kind and helpful. The rooms were excellent. I also enjoyed the breakfast. Real eggs. You can't beat that. They had a nice selection of meats and cereals as well as yogurts, rolls, etc.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The room was very nice. The staff was friendly. Our only complaint was the breakfast in the morning wasn't very good, but it was free so we can't really complain! Overall it was a good experience. I would recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel was a nice cheaper option in the area.  At first glance it seems a little higher class than further inspection reveals.  The hotel is obviously older but they have done a good job of maintaining it.  Breakfast included scrambled eggs, fruit, toast, yogurt, potatoes, juice etc...   My small complaints for the room were the clock radio was set to the wrong time and was impossible to figure out how to reset it.  The towel I used after showering had several long black hairs that were not my own.  Other than that everything was okay.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed two nights for a wedding and it was exactly what we were looking for. Free parking and wi-fi and included breakfast. The room was spacious - plenty of room for three bridesmaids to get ready, and very clean. We weren't in the room a lot but had no complaints when we were. It's not the most luxurious place, but it was great for what we needed, and there were tons of dining options nearby (a Starbucks and a Wendy's right next door, and The Outlets at Orange mall less than half a mile away for nicer dining/drinking options). The only minor drawbacks were no ventilation fan in the bathroom (why do hotels do this, so irritating!) and extremely soft pillows - even with two each, it felt like we were sinking all the way through them.  We would definitely stay here again if
Manager Response: none

Summary: My family stayed at this hotel during our trip to Disneyland. It was a great price and a very nice hotel. The staff were very friendly and went above and beyond for us! The breakfast could have been a little bit better, but it was complimentary, so you can't expect too much. Other than that, we had a very positive experience! Would definitely recommend to others!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We had booked a cheaper hotel for the night and soon realized we were getting what we paid for. We just left our original hotel and drove straight to ALO. We explained our situation to the staff and they were amazing and got us booked into a room immediately. The room was comfortable, spacious, clean, and beautiful. The bed was very comfortable. We slept well. We were glad we chose to switch hotels, it was well worth the price to stay at ALO. We were very impressed all around with the staff and the hotel in general. The breakfast was great too! We will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Comfortable and great value for the money!
Summary: This is the second stay at this hotel in the same year and I have enjoyed both stays greatly.  Very nice looking outside and inside.  Comfortable rooms and good, complimentary breakfast is a great feature for a family trying to save some money when on vacation.  Will stay here when I can.
Manager Response: Dear omar_nagi,  I am delighted to read that we have met your expectations time and time again! Thank you kindly for your feedback and for choosing ALO Hotel. We look forward to your next visit.  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary Heading: Good place to stay near Disneyland
Summary: This is an older hotel that has been renovated and is very nicely done.  Comfortable bed and nice bathrooms.  The WiFi is very slow.  This is also a very noisy corner with the Medical Centre right across the street.  The medical helicopter and sirens all night.
Manager Response: Dear alphal13,  Thank you kindly for your candid review. We are contented to hear that you were satisfied with the renovations of our hotel. Nevertheless, we regret to hear that your stay was anything less than exceptional. We greatly appreciate the constructive feedback you have provided and hope that you will consider staying with us in the future.  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: Convenient location, easy drive to John Wayne Airport in Santa Ana. Smaller property, great staff, super clean. Very reasonably priced. Hot breakfast in their restaurant.  included. Ask for a room higher up on the side of the hotel that faces towards Disneyland so you can watch their nightly fireworks display.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great value, Great location, Great night's sleep
Summary: No one will mistake this hotel for a 5 star resort, but then it does not come close to the expense of one either. The rooms are clean, comfortable and QUIET! The air conditioner is uses an ultra quiet fan, which really adds to a nice comfortable bed for an excellent nights sleep. The bathroom is very small - only one person at a time. This is a little inconvenient, but this is only really negative about the room. They also serve a great, hardy breakfast - eggs, bacon, sausage, fruit, croissants, and so much more. We were very busy this trip, so we did not get to try the pool, Jacuzzi or workout facilities (next time!).
Manager Response: none

Summary: Breakfast was nice and the room was very clean and comfortable. Wish I could find out where they got their pillows from as I slept like a baby.  We went on a family trip to the Angel stadium when they had the monster truck show. Was not crowded at all.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My husband has been undergoing medical procedures at the UCI Medical Center near the ALO Hotel in Orange, California.  During this stressful time every person involved with the hotel has gone above & beyond to make us feel comfortable & relaxed.  Our yellow lab is a part of our family & has also been made very welcome when we stay at the hotel.  We were at the hotel recently when a violent rainstorm occurred with a resulting power failure.  The staff rallied & made sure that every guest was comfortable, warm & had breakfast at the nearby cafe (the breakfast buffet was unable to open due to the power failure).  Cory Irwin has been the desk manager for each of our stays and is friendly, helpful and willing to listen.  Our room has been immaculate each time we have stayed.  The
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Clean, good value and great location!
Summary: I can't think of anything negative about this hotel. The hotel in general is clean and  we always come back to a clean room. The service is great and staff are friendly. There was no wait time for check-in.  The free hot breakfast can be improved with more variety, but it is still good.  Great location, close to Disney, shopping center and highway. Kids enjoyed watching the Disney fireworks from the hotel.
Manager Response: Dear beebum716,  Thank you for your time in reviewing your recent stay at our hotel! I am pleased to see that you enjoyed your stay with us. Kind compliments such as yours are what motivates our team to continue going the extra mile for our valued guests. We hope that you will return soon!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: I booked this hotel via Hotwire so I went in not expecting much; not really knowing these branch of hotels and all.  I had looked at the reviews and the majority of them were pretty positive so I went in with slight optimism.  The lobby was nice, but the room was my main concern considering I wouldn't be spending much time in the lobby.  The front desk personnel were also very helpful and friendly.   To my surprise, the room was actually pretty nice.  Very clean and spacious with a full couch and mini fridge.  The bathroom was a tad small but it wasn't a huge inconvenience for me; possibly for a tall person though. :)  I really wish I had been able to try their complimentary breakfast but sadly I had overslept.    Overall I was very pleased with my stay.  I would definitely
Manager Response: none

Summary: Enjoyed the hotel which had good accommodations, close shopping area and plenty of restaurants. TV, cable, clean rooms, double queen beds with nice linens. Full continental breakfast was worth the price.
Manager Response: Dear russmac363,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us! It is a delight to read that you enjoyed your stay, as well as our optimal location. We hope to serve you again soon.  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: Great overall but the front staff weren't the most friendly.   Our tub drain was clogged, but they were willing to switch our room but we didn't want to go through the hassle.  Breakfast food was good.  Eggs, pancakes, fruit, cereal, etc.  Full breakfast- not just a bagel and yogurt.

Summary Heading: Refreshing, good value, lovely lobby and rooms
Summary: I stay at this hotel 1-2 times a month for Ducks games. The decor of the lobby and rooms is very nice. Good breakfast with many selections - hot and cold. The staff is friendly and honor special requests - i.e. top floor and so on. Great value - Alo Hotel is up to other Ayres propertiy standards, just scaled down in size. King rooms are significantly larger than queen rooms. Both are nice and they've utilized the space.
Manager Response: Dear RhondaReynolds,  I am happy to read that you enjoyed your recent stay. Thank you kindly for your loyalty to our hotel and the compliments you have shared regarding our decór, accommodations, and exceptional team. We hope that you will choose us again anytime you are in the area!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: ALO has been great every time I have stayed here! Clean!!! comfortable beds, friendly area and staff is great. The courtyard pool is nice, hallways are quiet and the atmosphere is what keeps me coming back when ever I am in town. I like clean, comfortable and nice without the outrageous prices & snobbiness of some hotels.
Manager Response: Dear Sandra M   I am happy to see that you enjoyed your stay at ALO Hotel! Thank you for the kind feedback and we hope that you keep us in mind in the future.  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: My family & I have stayed here every time we are in the Anaheim area.  We love the friendliness, affordability, hot breakfast & super comfy beds.  I also appreciate the lemon water, hot water & coffee they always have available in the lobby.  I think it has been over 8 years for us exclusively staying at this hotel.   I sleep like a rock on those Dream Sleeper beds and wake up feeling fantastic.  Any little thing wrong with the room just tell them and they are on it!   The fan was wobbly & loud...when we got back from Disneyland that day, it was working perfectly.   I always look forward to coming back when we can!
Manager Response: Dear LoveMyFamilyLots,  Thank you kindly for your recent review and for your loyalty to ALO Hotel in Orange! We are thrilled to see that your stay exceeded your expectations. Your kind words regarding our friendly team members, Ayres Dream Sleepers, and prompt service are greatly appreciated. We look forward to your next visit!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary Heading: the most horrific customer service we have ever experienced
Summary: We just got off the phone with their general manager named sandra zuno who was very unprofessional and the most inflexible person we have had to deal with. We have a family of 4 and requested for a room with two queen beds and they flatly denied our request asking us to pay an additional $56. In all my years, I have never experienced this. I regret even having to stay at this hotel. Beware of ALO Hotel.
Manager Response: Dear John S.,  I regret to read that your stay was anything less than exceptional. We always encourage our guests to book directly with us as opposed to booking via third parties such as Hotwire or Expedia, etc. to ensure satisfaction. Unfortunately, reservations from third parties cannot be modified at the hotel level; therefore, in order to accommodate our guests' request we offer an upgraded room for a nominal fee which was quoted at an additional $10 plus tax per night. We also extend complimentary cancellations on a case by case basis to, again, ensure guest satisfaction. Nevertheless, it saddens us to see that we were unable to provide exceptional service. We hope that your future accommodations are comfortable and satisfying.  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: We got an awesome deal on the ALO hotel when booking on Hotwire.com - just $89/night.  We stayed 3 nights.  The hotel is easy to find and is close to area attractions including the Disneyland Resort.  If you are visiting Disneyland, park in the Toy Story parking lot (this is official Disney parking) at the corner of Harbor & Katella.  It is the closest to the hotel (about 5 mins with lights and traffic), and is much better parking than the Mickey & Friends parking structure.  There is also a shuttle operated by ART that leaves to/from the hotel, tho I believe it only runs every 20 mins or so.  The hotel is very nicely appointed, being a boutique style hotel.  Contemporary decor everywhere.  Great FREE buffet style breakfast with hot items including eggs (add cheese or salsa if
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: With all the competition, I'd look eleswhere
Summary: We spent 6 nights at Hotel Alo during the Christmas/New Years Holiday (2015-16).   It is an aging hotel. Recent updates include the lobby space which gives a great 'first impression', but quickly fades as you move into the elevator corridor. They also recently added to/updated the landscaping and it gives it curb appeal...again which does nothing for the rooms or the overall hotel feel.   Hotel was clean and comfortable throughout, although bordering on too dated to be comfortable. Rooms felt on the small side and Beds were o.k., bathrooms were older with some peeling on the porcelain and the tube too shallow to be of any use. Furniture was older but nice and tidy. No separate fan or fan control (that we could find) existed for the bathroom, which presented many unpleasant
Manager Response: Dear Mathmattx,  Thank you for taking the time to candidly review your time with us. I am disappointed by the many aspects of your stay which were inconsistent and unenjoyable. Summary: Hassle free and pleasurable staff. We had no worries and the room itself was cozy and felt like being home.  Lover the dark woood furnishings and comfortable bed. Perfectly located near a Wendy's, Starbucks, and Best Buy.  WIll make it my home away from home with my  love for sure!
Manager Response: Dear Cheryl J,  Thank you so much for taking the time to review our hotel based on your most recent stay. Summary: I found this hotel last minute on Hotels.com as my family and I decided to stay an extra day. We were transferring from a different hotel but we wanted to go to Disneyland first thing in the morning, so they let us park and take the ART from the hotel even though we wouldn't be checking in until later on in the afternoon. The customer service was awesome! The room was a bit small but it had all the accommodations I was looking for. It was clean for the most part, except for a washcloth that clearly had makeup stains on it. We just didn't use that one. The free breakfast in the morning was well-stocked. However, there was no room to sit in the allotted space in the dining room so some people had to eat elsewhere. We got a seat just as another family was leaving. Overall it was a

Summary: The rooms were kind of small, however it was good for the price.  And a good thing about it was the "FREE" breakfast in the morning. That saves a family of 4 an easy 30.00 on breakfast in the morning.  We were treated by the staff great and they were informative. They made the stay very comfortable and easy to check in and out.

Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary Heading: One of the best hotel near disneyland
Summary: Free breakfast and parking. Near freeway makes the drive easy to go to Disneyland.  Friendly staffs. I told the front desk that the bath tub was clogged at 8:40 am and I was told it will be cleared as soon as the maintenance come back at 9:00 and he did.
Manager Response: Dear DLAPH,  We are thrilled to see you that you enjoyed your most recent stay at ALO Hotel! Your kind words regarding our optimal location and our amazing team are greatly appreciated. We look forward to your next stay with us.  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: Near the freeway and the theme park, convenient for driving visitors . Outlet located at a nearby walking distance . Water, coffee and snacks are provided . Free parking and fast wifi access . Low room rate with high quality

Summary: I wasn't really at the actually hotel very much at all. I'm for sure not the most qualified person to rate the quality of the hotel.  The time that I was there, I felt the staff were all very kind and accommodating, everything was clean, and the quality of everything was great.   My only complaint is that I was placed in room 101, which is the one located closest to the lobby. It was kind of loud in the morning with everyone running around for their day in Anaheim. If I had stayed more than the one day, I probably would have asked for another room.
Manager Response: Dear ryneweir,  All feedback is great feedback! We truly appreciate the time you took in writing this review and are contented to read that our hotel was impressionable. Nevertheless, we regret to hear that the room you stayed left much to be desired. In the future, we kindly encourage you to request a room that is conducive to your preferences and needs. Our team will do our best to accommodate your needs to the best of our abilities.  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: Stay was average. Rooms were nice but we were given the wrong rooms and part of our party was charged extra at the fault of front desk. Continental breakfast was poor. Could have had a better selection like other hotels in the Disney resort area.
Manager Response: Dear Kelseysantajuana,  Thank you for the opportunity to serve you during your recent visit to the Orange area. Please accept my most sincere apologies for the inconvenience you experienced concerning your party's room. I always welcome our guest's honest feedback as constructive criticism to ensure that we continue to grow in terms of guest service and the exclusive amenities we offer. I am saddened to read that you did not enjoy our complimentary full American breakfast. We try our best to accommodate each of our guest's tastes and are disappointed when our variety does not meet expectations. We hope these small inconsistencies do not keep you from returning in the future. Thank you again for your review.  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: I stayed here for one night. My room ( #500 on the fifth floor) was clean though the furniture was a bit dated for being a boutique style hotel. The floor plan was generous and the room included a flat screen tv, microwave and small refrigerator. There were plenty of towels in the bathroom and the shower had good water pressure. The hotel is not far from Disneyland, however close to shopping and great restaurants. Do try Anepalco located adjacent to the lobby. Great mexican food.  I would recommend staying here.
Manager Response: Dear Ken C.,  Thank you for allowing us the opportunity to serve you upon your recent visit to the area. Our spacious and well-appointed accommodations are a point of pride for us and I am pleased to see that it made all the difference during your stay! I agree that Anepalco's is a wonderful place to grab a meal and conveniently located adjacent to our hotel. We do hope to see you back soon!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: Five people including me stayed two nights in ALO. It was a pleasant stay. Continental breakfast was good; rooms were clean, staffs were courteous. Location easily access from freeway (inter. 5).  One thing is worth to mention about amenity in the room. I do not know why you do not have bottle water in the room. The explaination of staff is unsatisfactory!
Manager Response: Dear Khen D.,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay. I am pleased to see you enjoyed our full American breakfast buffet, well-appointed accommodations, and team members. Our optimal location is conducive to our guest's needs and I am delighted that was the case for you and yours. Thank you for your review and we hope to see you soon.  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: We stay here 2-4 times per year. Great place to stay. On a route to Disney. Great place. Clean lobby. Clean rooms. Refrigerator in the room (mini) fitness center isn't great but it isn't terrible. An elliptical. A treadmill. Exercise bike and free weights to 22.5 pounds. Quick check in/out. Decent hot breakfast but this last stay they were very busy and tables were not cleaned quickly and people left their plates and drinks on the table and it stayed there awhile. Petty I know but just my observation. Steps away from a Wendy's Quiznos and Starbucks. About 500 feet from a mall with plenty of food and shops offerings. Fair warning. Located near lots of medical centers so you may hear ambulance sirens occasionally. In 3 nights I heard one that woke me up. Overall though this is a
Manager Response: Dear Jrivvy,  Thank you for allowing us the opportunity to serve you upon your recent visit to the area. Thank you for your feedback concerning our breakfast area. Your review will absolutely serve as a training platform for our team members. We hope to see you back soon!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: ALO was perfect in every respect when I took my trip. While I was initially apprehensive b/c of its size being much smaller than the other brand name hotels in the area I was extremely happy with my choice upon arrival. Staff was kind and very helpful. Location is great, at least if disneyland is you destination. Rooms were good size and well kempt. Would stay here again
Manager Response: Dear Strayowl,  Thank you for choosing ALO Hotel to serve as your home away from home. I am pleased to read that we exceeded your expectations in terms of location, accommodations, and cleanliness. We hope to host your next visit!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: Not to far from Disneyland. We used a cab it was about 20 dollars round trip. Parking at Disney is 25$ so you save money. Also parking is payed with the reservation and breakfast also comes with the package.  Trust me you save a whole lot just in that. Oh and free WiFi.      One of the best hotels I've stayed at. Great Service, rooms are spacious and all clean, neat. They try to accommodate you. Very respectful.
Manager Response: Dear Eva Vivana O,  I am thrilled that you found our hotel location and amenities conducive to your needs. It is always humbling to hear when we exceed our guest's expectations. Our team works hard to accommodate each guest and I am always glad to see that our guests take notice. Please come visit us again soon!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: Great hotel, nice decor, clean big rooms, excellent service (especially by Luis #1 and Luis #2). Easy access to Disney (shuttle stops at the door), free parking, fast internet. Beakfast was OK, but could be better. Everything is worth the money! Shopping and restaurants are less than a mile away. Oh, and Best Buy is next door! Will gladly come back.
Manager Response: Dear cool_alaska,  Thank you for choosing ALO Hotel for your recent stay in Orange! I appreciate your candid feedback concerning our breakfast. We are always looking to make improvements where necessary and truly appreciate any feedback our guests are willing to give. We certainly hope to welcome you back soon!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary Heading: Alo" is a vacation in of itself"
Summary: It is a pleasure again to review my favorite all time hotel in southern CA, the ALO hotel. My son & myself, stayed here yet again,for another wonderful stay Dec 1,2,3. It just seems to get better and better with each and every stay.we plan on going again early February, and sure are looking forward to that.I must mention the staff members who have made our stay, worth coming again and again,Sandra zuno,Jaye brown, and Cory Irwin".thank you all for everything you do.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  It is always a pleasure to read reviews such as yours. I am delighted to know that we are considered your all-time favorite hotel in Southern California! Thank you for your personal compliments regarding our team. We are always more than happy to accommodate our guests in any way we can. Service is a top priority for our team and we are humbled by your kind words. Thank you for your continued loyalty to us and we look forward to seeing you in February!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: I stayed for one night before an interview.  My room was clean but there were a couple things that left me wanting.  There were no accessible outlets near the bed, which is a pain since I like to charge my phone by the bedside and use it as an alarm.  The bathroom could have used more lighting.  There was no in-room safe.  I liked the dark wood headboards, though, and I really liked that the room had a pretty ceiling fan with extra lighting.  The complimentary breakfast was pretty good.  I sat near the front windows in the room closer to the lobby and I thought the decor in that room was neat.  I agree with other reviewers, though, that the back room with the buffet was pretty drab.  The food was plentiful and there were many options.  I liked the breakfast potatoes and the
Manager Response: Dear MedStudentLauren,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay at our hotel. I am pleased to read that you enjoyed your stay with us overall. Thank you for your candid feedback concerning our room layout and lobby. We always welcome feedback such as yours to ensure we are offering only the best service and accommodations to our valued guests. It is a delight to read that you enjoyed your time with us and we certainly hope to welcome you back in the future.  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary Heading: A real deal and close to Disney
Summary: My family and I made a two day Disney excursion and a 1 night stay at the ALO, which was a really good value, considering the free continental breakfast (comparable to Denny's/IHOP), free Wi-Fi, and free parking. I paid about $145 for a family of 4. It was very clean, although the decor could be a little more modern/nostalgic, than nostalgic.
Manager Response: Dear Wayne410,  Thank you for choosing us for your recent visit to the area! I am happy to see that you enjoyed our exclusive amenities and well-appointed accommodations. Thank you for your candid review. We hope to see you back soon!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: Good access to Disneyland and Outlets at Orange.  The Anaheim Resort bus picks up at the hotel and the outlet stores are within walking distance.  Hot breakfast is included and the pool looked good.  Worth a try.
Manager Response: Dear John E.,  Thank you for your wonderful review. I am happy to see that we made a difference in your time in Orange. Please come back and see us again soon!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: Really enjoyed the hotel.  The restaurant's food was delicious, and was a great venue to meet and chat with people.  We started outside on the patio area, and had no issues coming inside when it started raining.  The room I stayed in was beautiful and clean.  It had everything I needed to get ready for an important interview.  My only issue was with the wired internet plug under the desk.  I prefer the reliability of a wired connection to wi-fi, so I got a cable from the front desk.  Upon plugging it in, I was unable to gain access to the internet.  That said, the wi-fi had no problems whatsoever, so the vast majority of people would not even notice this.
Manager Response: Dear 956marcusa,  Thank you kindly for taking the time to write a review to let others know about your recent stay at ALO Hotel. I am thrilled to hear you enjoyed your stay as well the accommodation we have to offer. Nevertheless, I regret to hear that you were unable to establish a direct connection to access internet. In the future, please do not refrain from bringing any issues you may experience to our attention. We make it our mission to resolve any and all issues our guests may experience. Thank you again for the feedback and we hope to welcome you back soon.  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General manager

Summary Heading: Clean but very disappointed with the details
Summary: We felt like we were mislead by all the good reviews we read for this place which is why we picked it.  The room had unfinished ceilings. The walls in the tiny bathroom were not in good condition or not finished. There wasnt even a fan in the bathroom! The complimentary breakfast was okay but the dining space for those with the terribly stark and no windows.   Not at all what the picture showed. We were escorted to a room in the back past the nicer dining room to a small room with a sign taped to the door saying "complimentary breakfast" and the room had no wall decorations and just some foldout plywood tables and chairs. If I one that is how those that got their breakfast included with the room were treated I would have happily paid a higher room fee somewhere else. I would not
Manager Response: Dear Mr. Plamondon,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. Per the email I sent you in response to your TrustYou survey, our team works hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience and it's apparent that we fell short in your case. Our ceilings and bathroom walls are a plaster finish done in the European style using a towel to smooth and swirl the plaster to create the "old world look". In regards to our breakfast room, we recently converted a former meeting space into a breakfast room and we are continually making improvements. I want to assure you that each guest's experience is our top priority. Our goal is to provide a positive experience to every guest that stays at our hotel. Please feel free to contact me directly if you need assistance with any further concerns. Thank you for allowing us the opportunity to serve you.  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: We stayed here for one night and were very pleased with the hotel. The price was totally reasonable. It's in a good neighborhood, and there are lots of restaurants within walking distance. The rooms were clean and comfortable. The heated pool and jacuzzi were perfect for the time of year we were there. The breakfast was great too! Will definitely stay here again!!
Manager Response: Dear Bntravelx4,  Thank you kindly for your candid review regarding your most recent stay at our hotel. It is great to hear that you were pleased with your stay and the value our hotel has to offer. We greatly appreciate your kind words in regards to the cleanliness of our hotel, the optimal location, and the delicious complimentary full American breakfast. We look forward to your next visit!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary Heading: Our favorite place to stay when visiting Disneyland
Summary: We visit Disneyland quite often. This was our 3rd time staying here in the last 6 months. The superb customer service and over all quality stay of this place has been consistent every visit. I am not exaggerating when I say we LOVE staying here. It's such a comforting feeling to know after the long drive we will arrive to a clean, safe, friendly, welcoming environment. They're definitely kid friendly too. We travel with a total of 6 kids combined in our large group and don't feel the need to hush them onsite. And we can't forget the FREE buffet breakfast. It's definitely not a teeny tiny continental breakfast. It's all you can eat and it is GOOD. Book here, you won't regret it!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Nice, clean, good service, and a great complimentary breakfast.
Summary: This hotel was great, I will definitely be returning. The rooms are a little small, but they're so cute everything else makes up for it. There are shuttles to the Disney Parks throughout the day for a very small fee. The complimentary breakfast is very good and saved us $ by not having to buy for our family of 5 (probably saved us a good $60 a day by not having to go out and buy breakfast) not to mention it is good, hot food.
Manager Response: Dear Amanda P,  Thank so much for providing some insight based on your most recent stay at ALO Hotel. We are contented to hear that you had a great stay at out hotel. Thank you so much for your generous feedback regarding our accommodations, complimentary amenities, and the value our hotel has to offer. We look forward to serving you again!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: Great customer service at the front desk! We missed our shuttle twice because the driver didnt stop so the Alo took us. They didn't need to. And the hotel has been updated. It is old but clean! Very shocked though. I am a cancer patient. I have a Bag of drugs and one of those daily things. I didn't even look in my bag because it was mostly there for emergencies. When we got home I discovered, It had been gone through, some drugs missing and a box of variety of cold meds are missing. Disappointed to say the least. These drugs aren't cheap! In fact very expensive! The bag was even hidden. I recommend they get safes!  We have stayed at this property 3 times. Probably will again but don't take anything of value.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your time in reviewing your recent stay with us. I encourage you to reach out to me directly to ensure that your medication is located in our Lost & Found. We have a very honest and trustworthy team and I am disheartened to read that your medication is missing. I certainly understand your disappointment but would love to get to the bottom of the missing medication, as I am sure you would as well. Thank you kindly for your continued loyalty to Ayres Hotels and I look forward to hearing from you and welcoming you back next time!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: We've stayed here several times for business, and always appreciate this hotel. This time we did not have a chance to have the complimentary breakfast which was the only drawback, but we ALWAYS have dinner at least once at Anepalco, which is a part of the hotel. It rocks!!! Excellently balanced dishes! Also a plus to be able to see the Disneyland fireworks from our hotel room.
Manager Response: Dear this-a-way-valerie,  Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your recent stay. Our entire team greatly appreciates your kind words and are glad to hear that you had an enjoyable stay. We look forward to your next visit!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: Very nice, well kept hotel just a short distance from the parks, in a nice business area.  Starbucks and some shopping just a short walk across a parking lot.  Easy access to highway 5 and the 57.  This is our second stay at an Ayres Hotel and they have been excellent. The staff were very friendly and helpful and the rooms were kept clean and maintained well.
Manager Response: Dear fdelamathome,  We are thrilled to see you that you enjoyed your most recent stay at ALO Hotel. Your kind words regarding our optimal location and exceptional customer service are greatly appreciated. We look forward to your next stay with us.  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary Heading: Customer service was bad for us
Summary: The reason I say for us is because when we arrived we did not get treated with kindness like others ... We had some issues and no I'm so sorry about this let me fix it since it was not your fault it was a mistake the hotel did... Our booking was canceled from someone at the hotel and rebooked for our checkout date and the guy did not want to help us and was telling me there where completely booked and couldn't help I had to call hotels.com and have them call him and it was just a frustrating situation. He seemed like he did not want us there. Kinda felt discriminated !!! Other people or hotel guest would come by and he would greet them so nice and to us he was rude like we had done something wrong!!! Eventually long story short we did get a room "sold out " 🤔😠😒!!! We got
Manager Response: Dear Carmencita726,  Thank you for allowing us the opportunity to serve you and for your detailed review regarding your time with us. I am certainly taken aback by the apparent lack of exceptional service you received. Safety, cleanliness, and guest service are among our highest priority. As you stated in your review, and as outlined in fellow guest's reviews, our commitment to top-notch service is a point of pride for us. It is saddening that you did not receive the service you truly deserve. I will absolutely use your review as a training platform for our entire team to ensure this does not occur again in the future. Thank you again for the opportunity to serve you and I truly hope to welcome you back soon to deliver you the experience you deserve.  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: Originally booked online.  Had the opportunity to book another night so I called the local number. I can not remember the girl that I spoke with (so sorry) but she was SO helpful and courteous! We were able to pick our son up a day early from College and sneak in a day at Disney. The only downside was the front desk clerk, Drew. I do remember his name......rude, curt. I asked a couple of questions when we arrived and he was less than helpful and seemed like he really didn't want to be there. I got more information from housekeeping staff:) That being said - the place was clean, comfy bed and great location. Breakfast was so-so.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great location, close to shopping and restaurants. The room size was generous but the value was the best part. Decor was toward the old world charm but modern and beds were comfortable. Will definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Free parking, no Resort Fee, eggs & sausage for breakfast. Clean, updated rooms. Stayed with extended family and had adjoining rooms. Couch in room. Covered parking available. Friendly staff. Great location to DLand.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Third time we have stayed here.  On/off freeway to Disneyland, 5 minute drive. Good breakfast and plenty of parking. Friendly staff, clean rooms.  Was here for Thanksgiving with family. Will definitely stay again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I used to stay here when my son was in college. It is close to Chapman College. Since I don't know the area very well and was visiting family in Santa Ana, I decided to stay here again. I did not know they built an Ayres Hotel (which this used to be branded) right next door or I would have chosen that. They have rebuilt the lobby to look modern, but the rooms are the same and dated. The room was fine, but the common  areas like the hallways were too cold. It seems to be a popular hotel now for families going to Disneyland. It isn't close but a bus ride away. So at 6 am there were kids SCREAMING bloody murder in the hallways. The restaurant for breakfast was terrible. Runny eggs, terrible french toast, and burned coffee. Don't stay here for the free breakfast. The breakfast rooms
Manager Response: Dear jebett,  Thank you kindly for your candid review. While I wish your experience would have been far more pleasant, I appreciate the feedback you have provided as it will allow us to make changes where necessary. Please accept my most sincere apologies in regards to the dissatisfaction caused by other guests. I regret to read that our breakfast was not up to your standards, but would like to assure you that your comments will not be taken lightly. Once again, thank you for your critical feedback and I kindly encourage you to give us another opportunity to provide the service you deserve.  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: Conveniently located and close enough to Disneyland; easy shuttle service offered for a small fee that picks you up in front of the hotel. Hotel staff very friendly and rooms nice, clean and quiet.  Complimentary breakfast was very nice, it wasn't your typical cereal and toast.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: ALO Hotel was great for our Disneyland vacation!
Summary: This room was a great value compared to other budget hotels near Disneyland! The room was very nice, it was clean, and the beds were comfortable. There was plenty of shelf, closet and drawer space and plenty of outlets right on the main table and lamp for easy charging of electronic devices. Towels were soft, the bathroom was clean and the shower had great pressure. Could hear a little noise from the hall if people were noisy, but otherwise the room was quiet! Breakfast was fantastic with plenty of choices and a little change each day for variety - included eggs, potatoes, fruit, yogurt, cereal, toast & croissants, pancakes or french toast, bacon or sausage, juice, coffee and hot chocolate! The shuttle to Disneyland was a great value and very convenient! We went in November, so
Manager Response: none

Summary: The customer service was very good and the breakfast was much better than what you would find in other hotels, the rooms were clean the hotel was nice. The location was a little farther away but they have a shuttle that goes to Disneyland. I would definitely consider staying here in the future
Manager Response: Dear Aileen J.,  Thank you for your time in reviewing your recent stay. I am delighted to read that our accommodations and service exceeded your expectations. We certainly hope to see you back soon!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: Was a Good stay, just wished that the Breakfast hours went until 10 am and also Disneyland was a bit further away than the 2-miles it states that they are, I don't know what it was but it seems to take a while to shuttle us over there.
Manager Response: Dear TrippyFox,  Thank you for allowing us the opportunity to serve you upon your recent visit to Orange, California! I hope to see you back soon!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary Heading: I WAS NOT IMPRESSED AT ALL
Summary: Had business in the area. I used to live about 1/4 mile from here. This hotel was, at one point a Holiday Inn, decades ago. The hotel was undergoing a paint job. It somewhat had an "english-countryside-theme" Now the room was huge: couch/coffee table. Great bathroom, new fixtures. The A/C worked perfectly. comfortable bed. The was nothing wrong with the room. The pool area was very small, and situated next to a driveway and parking lot. Zero Ambiance.  And their "included breakfast"? although not HORRID it was far from WONDERFUL.  Totally blah. The hotel, Food, Everything.
Manager Response: Dear Aerovergalineas,  Thank you for your candid review of our hotel. While I am pleased the room itself proved comfortable, please accept my most sincere apologies for a stay that you felt was not up to par. I  appreciate your comments about our exclusive complimentary breakfast as well. We are constantly revisiting our offerings and will definitely use your feedback when we next review them. Furthermore, we kindly encourage you to visit us in the future, further renovations are scheduled to take place. Thank you again for your kind review.  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary Heading: This bargain is not what we bargained for
Summary: We originally got a good deal through a hotel booking website but we were astonished to find our room was not up to any type of standard we were looking for. Unfortunately we found that 2 of our sheets and one of our pillows had old, dry blood on them. We called the lobby who weren't apologetic at all and hung up after saying they would send someone up. I will give kudos to the security supervisor who was the only one who really showed us any care about what was going on when he came to the room.  He upgraded us to a better room and apologized.   We called the next day and the supervisor was never notified of what happened, and when I called later that week to make sure management knew they also had no idea, like it had been brushed under the rug. Out of any service personnel we
Manager Response: Dear Jacob H,  Thank you kindly for taking the time to write a review on TripAdvisor. Your input, as well as the feedback from each of our guests is quite important as we are always looking for ways to improve our service. In regards to your recent stay, please accept my most sincere apology that your experience with us was anything less than remarkable. I certainly empathize with your frustration regarding the lack of communications between management. Nevertheless, we assure you that our night auditor at the front desk brought this matter to the attention of our Front Desk Supervisor, Cory. Cory then informed our Assistant General Manager, Jaye who informed myself. On behalf of our entire team, I would like to extend my most sincere apologies for the discomfort you experienced during your stay. I truly appreciate your candid feedback. We always strive to accommodate our valued guests with exceptional value, accommodations, and service. I am saddened to see that we missed that mark with you. Thank you again for your review and we only hope that you will give us another opportunity to redeem ourselves in the future.  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary Heading: High end atmosphere at a low end price...what to expect at the ALO
Summary: Simply put, the ALO is an inexpensive hotel trying very hard to be upscale.  For the most part it succeeds at being a nice clean hotel at a good price.  It’s not upscale, but again, for the price you should not expect it to be.  Room: Decent size room clean with OK bathroom.  Most important, it was clean and nicely decorated.   Service: Front desk was staffed by what appear to be college students.  They work hard and where efficient at their work.  No issues.  Location: Right in the heart of Orange County.  Seemed to be neither close nor too far from anything. Price: Best part of the whole thing.  Upscale attempt at a low price means goood value for any traveller.  Felt more like a business motel.  The chain is family owned and decorated with many family pictures.  My room had a
Manager Response: Dear Mr. Gaucho,  Thank you for taking the time to submit a review on TripAdvisor for fellow travelers. I am pleased to read that our accommodations were of good size to your standards and that our cleanliness was a stand-out point for you. I am proud that you found our team members to be hardworking and efficient. They will be happy to see your praise! I agree that our value is one of the most popular points of interests when our guests book their stay and am happy to see that you agree. We hope to welcome you back any time you are in the Orange area!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: Free parking.  Super close to the Orange Outlets (previously known as the Block of Orange).  The Orange Outlets have Dave and Busters, Buffalo Wild Wings, Corner Bakery, El Torito, Carls Jr., BJ's Pizza, Fridays, Market Broiler, Nordstrom Rack, Burke Williams, AMC movie theater, and much much more.  This hotel is close to the Angel Stadium and to Disneyland.  Super close to the Orange Circle which is a cute place filled with antique shops and lots of little restaurants.  And there's a Westfield Mall off the next freeway offramp off the 5 freeway. ALO Hotel staff very friendly.  Grounds super clean. It's like a boutique hotel.  Beds comfy, rooms super clean, super quiet.  This is my 2nd time staying here and I am planning on staying here again.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent visit with us at ALO Hotel in Orange! I am pleased to see that you found our location convenient to local points of interests, shopping, and dining options. I am also delighted to read that you found our accommodations well-appointed and immaculately tidy. We certainly look forward to welcoming you back again soon!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: Wonderful hotel and staff. Great location. Close to Disneyland and the outlets. Could see the fireworks. Comfortable and clean beds and rooms. Safe parking. Very nice neighborhood. Excellent price and breakfast included. We had an issue with our next-door neighbors in call down to the front desk. They immediately sent up security. The noise stopped for 30 seconds. Then loud music started up. Called the front desk again. They came straight back up and took care of it. Super helpful. Maid service was good. The ladies working were very nice and dos a great job each day on our room.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your detailed review regarding your recent experience at ALO Hotel! While I am saddened that there was a slight issue concerning noise, I am pleased to see that our team went above and beyond to ensure that your stay was not disturbed. Please come back to visit us again any time you are in the area!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: Check was quick and smooth after a long drive from Reno. Very accommodating when we changed the dates. Breakfast was better than most American hotel and served hot foods. Rooms where comfortable and the bathroom was clean. We drove and self parked at Disneyland the 1st day which cost $18 and as a fair walk to the entrances. 2nd day we caught the shuttle from the hotel ($5 each) and drop us only a short walk to the entrance and was quick than driving ourselves. I would recommend this hotel to anyone wanting to stay in Anaheim.
Manager Response: Dear Steve,  Thank you for choosing ALO Hotel for your recent visit to Orange. I am pleased to see that there were no hang-ups when you needed to revise your reservation. I appreciate your kind words and recommendation and hope to see you back soon!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: I stayed at ALO hotel the night before an interview at UC Irvine Medical Center.  The staff was friendly, bed was very comfortable, and room was tidy.  I was able to walk across the street to the hospital in the morning very easily.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for allowing us the opportunity to serve you during your recent visit to Orange! Thank you for your compliments concerning our friendly and professional team as well as our exceptional accommodations. We hope your interview went well and we hope to see you back whenever you return to the area!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: We stayed six nights at the ALO, and it was a very nice experience. The staff was pleasant, the morning breakfast was great, the room was clean, and the bed was very comfortable.  We will stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your time in reviewing your recent stay with us. I am beyond thrilled to read that your experience was exceptional. Our entire team warmly welcomes your kind compliments regarding their service, cleanliness of our accommodations, and breakfast. We look forward to welcoming you back!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: Great value. Very clean inviting lobby. Clean contemporary roomm personnel very friendly and helpful. Free breaks was nice, however a bit more selection would have been most welcome. Will definitely return.
Manager Response: Dear Paul,  Thank you for the short and sweet feedback! I am thrilled to see that you enjoyed your stay and truly hope to welcome you back soon.  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: We stumbled on this hotel when we couldn't find a reasonably priced pair of rooms for a trip to Disneyland. We have stayed at another Ayres property several times near the baseball stadium and so took the gamble on booking this hotel because of our excellent experience there.  The ALO is easy to find from the highway, exiting the I-5, its pretty much right off the road a little passed Disneyland when heading south.  Front desk area looks fantastic, the two guys behind the counter were approachable, intelligent, and very helpful. Full marks to them!  The rooms are good size, large bed, nice pillows, plenty of counter space in the bathroom. A pleasantly built cabinet with a small fridge, and coffee making cubby hole was found near the bathroom. Everything was CLEAN! And not just
Manager Response: Dear Kevin M.,  Thank you  for choosing ALO Hotel for your most recent visit to Orange! I agree that our location is optimal and our accommodations are well-appointed. Your compliments regarding our team members is wonderful to hear! Our team works diligently to provide a memorable stay for each guest and I am always pleased to see the compliments they receive from our guests. We hope to host your return stay!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: I took my 18 year-old for a one night trip. He attends an annual convention, but being 18, can't get a hotel room. We took Amtrak to ANA, then the #14 shuttle (Bay 12) goes right to this hotel! Easy! Staff was excellent and very well groomed. Water, coffee, cookies in the lobby (I don't eat sugar, but nice touch). Place was spotless! I am a frugal person, but won't stay in junk hotels. Room was clean and very nice. Place was quiet. Restaurant (I like the dark furniture) was crowded, which is not always the case at a hotel. Free breakfast is free so no complaints there..I know some will cry a river that there is not an omelette guy and such, but it's free. C'mon. Easy check out. We'll do the same and if going for a weekend, Amtrak to station (Honda Center and baseball stadium are
Manager Response: Dear Robert R.,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent "quick stay"! I am delighted to read that you found our accommodations comfortable and conducive to your needs. I did want to inform you that our new policy allows us to host guests 18 years and older! We look forward to serving you folks again soon, thank you again for your review.  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: before booking this hotel i read many of the reviews. some of the things people complain about are such petty things. we found the staff to be wonderful. the breakfast was great.shuttle service to the park was on time (5 dollars per adult) you can come and go as many times as you would like. hot tub/pool area was nice and clean. the room and bed was very comfortable. yes the rooms could use a little tlc but they are not run down by any means. we would stay here again in a heartbeat. the only reason i did not give five stars is because there is always room for improvement. thanks ALO staff
Manager Response: Dear Mike W.,  Thank you for allowing us the opportunity to wow you during your recent visit to Orange County! I am pleased to read that you enjoyed your stay and appreciate your many compliments. We work hard to provide only the best in accommodations and service and are humbled when our guests take notice. Looking forward to your return!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary Heading: Simple, clean, free breakfast and wifi
Summary: Choose this hotel for the November Blizzcon event. I got separate rooms booking on the internet but the staff help me changed them into the same one so I don't need to keep checking in and out. The room is on first floor. Shower area has some hair left behind and a small spider appeared in the second day of my stay. (Since it's a room in the first floor, I guess that could happen?) However, if you're not an OCD person, they're not going to bother you. I had a comfort stay for these days, and the breakfast and wifi is free which is really great. (The bacon and sausages are a bit too salty though.)  The only thing I'm not happy with is the transportation system. It takes more than 40 mins to walk to Disneyland or Anaheim Convention center, and the bus is never on schedule. On
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to submit a review of your stay based on your experience with us. While I am disappointed to read of the inconvenience you experienced with Anaheim Resort Transit, I am pleased to see that you are able to differentiate inconsistencies on their part and not on our own. Thank you for your kind compliments and I truly hope you will come back for a return stay in the near future.  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: We had a great stay at the ALO. Room was very clean and comfortable, we even had a view of fireworks from Disneyland. Overall great choice for a budget minded hotel stay. Good breakfast just plan on getting there early.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to leave feedback regarding your recent stay at our hotel. I am thrilled to read that your stay was enjoyable and you were able to take advantage of our complimentary full American breakfast. Please come back to see us soon!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: This hotel does not get a 5 star rating because the rooms are old and need to be redone, however the lobby and outside of the hotel have been recently renovated and are great.  There were a few problems on our floor as a result of unruly guests however staff remained professional and dealt with the problem immediately! We would like to mention Luis at the front desk who was great- friendly, professional and helpful. The manager?- did not catch her name was also good.  The hotel breakfast was wayyyy more than expected and very good. The shuttle to Disney picks you up at the lobby doors and is also very convenient.  The hotel location, while slightly far from the parks- is very good as it is easy to find- just off the highway and only a block away from an outlet mall.  We
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for choosing ALO Hotel and for your feedback regarding our recent lobby and exterior renovations. I appreciate your candid words regarding our rooms and will keep these comments in mind when looking to make improvements. I certainly hope to welcome you back very soon.  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: Very nice place to stay. Clean and friendly. We stayed in the double queen room. Bathroom is small but doable. Has a fridge. Decent breakfast perfect for families to load up before the park. Shuttles to and from the park and on schedule. Starbucks is very close. Staff is very friendly.
Manager Response: Dear Carmel T.,  Thank you for reviewing your recent stay at ALO Hotel! I am pleased to read that your stay was pleasant and you enjoyed our lux accommodations and amenities. Come back for a return visit soon!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary Heading: Nice location - close to theme parks but quieter than hotels right by the parks.
Summary: ALO hotel had great staff. Breakfast was plentiful. Room was nice but bathroom was not at clean as I would have liked it (hair on floor as well as rubber band from braces). The hot tub and pool area were nice.  Lobby had computer and printer for buying theme park tickets which saves us time. Glad we paid a discounted price.
Manager Response: Dear kkimColorado,  Thank you kindly for your candid review on TripAdvisor. We are thrilled to hear that you had a pleasant interaction with out team members and indulged in out complimentary breakfast. Nevertheless, please accept our most sincere apologies for falling short of yours and our own standards of cleanliness. Thank you once again for your review and we look forward to serving you in the future.  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: One of the best hotels I have stayed in LA.  Accessible to Disney through their shuttle. The front desk staff are very friendly.  It's worth staying with free wifi, parking and breakfast. Would recommend to family and friends.
Manager Response: Dear Anthony S.,  Thank you for your time in reviewing your recent visit to our hotel. I appreciate your compliments regarding our convenient location, complimentary full American breakfast and wifi, and friendly team members. I appreciate your recommendation and hope to see you again soon!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: The room was clean and comfortable bed. The room had a ceiling fan which was very nice. The downside was that at about 11:00 pm after we had just fallen asleep, we were awakened with the strong stench of pot-weed aroma filling our entire room to the point it woke us up and we felt nausea. The safety-latch lock on our room-door was not bolted to the door anymore, so we had to put a chair against the door handle to act as a lock. And the breakfast has gone way downhill since we stayed here a year ago.  No more bacon, no more fruit loops, and cheap orange flavored drink in place of orange juice. We stayed 3 days and never saw bacon.  The entire breakfast is mass produced rubbery scramble-type egg substitute, a gallon mass strawberry flavored yogurt poured into a giant serving bowl,
Manager Response: Dear Tori G.,  My deepest and sincerest apologies for your stay being anything less than stellar. When outside circumstances or situations occur, we encourage our guests to inform our front desk as soon as possible so that we may remedy the occurrence and ensure the duration of your stay is enjoyable. It is likely that an occurrence that is harming your stay is also harming other guests so it is of the utmost importance that it is brought to our attention. The same goes for any maintenance issues such as your door locking mechanism. Safety is our top priority and we prefer our guests feel safe while still maintaining proper Fire Safety Codes by not blocking doorways. I certainly appreciate all of the candid and necessary details you have outlined in your review and absolutely hope to see you back soon!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: Room were specious.  The check in service was fast didn't take much time.  The price for the room was ok coz I got it by hotwire . The room were clean and tidy.  The breakfast was horrible. The parking was full at night so had to park at the other block
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to review your most recent stay at our hotel. I appreciate the kind compliments you have extended regarding our efficient service and spacious accommodations. We hope to see you return soon!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: We stayed for 3 nights while we visited Disneyland and the hotel is conveniently located, close to Disneyland and the Orange Outlet shopping mall. The rooms are big and the complimentary breakfast was adequate, but not more. There is a shuttle service to Disneyland, which cost $5 both ways and the parking is free.
Manager Response: Dear Bass93,  Thank you for allowing us the opportunity to host your most recent visit to Orange! Our close proximity to the Outlets at Orange and Disneyland is an added plus to our exceptional accommodations and amenities. Thank you kindly for your insightful review. We hope to welcome you back very soon!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: its a nice place. Nothing spectacular. The room is clean, quiet and the bed is nice and soft. The staff was really nice. No complaints from me. The pool looks a lot bigger than on the website and the gym is the size of a closet if that's important to you. It looks like it shares the same property as the Ares hotel. Its walking distance to the block and is close to major freeways. I really recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Normzilla,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent experience at our hotel! I am pleased to see that you found our team friendly and professional and our accommodations clean and comfortable. I appreciate your vital feedback as well as your personal recommendation for those planning a stay in Orange. Looking forward to welcoming you back soon!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary Heading: Decent hotel, near to Disneyland, on shuttle route
Summary: My family went for a 3-day Disney trip. Found this hotel, fairly close to Disney park, on Shuttle route 14 of the Anaheim Resort Transportation (ART). Close enough to be able to head back via Shuttle for lunch/nap breaks, before heading back to the Disney park in late afternoon.   Breakfast inclusive. Hot breakfast, such as omelets, and pancakes, bacon/sausage, and pastries. Free parking for guests too. Small pool and hot-tub at the hotel.  Rooms are ok. A little dated, but still comfortable.  Does have Wendy's, Starbucks and Quiznos next door.
Manager Response: Dear Khamen77,  Thank you for choosing ALO Hotel and for your review regarding your stay. I am delighted to read that you enjoyed our accommodations and exclusive amenities, including our full American breakfast buffet. We look forward to welcoming you back!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: After many years of travel I came upon ALO only by chance that my go to hotel was filled for the night I was in town and so remembering the hotel across the street.  I "flew over" on Google Earth to get the name and address.  To my delight ALO met and exceeded all those things expected of the big guys. The staff, the hotel, and the best hotel bed I have ever found.
Manager Response: Dear John Sweeney,  Thank you for your time in writing a review concerning your recent stay with us. I am pleased to see that we exceeded your expectations in terms of our comfortable and luxurious accommodations as well as our friendly and professional team members! Looking forward to welcoming you back!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: I've stayed at this hotel approximately 4 times over the last 6 years. This year they did some renovations of their front desk/check in area. I appreciated the water stand in the lobby. Breakfast was great - french toast or pancakes every day with scrambled eggs and country potatoes, assortment of bread/bagels and juice (although I would've loved something NON-citrus, like cranberry). The staff at every stay has been very attentive and welcoming. The drive to Disneyland is very short (hop on I-5 and it's literally a few minutes; the line for parking usually takes longer than the drive to the park). I've only used it once, but the ART transportation has been convenient in the past, rarely crowded to the point of standing-room-only.  One thing I feel I should mention: when we
Manager Response: Dear smeows -  It was wonderful welcoming you back! Thank you for making us your choice of hotel when visiting the are these past 6 years. We absolutely love welcoming back our repeat guests and are very happy to know you found your stay exceptional once more. We look forward to welcoming you for stay number 5 and sincerely appreciate your continued patronage.   Safe travels,   Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary Heading: Great staff but location bit far from Disneyland for kid's naptime
Summary: One of the main reason's why I wanted to leave a review was because of Corey. He really took care of us. Before we arrived I called and talked to Corey about options on how to get transportation from LAX to the hotel. He didn't have all the answers but he gave me all the options he could think of. When we got to the hotel he followed up asking me what we ended up doing so that he could help the next customer with the same issue. That was awesome! The hotel manager was great as well.  Pros: clean and comfortable room, great maid service, excellent hot breakfast, and ice water and cookies in the lobby.  Cons: wifi was hard to work with, one staff member got after our kids for a minor issue, couldn't take breakfast items back up to the room for my wife, and I wished there were more
Manager Response: Dear kjkora -  Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience and for allowing us the opportunity to welcome you. While we are thrilled to know you found the guestroom clean and the breakfast excellent, we do apologize for any inconvenience caused by the Wi-Fi or by our location. Some travelers find the location a nice escape from the hustle and bustle of the Disneyland area, but we do understand that guests' needs will differ. We hope you will still allow us the chance to welcome you back.   Warm regards,   Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: Arrived early evening to a very unfriendly, muttering front desk clerk.  His version of referring us to a dinner place was printing a list of restaurants and sliding it to us on the counter.   Carpet in the room was damp...  Most frustrating thing was waking up early to work out before working only to find out the exercise room did not open until 7am.  Tried to work with another unfriendly front desk employee who was very un-cooperative.  First attempt was at 6:30am, when I went back at 7am door still locked, had to call twice to get someone open it by 7:10am.  Only helpful, polite staff were the two that worked around 8am and helped with directions for work.
Manager Response: Dear Laura C =  Thank you for your review of our hotel. Please accept our sincere apologies for any issues you may have experienced. We absolutely wish for every guest to be treated with the utmost care, courtesy, and hospitality, and we are so very sorry if this was not the case during your stay. Your feedback is very important to us and will be used to reinforce our normally exceptional service standards. We hope you will still allow another opportunity to show you how comfortable and welcoming stay at our hotel can be.   Sincerely,   Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: We stayed here for 2 nights while we visited Disney. Great hotel for a great price. The hotel offers a shuttle to and from Disney which is cheaper than taxi or parking there. The swimming pool is very nice and clean and the rooms are spacious and clean with all the amenities. But what made this hotel stand out for me was the free breakfast. This is real hot breakfast buffet not your average coffee and toast. Eggs, pancakes, french toast, sausages, hash browns, fresh fruit, juices, coffee, you name it! So worth it. I highly recommend it.  My only "complain" would be the super thin walls. We could hear people talking on both sides of our room.
Manager Response: Dear Jenny G -  It was a pleasure welcoming you as our guest for two nights! Thank you so much for your kind words and for choosing us for your stay. We know you have many choices in the area and are so pleased to have had the chance to accommodate you. We are so thrilled to know you found everything from the hot breakfast to the room cleanliness conducive to a comfortable and relaxing visit. Please consider us the next time you are in the area.   Happy travels,   Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary Heading: Much different from the other Ayres Inn, stay there if you can
Summary: I'm a fairly easy guest anywhere we stay. We don't make a lot of mess or noise, and expect little assistance or extra amenities. Something as basic as a greeting and goodbye when we check-in and out of the hotel IS something I expect. We barely received a 'Hi' when we walked in and were basically processed through. I am looking for more than someone just doing their job in a polite enough way. I expect hospitality and I definitely did not receive this. When we walked by housekeeping in the halls, they would say hello to the staff member behind us rather than acknowledge us. It all just gave a very unwelcoming vibe. I was also quite disappointed by the "complimentary breakfast" in comparison to what they offered at the other Ayres Inn just down the road. We had the same frozen
Manager Response: Dear jklemnop -  Thank you very much for your candid review of our hotel. We are so sorry if your stay with us was anything less than exceptional. We want each and every one of our guests to feel welcome and well accommodated, and I sincerely apologize if this was not the case during your visit. Please know that your comments are being take very seriously and are being shared with the appropriate team members to ensure against anything like this in the future. We will also be using your breakfast comments to help guide us when we next revisit our offerings. We hope you will still allow us another chance to welcome you and should you how remarkable a stay with us can be.   Sincerely,   Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: This hotel is a great value with and extremely friendly staff. The rooms were very clean and the beds were super comfortable.  The breakfast was really great.  Perfect place to stay with your family.  The pool area was perfect.
Manager Response: Dear lizzybaby80 -  Thank you for your very kind review and for choosing our hotel for your visit. It is always fantastic to hear that a guest's stay has been comfortable and that the service provided was exceptional. We are also very happy to hear that you found value in your stay. We hope you will allow us another opportunity to welcome you very soon.   Sincerely,   Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: Spent one night bed was wonderful The only negative was the restaurant  no American food menu difficult to read  Complimentary breakfast was great. Sandra a ALO employee came around and asked if she could help anyone  she was wonderful Room was very clean  Good for families All the main restaurants close by. Wendy's is next door
Manager Response: Dear Lulu120639 -  Thank you so much for allowing us the opportunity to welcome you for a night and for your feedback. It was a pleasure providing you with a comfortable and clean stay, and we are delighted to know you left with a positive impression of our hotel. We hope your travels bring you back very soon.   Regards,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary Heading: Clean room and close to everything
Summary: The staff was wonderful, offered us an early check in since our flight arrived at 8 am. Room were clean and cofortable. Pool was nice and was always empty, so we took advantage of that. The free breakfast was okay, but it was the same thing everyday, Overall, it was a great stay
Manager Response: Dear gentrydavies -  It was an absolute pleasure having you as our guest. Thank you so much for choosing our hotel for your stay and for taking the time to share your experience with fellow travelers. We are very happy to hear you found our location convenient and the rooms clean and comfortable. We sincerely appreciate your patronage and hope you will visit again very soon.   Safe travels,   Sandra Zuno  General Manager

Summary: I stayed with my family just for two nights and with the only purpose of going to Disney and we had an excellent experience. Hotel is very nice and clean, staff very friendly, outdoor pool and hot tub, nice hot breakfast, free parking, free wifi and shuttle to Disney for $5 roundtrip ($2 for kids under 8) we didn't try the restaurant but heard its really nice (closed on Mondays though) and there are plenty of dining options very close by. Rooms are really nice, clean and confortable. I think its a perfect hotel for a Disney trip with the family, totally recommend it!
Manager Response: Dear Alonso M -  Thank you so much for your kind review and for allowing us the opportunity to welcome you. We are beyond thrilled to know you found every element of your stay excellent and sincerely appreciate your recommendation. We hope your travels bring you back very soon.   Warm regards,   Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: There was an old musty smell to the hotel. It was in the rooms and hallways. The lobby was cute and modern so heading down the hallway towards the rooms was disappointing. The elevator hall was lined with old black and white photos that did not match the decor of the lobby. The decor in the hallways leading to the rooms was old fashioned. The furniture and decor in the room was easily 20 years old and looked it. There was a ceiling fan in the room. I thought that was strange. It didn't work. The AC didn't seem to cool down much, but maybe that was because of the humidity. The breakfast was the same every morning {i've never seen an egg disk before) and was in a small side room near the restaurant. The restaurant was only open one night that we were there so I can't review that
Manager Response: Dear Gabbyaz,  Thank you for your time in submitting a review for fellow TripAdvisor travelers. I am saddened to read that you will not be returning but certainly appreciate your feedback regarding our accommodations. We are continually looking at ways we may improve and reviews such as yours help us in that process. Thank you for allowing us the opportunity to serve you.  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: About as far away from Disneyland that I wanted. Rooms were clean and comfortable. Pool was perfect temperature for evening swim. We checked out restaurant down stairs but thought it wasn't as warm and cozy as we were looking for so pour group walked about a block away to El toritos. Lots of places to eat around there so if you want to have a couple cocktails and not drive it's a great hotel. Anaheim stadium is very close.
Manager Response: Dear Cathy W -  We sincerely appreciate you taking the time to share your experience with fellow travelers and are also so grateful you chose our hotel for your stay. We are so pleased to hear you found your guestroom clean and that your overall stay was so enjoyable. We look forward to having you as our guest again soon. Thank you again for your comments.   Warm regards,   Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary Heading: Very good but then not so good
Summary: The staff was very friendly and knowledgeable. Every complaint was dealt with quickly and professionally. There were complaints, though. Lamp on the bedside table did not work. The A/C was set at 74 but the room was 80 or so. We had to turn down the thermostat to mid 60's to get the room 76. One morning I completely lost water several times during my shower. The room is set up well for business and pleasure. The desk had a wired network connection. Wifi was also available and was quick and easy to connect to. The TV selection was very good.
