When changing channels, however, the TV would often change two channels for each click. Made it hard to channel surf.  Breakfast was better than most. It also changed each morning. The ambiance, however, had much to be desired. It felt like
Manager Response: Dear genehouk -  Thank you very much for your candid comments and for allowing us the opportunity to welcome you. While we are very pleased to know you experienced helpful and friendly service, we do sincerely apologize for the various issues that arose in the guestroom. Our goal is to ensure each guest experiences the most comfortable stay possible and what was described would certainly hinder a stay. Please know that these comments are being used to make the appropriate necessary changes. We sincerely appreciate your comments and hope you will visit again.   Regards,   Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary Heading: EXCELLENT STAY! PERFECT ACCOMODATIONS!! VERY HAPPY!
Summary: As a very experienced traveler and after staying at pretty much EVERY hotel near Disneyland this is the best hotel of all. First of all, when I was concerned about a couple of their accommodations (mostly because they seemed too good to be true), I sent an email via the Hotel;s Facebook page and received an email right back from the Hotel Manager, not only answering all my questions, but making sure I received the room that would fit me the best. FREE PARKING! What? Yes indeed!! Free Wireless!! Free HOT Breakfast buffet!! NO RESORT FEES!! These are non-existing at Disney area Hotels,  but not here.
Manager Response: Dear LLevy412 -  Wow! Thank you so much for your very enthusiastic review of our hotel. We sincerely appreciate you choosing us for your visit and are so pleased to know you found everything from the complimentary breakfast to the service exceptional. To hear that a guest has found his or her stay "perfect" is a hotel's dream, and we are so humbled by your kind words. Thank you again for your review, and please visit again very soon.   Sincerely,   Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: We love ALO. We have stayed here time and time again. We love the staff, the professionalism, the pet friendly, and the courtesy of the staff. We love te breakfast. We love everything about this hotel. It's always the first place we check!
Manager Response: Dear ColtonandStepha... W -  And we love welcoming you! Thank you so very much for your positive review and for taking the time to share your experience with fellow travelers. We are always so excited to welcome back our repeat guests and are ecstatic to know we are your choice of hotel when in the area. We sincerely appreciate your patronage and look forward to your next visit.   Sincerely,   Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary Heading: Great place to stay and visit Disneyland !
Summary: We stayed here for our Anniversary trip to Disneyland.  The Front Desk clerk that checked us in even gave us a complimentary bottle of wine.  The breakfast is awesome and a good way to avoid expensive food inside Disneyland in the morning.  Be aware, they said that they served until 9:30am but the last day we were there we arrived downstairs for breakfast at 9:10am and it was all over and being packed up.  They offer free parking which helps to make up for parking in the structure for Disneyland every day.  Some hotels that are closer to the park charge almost as much per car as the park.  The room was gorgeous with a leather sofa / bed and coffee table.  We know where we want to stay again whenever we visit now.  Check with Getaway Today for specials for this Hotel, it is
Manager Response: Dear blpettyaz -  Thank you so much for allowing us to welcome you on your special day and happy anniversary! It was such a pleasure welcoming you as our guests and we are beyond thrilled to know you found each element of your stay exceptional and that your overall experience was so positive. We cannot wait to welcome you back.   Warm regards,   Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: Over all, this hotel was excellent for the price we got through HotWire.   I was impressed with how clean this hotel was!  I would come back and recommend this place to family and friends:)  Good location to everything and close drive to Disneyland!
Manager Response: Dear Kitty415 -  And we were thrilled to have the opportunity to impress you! Thank you so much for taking a chance on us and for allowing us to welcome you. We sincerely appreciate your kind comments and are elated at your very positive and clean experience. We hope your travels bring you back very soon. Thank you again for your feedback.  Safe travels,   Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: Stay away from ALO Hotel! Room was dirty, stained carpet, black tile grout, 1970's ceiling fan, blood on lamp shade, hair on bath towels, water stains on bathroom walls, had odor, A/C wall unit didn't work, dusty, glass on night stand had smudges from previous guest and breakfast was disgusting. Staff not accommodating! Pay $10 more and stay at Hyatt.
Manager Response: Dear Charlene H.,  Thank you for allowing us the opportunity to serve you and for your detailed review outlining your experience. I am disappointed to see the many inconsistencies you encountered while with us. I would like to assure you that cleanliness is one of our main concerns and top priorities. Reading what you have pointed out is absolutely unacceptable and will be investigated further to ensure we are providing only the best in accommodations and service. I thank you for your candid review as we make it a point to improve continually and always welcome critical feedback. I can only hope you will allow us the opportunity to welcome you back in the future. Nevertheless, I truly do appreciate your review.  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for low cost hotel
Summary: Wonderful value for business or visiting Disneyland . Great help and staff. Low cost. Good value. Perfect location.  Walking distance to UCI Medical Center and family friendly mall. You wont be disappointed and your family will thank you along with your dog if you want to  bring
Manager Response: Dear Richard K -  It was a pleasure having you as our guest. We sincerely appreciate you choosing us for your stay and taking the time to share your experience on TripAdvisor. It is wonderful to hear you found value in your stay as well as exceptional service. We hope you will visit again in the near future.   Regards,   Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: Overall rate is acceptable for a short stay. Rooms are clean. Price is encouraging to stay. Close to outlets mall and Disney land. They offer shuttle service to Disney land. Nothing else to do in that area.
Manager Response: Dear Muaaz H -  Thank you so much for choosing us for your short stay and for sharing your feedback with fellow travelers. It means so much to us that you took the time to review our hotel and we are so pleased to know you found the overall stay comfortable. We are very sorry if the location was not more conducive to your needs, however. We hope you will allow us to welcome you for a longer stay in the near future.   Sincerely,   Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: The hotel was clean, the staff was very helpful and friendly. The hotel offers free breakfest for hotel guest. It's not the four seasons, so to hear people complain about the complimentary breakfast is too funny. The shuttle for Disneyland comes daily every 20-30 mins. $5 for a round trip ticket. Well worth it vs fighting for a parking space and paying $20 plus per day to park at the park. We will be back for another fantastic trip.
Manager Response: Dear Sal M -  Thank you very much for your kind comments and for choosing our hotel for you stay. It was a pleasure having you as our guest and we are so thrilled to know your experience with us was one of comfort and value. We sincerely appreciate you taking the time to share your thoughts and hope to welcome you back very soon.   Regards,   Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: All I needed from the hotel was there. The room clean, a lot of space, very comfortable bad, desk, fast always working wifi, tv, clean bathroom, even a coffee maker in the room. The staff professional, always available, always very kind and helpful. No bothering from anyone. Delicious breakfast. The location just perfect for me, visiting UCI, but also saw many families with children. Easy and cheap transfer to and from the hotel to the airport. Even coffee, tea, cold water and biscuits available for all visitors at any time located near the front desk. Everything was just perfect.
Manager Response: Dear Maciej S -  We sincerely appreciate your very kind comments regarding our hotel. Thank you so much for choosing us and for taking the time to share your feedback. To know we have provided a "perfect" stay to a guest is simply amazing and we are so very happy to have done so. We are very grateful for your review and hope you will visit again very soon.   Warm regards,   Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary Heading: Great little hotel in the Orange County area.
Summary: This is a fantastic little hotel that has easy access to shopping, entertainment and the Disney parks. Clean rooms, friendly staff and quaint pool area make this place a winner! My family and I did not experience any of the noise issues that others mention. The elevators are on the small size so if you travel heavy you'll need to make multiple trips to your room. The staff greeted us every time we were leaving and arriving and asked us if there was anything they could do for us during our five day stay. I didn't find the bathrooms too small, they are not huge but I didn't have a problem closing the door then using the toilet, that seems pretty straight forward bathroom usage to me.   I would totally recommend this hotel to friends and family that are traveling to this area.
Manager Response: Dear Steve A -  It was a pleasure welcoming you for five days recently. Thank you so very much for your kind feedback and for taking the time to share it with the world. Our goal is to provide the most exceptional service and comfortable accommodations possible, so when a guest lets us know we have succeeded in this goal it is fantastic. We are so very grateful for your patronage and hope your travels bring you back very soon.   Sincerely,   Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: My 9 day stay was unexpected as my Dad became ill during my vacation visit and then spent a week in ICU at UC Irvine before passing away.  I booked the room because it was across the street from the hospital and I needed a place to rest other than my Dad's room, even though they had a bed made up for me there.  Every staff person at ALO that I came in contact with was kind, efficient and professional; I will never forget how wonderful they were.  Now for the room pros and cons:  I really liked my room - I was on the fourth floor next the end of hall staircase (opposite end down the hall away from the elevator) and heard absolutely no noise when I was in the room - other than Disney fireworks.  More pros:   Free Parking, free coffee and ice cold lemon water in the lobby,
Manager Response: Dear Pfaye -  Thank you very much for taking the time to share your feedback and please accept our deepest condolences for the loss of your father. We are pleased to have provided you a comfortable place to stay during this absolutely difficult time. Your comments are being used to make adjustments as necessary and we are very grateful for them. Perhaps you will have the chance to visit again soon under different circumstances. Travel safely.   Take care,  Sandra Zuno

Summary Heading: Not the place for a quiet stay, but staff is great!
Summary: My wife and I spent three nights recently.  Rooms are small-ish and noisy from all the children in attendance.  Hot water in the shower cuts off after about 4 minutes.  Wish the front desk would tell you that up front. Complimentary breakfast buffet is below standard and served with disposable plates and plastic utensils.   But the staff go out of their way to make you fell welcome.  They would be the only reason we would return.
Manager Response: Dear busterboddikrabb -  Thank you so very much for you candid review of our hotel and for taking the time to share your feedback with your fellow travelers. While we are so pleased to know you found the service amenable, we are so sorry if your stay was not more exceptional and for any noise you may have experienced. Please know that your comments will absolutely be shared with our Front Desk team to ensure we are thoroughly informing guests of all aspects of the hotel. We hope you will allow us another opportunity to welcome you.   Sincerely,   Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: This hotel is modern and a very short drive to Disney, right off the 5 freeway. The beds were super comfortable! It is surrounded by some fast food restaurants, but mostly office and medical buildings. Being close to a hospital did become frustrating every night when we were woken by sirens on multiple occasions. The front desk people were friendly on check in, but over the course of our four day visit they never once greeted us again as we literally walked right by them going to the elevator. I think I received a smile from one gentleman. The hot breakfast is pretty basic and located in a windowless room with some folding leg tables. The hotel offers water and cookies by check in, but don't count on the cookies ever being there. The room was average size and it was really nice
Manager Response: Dear Erin V.,  Thank you for taking the time to write a detailed review regarding your recent visit with us. I am saddened to see that you did not find the great value we strive to provide our guests. It is feedback such as yours which keeps us growing and learning and for that we sincerely thank you. I certainly hope to welcome you back.  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: We were pleasantly surprised when our daughter Kim contacted ALO Hotel and got a knock at the door and received a nice bottle of wine and gift from the ALO Hotel Staff and Management. All of the staff were friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Dear Richard D,  We are truly humbled to read that we were your chosen hotel for such a memorable event! We take it upon ourselves to go above and beyond for our valued guests. It is truly a pleasure to provide them with a lasting impression. Thank you so much for the feedback you have provided us with. We look forward to celebrating your next anniversary!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: Fantastic stay. The staff were eager to help and very friendly. The breakfast was also great. It was a hearty meal and not some cheap bagel breakfast like other hotels offer. The A.R.T. shuttle stopped right in front of th hotel so we didn't have to walk far. We would definitely stay here again in the future.
Manager Response: Dear altorres1976 -  And it was fantastic welcoming you! We sincerely appreciate your kind comments and also being your choice of hotel. We love providing guests comfortable and fantastic stays, so it is wonderful to know yours was so positive. We hope you will visit again very soon.   Safe travels,   Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary Heading: Good hotel for the money, free parking and breakfast buffet
Summary: The property was neat and clean. Fresh lemon water and coffee always available in the lobby. Staff was nice and accomodating but sometimes didn't answer the phone when you called from your room. Breakfast buffet was good, but could offer more variety. Food rotated every 3 days only switching out pancakes for french toast and sausage for bacon. Should be more fruit and cereal selection, including kid cereal. When they say they close at 9, they mean it! They should offer multiple food stations because there was a huge line one morning and if you were last in line, they wont replenish anything at 8:50. Bathroom was very small but room had a shelving unit that offered a lot of space for your things. Microwave and ice machine is only on 2nd floor, laundry option on 4th. Pool is
Manager Response: Dear DfromGlendale,  Thank you for choosing ALO Hotel and for your detailed review! I am glad to see that you enjoyed your stay overall. I truly appreciate your feedback regarding our breakfast policies and will take these into account when looking to make improvements in the future. Again, thank you for the opportunity to serve you and we hope to welcome you back soon!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: The location was great was prefect for our needs. We ended up doing dinner at Downtown Disney and it was an easy trip. The purpose of this trip was a funeral and a visit to the Disney property was not part of the plan. The room was clean and ready to go upon arrival. I would stay her again in the future. Breakfast was awesome too.
Manager Response: Dear 890daleb,  Thank you for taking the time to submit a TripAdvisor review for fellow travelers. It is humbling to see that you found our accommodations to be conducive to your needs! Although the purpose of your visit was not for fun, I am proud to know that our team and accommodations wowed you! We look forward to welcoming you back for leisure next time!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: The hotel was great as always.  Booked two rooms but had to cancel one of them due to an injury with person unable to travel.  Canceled without a problem.  The room and the service was exceptional and parking was not a problem.  Breakfast was good with enough selections to satisfy.  Check in and check out were easy.  Will stay again when in the area.
Manager Response: Dear Steven B.,  I am delighted to read that your stay was a phenomenal one! It is our top priority to exceed each guest's expectations when hosting your stay and I am always overjoyed to see that we did just that. I look forward to welcoming you back the next time you are in the area!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: Extremely comfortable and everyone on the staff were courteous. The front desk clerk even found a pet friendly restaurant for us. She went the extra mile and everything she did she did with a beautiful smile. Thanks!
Manager Response: Dear Eva F,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us! Your kind compliments are warmly welcomed as our team works diligently to leave a lasting impression for each of our guests. We are looking forward to serving you again.  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: My boyfriend and I had an amazing time at the ALO Hotel. We booked through Hotwire, the staff was very friendly upon check in, and the ART picks up right in front for Disneyland, loved that check out was noon so we didn't feel rushed. We will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Though the room wasn't clean upon arrival, once it was it was great and everybody who works here is nice. we had requested an ADA room as my husband is in a wheelchair, i thought it was odd that they called a day earlier to check to see if "we really needed a handicap room" are there people out there that lie about that? Kind of scary. Great hotel, if I ever need it again I'd definitely check in here first
Manager Response: none

Summary: Hotel was very clean. Staff was very helpful. Breakfast was perfect. A really pleasant stay. Would book with them again in a heartbeat. Great location close to Disneyland. Shuttle worked well, used it every day.
Manager Response: Dear jvandervest,  Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your recent stay. Our entire team greatly appreciates your kind words and are delighted to see that you had an enjoyable stay. Please keep us in mind the next time you are in the area!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: Corey took my phone call a couple days before our stay. My husband was having surgery at UCI medical center and we needed somewhere close and affordable. I had called a couple other hotels in the area and customer service to me is everything ( the other places simply did not have it) Corey was so helpful, set us on the ground floor and asked how he could help. When we checked in everyone was smiling and inviting. The hotel itself is clean and well taken care of. Our room was spacious and comfortable. After my husband's surgery we had to stay for the follow up. Corey provided a wheel chair for my husband and even offered to help me get him up!! To me this was above and beyond. They cleaned our room when we asked and when I was able to get him up and out of the room for a few.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The staff at check-in were nice and helpful. The warm chocolate chip cookies were yummy and ready when we arrived. The room was clean and the bed comfortable. A nice selection for breakfast which was good.
Manager Response: Dear michelegR7891JF,  Thank you kindly for taking the time to share about your recent experience at our hotel. I am delighted to read that you enjoyed your time with us and I thank you for your kind compliments regarding our team members and exclusive amenities. We thank you again for your review and cannot wait to welcome you back!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: Wonderful location near the Interstate, plenty of free parking, walking distance from a shopping center that had good restaurants, good size room, nice breakfast room with a good breakfast.   Next occasion to be in the area we'll be back.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We had such a wonderful stay and would highly recommend it to anyone and everyone!  Clean and incredibly welcoming staff!  One of the gentleman checking us in was so above and beyond welcoming, giving us so much information on the areas surrounding the hotel that we took his advice on places to walk, shop, and eat. He definitely knows the area!! We had the best time taking all he said and putting it in action! Look forward to going next year!
Manager Response: Dear Javier,  Thank you for choosing ALO Hotel and for taking the time to write a review for fellow TripAdvisor travelers. I am proud to see that our team blew you away with their knowledge of the area and friendly demeanor. It's always an honor to see that we left a lasting impression. Thank you again for your review; we are looking forward to having you back!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: Hotel is such  a great value- Free internet, Parking, hot breakfast, and nice rooms with fridge and good size.. We have stayed many many times as a Disney pass holder we get special pricing..breakfast area gets filled up and tables do need busing more often.. Greeting at check in by Drew was non exisitant, not rude or anything like that. Just no thanks for returning or welcome, as I'm used to hearing from previous times.. Hotel is one of our favorites
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your time in reviewing your recent stay with us. I am delighted to see that you enjoyed all of our exclusive amenities as well as our great value! I am, however, saddened to see that the service you received lacked the enthusiasm that you are familiar with when you stay with us. Rest assured, your review will certainly act as a training platform to ensure we are performing consistently for all of our guests.  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: Hotel was clean and the room was comfortable. The breakfast was OK but it would have been nice if the tables were cleaned occasionally. The dishes were picked up but the tables were very sticky both mornings and I never saw anyone wipe them at any time we were there. It is nice they have lemon ice water and cookies available during the day. The ART transportation was unreliable at times especially in the evenings, mornings were on time. They are close to the Disney Parks and have adequate parking. The hotel staff were friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Dear TimDean3,  Thank you for allowing us the opportunity to serve you and for your time in reviewing your recent stay! I am disappointed to see that we did not meet yours, nor our own, high standards of cleanliness during breakfast. Your review will certainly act as a training platform for our breakfast team to ensure that we are tending to tables that need our attention. With that being said, I am pleased to see that our friendly and professional team met your expectations and that our optimal location worked out well for you. We hope you will allow us the opportunity to serve you any time you are in the area.  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary Heading: Very nice hotel!  Very nice price!  Conveniently located.
Summary: Our room was very well appointed and clean. The beds were really comfortable. Pool area was nice but I wish they had beach towels. Staff was great. Love the water and coffee station in the lobby.  Didn't take advantage of the breakfast so I can't comment on that...Very close to the Honda Center - we took Uber. Hotel shuttle available for Disneyland trips.  I'd definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Shelley,  Thank you for taking the time to submit a review for TripAdvisor for fellow travelers to view. I appreciate your glowing review and kind compliments. Our team works diligently to provide the highest level of service and accommodations that we would expect if we were guests ourselves. It always humbles us to see that we have left a positive lasting impression. Until next time!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary Heading: Nice and Clean.  Short drive to Toy Story Lot.
Summary: The service was extremely friendly.  Always look forward to the ice water returning from a scorching day of play.  There is also coffee and maybe a couple cookies if you are lucky.  The swimming pool is fine for little kids or even adventurous adults.  Our rooms are clean except for a hair here or there.  Baths are clean except for the one or two stray hairs again.  Everything works, but the bathroom does show signs of age.  If you are parking at Disneyland, it is a little more than a ten minutes drive to the Toy Story Parking Lot.  I wouldn't pass up a deal at staying here.
Manager Response: Dear Fawn,  Thank you for allowing us the opportunity to serve you during your recent visit to the area! I truly appreciate your sincere feedback and recommendations in regards to our accommodations. We keep all guest comments and concerns in mind when looking for ways we can improve and always accept criticism constructively. Thank you again for your time in writing a detailed review. We look forward to your next visit!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: Stayed here while visiting my son at Chapman University.  This is a great location, easy to get in and out of.  I was traveling with my mother who is in her 80"s.  The hotel gave us special care in room location and proximity to parking.  The staff is very nice and I will definitely come back here on my next visit.
Manager Response: Dear Sailb0atgirl,  Thank you for choosing ALO Hotel! I am delighted to see that we were able to accommodate you and your mother in a room conducive to your needs. We look forward to making more memories with you while your son continues his education at Chapman University! Thank you again for your high praise.  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: This is what a hotel should be, I requested a first floor pet friendly room, and upon arrival received a first floor pet friendly room! (at a very fair rate for a tourist area, with a pet fee). From the moment we checked in, we knew we made a great choice. Clean room, friendly and knowledgeable staff, and a great location. We picked The ALO, for it's walking distance to Angel Stadium as well as many restaurants and attractions in the area (Both walking and a very short drive!) The FREE breakfast was a nice treat with fresh coffee, juices and HOT foods as well as  outdoor seating on the patio which was a great way to start the day.This is a family motel as there are many children there due to being a very short drive to Disneyland. This location also has a shuttle bus stop to
Manager Response: Dear Larilu,  Thank you for choosing ALO Hotel for your recent visit to the area! I certainly appreciate your detailed review and high praise. It is humbling to see that you rated your stay as well as our service and accommodations so highly. We look forward to hosting your next visit!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: We were at run Disney for the week.  The morning breakfast was great, there was outside patio where I could eat with two toddlers (twins).  If I was rating just the hotel staff for the weekend I would have given them Excellent.  The hotel staff were patient, help with extra information and made checking in easy and providing all information up front, like connecting to the internet without being asked.  The rooms were clean and roomy.
Manager Response: Dear Vangie,  Thank you for your review! I am pleased to read that you chose our hotel for your recent visit to Disneyland Resort. We take great pride in providing the highest level of service and exceptional accommodations. Our team works diligently each day to ensure our guests take note of the extra mile they are always willing to go. Thank you again for taking the time to inform fellow TripAdvisor travelers of your recent stay with us. We look forward to your next stay!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: This hotel is right across the street from UC Irvine Med Center, so it is ideal for anyone traveling for care, or visiting patients.  The room was very clean, bathroom spotless.  Bed was comfortable. Starbucks next door, plus a full breakfast in the morning, which was very generous and well prepared.  Lobby has drinks and coffee all day, which is a really nice touch.  I will return whenever I am in the are for business or leisure.
Manager Response: Dear PetalumaMamma,  Thank you for your time in reviewing your recent stay with us. I am delighted to see that you found our exceptional accommodations and convenient location conducive to your needs. Thank you kindly for your glowing review and recommendation. We look forward to your return!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: Hotel was clean. Staff were friendly and helpful. Parking was free, never had a problem finding a space in our 5 night stay. Breakfast buffet was ok. Man, although the lines get looooong if you go after 8AM. May be it was a bad timing since we ran into  a bunch of soccer teams staying in the hotel and breakfast line got crowded. Being a Sep long weekend didnt help either but I was able to eat and it was free unlike other hotels charging for it.  ART shuttle stops RIGHT infront of the hotel lobby. Super convenient. Hotel very close (~1- 1.5 miles) to Disneyland. Rooms were cleaned on time and nice.  Overall, like I said, a happy family here.
Manager Response: Dear Anvs,  Thank you for taking the time out of your day to submit a review regarding your recent visit to our hotel. I am absolutely thrilled to read that our accommodations and exclusive amenities were exactly what you and your family were looking for! We take great pride in providing exceptional guest service and accommodations for each guest who enters our doors and are humbled when we leave a lasting impression. From our happy family to yours, we look forward to welcoming you back!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary Heading: You will want to go back
Summary: I've stayed at ALO at least three times in the past year. The rooms are exquisite, classy, clean, modern, spacious, equiped with a mini fridge, coffee maker, iron and ironing board. All the rooms have a beautiful view. There is a gym in the fifth floor, laundry room in the fourth. A great restaurant within the hotel premises, Anepalco. Breakfast is delicious and it is included. There is a Starbucks, a Wendy's and a Quiznos less than a half block away. Transportation to Disney, the airports and great front desk help to meet your needs. You will want to go back again and again.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am delighted to see that our well-appointed accommodations were just to your liking! Our optimal location was carefully planned out with our guests' convenience in mind. It is always humbling to see that our guests have taken notice of all the measures we go to in order to ensure an enjoyable stay. Thank you so much for your detailed review and we certainly look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Sincerely,  Sandra Zuno General Manager

Summary: AOL Hotel is a quaint hotel that is very convenient for those staying in the Orange County area.  The staff is friendly and helpful.  The cookies are delicious and the breakfast is not five star but enough to fill your stomach to start the day.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We appreciate you mentioning our friendly and helpful staff.  We look forward to welcoming you back again in the future.

Summary: A decent hotel, clean, decent sized rooms. Friendly staff. Only issues is it was a little further than we like when going to Disneyland and due to construction parking was far. Also breakfast times were a little early so we missed that.  But overall not a bad place to stay. Loved that this hotel had free parking.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of the ALO Hotel.  We appreciate your feedback and hope to see you again soon!

Summary: I stayed at the ALO for the Disneyland Half marathon weekend. Although the hotel is a little further from the parks than I am used to, it wasn't a problem at all. There is a $5 per day ART shuttle that goes to the parks (if you are riding it multiple days, there is a slight discount available). I was able to buy my tickets right at the front desk. The shuttle was on time and ran frequently.   The room was perfect for me. King size bed, a sofa, mini fridge. I also had plenty of storage. I did have a rental car on the property for a couple of nights, and the parking garage was convenient and there was easy access to the hotel from the garage. I was not able to take advantage of breakfast, since I was there for some VERY early mornings on race days.   The hotel is across the street
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your recent experience at the ALO Hotel by Ayres. We truly appreciate the positive feedback and are thrilled to hear our staff provided you with excellent service. Thank you again for taking the time to complete the review and we look forward to having you stay with us again in the future!

Summary: Even though the name has changed the service is still excellent. They are doing some remodeling which I think is a bit of waste because I thought it was a perfect little boutique hotel before but that is all superficial. Lobby bathrooms are updated. Lobby is better lit. The piano is gone. But on to the stuff you care about. Free coffee, tea, and water available all day in the lobby. Cookies in the evening. And a delicious free buffet breakfast buffet in the morning that will fill any belly and has great variety of eggs bacon sausage pancakes French toast depending on the day. They always have fresh fruit coffee cake toast bagels cream cheese cereal milk juice etc. Starbucks is a 45 second walk from your room and Wendy's even closer. It is on a bus route to Disney that is on a
Manager Response: Your review was such a pleasure to read!  We greatly appreciate you mentioning our great staff, clean rooms and yummy breakfast buffet.  We cant wait to welcome you and your family back again soon!

Summary: Excellent accommodation and location, close to DIsneyland. The daily full service breakfast is a bonus that we really enjoyed. The only disappointment was for our family of 4 is having to sleeping in a regular bed and sofa bed instead of 2 regular beds.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent review.  We are happy to hear you and your family enjoyed your stay with us.  If you were to book with us again in the future please feel free to contact the Hotel directly to see about different room type accommodations.  Thank you again and we hope to see you all soon!

Summary: Family vacation to Disneyland parks.  Choose this hotel because of the free breakfast and shuttle option.  Didn't realize the $5 shuttle fee was per person so it was cheaper for us to drive and park ourselves.  The breakfast buffet was eatable but not great.  Room was clean and staff was friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of the ALO Hotel.  We hope to welcome you and your family back again soon!

Summary: Excellent service only one small detail our bed was suppose to be king cal and we were placed In full size my husband slept in the couch and I slept in the bed in the middle of the night. We didn't complaint
Manager Response: Thank you for the review.  We are sorry to hear you had an incorrect room type during your stay.  We hope to welcome you both back again soon!

Summary Heading: A place to call better than home
Summary: It's been a couple of months since we stayed at our favorite hotel alo" hotel formerly Ayers. But looking forward as always to our next stay. It's alway's fun here, and very comfortable as well, and we enjoy talking with the staff. They are so warm & friendly, in all its such a pleasure spending our time away from home here. Not to mention the convenience of its location to all of the entertainment here in southern CA. Again we are looking forward,to our stay, and my good friends & staff there, all of them but most notable Jaye Brown, and Corey.
Manager Response: Thank you for the awesome review!  We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and that our staff provided you with great service.  We look forward to welcoming you back on your next trip to the ALO Hotel!

Summary: Nice hotel, Excellent lobby amenities. Dont be late down to complimentary breakfast, ends promptly on schedule. Luggage carts were retained by guests in their rooms making luggage transport a challenge. Please use the cart and put it back for the next guest.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of the ALO Hotel by Ayres.  We look forward to welcoming you and your family back soon!

Summary: We stayed just one night while dropping our daughter off at college. Our room was large, clean and comfortable. We did use the free wifi without a problem The front desk clerk was friendly and helpful. And breakfast the next morning was decent. So, we're headed back in October!
Manager Response: We appreciate you sharing your wonderful review on TripAdvisor for the ALO Hotel. We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your recent stay with us. Thank you for the delightful compliments regarding our Guest Service Agents, Hotel quality and our great breakfast. We thank you again and look forward to seeing you soon!

Summary: In a safe, and accessible to main highway. This hotel is good for accessing UC Irvine, travel of course to Disneyland. And access all nice beaches on that side of Orange, CA. I visited Corona del Mar, Huntington beach and Laguna beach with ease. The rooms are clean and comfy. plenty of pillows and new bed linens.
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review of the ALO Hotel by Ayres.  We appreciate you mentioning the accessibility of our Hotel to the local attractions and our clean rooms.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: Very nice and clean hotel.  Close to Disneyland as well as other restaurants and shopping.  We stayed for six days and it was very expensive for that length of time but was not out of line as compared to other area hotels.
Manager Response: We thank you for your review.  We look forward to welcoming you and your family back again on  your next Disneyland trip!

Summary: Consistently great staff service at this hotel elevates it above other hotels in this category and even the category above.  Will definitely be back next time I am in the area, and will recommend it to anyone else without hesitation.
Manager Response: Thank you for recommending us to other reviewers.  We thank you for your feedback and we are delighted to read we provided you with fabulous service!  Thank you for giving us the opportunity to serve you.  We look forward to your return visit to our hotel!

Summary: My stay there was good besides the fact my room wasn't ready until 4 but it was awesome customer service was great and I will definitely stay again soon and the location was great got to see some fireworks from Disneyland amazing .
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review!  We are so happy to hear you were provided with great service during your stay.  We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary: An absolute treasure tucked away in O.C. I was in town on business for a week and stayed here. Exceeded my expectations for their star level rating. Staff was more than accommodating. Will stay again.
Manager Response: Your review was such a pleasure to read.  We are so happy to hear you had an excellent stay with us and our staff provided you with great service.  We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Near Disneyland and near an outlet. Bus shuttle to Disneyland if needed. Stayed there our first night in USA, on our way to San Diego, so really it was for just to sleep off our jetlag and get going. The staff was friendly and the breakfast was good. Would stay again
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review.  We look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to the Anaheim/Orange area.

Summary Heading: Perfect for Chapman Families and close to Disneyland
Summary: I did lots of research in selecting the perfect hotel for my family as we were dropping off our first child for her first year of college. I needed a hotel close to Chapman University, and I wanted a nice, but basic room knowing we wouldn't be spending lots of time at the hotel.  ALO fits the bill. The big plus for this hotel is that it has queen beds as opposed to the traditional double beds when you need two beds in the room. The hotel is clean and our bathroom was a little dated and on the smaller side but adequate.  ALO is exceptional for the price point and much better than I expected.  The staff was exceptionally helpful when answering questions about the local area.  Questions such as where to get our car serviced etc.  Not your typical tourist questions.  I plan on the
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us!  We are thrilled to hear our hotel met all your needs.  Thank you for mentioning our clean and comfortable rooms.  We look forward to making your every stay with us a perfect one!  We look forward to welcoming you back at ALO Hotel when visiting Chapman University.

Summary Heading: Great stay - Nice people and Clean Facility
Summary: We had a 3 day stay here for our latest trip to Disneyland. It is a short ride to the park on a clean friendly bus.  Breakfast was hot, varied and good. The room, as well as the halls and lobby were spotless. The staff was friendly and helpful, and made it a great stay. We look forward to our next stay.
Manager Response: We love reading our guests had a wonderful experience at our hotel!  We are happy to read you enjoyed your stay at our hotel.  Thank you for sharing with our reviewers how great our breakfast is, how clean and comfortable our rooms are and how easy it is to get to and from Disneyland.  We look forward to your next stay at our hotel!

Summary Heading: Surprised with this gem of a hotel
Summary: Stayed here to watch the Blue Jays crush the Angels. Very close to the stadium and some shopping. Room was clean, had microwave and fridge, free wifi, and beds were comfy. Swimming pool was used by the kids and they had fun. Ample parking available and breakfast was delightful. I'd stay here again next time in Anaheim. Great value for the features we received.
Manager Response: Your review was a pleasure to read.  Thank you for sharing about your wonderful experience at our hotel.  We are thrilled to read we were just what your family needed.  We hope to have the opportunity to serve you on your next visit to the Anaheim/Orange area.

Summary: Fantastic trip. Went to nephew's wedding. It was great to have family all in one place. a sister & 2 brothers with spouses. Loved the breakfast. Good food. It gave all of us a meeting place to schedule our day.
Manager Response: We thank you for your kind review.  We look forward to having you and your family stay with us again in the future.

Summary: hotel was in a nice location easy access to shops and training site. Could have more options available for breakfast. Overall pleasent stay, very accomidating to company stayed extra day to avoid traffic and was given the Sodexo corperate rate
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of the ALO Hotel.  We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary: No  microwave  in the room staff was not friendly didn't have coffe and cookies in lobby like they were supposed to.    Excepted more out of it than was offered the sheets were never changed I will not be back
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. Your feedback is important to us, as it helps us to better serve our guests. With that said, we are sincerely sorry we failed to meet your expectations during your recent visit.   In regards to the microwave we do have them available for our guests upon request, I am sorry we did not offer this item to you.  Our cookies are available to our guests in the evenings and are replenish throughout the night, we are sorry to hear you missed the opportunity to have those as well.  If there is anything else you feel could help us better serve our guests please contact me directly at jbrown@ayreshotels.com.

Summary: We spent 4 nights here during our trip to Disneyland/legoland. The property is clean, has fantastic staff and has a boutique feel for a bargain price.  Cookies in the lobby and breakfast in the morning. Breakfast left a little to be desired but let's be honest...I was more interested in visiting the mouse then eating my eggs.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to complete your review for the ALO Hotel on TripAdvisor. We appreciate your compliments on our great staff and our clean and comfy rooms.  Again, we thank you for taking the time to share your experience at our hotel. We hope to see you soon.

Summary: Over the past 3 years my family and I have made this place our go to hotel. We are annual pass holders to Disneyland and this is hands down the best hotel to stay at. The customer service is outstanding!! The rooms have always been exceptional and you can see the fireworks from your room if you're on the top levels. The breakfast is always amazing as well. It's hard to find hotels in the area with free parking and free breakfast. If you're looking for a place to stay look no further then ALO you won't regret it!
Manager Response: We love reading our guests had a great experience at our hotel.  Thank you for sharing with our reviewers the great value our hotel has because of our breakfast, and our location to Disneyland!  We thank you once again for your review and we look forward to welcoming you back!

Summary Heading: Excellent, affordable accommodations in the Disneyland area.
Summary: Friendly, helpful staff.  Modern redecorated lobby with complimentary iMac computer and printer, water, coffee, and tea.  Great rooms with bright, clean bathrooms, comfortable beds and pillows, and plenty of closet space (love the cubicles!).  Wendy's, Quizno's, Starbucks, and Best Buy next door.  Outlets at Orange within walking distance.  Quick access to Disneyland via ART shuttle that picks up at front door.  Only complaints are that the ART shuttle rides from Disneyland back to ALO are much longer than they used to be with the addition of the ARTIC stop, and in-room TVs could have a better selection of cable channels (such as Hallmark, TCM) and free broadcast channels (such as Antenna TV and MeTV).  This is my favorite hotel in the Disneyland area and I look forward to my
Manager Response: Your review was such a pleasure to read.  We thank you for mentioning our friendly staff, clean guest rooms and our other complimentary amenities.  We look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to Disneyland!

Summary: The room was clean and had all we needed for our stay while at Disneyland. The breakfast was adequate with several choices. Coffee, water and tea was available in the lobby 24 hours a day.   The Disney shuttle picked up in front of the hotel every 20 minutes. We reserved a room online for 4, when we got to our assigned room it had a bed and a sofa bed and told if we wanted to upgrade to a room with two beds it would be $10 more per night.  The pool is small. Overall it served its purpose.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of the ALO Hotel by Ayres.  We thank you for mentioning our clean rooms and complimentary amenities.  We look forward to having you and your family stay with us again.

Summary Heading: An honest review of ALO hotel.
Summary: Average hotel similar to a Best Western or a Comfort Inn. Adequate for a short night stay or for a Disneyland stay. the pool was good but small. the hot tub was big and nice. Pool area was clean. Rooms were just ok. HD TV ok. Get one on the back side away from the very busy street leading to the ER. carpet down the halls was nice. Elevators were very small. Outside patio was nice, next to the restaurant. The restaurant for breakfast was terrible. Plan on going out, for a decent one. We got frozen egg pucks. Front desk staff were nice and helpful. the better hotel is next door called the Ayers Hotel. I'd stay there unless your on a tight budget. Starbucks is a short walk:)  Horrible WIFI. Use 4G. It is 2 miles to Disneyland off the I-5 freeway.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. Your feedback is important to us, as it helps us to better serve our guests. With that said, we are sincerely sorry we failed to meet your expectations during your recent visit. We are glad you enjoyed our clean and comfortable rooms and the pool area.  We are continually making improvements to our hotel, if there is anything else you feel could help us better serve you please contact me directly at jbrown@ayreshotels.com.

Summary: We stayed 5 night. The hotel is nicely located. And the area felt really safe. The pool is small. The breakfast was not bad bad but could be a little more. Not a lot of variate was the same every days with the exception the swap out sausage for bacon each day and the egg disks well let just say we think they wear eggs, The front desk was nice and helpful. However the room was clean when we arrived the beds are nice. However after a long day at Disney we came back to have to clean the room. When we left there was a little bit of garbage on the floor that my kids left. And was still there when we got back. My companion shaved right before we left and the wash cloth he used was fold up like a fan with his whiskers still in it. the bath room floor was dirty. There was only one day
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review.  We truly appreciate your guest feedback.  We look forward to serving you again in the future.

Summary: The hotel elevators are quite small.  Hotel provides a hot breakfast buffet, however it is over at 9am during the week.  Cookies were provided in the lobby after 7pm which was a nice surprise.  There are no towels by the pool, you need to ask at the desk.  We could see the fireworks from Disneyland from our room on the 4th floor.  Very convenient computer and printer in the lobby as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review.  We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: I would highly recommend staying at this hotel. The room was very clean and decorated nicely. The staff were also very courteous and were keen to answer all our questions. We didn't have breakfast though so can't comment on that. I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Your review was a pleasure to read.  Thank you for sharing about your wonderful experience at our hotel.  We appreciate you recommending us to our other reviewers.  We look forward to seeing you next time you visit the Anaheim/Orange area.

Summary: The pool was a bit small wish it was bigger; overall it was a peaceful stay. Also, it would be good if they had more snack bars they are so needed! The customer services was good. Housekeeping was also good.
Manager Response: Thank you for mentioning our Front Desk and Housekeeping staff provided you with good service.  We look forward to your next stay.

Summary: Our time was very short. We stayed one night and had to leave super early the next morning. The rooms were very clean! We loved how it was easy access to the fwy! Loved how we were so close to Disneyland also! We will definitely stay here again! Plus Anepalcos is an amazing cafe!
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review!  We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and for mentioning our clean rooms.  We can't wait to welcome you back soon!

Summary: Helpful staff and easy bus access to Disney (ticket purchase required) and within walking distance to a large shopping outlet centre with restaurants and cinema. Swimming pool was great and relaxing in the evening. But needed a shop in the hotel or vending machines. Also only 40 mins driving distance to Universal Studios. Plenty of other nearby restaurants as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review of the ALO Hotel.  We are happy to hear you enjoyed your recent stay with us and thank you for mentioning our helpful staff.  We look forward to having you stay with us again!

Summary: We stayed at ALO hotel for five days to visit Disneyland and we didn't regret our choice. The place is 7 minutes driving to Disney and the hotel is absolutely clean and spacious. The room had a coffee machine and iron but no safe, which i believe is a must have. My favorite here were the staff; really wonderful, extremely helpful and friendly. They even kept packages for us that arrived a week earlier before our arrival. Parking was free of charge and the WiFi, too. The drawback in this hotel is the restaurant and breakfast. It's just too small for the crowd and in need for refurbishing. The breakfast buffet itself lacked choices and was somewhat boring. The value for money was excellent and i definitely recommend the place for a Disney or Orange visit.
Manager Response: Your review was a pleasure to read.  Thank you for sharing about your wonderful experience at our hotel.  We are thrilled to read our staff was extremely friendly and helpful.  We look forward to having the opportunity to serve you on your next visit to the Anaheim/Orange area.

Summary: First time staying at this hotel and the location is right off the 5 freeway so you cant miss it, if your driving. The hotel decor is very beautiful, great staff very friendly and helpful. Free parking, free breakfast, and a small $5 fee to take the shuttle to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of the ALO Hotel.  We can't wait to welcome you and your family back soon!

Summary: An excellent 3 stars hotel  Clean rooms Excellent staff Very good location I loved it. Deserves each cent we paid and there is a shuttle from the hotel to Disneyland which is 10 minutes away. The area is the best in LA.
Manager Response: Thank you for mentioning our clean rooms and great staff.  We appreciate your kind feedback and hope to have you stay with us again in the future.

Summary: I had to go to uci med center for a procedure.  I had a tube down my nose and a black box attached.  I was so embarrassed to be out in public.  But the girls at the front desk were so nice.  The pool was closed for maintenance but they let me in early so I could do my yoga.  It was really nice of them.  I was also late getting to breakfast but ran in last min. And the staff were all very polite and helped me get all my breakfast.  Rooms were nice  I requested a bottom floor which they were able to accommodate.  All and all it was a very good experience.  theybalso have a special rate for uci patients.  Just ask !!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of the ALO Hotel by Ayres.  We appreciate you mentioning our friendly staff and the great service you received with our Breakfast Attendants.  We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Beautiful hotel.convenient to evetything. Grest breakfast  food. Outside garden area was very lush and beautiful.  Restsurants and thems parks eadily accessible.  Shuttles are helpful. Friendle helpgul staff.
Manager Response: We appreciate you mentioning our great amenities and staff.  We look forward to having you stay with us again soon!

Summary: Great value for the money!  Right beside Wendy's and Starbucks which was a plus.  Best of all it was one block from the Outlets Of Orange.  It was too far to hit a supermarket to buy some miscellaneous groceries but that is my only my complaint.  Included breakfast and wifi was a terrific incentive to choose ALO!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review for the ALO Hotel by Ayres.  We are happy to hear you enjoyed your recent stay with us.   We look forward to welcoming you back on your next stay in the Anaheim/Orange area.

Summary: Great staff , Just wished the restaurant was open later. and the review here shouldn't count your words in order to allow you to submit this form. After all, we are submitting this for your benefit .. ok I have three more letters to go before i can submit this and get back to work..
Manager Response: We look forward to having you stay with us again soon!

Summary Heading: Best stay ever had in a hotel
Summary: To start of the staff was great, told us where we could go have fun at the beach, and get on a ferry ride. The hotel was very clean and tidy food was excellent every morning enjoyed our stay thank you for a great vacation.
Manager Response: Your review was such a pleasure to read!  We are so happy to hear you and your family had a great stay and took advantage of our great local beaches.  We cant wait to have you stay with us again soon!

Summary Heading: Another fantastic stay at ALO hotel(Formerly Ayars of Orange)
Summary: First trip back after a year-name has changed but location/friendly service(esp. from Corey at the front desk) and generous room size the same. Full breakfast- which is still a bargain for the price- a little less sophisticated than what I remember. With the free parking and location to the freeways in Orange it's the perfect spot. Also remember: 1)If visiting Chapman University ask for the Chapman rate 2) Disney bus picks up right outside the front door
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review of the ALO Hotel.  We are so happy to hear Cory provided you with great customer service.  We thank you for the positive review and look forward to having you stay with us again soon!

Summary: The employees were very professional  made us feel welcome the free breakfast was amazing I would recommend a family staying here it is reasonable price and very  well located  The kids enjoy the swimming pool
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review of the ALO Hotel by Ayres.  We are so happy to hear you and your family enjoyed your stay.  We look forward to having you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Still the best place to stay in Orange
Summary: Has been a year since we visited Orange. The hotel has changed its name(Was the 'old' Ayars in Orange- now ALO. The 'new' Ayars is right next door.Lobby has also undergone a nice update-clean/warm and inviting  Room was ready as usual- check in staff great. Breakfast has gone down a little in quality but still the best deal in the area if visiting Chapman or Disneyland(shuttle to the park outside the door)
Manager Response: Thank you for your loyalty to the ALO Hotel!  We are pleased to read that our staff provided you with great service!  We thank you for your feedback and we look forward to seeing you soon again!

Summary: Very nice room, hotel, and area of city. Many things close by angels stadium, Disneyland, outlets, garden walk. close to freeway entrance as well. Hotel looks brand new included free Wi-Fi free parking and free breakfast.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review of the ALO Hotel by Ayres.  We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and we look forward to welcoming you both back soon!

Summary Heading: Shuttle to theme park a big bonus.
Summary: Love the location.  Water, coffee and cookies was a big treat after a long day.  Everything is very convenient.  Breakfast a bonus too!  Ask for a room facing the best buy store so you can see the Disneyland fireworks.
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review of ALO Hotel.  We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and took advantage of our yummy buffet breakfast and complimentary amenities.  We look forward to having you and your family stay with us again.

Summary: We booked 2 rooms at this hotel last weekend.  Both rooms had problems with the sinks and bathtubs draining, we ended up with a sink full of water when brushing our teeth and a bathtub nearly overflowing when taking a shower.    On top of the overflowing sinks, the toilet would not flush.  We had to lift the lid each time to flush the toilet.    If you are hoping for a queen or two queen beds, you might be out of luck.  The beds advertised as queens are really doubles.    As for the price, you need to double check your bill when checking out, we noticed that they billed us 2 different prices for each room.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. Your feedback is important to us, as it helps us to better serve our guests. With that said, we are sincerely sorry we failed to meet your expectations during your recent visit. We are continually making improvements to our hotel, if there is anything else you feel could help us better serve you please contact me directly at jbrown@ayreshotels.com.

Summary Heading: ALO INN is not up to the AYRES HOTEL standards
Summary: Disappointed in the name change or ownership in this ALO Inn. The amenities show on the Ayres Hotel web page was not at this ALO Inn. Breakfast on the weekend ended at 930 and they chase you out. No warning of the time change given at the front desk and on the key card jacket breakfast times was whited out. No breakfast meats on a Saturday morning and you had to use white disposal Styrofoam plates and plastic ware. Sunday morning I was lock out of room because key card expired too soon. There is a new Ayres Hotel next door,make sure to reserve the right hotel. This is not of the Ayres hotel Standards from my past stays at other Ayres hotels in California.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. Your feedback is important to us, as it helps us to better serve our guests. With that said, we are sincerely sorry we failed to meet your expectations during your recent visit.  I wanted to inform you that we are still owned and managed by the Ayres Hotels chain and offer the same amenities as any Ayres Hotel.  With our property having a restaurant on the premises we are unable to offer breakfast after 9:30AM as the restaurant opens promptly at 11AM.  We are sorry to hear you felt chased out of the breakfast room, I can assure you that was not our intention.  We hope you give us the opportunity to serve you again in the future.

Summary Heading: Good price, excellent location, and terrific staff.
Summary: ALO accommodations are central located whether you are in need of California's Medical / hospital facilities, nearby restaurants and/or entertainment (Disneyland, Movie Theaters, Restaurants).   Each of these options are within walking distance of this clean, well run hotel.  The staff are courteous, friendly, and helpful.  The price point is very affordable, and the complimentary breakfast quite hearty! Sandra and Christine continue to do a wonderful job overseeing the ALO and Ayers Orange.
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review of the ALO Hotel.  We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your recent stay and thank you for mentioning our great Management and staff.  We can't wait to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: We stayed here for 4 nights on a Disney/beach trip. We checked in late (after 9 pm) Luis was very kind and seemed genuinely happy to check us in and that we were staying there. Rooms were clean and attended to every day. Walls are a little thin, so it's a little noisy during the day. I'm a light sleeper and was never awoken at night. Breakfast was very good. Our 5 year old son loved the complimentary cookies in the lobby. Easy to take the ART shuttle to Disneyland (about 13 minutes away.) Pool area was nice. We stayed at 3 different California hotels on our week long trip and this was our favorite one! Thanks for a great stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review of the ALO Hotel.  We are so happy to hear Luis provided you with excellent service and you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast and evening cookies.  We look forward to having you and your family stay with us again in the future.

Summary: This hotel is a mess! Don't waste your money!   Rooms are paper thin, small, & outdated. The carpet felt squishy & wet like it had flooded in the past. The bed spread had stains on it. The walls are paper thin, we could hear everything going on in the hallway & light shined through the door all night which was annoying. The shuttle back to the hotel from Disneyland is a 20-30 min drive. Dont call their restaurant! We made that mistake & when checking out we found that we were charged a dollar for a 2 second conversation. The elevators were scary unstable, & super small! Could barely fit a luggage rack.    This hotel is sad. I would not recommend it!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review for the ALO Hotel. Please accept our apology for your unfortunate stay. We appreciate your feedback as it is very important to us, and we will utilize this as a guide for future improvement. We hope you give us the opportunity again in the future.

Summary: Very pleased with this hotel.  Booked it on hotwire and was pleasantly surprised when we got there.  The lobby and room were clean and updated.  The staff were all very friendly and helpful.  The breakfast each morning was delicious, and the hotel was very easy to get to, and closed to Disneyland.  The beds were a little bit firmer than I prefer, but not horrible.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review of the ALO Hotel by Ayres.  We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your recent stay with us!  We thank you for the great feedback of the hotel and look forward to having you stay with us again.

Summary: ALO was part of our family vacation. Two days at Disney and an Angels game. Location was great, staff was great and the food next door at Anepalco was excellent. Best Huevos Rancheros I ever had. Easy access to all entry ways. Pool was a little cold. All in all it was a great vacation.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of the ALO Hotel by Ayres.  We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us while visiting Disneyland and Angel Stadium.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary Heading: Really, really pleased with our stay!
Summary: I read reviews of this hotel before making our reservations.  I was drawn to it because of the good reviews of the staff, as well as the reasonable prices.  We are grandparents, and were going to meet our daughter, son-in-law and grandchildren for a family wedding, followed by a trip to Disneyland together.  Couldn't have been a better fit.  Hotel is very clean, nicely decorated, has a nice pool, and, best of all, has a terrific free breakfast.  Soooo helpful when trying to save time in the morning!!!  Delicious food.  My daughter was particularly delighted that there were kid-friendly items, like familiar cereals, pancakes, French toast, yummy potatoes, hot chocolate, fruit, bacon or sausages, scrambled eggs and breads/pastries and juices of several types.  We all loved it!
Manager Response: Your review was a pleasure to read.  We are very happy to read you left very satisfied with your stay at our hotel!   We are delighted to read that you highly recommend us to your friends and family!  We are very proud to read that all of our staff provided you with great service and that you enjoyed our breakfast.  We cannot wait to welcome you all back again soon!

Summary: This was our first stay at the ALO Hotel, and we couldn't have been more pleased. The room was clean, the and quiet bed was comfortable, and we were treated well by all the staff. It is located in a very busy area because it is not too far from Angels Stadium, Disneyland, and the convention center in Anaheim - but far enough to get to places in the immediate area with ease. Our situation was different from many of these reviews because we were in Orange because our son-in-law was having surgery at the UC Irvine Medical Center. The hotel is about a 5 to 10 minute walk away. It was perfect for us. Our daughter was able to stay with us. We had free parking at the hotel and were able to easily walk back and forth to the hospital  during the 6 days we were there. I cannot say enough
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review of the ALO Hotel by Ayres.  We are thrilled to hear our staff provided you with great service and your rooms were clean and comfortable.  We hope to welcome you all back on your next visit to the Anaheim/Orange area.

Summary: This was our second stay and it was amazing! We stayed for 10 nights. The hotel is clean, the breakfast was pretty good, and the staff is amazing!!! They have a pool, hot tub, free parking, free internet, free breakfast, a laundry room ($2 to wash and $2 to dry) and ART picks u up right at the front door! I will say due to traffic and hockey and baseball games there were 2 occasions when it took 90 minutes from the time we started waiting for the shuttle at Disney until we got to the hotel. But out of 8 days going back and forth to Disney it's bound to happen. Most of the time it was not like that. Not a hotel issue at all... They are fabulous.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review of the ALO Hotel.  We are so happy to hear you chose to stay with us again for the 2nd time.  We appreciate you mentioning all of our complementary amenities, our amazing staff and the ART Disney transportation.  We look forward to having you stay with us again!

Summary: It's a decent hotel to stay in we had a very pleasant stay. Comfortable rooms warm staff. Right next to Wendy's & Starbucks was an added benefit. The only issue was the buffet breakfast which was a part of our package. They would pack up the buffet 10 mins before end time irrespective of the fact that there are guests still sitting and eating. It's ok to inform people that the buffet is closing but at least let the guest who are already in finish their meal. Other than this everything about the hotel is good.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review of the ALO Hotel by Ayres.  We appreciate you mentioning our comfy room and friendly staff.  We will look into ways to improve our breakfast with our staff to accommodate all our guests.  We look forward to your next trip to the Anaheim/Orange area.

Summary: Stayed for 5 nights to visit Disneyland and beach. Hotel changed name from Ayers Inn Orange to ALO.  Hotel was clean and pleasant.  Staff was nice.  Only knock was sirens going to nearby Irvine hospital.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review.  We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your recent stay with us while visiting Disneyland.  We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary: We were in Orange to attend UCI for treatment, stayed to play a bit in the area. Shopping and food were very convenient. We saw a movie in the theatre that's close. The shuttle to and from Disneyland were a reasonable price, we used it. Morning breakfast food in the attached restaurant was delightful, complete with eggs and fruit just like we're used to eating. The room was clean, bed and pillows comfortable. Towels sparkling white! Front desk personnel were very friendly, informative and helpful.The whole stay was very positive.
Manager Response: Thank you for your pleasant review.  We thank you for letting our other TripAdvisor reviewers of our clean hotel, friendly staff and our breakfast.  We look forward to having you stay with us next time you visit the Orange area.

Summary: I will stay here again.  Love the changes!! It's located right in the heart of Orange.  You can walk to shopping and eating with a large option to pick from. If your going to an Angels game this is a great place.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review.  We appreciate your feedback on the newly renovated lobby at ALO Hotel.  We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Nice out of the way spot for Disney
Summary: I was hesitant to get a hotel not within walking distance to Disneyland, but my parents were joining us and didn't plan to do Disney the whole time. This hotel is awesome! Clean, comfortable beds and pillows, and fairly quiet. We drove our rental car so not sure how the shuttle is, but it only took us about 5-10 min to get to Disneyland parking. The breakfast is good, and the pool was clean. We would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: We are happy to read you enjoyed your first stay at our hotel!  Thank you for mentioning our clean and comfortable rooms as well as our complimentary breakfast.  We cant wait for you and the family to stay with us again on your next Disneyland trip.

Summary: It would have been nice to know that the ice machine was on the second floor and I was staying on the third floor. The room was quiet overlooking the pool.  The breakfast was a very nice added bonus and very tasty. Everyone was very polite and  helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for your brief review of the ALO Hotel.  We look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to the Anaheim/Orange area.

Summary: This hotel chain is so wonderful, I'm a huge fan. We've now stayed at the Ayres Hotel Anaheim and this location and loved both. Free breakfast, WiFi and parking, hard to beat having all three. The room was very clean, furnishings are nice and staff were very friendly and helpful. The only thing I could say they could improve was to add fabric softener to the towels and sheets, both are very rough. If I had to choose between the two locations though, the Ayres Hotel Anaheim has the ALO beat out for their happy hour with free beer and wine!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of the ALO Hotel.  We are so happy to see you are a fan of the Ayres Hotel chain!  We appreciate your loyalty to Ayres Hotels and look forward to having you stay with us again!

Summary: Hotel Arrival:  We were greeted by Luis, who was the sweetest front desk personnel member we were fortunate to have check us in!  He was courteous, professional, and handled are check in quickly.  The hotel lobby looked beautiful.  We were told it had just been remodeled.  Very nice!   =====   Room Cleanliness:  Dear Hotel Team:  Due diligence is practiced during my travels to prevent unwanted guest for my return home.  Please take this portion of my review as a complement to your cleaning staff.  They do their job extremely well!   We entered the room, and it looked fantastic!  It is bright with the natural light from windows and clean.  My due diligence:  Did an inspection of headboard, bedding, mattress (under and over), couch (queen sleeper out), nightstands, desk and
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of the ALO Hotel.  We appreciate you taking the time to let our reviewers see why our hotel has such a great value.  We are very happy to read you were pleased with your stay.  We are happy to read you found our hotel to be clean, comfortable and our complimentary Full American breakfast buffet to be great.  We look forward to welcoming you and your family back again when coming to the Anaheim/Orange area.

Summary: We spent 4 nights at the ALO. our experience from the moment we walked in was a positive one. Friendly staff greeted us and were there throughout our stay to answer any questions and accommodate us in anyway possible. Very modern and clean, with a calm and relaxed atmosphere. The room was extremely clean, Quiet and comfortable.  We will definitely stay here again. Highly recommend.
Manager Response: Thank you for recommending us to other reviewers.  We thank you for your feedback and we are delighted to read we provided you with fabulous service!  Thank you for sharing all of our great complimentary amenities! Thank you for giving us the opportunity to serve you.  We look forward to your return visit to our hotel!

Summary: Great proximity to UCI medical center! Not handicap accessible due to high curbs. Rooms a bit shabby. Easy to find. Needs a face lift. Nice pill and spa,  close to Disneyland and Knotts Berry Farm. Xxx
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: The Staff at this hotel were excellent!!   The lobby has been remodeled and looked fantastic.  The rooms have not been remodeled, but the bathroom was.  Our room was a little small, but nicely appointed ~ I'm sure the rooms will be fantastic after the remodel.  The breakfast was comparable to any of the major hotels and was included in our room rate as was free Wifi.  We were walking distance to The Outlets at Orange Mall, where there were several excellent restaurants. Right next to the hotel is a Starbucks and several small fast food establishments.  There was a shuttle that stopped at the hotel for $5.00 RT to Disneyland. It was a steal!  We didn't have to pay $17.00 to park the car at Disneyland.  Oh did I mention there was laundry facilities on the premises?   Overall our
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review.  We are happy to read you experienced the great value our hotel has.  We are delighted to read you found our hotel to be very clean, our staff to be friendly and the ART shuttle to be just right for your needs.  We hope to have the opportunity to serve you again in the future.

Summary Heading: Very clean and had good breakfast...
Summary: Nice hotel for it was renovated. The location is near Disneyland. The staff are great! And so as the food during breakfast!  Nice hotel for it was renovated. The location is near Disneyland. The staff are great! And so as the food during breakfast!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: Stayed here for two nights whilst visiting Disneyland. The hotel is well located there's a Wendy's next door! And a large outlet mall across the street with food and a cinema. The lobby has free coffee and cookies and the inclusive breakfast was nice, buffet style and we enjoyed this. Room looked a little dated but was comfortable for what we needed. I'd stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review and for mentioning our complimentary cookies and breakfast.  We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.
