Summary: I had some business in the area and since I had stayed at the Ayres Hotel in May I thought I would try the newly renovated and named ALO Hotel next door.  First of all there are no hidden charges.  Free wifi in your room not the lobby, and parking as well as breakfast included with my stay. Loved the buffet style breakfast.  I had a room with 2 queen beds and it was spacious, clean and well kept.Bed and pillows are so comfortable!Lots of pillows!  Bathroom was nice and very clean also.  Staff was very accommodating since I kept adding on more nights.Would definitely stay here again.  They also have a Disney shuttle from both hotels. Cookies and coffee late night in lobby free.
Manager Response: We appreciate you sharing your wonderful review on TripAdvisor for the Ayres Inn Orange. We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your recent stay with us. Thank you for the delightful compliments regarding our Guest Service Agents, comfy beds and our great breakfast. We thank you again and look forward to seeing you soon!

Summary Heading: Don't chose the one queen bed room at this hotel
Summary: Don't chose the one queen bed at this hotel, or you want to walk and "mini". Because as they said, the one queen bed room is always end of the hallway and the room is very small. The people at the front dest don't know anything and they said give me a double queen side and when I go to my room and see that is a one queen room and I went down to ask them and they said that is the only room they have and the hotel is full, they can't and won't help me check and they also said  priceline don't guarantees what kind the room we got, but that don't make seen. I feel very disappoint at this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. Thank you for taking the time to complete our survey and we hope to have you stay with us again.

Summary: It was wonderful. I stayed for 5 days their breakfast was amazing! It was clean, quiet and very friendly staff.  I'm definitely going back! It's close to everything. Thank you to all of ALO staff!:-) :-)
Manager Response: It is great to hear that you enjoyed your stay at our hotel and that our staff took great care of you.  We look forward to your next visit to the ALO Hotel.

Summary: Came here for 1 night as a getaway from the madness and stress of the week. Upon arriving, I was thrilled to see the renovations were completed and their lobby was very modern. Pleasant and professional front desk. Free parking and WiFi? For a hotel like this? I was very happily surprised. My room was on the 5th floor and I had a GREAT view of the sunset after I had come back from a dinner date. Their beds: blown away by how comfortable they were! I have a horrible time staying asleep and I don't recall waking up once. I wish I had tried their breakfast but my day began at 5:30am :-/ Will definitely come back and recommend.
Manager Response: We love reading our guests had a great experience at our hotel.  Thank you for sharing with our reviewers the great value our hotel has because of our great customer service and our clean and comfortable rooms.  We thank you once again for your review and we hope to see you on your next visit.

Summary: We love staying at this hotel whenever we have an appointment at Children's Hospital. The rooms are nice and clean, the staff are kind and friendly, and breakfast is great! Also, parking and wifi are free! The only thing I don't like is the loud plumbing.
Manager Response: Your review was a pleasure to read.  Thank you for sharing about your wonderful experience at our hotel. We look forward to seeing you next time you visit the Anaheim/Orange area.

Summary: We enjoyed our stay at the ALO orange very much the staff were very helpful the rooms where clean and spacious. The continental breakfast was good and very popular among the guests. We will be staying again this summer at the ALO.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your recent stay and we look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: The staff was awesome friendly and so helpful the pool and hot tub were so clean my son's enjoyed the cookies and the breakfast  we also liked that the hotel was down the road from the outlet stores which my wife loved the shuttles were on time the driver's were super friendly I would recommend this place to any and everybody
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review of the ALO Hotel by Ayres.  We appreciate you mentioning our great breakfast, staff and the ART shuttle company.  We look forward to welcoming you and your family back on your next trip.

Summary: The hotel was under construction while I was staying. Not a whole lot of noise but moving around was a little difficult. Concierge was AWFUL! I asked for a taxi to pick me up at the hotel at 7am so that I could get to my job on time. They had no idea if anyone had called. I ended up waiting till almost 8 for a cab to pick me up after asking multiple times if anyone had called. Rude and bad attitude when asked again. Hotel other than that was very clean. A little bit of noise on Saturday morning due to family's going to Disneyland with small children. I would stay again if I needed too.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of our Hotel.  I am sorry to hear you encountered an issue with getting a taxi during your stay.  We appreciate your feedback as this helps us improve our customer service with our guests.  We thank you again for your review.

Summary: They charged me twice for one hotel room. Didn't say anything about it I had to find out by my bank! Then we I told the manager he acted like a jerk about it. Then had me talk to chase for 30 minutes about trying to get my money back. Then said he would give 25% off my room but didn't!
Manager Response: We are sorry we were unable to provide you with a satisfactory experience during your recent stay. We appreciate your feedback as this will help us improve our future guests experience.  However I would like to state that our Guest Service Agent did contact your bank for you to help get the pending authorization released as well as provided you with a discount for the inconvenience.  If you would like to discuss this future please feel free to contact me directly at jbrown@ayreshotels.com.  Thank you.

Summary Heading: It was a great week long stay!
Summary: We had an excellent week long stay at the ALO Hotel for my son's college graduation from Chapman University. The lobby was undergoing renovation and the staff went out of its way to accommodate all of the guests with this minor inconvenience. The staff is very friendly. The breakfast was excellent. The location was great. We highly recommend the ALO Hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review of ALO Hotel by Ayres.  We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us even while we were undergoing our lobby renovation.  We look forward to having you and your family stay with us again in the future.

Summary: We came to Anaheim for an Angels game and a quick trip to Disney. I got this hotel on Hotwire for an amazing deal, but it was advertised as a 3.5 star hotel, and it is 3 stars at best. The good: the staff was amazingly nice and helpful, and very good with my kids; breakfast was free; a frequently-running Disneyland shuttle that was not packed at all on a Saturday in late May; the lobby is beautifully remodeled. The less good: the rooms were run down; there were sirens running outside of our room all night; the breakfast area was dank and (barely edible) breakfast was served on styrofoam plates. If they are planning to remodel the rooms and breakfast area, I would bump this review up to 5 stars.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of the ALO Hotel by Ayres.  We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us while attending an Angels game.  We thank you for mentioning our great staff.  We appreciate your feedback on the dinning area and will share your comments with the restaurant owners.  We thank you again for your review.

Summary: They are still dealing with construction but there was just a slight redirection to our room. There was a piece of a pretzel between the beds.  Otherwise the room was good.  Not keen on the breakfast area.  So dark (black painted wood) did not go with the rest of the hotel)  Reasonable price.  Wendy's might be better (its next door) for the breakfast.
Manager Response: We thank you for your review of the ALO Hotel.  We are sorry to hear you did not like the look of the breakfast area. With having a restaurant onsite, Anepalco's Café handles the décor of that area as it is based off of the Anepalco's theme.  We appreciate your feedback on this and will share with the restaurant owner.  We look forward to having you stay with us again.

Summary: First time staying at ALO and it was a experience. Friendly staff and check-in was fast and easy. Rooms were a nice size and had a sofa, bed was really comfortable and bathroom was clean. The breakfast choices were great and food was good. Lots of space to eat. Went to Disneyland and they offer a shuttle for $5 round trip that picks you up and drops you off at the hotel. Shuttle passes very often and last shuttle from Disneyland is 30 after closing. Parking and breakfast is free so saved me some money to waste on a delicious turkey leg at Disney. Lol 10 to Disney on the shuttle. Will stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review of the ALO Hotel by Ayres.  We are thrilled to hear you enjoyed your recent stay with us.  Thank you for mentioning our friendly staff, comfortable rooms and great breakfast.  We look forward to welcoming you back on your next trip!

Summary Heading: PERFECT LOCATION TO STAY FOR YOUR ANAHEIM ATTRACTIONS VACATION!
Summary: While a lot of people choose to stay in Anaheim when they go to  Angels Stadium, the Honda Center, or even Disneyland; I recommend staying at the ALO Hotel.   It is centrally located only six miles (approx.)  from everything.  When you arrive  you have warm Chocolate Chip cookies to greet you upon check it. Ask for a room on the Disneyland side, though you can't see Disneyland from your window,  you certainly can see the fireworks and HEAR the fireworks at 9:30pm.  The hotel is very  nice  the rooms quite large, and has a nice buffet breakfast for you so long as you are an early riser.  An additional plus is that it is across the street from a humongous mall that has everything for people of every age.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of the ALO Hotel by Ayres.  We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your recent stay with us and were able to experience our complimentary breakfast buffet and evening cookies.  We look forward to welcoming you back on your next trip to the Anaheim/Orange area.

Summary: Excellent in every way! Thank you for the best stay ever. Breakfast is included. Everyone is very helpful! I will go back. It is strategically located near Disney, and The Block Outlets. Parking and shuttle service to the Disney parks.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing about your wonderful experience at the ALO Hotel.  We look forward to seeing you next time you visit the Anaheim/Orange area.

Summary Heading: Great stay, even while under construction
Summary: I had no idea this property would be going through a remodel and re-branding while I was there, but it didn't affect my stay at all.  I enjoyed a nicely appointed room that was clean and well maintained.  They also have free parking, free WiFi, and free breakfast that includes real food like scrambled eggs, potatoes, sausage, yogurt, etc.  I took advantage of it all 3 days I was there.  And all this for a competitive price that was lower than some of the bigger properties that don't offer all the free amenities.  This property was a great choice and I will definitely stay here again when I'm in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review of the ALO Hotel.  We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and you were not disturbed while we were undergoing a lobby renovation.  We look forward to welcoming you back on your next trip and showing you our beautiful new lobby.  We thank you again for your review!

Summary: This is a fairly nice hotel. It isn't new by any means but it was clean and the location is great for Disneyland. They were re-doing the lobby while we were there and we were located on the first floor so had some noise issues very late at night one of the nights of our stay however the staff did apologize.  The breakfast in the morning was nice and had a good variety. The shuttle to Disney from the hotel was fantastic and super convenient.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of the ALO Hotel by Ayres.  We are happy to hear you enjoyed your recent stay with us.  I am sorry to hear you experienced some noise on one of your evenings from the lobby remodel.  We look forward to having you stay with us again!

Summary: I had read reviews on this hotel and was very happy that the reviews were accurate. Despite the fact that the lobby was being renovated I had no issues with any service or noise. The only thing I would have liked is if the pool was open later. Getting back to the hotel after the day in Disneyland, the hot tub would have been nice, but that is my only complaint. The rooms are a bit dated, but everything worked well and the bed was the most comfortable bed I have ever slept on! The rooms were clean, as was the rest of the hotel.
Manager Response: We thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback.  We are delighted to read you enjoyed your stay at our hotel!  We hope you visit us soon again!

Summary: Stayed at the Ayres Inn Orange on a recent trip to Disneyland. The hotel has the most comfortable beds ever--as in, the mattress was so comfortable I had to pull out the sheets to look at the label to try and source the mattress at home. After some research, I learned that the mattress is actually custom made for the hotel chain.   The hotel room was clean, spacious and generally well located right off the highway. The included breakfast was pretty standard hotel breakfast buffet fare but made for good value when considering the price of the stay.   Clean, easily accessible from the highways, free parking, fast wifi.   Oh and did I mention the mattress??
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review of the ALO Hotel (formerly the Ayres Inn Orange).  We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your recent stay with us.  We appreciate you mentioning our great mattresses, clean rooms and buffet breakfast.  The Hotel does sell the mattresses so if you are interested in gathering information on that please contact the Hotel directly for additional details.  We thank you again for the review and look forward to welcoming you back in the future.

Summary: Hotel is close to Disneyland, we drove and parked in the parking garage. Hotel is under construction but we had no problems with noise and we not inconvenienced at all. We enjoyed our stay, hotel was clean and beds were very comfortable..Free parking is always a plus. Internet worked great. No complaints..
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of the ALO Hotel by Ayres.  We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your recent stay with us.  We appreciate you mentioning our great amenities and the cleanliness of our Hotel.  We are also happy to hear you were not inconvenienced by the remodeling of our Hotel lobby.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the ALO Hotel on your next Anaheim/Orange visit.

Summary Heading: Good service, good room, good price=good review!
Summary: Ayres never fails us! Predictable clean rooms, easy check in and out and good breakfast! The construction going on was not a problem.Parking is never a problem. Staff are friendly and helpful. Bed was comfortable and bedding high quality, clean and fresh. Appreciated the nice furnishings in the room!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review for the ALO Hotel by Ayres.  We thank you for the great review and for mentioning our clean guest rooms, parking and breakfast.  We look forward to your next trip to the Anaheim/Orange area.

Summary Heading: Even under renovation, service was great and area clean
Summary: We left our prescheduled "3-star" hotel rather disappointed and were left to find a new place to stay as we drove down the road.  This hotel was a very pleasant surprise and a great deal.  The free breakfast was great and there was plenty of parking.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of the ALO Hotel by Ayres.  We appreciate you mentioning our great complimentary breakfast and parking.  We look forward to your next stay.

Summary: this was a very comfortable hotel.  they are currently going through an update to the facility and would expect it to be even nicer when complete.  great pool and spa area.  would recommend they get adjustable office chairs for the desk area in the room.  a must for the traveling business person. I would stay at this hotel again and recommend to others
Manager Response: Thank you for the review of the ALO Hotel by Ayres.  We appreciate your feedback on our Hotel and look forward to welcoming you back on your next business trip.

Summary: My uncle was scheduled for surgery at UCI.  The staff was very accommodating and helpful. The rooms were nice and clean.  We had a nice view.  Starbucks was walking distance.  The hospital was right across the street. They even have a loaner wheelchair, walker and shower chair. Breakfast was nice.  There are several restaurants nearby to chose from. All in all, we would stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review.  We appreciate you sharing the great customer service you received as well as the cleanliness of our guestrooms. We look forward to welcoming you and your family back when visiting the Anaheim/Orange area.

Summary Heading: My pet's recent stay at Ayers Inn
Summary: Excellent in terms of people and pet accommodation.  I was in Los not as a vacation but a visit to a very sick relative.  My stay at this inn helped easing my anxiety in finding good place for me and my pet while spending countless hours in the hospital.  Good location, excellent staff and above all the housekeeping had done an outstanding job.  Thank you Ayers!
Manager Response: We thank you for your review.  We appreciate you mentioning our great Housekeeping and Front Desk staff in your review.  We hope to see you again on your next visit to the Anaheim/Orange area.

Summary: I got a good rate on Hotwire.com and recently did a staycation here while visiting Disney California Adventure for the first time.  They got all the basics right---the room was clean and well-maintained, with no obvious scratches or wear and tear, and had no noticeable smell.  There are a few reasons I can't give it a rating of five, though.  First, the lobby is closed for construction and there are signs all over the place warning that they are in the process of rebranding.  Apparently this is because a more upscale Ayres Hotel was just finished to the north.  To check in, you have to follow the signs and enter the building via a side entrance, then duck into a room that has been converted into a temporary lobby.   Second, the complimentary breakfast didn't have any sausages at
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review, and choosing the Ayres Inn Orange for your recent visit. Please accept our apology for your unfortunate stay. We appreciate your feedback it is very important to us, and we will utilize this as a guide for future improvement. We look forward to the opportunity to welcome you back soon.

Summary: We were unaware of the 3rd party reservation restrictions.  When my friend and I were given a room with 1 bed, the manager was very kind to find us another room with 2 beds even though the hotel was booked .
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear you were provided with great service upon arrival.  We look forward to having you stay with us again.

Summary: I arrived the day after I broke my leg. All the staff were incredibly concerned for my comfort and arranged for me to have a room 8 hours before official check in!  This property serves breakfast as part of the room rate and Jaye offered to get breakfast and have it delivered to the room, offering if there was anything the staff could do to let them know. Corey delivered my bags to my room even though the hotel does not really have a valet. Corey is front desk staff. He also saw I was struggling with crutches and arranged to personally deliver a walker to the room. Every step of the way, the staff were genuinely concerned about me and my comfort. The hotel arranged for a late checkout so I would not have to leave the room several hours before my departure and Corey once again
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We appreciate you mentioning Cory and Jaye provided you with great service during your stay.  We always love hearing about our guests great experiences with the Ayres Inn Orange.  We look forward to having you stay with us again.

Summary Heading: Looked forward to my room at the end of the day!
Summary: My Ayres Inn room was so quiet it seemed no one else was there. Bed was very comfortable and the cleaning staff does an excellent job, spotless! I felt very safe no matter what time of night I roamed.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We appreciate you mentioning our clean rooms and our great Housekeeping staff.  We look forward to your next trip to the Anaheim/Orange area.

Summary: Perfect location. Able to walk to angels stadium. Close enough to shops and movies. The hotel is clean and classy. Very satisfied with our stay. Beautiful, well maintained, great friendly staff. Will be staying here or other Ayers hotels very soon.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review of the Ayres Inn Orange.  We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and are happy to hear you will be staying with other Ayres Hotels.  We look forward to welcoming you all back again soon.

Summary: This was our third time staying at the Ayres Inn in Orange.  The room was fantastic and my wife loved the spacious bathroom.  It was just a tad inconvenient because the main lobby was being re-done but I'm sure it will be beautiful when it's complete!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of the Ayres Inn Orange.  We are happy to hear you enjoyed your recent stay with us.  We look forward to your next stay.

Summary: The room was clean and well maintained, beds were very comfy, breakfast was awesome (hot entrees, breads, fresh fruit, cereal etc.), staff was always very friendly and helpful.  only a short 5 minute drive to disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of the Ayres Inn Orange.  We appreciate your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back again.

Summary: This hotel was clean and had a good breakfast and free parking. The ART shuttle system was easy to use but it definitely takes awhile to get back from Disneyland. It is the last stop before going to Disneyland so the shuttle was always crowded. It is also the last stop to drop off on the way back. The fitness center was definitely lacking and there was a foul smell in the lobby.  The fresh baked cookies were great.  We did not use the pool.  We would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We look forward to your next stay at the Ayres Inn Orange.

Summary: The purpose of this visit was mainly to visit Disneyland and the surrounding areas. Considering that most of the Good Neighbor hotels near the park are no longer a bargain, there was no reason for us to stay in the area. This hotel was slightly further away but the price was right. Plus it included free parking, free wifi, free hot breakfast and free cookies in the evening.  Aside from all that, the hotel was very well maintained and everything was spotless. The staff was friendly & helpful. The breakfast was extensive with plenty of options for everyone. They had extra crispy bacon one day. I LOVED that!  Our room was comfortable and very well appointed. It was clean and everything was in very good repair. The bed and pillows were comfortable and afforded us a good night's
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review of the Ayres Inn Orange.  We appreciate you mentioning our complimentary amenities and friendly customer service from our Guest Service Agents.  We are excited to welcome you and your family back in the future.

Summary: Always enjoyed this hotel as a great value for Disney Passholders and fans. Parking and internet is incluede along with cooked hot breakfast buffet. Easy location just of the 5 freeway at chapman- Disneyland located west of the property 2-3 miles on Harbor. Easy in and out..
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary Heading: Nice, Reasonable, Well Equipped Inn with Friendly Staff
Summary: We chose Ayres Inn Orange because it was pet-friendly and we were traveling with my daughter's cat. I have stayed at many Disneyland-area properties, including Disneyland hotel and others near the main gate; this was the farthest we have ever stayed from the park. The pros: Very nice staff at front desk and in restaurant; Very expansive breakfast included (fresh fruit, eggs, sausage, potatoes, pancakes, bagels, croissants, and more); weekend breakfast until 9:30 am; refrigerator in room; Free wifi; Nice lobby with lemon infused ice water and coffee at all hours; shuttle to Disneyland (fee) is fast.. Cons: Our room was not in the best condition (e.g. ceiling cracks)-ground floor windows looked at steel storage container limiting the light that came into the room. Perhaps it was
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of the Ayres Inn Orange.  We are very happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us recently.  We hope to see you and your family again soon.

Summary Heading: Another great stay at an Ayres property!
Summary: This is the second Ayres property we've stayed at when we've visited Chapman University, and we enjoyed it just as much! The hotel is clean, decorated well, has great service, and offers a nice breakfast. We will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review.  We love having our Chapman Parents return when visiting their students at the University.  We look forward to your next stay!

Summary: I have stayed at the Ayres Hotel in Redlands and was impressed with it, so booked this one in Orange recently. Although this is an "economy" version of the Ayres Hotel next door, it has quality furnishings and is very clean.   The room I stayed in was smaller than the Redlands rooms, but I had one bed instead of the usual two per room. The one difference that I missed was that there was no microwave, and looking at their website I see there are none in any rooms. My room was on the sixth floor and I was able to view fireworks from Disneyland as well as the spire from the Crystal Cathedral. Another bonus is free parking.  The breakfast was a bit of a disappointment for me, since I can't eat fried foods, and they only offered sausages, bacon, scrambled eggs and hash browns.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of the Ayres Inn Orange.  We appreciate you trying out the Orange location after staying with our Ayres in Redlands.  We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and we look forward to your future stay.

Summary Heading: Best Hotel We have Ever stayed at
Summary: The hotel was one of the best hotels we have ever stayed at.  We stayed there for 3 nights.  Front staff, breakfast staff and housekeeping staff were all so nice and helpful.  Lobby area was so nicely decorated.  Our room was a King bed and sofa bed.  The room smelled clean and was nicely decorated.  Lots of storage shelf space to put your items at.  Bathroom was a bit small and there was no vent but otherwise it was durable. I think the only CON to this hotel was that the shower head did not move at all and water was slow.  Our room was facing the side where we could see fireworks which was nice.  Breakfast consisted-- eggs, potatoes, sausage, pancakes, french toast, mixed fruit, yogurt, cereal, toast, bagels, apple, orange juice and milk.  Food was good, filled our stomachs
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to complete your review for the Ayres Inn Orange on TripAdvisor. We appreciate your compliments on our great staff and our clean and comfy rooms. We are so glad you enjoyed the ART Shuttle Service to and from the Convention Center. Again, we thank you for taking the time to share your experience at our hotel. We hope to see you soon.

Summary: We stayed at the Ayres Inn Orange this past weekend and as usual, we were pleased with the staff and accommodations. Ayres is our usual place to stay if the price is right. The rooms were clean and the morning breakfast is just right to start the day. That being said, I think the hotel has to do something about people showing up for breakfast still dressed in their sleepwear. Kids were there with p.j.'s, socks (no shoes!) and looked like they had just rolled out of bed. I don't even think they washed their hands before going down to eat!! This was a real turnoff for me and may very well be the deal breaker.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of the Ayres Inn.  We appreciate your feedback as it helps us improve in certain guest service areas.  With that being said we will look into informing our guests of proper dress code for our breakfast room.  We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: When we arrived the staff was very helpful and willing to provide assistance.  I was surprised when Cory asked me about my needs because I am legally blind.  I was given a room that was accessible to everything.  I am grateful for their interest in helping me and my husband. I was excited because the hotel was very close to the Anaheim Convention Center where I attended for the Star Wars Celebration 2015.   What attracted me to this hotel was its previous reviews and free WIFI, Free  Parking, and Complimentary breakfast.  Also the ART bus stops in front of the hotel for transportation to different areas such Disneyland and the Convention Center.
Manager Response: We appreciate you sharing your wonderful review on TripAdvisor for the Ayres Inn Orange. We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your recent stay with us. Thank you for the delightful compliments regarding our Guest Service Agent Cory. We thank you again and look forward to seeing you soon!

Summary: This hotel is one of my favorite hotels in Orange County, the beds are so comfortable but the highlights on the rooms are the Pillows, oh yeah! This is one of the hotels where you feel you are sleeping in your own bed. American Breakfast included. Just across the street from The Outlets at Orange, and the UCI Irvine Medical Center, within walking distance of The Theo Lazy Facility County Jail, a few blocks from The Angel Stadium and Train Station, within walking distance of the Crystal Cathedral, what can I say, location, location, location!!  Joab
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of the Ayres Inn Orange.  We are happy you enjoyed your recent stay with us and look forward to having you back!

Summary: Whenever we are in this area, we try and stay here. Nice decor, clean, free big breakfast, fresh cookies, free parking, and a shuttle stop. Helpful and pleasant staff. Good for couples and families. Right off the freeway.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We are so happy to have a loyal Ayres Inn Orange guest.  We look forward to your next stay.

Summary: The walls and shower curtain were dirty (they did bring us a clean shower curtain as soon as we asked for one), the shower stopper didnt work, the television reception was horrible, we could hear our neighbors through the walls, the breakfast was bland and while there was a large variety of different types of food the only thing worth eating was the fruit, the pool and hot tub were dirty and the hallway smelled awful (can't really describe the smell, but it was gross).  The maid came in to our room three times in one day, then never again.  On the first time, she came in with our clean shower curtain, and did her maid things.  The second time she knocked and my hisband let her in.  Apparently she had lost a cleaning item and thought it was in our room.  The third time she used
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review for the Ayres Inn Orange. Please accept our apology for your unfortunate stay. We appreciate your feedback and we will utilize this as a guide for future improvement on our Guest Service areas. We look forward to the opportunity to welcome you back soon.

Summary: Nice hotel right off I-5 at Chapman road exit.  Good value for price.  Very helpful staff.  Only drawback was hallways a little noisy with young families visiting Disneyland.  Otherwise good place to stay in Orange.  Convenient to the Santa Ana River Bike Path.  We were attending a wedding and used Uber all weekend long. Extremely convenient for Uber service which added to the value.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review.  We are happy you enjoyed your recent stay with us.  We look forward to your next stay.

Summary: Lobby was nice and quaint.  Room was decent.  Location was good.  Shuttle service was great.  Loved the free breakfast, just right.  Staff was very friendly and helpful. BIG CON: The doors were not sound proof at all.  We could hear everyone and everything that happened in the hall.  Everyone who walked by, doors closing/opening.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of the Ayres Inn Orange.  We appreciate your feedback and are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us.  We look forward to your next stay.

Summary: 10/10 in every respect from staff to cleanliness to breakfast to comfy bed , room wAs spacious spotless and very comfy staff all friendly we were very happy with every thing free parking too! Can't beat that would definitely stay again
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review of the Ayres Inn Orange.  We are happy to hear you enjoyed your recent stay with us and that we provided you with great service.  We look forward to your next trip to the Orange/Anaheim area.

Summary: My wife and I stayed 3 nights here for a family wedding.  The king room was large and clean and had a nice leather sofa and plenty of closet and drawer space.  The bed was comfortable and there was enough hot water.  In-room wifi was free.  The tasty breakfast buffet included hot items that were not the same every morning.  (We liked that.)  Service was polite.
Manager Response: We appreciate the great review you left for the Ayres Inn Orange.  We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and we look forward to seeing you both again soon.

Summary: Whenever I visit So. Calif, i will only stay at Ayres Inn.   This is the second time i have stayed at Ayres, one in Orange Ca, and the other closer to Yorba Linda.  The staff - very courteous, pleasant, knowledgeable friendly,  Thee rooms were kept very clean, towels and soaps, , shampoo, etc always there. more than needed.  The breakfast hincluded in the room rate was  not just danish, eggs, pancakes, sausage, the best croissant this side of the Atlantic, and coffee and tea were always provided in the lobby, along with cookies in the evening.  A very pleasant experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for mentioning our great staff, breakfast and the cleanliness of our guest rooms.  We are happy to here you enjoyed your stay and our delicious cookies we have in the evenings. We look forward to your next trip to the Orange/Anaheim area.

Summary: Every guest service rep was kind and helpful. They brought up extra towels fast. The room was clean. The pool was a comfortable temperature. The jacuzzi worked fantastically. I got an amazing rate through Hotwire.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We look forward to having you stay with us again.

Summary: We thought this hotel covered all the wants and needs for a cost conscious traveller. We got a great price through Travelocity, and had no problems with check-in. The room was spacious (king bed plus a leather sofa), mini fridge, lots of extra shelf space. Laundry is available, although if you are across from it, like we were, it is noisy when the machines are on. Ample selection at breakfast, and they kept it full. Inexpensive shuttle to Disney, although the route back at night seemed convoluted. Close to the interstate and therefore less than half an hour to get to the coast, but no real traffic noise. Staff was friendly. Tea, coffee and water in the lobby all day. All in all a great deal. We would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review.  We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: the staff friendliness and helpfulness was variable (some very, some not at all); you can hear others in rooms beside you; I saw a cockroach on the floor in the bathroom; there was hair in my shower; the bed was very comfortable; they offered all kinds of Disney tickets but a 1 day pass (which is what we needed)?; the shuttle to Disneyland was better on the way there, but quite a long drive back to the hotel from Disney with lots of other stops; the breakfast buffet was with paper plates and plastic utensils, but wasn't too bad (buffet style).  The hot tub was over chemical-ed so it was like a bubble hot tub; the pool was 'refreshing'.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review.  We are very sorry that our hotel failed to exceed your expectations. When we have high occupancy like we did during the Spring Break time frame we do use the paper and plastic products to ensure we are able to serve breakfast to all of our guests in a timely manner.  We have also shared your feedback with our Housekeeping Department in regards to the cleanliness of your room.  Thank you again for your feedback and please feel free to contact me directly, should you have any further concerns.  My contact information is 714-978-9168 x702,  jbrown@ayreshotels.com.

Summary: We stay here every time we go to socal. Great breakfast, great helpful staff and great house keeping. Highly recommend this place to all my friends when they go to Disneyland.  Always clean and comfortable rooms. It's nice to come back from a day out and your room is spotless! They have cookies waiting on the front desk when you get back and they always have a smile for you.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of the Ayres Inn Orange.  We thank you for sharing about our great staff, breakfast and our clean rooms.  We look forward to having you and your family stay with us on your next So Cal trip.

Summary Heading: Good deal for a busy season
Summary: We stayed here over spring break. The breakfast was a nice value for our family, but it gets very crowded. Still worth it though. The hotel it self is ok. We had a king with a sofa sleeper. The sleeper had gum in it that ended up on our kids. Gross. That mattress was very uncomfortable as well. The room could use some updates but not bad.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. Your feedback is important to us, as it helps us to better serve our guests. With that said, we are sincerely sorry your room was not cleaned properly to the Ayres standards. We are glad you enjoyed our breakfast even during the busy Spring Break time frame.  We are continually making improvements to our hotel, if there is anything else you feel could help us better serve you please contact me directly at jbrown@ayreshotels.com.  Thank you again for the review and we look forward to serving you again.

Summary: Enjoyed our stay. Room was very clean and comfortable. Staff friendly and helpful. The breakfast room could use a little more help with cleaning up after folks that can't be bothered to clean up after themselves. It was close to Disneyland (which by the way I didn't enjoy.) I know, I'm a grump! I really appreciated the small snack/drink kiosk instead of vending machines! Got my dear one a beer after our Disney visit and it was VERY reasonably priced. Ayres must be a Californian chain. Based on our visit, I would absolutely stay at one of their sister properties.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review.  We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and we look forward to having you stay with one of our Ayres Hotels again.

Summary Heading: Great stay for a Disneyland trip!
Summary: My husband, one-year-old daughter and I stayed at the Ayres Inn Orange last weekend. We have Disneyland Annual Passes, so we were really happy with the 20% discount! We arrived at the hotel a little before check-in time, but our room was ready. The rooms are nice, relatively large (we were told the rooms at the Ayres HOTEL Orange next door are even bigger) and clean. We had requested a crib and it was there, but it wasn't set up like it usually is when we request one. Not a huge deal, but I'm glad we checked in before Disneyland and not after with a sleeping baby in tow. We had stayed at this Ayres one other time and we've stayed at the one across from the Honda Center a few times, so I knew that at some point in the evening, they bake chocolate chip cookies. We've never been at
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review for the Ayres Inn Orange.  We are thrilled to hear you enjoyed our Full American Breakfast, comfy rooms and the ART shuttle service to Disneyland.  I am sorry we did not setup the pack and play in your room prior to your arrival.  We thank you again for the review and look forward to welcoming you and your family back soon.

Summary: the rooms were clean and the beds were very comfortable. the pool wasn't too cold, and the hot tub was perfect to relax in after walking all day in Disneyland! staff was friendly and I would stay here again!
Manager Response: We love to hear our guests had a great stay with us at the Ayres Inn Orange.  Thank you for the review and we can't wait to have you stay with us again.

Summary: Awesome hotel 😀 i loved their service, the staff was very friendly the rooms are very clean.... LOVED THE COOKIES IN THE LOBBY 😉 next time we go on vacation again i will be looking for this same hotel!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that our staff provided you with great service.  We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary: Arrived earlier than check in time. Staff checked me in & had key ready for me when room was ready so all I had to do was walk up to the desk as tell them a key awaits. Room was in excellent condition and sparkled when I entered.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your wonderful review and we are glad to read our hotel and staff provided you with excellent service!  We are very happy to read you thoroughly enjoyed our hotel and look forward to your future stay.

Summary Heading: A bit of heaven on earth
Summary: Once again we chose the ayres in orange off Chapman,it is without a doubt the only choice for me and my son,when ever I'm in town. The fun doesn't end when we leave Disneyland it continues when we go home to our room at the ayres hotel. They serve a great breakfast there in the morning, and at night delicious cookies at the front desk.and I can't end this without thanking this fine staff,very professional,kind, and caring. I must mention the fine staff by name the mngr Christine smith",Cory Irwin,and a sweet young lady Jaye brown assistant manager.thank you all
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of the Ayres Inn Orange.  It's always a pleasure having you and your son stay with us.  We appreciate you mentioning our great staff and the amenities that we offer.  We look forward to your next stay!!

Summary: Very comfortable rooms, awesome bed, great staff (incredibly helpful and friendly). I stayed for an interview and the staff drove me to and from, free of charge. Incredibly helpful. They went out of their way to help.  Awesome breakfast too I really enjoyed my stay here. Two thumbs up
Manager Response: We appreciate you sharing your wonderful review on TripAdvisor for the Ayres Inn Orange. We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your recent stay with us. Thank you for the delightful compliments regarding our Guest Service Agents, comfy beds and our great breakfast. We thank you again and look forward to seeing you soon!

Summary: Great service and great accommodations. The staff is very generious and rooms are clean, big and comfortable. About a mile away from the Disney parks and there are shuttles that will transport you from the hotel to the park and back. The price for the shuttle when we stayed there was $5/person.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to complete your review for the Ayres Inn Orange on TripAdvisor. We appreciate your compliments on our great staff and our clean and comfy rooms. We are so glad you enjoyed the ART Shuttle Service to and from Disneyland. Again, we thank you for taking the time to share your experience at our hotel. We hope to see you soon.

Summary Heading: Fine if you can handle the ambulances and helicopters
Summary: We had a great stay if you can get around the ambulances and the medical helicopter. You're right beside a medical center. I would come back again but it would have to be for the same price or better. The included breakfast made it a specially good deal.   Everything else is as you would expect from any hotel. Service was friendly and fast, rooms were clean, the facility was clearly and old one that had spent some significant effort upgrading. Its upkeep and maintenance was quite good. Breakfast was good too.   Disney: turn right on Chapman Ave heading towards Wendy's, turn right again at West street and it'll bring you to the parking areas at Disney. Pick up your supplies from Target on Chapman Ave and Harbor ave (also turn right onto Chapman).   Also check out Huntington Beach
Manager Response: We are happy to hear you enjoyed your recent stay with us.  Thank you for sharing that our rooms were clean and our staff provided you with friendly and fast service.  We apologize for the ambulance noise and if it caused any inconvenience during your stay with us.  We look forward to your future visit to the Orange/Anaheim area.

Summary: from check in , to check out, we had a great time....... we arrived an hour before check in, and were able to get our room..... breakfast was great!!!! you are only    10 mins from Disneyland!!!!! overall it was an excellent experience!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review!  We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Overall it was OK other than the bathroom smelling like sewer. Front desk people were rude and slow. They had play pins for cribs. Old dirty carpet throughout the whole hotel. Would not recommend or stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. Your feedback is important to us, as it helps us to better serve our guests. With that said, we are sincerely sorry we failed to meet your expectations during your recent visit.  We are continually making improvements to our hotel, if there is anything else you feel could help us better serve you please contact me directly at jbrown@ayreshotels.com.

Summary: This was a Hotwire special that really suprised us in a great way. Staff were wonderful and went out of their way to make you comfortable. They even arranged a free park at the other Ayres Inn near the Honda Center for the ice hockey game. After a 12 hour flight with a sore back, the heated spa in the tidy little pool area was a treat, followed by a superb sleep on an incredibly comfortable bed. The hotel is in old world style,  very homely.  The breakfast room is too small for its popularity, but the breakfast is plentiful, fresh and hits the spot (ok the plastic plates and cutlery on Saturday were a little weird though). The hotel has easy parking and is very close to everything.
Manager Response: We thank you for your wonderful review of our hotel and we look forward to welcoming you back the next time you visit!

Summary Heading: So great for LA and Disneyland
Summary: Stayed for 5 nights. What a great location, we went to Medieval Times, Universal Studios, Disney and Newport beach. Amazing free breakfast every morning till 9. Shuttle service to Disney. Awesome free cookies every night at the reception desk. Nice outdoor pool/hot tub. The service was great, we mainly just slept there and had breakfast and were on our way to the next attraction. The front desk staff were very helpful and went beyond what we expected.
Manager Response: We appreciate your wonderful comments about our hotel. It is great to read that your family enjoyed their stay.

Summary: The room was clean.  The staff were helpful, professional and friendly.  We stayed 5 nights, and had no issues at all.  Part of my concern with hotels near tourist attractions is the noise levels are typically high, but we did not have any concerns related to noise.  We'd definitely stay at this hotel again!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to read that our staff provided you with great professional service! We look forward to your next stay!

Summary: It cannot be marked as excellent as it is surrounded by freeways. On the other hand, this location might be advantageous. We stayed there for one night only as we visited he Chapman college. Others stay there for Disneyland visit and from this point of view, the location is great. The hotel is clean and nice, the staff is friendly..., you name it.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay, and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary: We spent 4 nights at the Ayes inn. The beds are very comfortable and the room was spacious. Breakfast was great, and the coffee was good! Staff was friendly and everything was clean.  We found it quiet even though it's on a busy corner.
Manager Response: We thank you for staying at the Ayres Inn Orange; we hope to see you soon again!

Summary: Had a wonderful time at the Ayres Orange. Very clean and well run hotel with nice amenities. Fresh baked cookies in the evening and great breakfasts to start the day. Staff was very helpful. Beds were comfortable and plenty of fluffy pillows.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write us a review!  We appreciate you sharing with our reviewers about your experience at our hotel.  We are very pleased to read that you were impressed by our amenities and staff service.  We look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary: We stayed at the Ayres Inn for 6 nights in February. First and foremost the Ayres Inn was clean and the staff was friendly. There were cookies in the lobby the night we arrived but we never saw them again. The breakfast was decent with hot items but there was a very long line most days (I'm talking 20 people) and it ends promptly at 9:00. The shuttle to Disneyland come literally to the lobby doors but if you are going in the off season as we did, be aware it only runs every hour and it seemed to be 30 minutes or so to get to and from the park. The pool is small and in a weird spot but my kids enjoyed it. The bathrooms are super small. All in all we enjoyed our stay and already have the Ayres booked for 10 nights for our next Disney trip. If you are getting this room for $100.00
Manager Response: Thank you for your excellent review of our hotel.  It is great to hear that you were pleased with the amenities our hotel has to offer, and most importantly, our staff service!

Summary: We actually stayed here a couple of times and everything was always great.  Very professional staff, clean comfortable rooms, great breakfast with good choices and a nice pool / jacuzzi area.  The hotel and grounds are kept very clean and you can tell that the staff cares.  We would definitely return again.
Manager Response: We are happy to read you are very satisfied with your stay at our hotel!   Thank you for sharing with our reviewers the features that make our hotel have a great value.  We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Stayed at the Ayres Inn Orange to attend a business conference at the Anaheim Convention Center. Was not able to get any hotels near the center, this was 2 miles away. Great experience. Clean. Charming. Although the property is older and the rooms reflect older, I was comfortable. Nice touches such as water, and cookies upon arrival. Staff went way out of their way to help me with transportation information. Luis and Dioxana were so attentive. Wonderful, plentiful fully stocked Breakfast Buffet with the room, not all hotels provide this and this sets Ayres apart. The location could not be better too, next to eateries and the Outlets at Orange with lots of restaurants and shops. Overall a great stay, and find ,, among many major hotels close by. I was pleasantly surprised of the
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write us a review!  We appreciate you sharing with our reviewers about your experience at our hotel.  We are very pleased to read that you were impressed by our amenities and staff service.  We look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary: I was in the Anaheim area for a convention at the Convention Center. The Ayres Inn provided me with a comfy room, an amazing breakfast, and friendly staff. The only issues I had were with the ART shuttle Route 14 being inconsistent. If you're taking ART to Disneyland, you'll be fine, but taking it to the Convention Center I twice had the driver drive right past the Convention Center stop when I was looking to get off, and once the driver went right past the ART shuttle stop when I was waiting to get on! With the shuttle running every 30-40 minutes, it's kind of a big deal.   But the Ayres itself was wonderful. I'd definitely recommend it!
Manager Response: We thank you for your wonderful review of our hotel and we look forward to welcoming you back the next time you visit!

Summary: Another great stay at Ayres!!! This Hotel is very nice, clean and comfortable!! And at a very affordable price too!! We stayed here while visiting Disneyland. The beds are super comfortable and the breakfast was good!!! Plenty of parking is always nice. My only "complaint" is the staff was not very friendly but I am finding this to be more common at most hotels these days.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your recent stay with us and found out hotel to be clean and comfortable.  We look forward to your future stay.

Summary: Only stayed here one night while my hockey team (Go Pens!) was in Anaheim playing the Ducks. I would have stayed at the Ayers across the street from the Pond (Honda Center) but they were booked up. Happy to find that this hotel was just as nice, keeping in the tradition of the Ayers franchise. Nice room, didn't use any of the amenities and not really sure if there were any, breakfast (included) was nice. I tend to travel alone so security is important for me and I am happy to pay for nicer places. That being said, it is a little pricey but for the area it is expected.
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review!  We are happy to hear you continue to stay with the Ayres Hotels brand, we appreciate the loyalty.  We look forward to your future stay!

Summary: Unfortunately we go to UCI Medical Center a lot. This is a very convenient property with discounted rates for UCI. And the service, meals, front counter have ALWAYS been very helpful. The addition of the parking garage makes the visit more comfortable.
Manager Response: We appreciate your review of our hotel.  We are happy to hear you have received good service during your recent and past stays with us.  Thank you again for the review.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for business
Summary: Travelled from Canada for the Natural Products trade show. Found this hotel to be well located and very comfortable. Would definitely stay here and any of their sister properties.The complimentary breakfast was very good. The room was really clean and comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review!  We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us during the Natural Products Convention.  We look forward to your future stay.

Summary: We really did like it here. Vg Service, checkin, parking , the room  All of it. But, this place is a Disney portal, with family's, kids strollers, it is  A mob scene at breakfast. So, the only escape would be to sit on the patio To eat. Discovered too late. We might stay here again or the sister hotel, Ayers hotel, next door, Very close to the medical center, and the 5 and 22 freeways are right at your door. Minimal freeway noise.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We are happy to hear you enjoyed our hotel during your recent stay.  I do see that while you were staying with us we did have a student group in-house so that would explain the busy hotel and breakfast.  We hope you choose to stay with us again in the future.

Summary: We stayed one night, it was close to our event. Hotel staff was very friendly and helpful. Room was nice and clean. Compared to the other hotels around it was a good price as well. Would stay here again!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review!  We look forward to having you stay with us again soon!

Summary: My husband have stayed here twice while enjoying a weekend of Angels weekend and we have booked another weekend in April.  It's small, not too crazy, has a nice pool and a really, really great breakfast buffet.  I'm a little disappointed their rates have increased as much as they have but it isn't keeping us away. If you're looking for a smaller hotel near Angels stadium, this is it!
Manager Response: Thank you very much from leaving us a quick review.  We are very happy you found our hotel to be a great place to stay when you are coming into the area for Angel stadium.  We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: First impressions was that this is sort of worn hotel, but it was still ok. Room felt small and sort of worn, but it was ok. The location and the price was highlights of this hotel.  There is a huge outlet mall within walking distance, Wendys and Bestbuy next door (yes, you can walk in Orange County) and there are highways very close to the hotel. Everything else was just ok in this hotel. Service, cleanliness and breakfast - ok. But for the price it's good.  I will probably not going to return but I can recommend this for the price.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and we hope to see you the next time you visit the Anaheim/Orange area!

Summary Heading: Nice Place for a Reasonable Price
Summary: My husband and I stayed here for 3 days in January 2015 and paid around $100 per night.  We really liked the location as it was very close to the freeway entrance, Disneyland, and the beach.  It is definitely a step-down from the Ayres Hotel chain, which we've also stayed at and loved. The quality of breakfast here isn't as high and they wouldn't let my husband take it up to our room, which was strange. That may have been just the person working there that day. The rooms are very nice and the bed was comfortable. It's a great value because you get free parking, free wifi, and a free breakfast.  Overall, it's a nice place for the value.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and we look forward to your future stay.

Summary: I made a reservation online through Priceline for your hotel only to find out that the room I was sold has a single bed after calling the hotel. I requested that the room have 2 beds. The person I spoke to said that all rooms with 2 beds were sold out. I asked for the room to be transferred to another hotel of the brand and they told me that they could not help me. This is very poor customer service! I am so very disappointed!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of our hotel.  I am sorry you felt that our staff provided you with poor service.  When booking your reservation through Priceline the Hotel is unable to modify or relocate your reservation as all changes must be directed to Priceline Customer Service.  With Priceline they do not guarantee a specific room type and at the time of your reservation booking the Single Queen room was the only room type we had available.  Once again I am sorry you felt you received poor service.

Summary: Location was perfect for our needs to Disneyland and surrounding parks, shops and dining. The free hotel parking, free daily breakfast and free Wi-Fi were definite bonuses. Low flow shower heads made for showering longer than preferred, but understand California is in a drought crisis. I would definitely choose this location again if staying in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of our hotel.  We are happy to hear our property worked perfect for your recent Disney trip.  We look forward to having you stay with us again!

Summary: Stayed at the Ayres Inn for the first time last weekend. I believe the front desk clerk's name who helped me prior to arriving as well as checking me in the day I arrived was named Cory or Cody (sorry) but he was GREAT! He confirmed my reservation, made note that I might be checking in early, the day of he kept me in the loop as to what time the room would be available since me and my daughter were coming in off a long drive. The room was clean. Beds were comfy. I look forward to staying here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  I am happy to hear Cory provided you with great service.  We strive to do our best to make our guests happy and I am glad to see he was able to do just that.  We look forward to your future stay!

Summary: Large rooms, good free breakfast & wifi. ART shuttle picks up at door. Close to outlet mall & "the" I5. Wendy's next door but not a lot else real close Overall, starting to show age. Pool was not operating
Manager Response: Thank you for the review of our hotel.  We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future.

Summary Heading: Enjoyed 2 nights with a family of 5
Summary: We stayed here for 2 nights to go to Disneyland with the family. The hotel lobby and room were very clean, our beds were extremely comfortable too. We made the mistake of taking the kids to the connecting restaurant for dinner. They didn't seem prepared for kids. We saw the word CAFE on the side and thought it would be a quick easy place to grab a bite. It was a bit pricey and fancy for our casual family. However the tortilla soup and tilapia was incredible! The next morning the same restaurant turned into a free breakfast buffet. I thought it would be a muffin and juice style, but it was a full hot breakfast.   This was the first time we stayed this far away from Disneyland (it's only 2 miles), but the ART picked us up at the hotel door (some hotels aren't that convenient).
Manager Response: Thank you for mentioning our clean rooms and lobby.  We are happy to hear you enjoyed the restaurant as well as the complimentary breakfast.  We look forward to your future stay.

Summary Heading: This review is for the HOTEL (not the inn)
Summary: I was booked at the inn for an interview and got moved to the hotel--AWESOME rooms.  Everything was incredibly nice, clean, and spacious, pretty sure those room are bigger than some So Cal apartments.  It's perfect for interviewing/visiting UC-Irvine Med Ctr (across the street) but it wasn't loud at all. Service was A+. It's directly beside a shopping center/outlet mall so there are plenty of restaurants but mostly chain stuff, try the food trucks!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review.  We are happy to read you enjoyed your stay at the Ayres Hotel Orange.  We look forward to having you stay with us again.

Summary: Loved this hotel!  The front desk staff were super friendly and accommodating. One clerk went out of her way to find me to give me some information. The room was updated and clean.  Loved the comfy beds.  The rooms are just as nice as much more expensive hotels.  Free parking in a parking structure, free full breakfast and free wifi.  The shuttle to Disneyland was only $5/day for as many times back and forth that we needed and runs every 20 minutes.  You can even buy your park passes at the hotel.  We were totally pleased with our experience and would stay again.
Manager Response: We are thrilled to read you enjoyed your stay with us!  Thank you for sharing with our reviewers the features that make our hotel have a great value.  We hope you visit us soon again!

Summary: Just left the Ayres Inn yesterday. I typically stay here 3-4 times a year as we are Disney Passport holders. Every time we visit is wonderful. Cory at check in is a great guy. Friendly, knowledgable and efficient. Check in was a breeze. Room was CLEAN, which is a must for my family. Pool was clean and warm considering we visited in February. Gym is tiny but if you try you can get an okay workout but considering it is vacation I just need it to get the blood moving in the morning. Lobby is clean and has a piano, if you are lucky you will be treated to some music by a talented guest. Used the washer/dryer. $4 total for a load but they worked just fine and you can purchase a one load wash at front desk for $1.08. Located next to a Wendy's, Quizno's and Starbucks and an easy walk to
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  I am very happy to read that our Cory provided you with excellent service!  Our goal at Ayres Inn Orange is to exceed all of our guests' expectations.  Thank you for giving us the opportunity to serve you.  We hope to see you soon again!

Summary: We loved the breakfast and our stay was very enjoyable. This was so helpful because my Dad was getting surgery at UC Irvine so my mother and I needed to be near by. The staff was wonderful. Thanks so much.
Manager Response: We appreciate you leaving us a review.  We thank you for mentioning our friendly staff and our  complimentary breakfast buffet.  We look forward to your future stay!

Summary: I was trying to work in a Disneyland trip with my husband that wouldn't break the bank, so I was looking for clean and affordable rooms.  I didn't think we'd get much for the money, but the Ayres definitely exceeded our expectations.  The breakfast was great and a nice perk.  The rooms were clean and updated.  I liked the convenience of the shuttle service to Disneyland.  I highly recommend this hotel if you're staying in the area.  It isn't quite as close as some of the other nearby Disneyland hotels, but the shuttle service is quick and you get a lot more for your money by staying a few blocks further down the street.  A+
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review of our hotel!  We are glad you enjoyed your stay at our hotel, and we hope to welcome you back sometime in the near future!

Summary: This property is a couple miles from Disneyland. The value is incredible with nicely appointed rooms, all with a refrigerator. Each morning there is an ample, hot breakfast. The breakfast, wifi and parking are included in the room rate. There is no resort fee. This hotel has a very European, boutique hotel feel to it.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review!  We are so happy you enjoyed your stay with us.

Summary Heading: Affordable A+ 5 star service for a little hotel
Summary: I have to say that this place called the Ayres hotel has to offer some of the best service in have experienced in a long time,  about as good as the Belagio hotel in Las Vegas.   The staff all knew my name,  knew that I had packages waiting for me,  super friendly, courteous, and they went the extra mile.  I will definitely return first chance I get!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review.  We are so happy to hear you were provided with excellent service during your recent stay.  We will continue to improve our guest service for our guests and look forward to having you stay with us again.

Summary: Thought this place was great, would def stay here again. Breakfast in restaurant was awesome, good location, beds comfortable. Very very good for the price i got it at. Close to anaheim convention and disney
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review of our hotel!!  We appreciate you sharing with our guests the complimentary breakfast and our comfy beds.  We look forward to your future stay!

Summary: Clean Hotel with some nice character.  Breakfast was better than average.  Close to Disney and the Outlet mall.  Pool was nice.  This location does not have an evening managers reception and the elevators are quite small.  There are very good chocolate chip cookies in the evening.
Manager Response: Thank you for your pleasant review.  We look forward to having you stay with us again!

Summary Heading: Great hotel conveniently located to Chapman University.
Summary: We stayed here for four days before checking our daughter into Chapman University. We arrived early and was able to check in. The front desk person was very friendly and informative. Our room was perfect for three people. We enjoyed hot free breakfast and free parking. Loved the iced lemon water, free coffee and tea, warm cookies in the afternoon and free parking. We will definitely stay here again when visiting our daughter.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review!  We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay.  We look forward to having you stay with us again when visiting your daughter at Chapman University!

Summary: Christine Smith has taken very good care of us, along with her staff, the last 3 visits to Ayres Inn Orange on our Disneyland trips.  Our last visit, in mid-June, was for my husband's 60th birthday.  The room was just perfect, the free hot breakfast delicious, and the ART shuttle was never full and always running on time.  It's our very favorite getaway place.  Thanks, Christine and staff, for running a very welcoming hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review and for mentioning our great staff.  I will make sure to share your feedback with Christine and the others.  We look forward to having you stay with us again!

Summary: This is a very charming hotel with a lot of details that made our stay so pleasant. The beds are very comfortable, plenty of TV channels and also plenty of parking space..Free by the way!  Close to everything. The front staff was very cordial and helpful. The free breakfast was delicious, with more options that your standard continental breakfast. I wish they had a waffle maker. My daughter loves those waffles!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review!  We love hearing from our guests and that they enjoyed their stay with us.  We look forward to your next stay!

Summary Heading: Expected an Ayres Hotel. Disappointed with the inn!
Summary: Pictures looked like an Ayres Hotel, but it is a renovated Holiday Inn.  Small rooms, with no changing area, tiny bathrooms with neon white paint, thin windows and walls heard traffic and sirens all night long, along with a neighbor coughing.  We usually love Ayres but this one was not up to standard, for us!  The breakfast even seemed less than our favorite Ayres.  Prices are less but you get so much less.  A young family might choose for the savings, but for us with two teens the room was to tight with no semi private area for change clothes and a tight bathroom... This inn was not for us!  A good night sleep was not possible for any of us!  Also, why do they have large "no smoking" signs on every door?
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review.  We truly appreciate our guest feedback.

Summary Heading: Charming hotel in a soulless desert
Summary: I stayed a couple nights at the Doubletree across the street and it's corporate vibe really got me down. I moved across the street to the Ayres Inn and was immediately charmed. My interaction with the staff confirmed my feeling that this was a well-run, customer-first hotel. Old school in a good way. If I have to stay in Orange again, I will definitely go back.
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review!  We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and had a pleasant interaction with our staff.  We cant wait to have you stay with us again on your next trip to the Orange area.

Summary: We were attending Super Cross at Anaheim stadium. Very close and convenient. Comfortable beds. Very helpful and friendly staff. Props to Luis. The free breakfast was delicious. The free parking is a plus as well. Would stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review!  We are so happy to hear Luis provided you with great service and look forward to your next stay!

Summary: This is the only place I stay when we visit Disneyland. You really get the best bang for your buck and the ART picks up right at the door. It's clean and you save money and time with the free breakfast.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review!  I am so happy to hear we provided you with great service and you enjoyed our complimentary amenities such as our breakfast, parking and internet.  We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future!

Summary: I book airs for all the business guests that visit which then lead to my using them when distant family and friends visited.   Very happy with the hotel but even more so with the people that work there!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review!  We look forward to your future visiting guests!

Summary: Have stayed here a handful of times and it's become our favorite Disneyland Hotel. Free parking, free internet, and a great breakfast buffet are our highlights. Handicap rooms are a little tight though. The pullout sofa in the king rooms is great for our 4 year old. We usually take an Uber car to/from Disneyland for $7-8 each way. Very convenient and will continue staying here.
Manager Response: We are very happy to read you had a wonderful experience at our hotel!  Thank you for choosing the Ayres Inn Orange as your #1 choice when visiting the Disneyland Resort.  We look forward to your next stay!

Summary: Clean Rooms, close to Disney and very affordable.The beds were very comfortable and loved having the free breakfast and parking.Me and my family have stayed here multiple times and have always been happy. You won't regret staying here.
Manager Response: Thank you for your loyalty to our hotel!  We are thrilled to read that you had a great stay with us.  We are really glad we continue to exceed your expectations.  Thank you for choosing the Ayres Inn Orange as your place to stay when visiting the Orange/Anaheim area.

Summary: I've seen the Ayres Hotel/Ayres Inn chain before but never stayed in one.  This one was the closest to my business meeting.  The hotel has a European feel and is nicely decorated.  The room itself was lovely and spacious.  I liked that the closet was open with no doors for easier access.  The bathroom was on the small side but I suppose that comes with the European feel.  One negative is that the leather couch in the room was very stylish but quite stiff and uncomfortable to sit on.  The king-size bed was so nice, I didn't want to get up (I probably shouldn't have checked in before going to the meeting).  Hotel has free parking and free internet.  Pretty close to Disneyland.  Lots of shopping and entertainment within walking distance.
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review.  We are very pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us.  We look forward to your future stay!

Summary: As someone that stays in hotels a few months out of the year,  I can be pretty critical about where I lay my head. I have now found my new home away from home.  I recently discovered the Ayres Hotel Collection.  How could I have missed such a great group of properties.  If they all follow the same guidelines as the Ayres Inn Orange there is no reason to stay anywhere else.   The hotel rooms and lobby are nicely appointed: Comfortable beds,  a nice amount of lighting and fast internet; perfect for the business traveler. The hotel features free parking, free internet, and a free breakfast.  A real breakfast!  As an added bonus it is all delivered by a friendly, helpful, and smiling staff.   Beware you may fall in love and not want to leave.
Manager Response: We thank you for leaving us such a great review!  It is always a pleasure to hear we have gained a new loyal Ayres Inn Orange guest.  We look forward to your future stay when you are in the Anaheim/Orange area!!

Summary Heading: Great alternative to staying right by Disneyland
Summary: Clean, economical hotel about 10 minutes south of Disneyland by car. We got a good deal on Hotels.com and stayed 2 nights recently while traveling with my 4 year old. We got a King-size room/bed which also had a sofa bed for my son. The room was of decent size and was clean. We were placed in a room just off the lobby and across the hallway from a laundry room. I expected that we might have noise issues, but really didn't at night. Parking was free, as was breakfast, which was quite good. We sampled the bread/bagels, scrambled eggs, bacon, pancakes/French Toast, bacon and cereals. I don't think I missed much- one of the reasons I've restarted my diet this week. WiFi was free, but depending on what time you tried to log in, could be pretty spotty. Not a lot of attractions within
Manager Response: We love hearing feedback from our guests and appreciate you mentioning our complimentary amenities.  We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay in CA!
Summary: Free parking, internet, and breakfast! Great location and a shuttle at a very reasonable cost to Disneyland.  We have stayed many times at this hotel, the staff is always very helpful and polite. The restaurant, Anepalcos, has great food! The website is easy to use for booking reservations and they have good deals if you book through them directly.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review!  We appreciate you mentioning our complimentary breakfast, shuttle service and also our great staff.  We look forward to your future stay!

Summary: Compared to similarly priced hotels in the area, this hotel had the best value for my money. Friendly staff. Not too far away from Disneyland.  Very clean. Right off of the freeway, but I couldn't hear any noise.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review!  We are happy to hear you enjoyed our clean hotel and that our staff was friendly.  We look forward to your future stay.

Summary: Front desk was extremely helpful and friendly. Booked Super Shuttle, explained Disney Shuttle and made sure we knew when and where to be, got us back and forth to Chapman U for audition to the dance program. The room was spacious, beds very comfortable and the complimentary breakfast was excellent. First day was eggs, bacon, potatoes and french toast while the 2nd day was eggs, sausage, and pancakes.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great review!  We are so happy to hear our staff provided you with great service.  We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future!!
