Summary Heading: nice and friendly staff, hotel was great, comfy, and clean
Summary: hotel was great, comfy, clean and the hotel about a 10 minute drive to Disneyland or take the shuttle service they offer for a small fee. its also near an Outlet Mall and it located right off of i5, the hotel offers breakfast in the mornings from like 6-9 Monday though Friday and I think it was 6:30-9:30 on Saturday and Sunday everything from bagels to eggs, French toast to pancakes (depending on the day) and fruit and cereal.
Manager Response: Thank you for your excellent review of our hotel.  It is great to hear that you were pleased with the amenities our hotel has to offer.  We look forward to having you stay with us again!!

Summary Heading: Perfect location for my needs, nice room and breakfast, great value!
Summary: Needed a hotel near The Vintage Rose to attend a wedding. After a lot of website searching (and many not so great reviews and some scary photos), I came across the Ayers Inn. With the great reviews, photos, nice amenities and good room rates; this was clearly the best choice for my needs. Front desk employees were very nice and gave me an earlier check-in than their standard time. Definitely recommend!
Manager Response: We thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback.  We are delighted to read you enjoyed your stay at our hotel! We hope you visit us soon again!

Summary: Overall a very nice stay. The complimentary hot breakfast was amazing but get there early. The shuttle was convenient and the location was close enough to Disney, convenient to Orange Outlets and short drive to Newport Beach. Very convenient to all major Hwys. We never had traffic issues, maybe it was the time of year, but I was very surprised. The beds were comfortable and really appreciated the free parking. We did not experience the pool or work out room. I would not hesitate to stay in this hotel again but would make sure we had a functioning bathroom fan next time. We had two adjoining rooms and neither fan worked. : (
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review!  We are happy to read your experience with our hotel was a great one and you enjoyed the fireworks from one of our higher floor rooms.  We are delighted you found our hotel rooms to be clean and quiet.  We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future.

Summary Heading: Usually great place to stay, but not this time
Summary: I have stayed at this hotel many times over the years.  Sometimes for business, and usually when the family goes out for Disneyland.  This last trip was not so good.  The first night we got in late and checked in.  I had my kids that were tired from travelling, so went to put them to bed, and the sheets and the pillows were covered in hair.  Not just a few hairs, but almost as if someone had shaved all of their body hair in the bed or something.  It was pretty nasty.  I called down to the front desk and they sent up a maintenance person up first who stripped down the bed.  He then took the pillows and disappeared for about 20 minutes.  So here I am with 3 small children after a 6 hour drive all sleeping and no where to put them.  It took a total of an hour to get the bed made
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. Your feedback is important to us, as it helps us to better serve our guests. With that said, we are sincerely sorry we failed to meet your expectations during your recent visit.  If you would like to discuss your stay in further detail, please contact me at jbrown@ayreshotels.com.

Summary: What a treat to be so close to Disney at half the price! Just 4 miles away and with a shuttle (about $5)  that runs every 20 minutes you can leave the driving to them.   The service helpful and friendly, although warmer at other ones we have been to, perhaps we will call more professional here. The hotel itself is in a quiet part of town but we could see the nightly fireworks outside sitting in our bed, over the large Best Buy sign.    It is next to the Ayres hotel, which has slightly larger, newer rooms. We felt that for the price, on Priceline, under $70 and included breakfast, score!  The bathroom lighting is quite bright, the floors are cleaned but perhaps could use a  deep cleaning. The grout in the tub could use a refreshening.   The king bed was comfy and with the window
Manager Response: We appreciate your review of our hotel.  We are happy you enjoyed the breakfast and also the Anaheim Resort Transit system to Disneyland.  We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Great Place to Stay Near Disneyland
Summary: I am so glad we found the Ayers Hotel in Orange. I had never heard of Ayers Hotels before but I will definitely look for them in the future. This hotel is not across the street from Disneyland, but we had a rental car and it was only about a 5 minute drive. They also have access to the Anaheim Resort Transit system, which is a great alternative to driving to Disneyland. Our room was clean, quiet and very spacious. Largest room I've stayed in in a very long time. The free parking and free internet were a real plus for us. I'm tired of having those items added on to my room charge at other places. And, the complimentary breakfast was really good and there was a variety of hot dishes. I felt that the rate I got for my stay was excellent. You could choose a motel closer to
Manager Response: Thank you for mentioning our clean, quiet rooms and our full American Breakfast buffet.  We are happy you enjoyed your stay with us and we look forward to your future stay.

Summary: We booked this hotel through an online booking service and were pleasantly surprised by how new and well appointed this hotel was.  Clean, well lit, with complimentary coffee in the lobby.  When we arrived before check in time we were given our keys!  Staff was friendly and promptly brought a requested item to our room.  Definitely recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review!  We are so happy to hear you and your family enjoyed your stay with us and that our staff was friendly.  We look forward to having you stay with us again.

Summary: We have stayed here twice and both times were happy. It's a great deal. The price is reasonable and includes parking, Internet and breakfast. Many hotels in Anaheim charge a ridiculous "resort fee" that may include only one of those things, and then you pay extra for parking and forget breakfast. This is quite a value, and the hotel is nice and clean. I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review!  We enjoy reading our guests feedback and thank you for mentioning our complimentary amenities.  We look forward to your next stay here at the Ayres Inn!

Summary: A huge disappointment compared to other Ayres hotels! This didn't feel like an Ayres and it use to be a Holiday Inn bought out by Ayres. The "inn" is dated and lacks the classiness of Ayres!! The lobby's bathrooms unkept with toilets that didn't flush properly. No complimentary newspapers and the free breakfast very mediocre. The breakfast room was old and uninviting. Again I'm comparing this to the other Ayres hotels we have enjoyed in the past. The room was OK but not great. Old loud heater/ac unit in the room. There was no remote for the TV . Caution when booking your reservation: ask for the hotel in Orange and not the inn: the hotel is newly built and I'm sure on par with Ayres standards. We were not given the option or explained the choice between the 2 locations. Our
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review.  I am sorry to hear we failed to exceed your expectations for Ayres Hotels.  Our goal at the Ayres Inn Orange is to exceed the expectations of all our guests.  Like all Ayres Hotels we offer the complimentary newspaper each morning which is located in our lobby, I am sorry you were unable to receive one during your stay.  We will strive to improve on the areas you mentioned and thank you again for your feedback.

Summary: I checked in today in room number 111. It is very clean and well managed. After long time i found a hotel with clean carpet. So far I am impressed with every thing in the hotel such as room cleanliness, room size, location,choice of coffee in the room etc
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great review!  We love to hear our guests enjoyed their stay with us.  We look forward to your future reservation.

Summary: We stayed at this hotel in our recent trip to Disneyland. Love the price, it includes breakfast parking and Wi-Fi, the shuttle is  great  if you don't want to drive. it  stops in front of the hotel, so it was one less thing to worry about after a long day walking at Disney. We would definitely sty here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review!  We look forward to having you stay with us again!

Summary: We went to Disneyland and picked this hotel because they do not charge for parking and provide transportation to Disneyland for $5.00 a day per person every 40 minutes. They also provide breakfast in their price.
Manager Response: We appreciate the kind review and look forward to your future stay.

Summary: Enjoyed the stay. Front staff was sooooo helpful and kind. We had three kids so needed a couple extra pillows and they were so quick to deliver them. Breakfast was normal continental. Close to Disneyland but cannot walk.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review!  We are so happy to hear our staff was helpful and friendly.  We look forward to you and family staying with us again!

Summary: We stayed at the Ayres Inn on our recent trip to Disneyland. Be aware that there are a couple of Ayres Hotels in the area as well - we went to the Hotel in Orange first by mistake. When we checked in, the clerk told us about the bus transportation to Disneyland which saved us about $7 over the parking fees. Breakfast buffet was included and was pretty good. Hotel room was clean  and bed was comfortable. All in all, a very good stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review!  We love receiving feedback from our guests and look forward to your future stay!

Summary Heading: Its my home away from home.
Summary: I am very comfortable here on every stay.  And I really love the staff here.this i includes cory, Jaye, and the manager Christine".it is to get there from home,& easy access,a great location for me. The use of art bus service is very convenient to take to disneyland,which runs every 30 minutes up and back
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review!  We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and that our staff provided you with great customer service.  We look forward to your future stay!

Summary: We had family come from around the Country for a wedding. We were able to spend additional time together in the lobby.  It was beautifully decorated and comfortable.  The Bridal Suite was beautiful.  24/7 desk service is great.
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review!  We are happy to hear you and your family enjoyed our hotel and we look forward to your next stay!

Summary: The hotel is clean and a nice place to stay for a few days, and the people at the front desk are friendly. However, I have never encountered such consistent incompetence from employees before.  1. My credit card number was entered with a missing digit. Therefore, no reservation was made in my name. And they never tried to contact me in any way to tell me my credit card had not gone through. 2. There is a shuttle service for medical students interviewing at UCI. It requires an advance booking the day before. I booked the shuttle for my interview day the day before for 7am, and I confirmed those details on two occasions. However, when I asked for the shuttle on interview day at 6:55 am, the staff told me that the shuttle had already been booked by another group for that same time.
Manager Response: I am sorry there was a confusion with your shuttle reservation.  We do our best to accommodate all of ours guests requests for shuttle service though we are limited to one van for all our corporate transportation.   We thank you for your feedback.   Should you have any further concerns, please contact me directly at jbrown@ayreshotels.com or at 714-978-9168 Ext. 702.  Thank you.

Summary: Very luxury decor and furniture! Nice hot breakfast served every morning! Affordable shuttle to Disneyland!  Bathroom cleaning could have been a little better, and window were thin allowing you to hear any wind whistle through the room, but that was pretty minor in my opinion!  Overall very impressed and will likely be returning!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review!  We are happy to hear you enjoyed your recent stay with us and look forward to your future stay!!

Summary: We were there for an overnight stay and loved it. The staff, the hotel and our room were great. I would definitely return for a visit. The hotel is close to Disneyland and other transportation options.
Manager Response: Thank you for your the great review!  We look forward to your future stay!

Summary: The staff was excellent, especially Cory. The food was lukewarm every day. The same thing every day. One day housekeeping hasn't cleaned the tub and we'd had no clean washcloths. But the front desk we're awesome and the rooms were nice. Oh, and the ART shuttle stops right art the front door which is very convenient
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear Cory provided you with great service.  We look forward to having you stay with us again!

Summary: I really enjoyed our stay. The rooms were clean. The only thing I could hear from the other rooms was the shower behind us. Not a big deal to me though. The free breakfast was buffet style which really worked out great for me because they had fresh fruit and other vegetarian food. My family was able to get full before our long days at Disneyland. The shuttle service was easy and on time. Room service gave us fresh towels and razors. The hot tub and pool were great. I would definitely stay again and had a great experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for your excellent review of our hotel.  It is great to hear that you were pleased with the amenities our hotel has to offer!  We look forward to your future stay!

Summary: Extremely close to disneyland. Only a 14 minute trip through the ART program. Shuttles run every .5 hour from the front of the hotel. Very nice rooms and friendly staff. Quiet rooms and very clean. Very impressed. Walking distance to near by shopping center.
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review.  We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future!

Summary: We were pleasantly surprised.   My wife and I booked a last minute night stay in order to get a Christmas visit in to Disneyland.    It is only 15 minutes away.  I booked a deal on Hotwire for $78 for a three star hotel and was not feeling confident.   Hotwire’s star rating is usually very generous and I was disappointed several times before.    There was a convention in town and decent rooms were expensive, even mid-week.   The Ayres was better than a three star.  The king room was very nice: clean and quiet and it came with a refrigerator ceiling fan and coffee maker.   The bed was comfortable, the wifi was fast and the TV had premium stations.  .   And best of all there were none of the baloney of annoying fees for parking/resort/wifi/breathing to contend with.   I am so
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your recent stay with us at the Ayres Inn location.  We appreciate you mentioning our clean and comfortable rooms.  We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future.

Summary Heading: Great value, clean friendly place to stay
Summary: We had a great time staying 6 days at the Ayres Inn Orange. The staff was friendly and attentive. Rooms were clean amd comfortable. We would definately stay here again! Great deal through Hotwire Secret Rates. ART shuttle available to main entrance at Disneyland.
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and that our staff was helpful and friendly.  We look forward to having you stay again in the future!

Summary Heading: Not a resort, but very solid hotel
Summary: We come to Anaheim mostly to spend our entire day in the Disneyland parks; and so we spend very little time in our hotel. For this purpose, the Ayres Orange exceeds all expectations. If you want to spend a lot of time in the hotel, they do have a pool which is moderately sized; and their breakfast area converts into a restaurant/bar (which closes early and so we've never actually seen open). But for the most part, this hotel is a clean, comfortable place to spend the night and get a (surprisingly good) breakfast in the morning before you head out to your day elsewhere.  On our most recent visit they had extended their breakfast hours (I'm not sure if this is a now permanent change) over when we last visited; so we were able to eat at 6:30 and get an early start.  The breakfast
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review!  I am so happy to hear we provided you with great service and you enjoyed our complimentary amenities such as our breakfast, parking and internet.  We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future!

Summary: Hotel has a lovely "warmth" about it. Rooms are very neat and clean, and the King bed mattress and pillows are so comfortable! Every morning there is a hot buffet breakfast from 6-9 o'clock. Staff are helpful. There are warm cookies on the counter every evening. There is free wifi (that is good quality!) and parking. The hotel is opposite a shopping complex that is within walking distance - we certainly took advantage of that a few nights as there was bowling and restaurants as well as outlet shops! The location is very good as there is a shuttle to Disneyland ($12 each person). The price is excellent and we will stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review and thank you for mentioning our complimentary breakfast, parking, internet and evening cookies.  We cant wait for you to stay with us again!

Summary: A clean , well maintained boutique style hotel that is conveniently located on the ART route #14.  It took ten minutes for us to get to and from Disney as they pick you up right at the Ayers Inn on Chapman Ave. Hotel staff are very engaging and helpful. Rooms are cleaned early so that is nice if you want to come back to your room. Everything worked well- elevator quick, shower-good pressure and hot , Iron -clean and functioning, coffee maker was quick. Out door pool warm and clean, hot tub clean with several jets at different levels. Hot breakfast that varied a bit each morning with lots of choices. Will probably stay here next time. We have been to Portofino and Remada on Katella and we liked the Ayers Inn a lot more. Excellent paintings and interesting photography on the walls
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review!!  We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and that you enjoyed our hotel over your past hotels.  We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future.

Summary: My family always stay at Ayres at Orange when we travel to California. It has a great location with free parking. Only 10 mins drive to the Disney theme parks,and 3 mins away from the Orange outlets. Breakfast in the mornings is great but you will need to get in early and a line forms pretty quickly. Staff at reception always friendly, regardless or what time you sneak back in.  I would recomend for anyone wanting a room with a great location and service.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review and also your loyalty to the Ayres Inn Orange!!  We love to have our guests return each year!  We look forward to your next stay.

Summary: We were in a room with a King size bed and a sofa bed for 2 of our kids and we brought a pac-n-play for our toddler. Things were tight but we were able to keep pathways open with constant organization over the 4 nights we were there. The room was clean, the bed comfortable and the furniture nice and in good repair. The a/c-heater worked fine. Our only complaints were that the hair dryer didn't work in the bathroom (I forgot to tell the front desk) and the breakfast choices were a bit limited and not arranged so that the line of people flowed very well, but it was okay considering the space is usually used for something else.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review.  I am sorry to hear the hairdryer did not work properly doing your stay.  However we are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us.  We look forward to your future stay.

Summary: The Ayres Inn is comfortable and friendly with heaps of parking and spacious rooms. Near great shopping, Disneyland and oldtown Orange. The staff are alway very friendly and helpful with a greeting every time you walk in the door. The breakfast is basic but is good for families rushing off to Disneyland or other activities.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review.  We truly appreciate our guest feedback.

Summary: I was really disappointed after reading these reviews then arriving at this hotel. The problem is guests are confusing this dumpy outdated inn with the beautiful new Ayres Hotel which is right next door (stay there!( The inn is outdated, old, and my room appeared clean but was actually dirty. I found hairs in the bathtub and when I was packing to leave and looked under the bed to see if I left anything, there was actual old wrappers of some sort of candy. They do not offer any help at your arrival with luggage. If you're expecting class service,  this isn't the right place. The front desk were polite. Unfortunately,  it doesn't make up what it's lacking. It's too bad,  the location is good (if you enjoy hearing ambulances from the hospital directly across the street)
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. Your feedback is important to us, as it helps us to better serve our guests. With that said, we are sincerely sorry we failed to meet your expectations during your recent visit.  We are continually making improvements to our hotel, if there is anything else you feel could help us better serve you please contact me directly at jbrown@ayreshotels.com.

Summary Heading: A Great Home Away From Home!!!
Summary: I love this hotel. The staff is amazing and will bend over backwards to accommodate. The facility is very clean and lovely. I always stay here when I am in Orange which is about 8 times per year. Never had a bad experience!
Manager Response: We are very happy to read our staff provided you with great service!  We thank you for being a loyal Ayres Inn Orange guest.  We thank you for taking the time to write a review and we look forward to seeing you again.

Summary Heading: Very nice, close to Disney, no extra costs
Summary: I have stayed in hotels around Disneyland many times, and the nicer ones they often hit you with and extra resort or parking fee ($10 or $15 per night). This hotel which was rated a 3* was as nice or nicer than many 3 1/2 * hotels I have stayed at. If you are driving to Disney, it is just a quick hop over to the Toy Story parking lots.
Manager Response: We thank you for your stay at our hotel and look forward to serving you in the future.

Summary: My husband, sister, and I were recently in Orange for my son's wedding.  I chose Ayers Inn due to the location, ratings, and price.  The Inn did not disappoint!  The staff was friendly, the room was very comfortable, and the complimentary buffet breakfast was appreciated.  I would choose Ayers again for a stay in Orange county.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We are happy to hear you all enjoyed your stay with us and we look forward to your future stay!

Summary: Front desk staff were incredibly friendly and went out of their way to help. Clean rooms with nice decor. Right across the street from UC Irvine medical center, so fantastic for anyone conducting business there.  Free hot buffet breakfast with good food. Occasionally had free chocolate chip cookies at the front desk for all to take.
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review of our Hotel.  We have to agree with you that our staff is exceptionally friendly and helpful.  We are so glad to hear you enjoyed your stay as well as our complimentary breakfast and fresh baked cookies that we offer in the evening.  We look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary: Just returned from a 4 day trip to Disneyland.  We were previously not familiar with the Ayres hotel chain but based on positive tripadvisor reports we booked our stay.  Happy to say that all went as hoped as the facility was well appointed and maintained.  Our room was good as it was clean with a very comfortable bed. Breakfast was a pleasant surprise as enough variety to satisfy our whole family of selective eaters.  The Outlets at Orange mall is one block away for easy shopping access and there are a number of restaurants close by. The hotel is also close to a hospital so a few sirens are to be expected but nothing excessive nor middle of the night was noted.  A local shuttle service to the Disney parks is available for a small fee ($5?) however we drove our rental van and
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We look forward to having you and your family stay with us again on your next Disneyland trip!

Summary: We stayed at the Ayres Inn while going to Disneyland for a couple of days.  The price was superb and included parking, breakfast, and Internet.  The staff is very friendly and helpful.  They also have a convenient shuttle to/from Disneyland at a reasonable price.  Breakfast had a great selection, definitely way better than expected. Rooms are spacious and very clean; the HDTV was nice.  The pool is small and in a shaded area (at least this time of the year) but it is sufficient for the little ones.  All in all, we had an excellent stay and will come back.
Manager Response: We appreciate you leaving us a review.  We thank you for mentioning our friendly staff, our great complimentary breakfast and also our ART shuttle service.  We look forward to your future stay!

Summary: We only stayed one night, but I would have liked to stay longer. Will definitely consider this location next time we are in the area. Close enough to Disneyland and other So Cal attractions. Staff was extremely nice as well as the parking structure.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review!  We look forward to having you stay with us again in future and hopefully for longer than one night.

Summary: Rooms are very beautifully appointed with beautiful dark wood furniture and real bed spreads. Entire property has an elegance to it. Very very clean and comfortable. The free wifi and breakfast are a bonus.
Manager Response: Thank you for mentioning our hotel rooms were clean and comfortable.  We appreciate the review and look forward to your future stay with us.

Summary: We had a great stay at ayers inn.  Rooms were clean, food was great- all of the things you Iook for in  a hotel.  But the service, particularly the GM and one house person, went above and beyond.  In short, we left a dental device in a paper cup that got thrown away.  Once we realized this, we found ourselves looking through trash bags trying to find it.  Right next to me as I was dumpster diving was the gm in her suit and one unfortunate houseman.   In the rain, no less.  This wasn't something they had it do, it was our problem.  But they did, and that kind of service is not easily forgotten.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review.  We are so happy to hear you and your family enjoyed your stay at the Ayres Inn.  We are very fortunate to have such a great GM and Houseman staff that show us what great customer service is all about.  We thank you again for the review and look forward to your future visit!

Summary: This is a value for money accommodation. The rooms are clean. There is a shuttle service to disney (5mins ride). And there is an outlet shopping centre (10mins walk). The staffs (Drew and James) were really helpful in giving directions etc.
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review!  We are so happy to hear our staff provided you with great service.  We look forward to your next stay!

Summary: My sister and I had a great 6-night stay at the Ayres Inn Orange.   PRO:  Safe, clean, close to amenities such as Starbucks, Wendy's, Best Buy and the Honda Center.  The WiFi was the best I've ever experienced in a hotel-setting and is something that truly matters to me.  The Staff was friendly, attentive, responsive, well groomed and professional.  They also displayed appropriate humor which was a bonus!   The bed, lighting, electrical outlets, etc. were perfect for our needs.  I would stay there again and gladly recommend this location for family and friends.   CON:  One con was not something that the Inn had much control over.  Our neighbors SLAMMED their door each and every time they came and went from the room.  We noticed that our door had to be physically closed - it
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review!  We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your recent stay with us and that our staff was professional, friendly and attentive.  I am sorry to hear your neighbors door repeatedly slammed, we will look into our doors to see how we can eliminate the noise.  We look forward to having you stay with us again!

Summary Heading: Nice stay...staff friendliness a coin toss
Summary: The rooms were nice. Nothing fancy but clean and the fridge was a nice touch. Bed was super uncomfortable and felt overly worn. We stayed 2 nights and had a hard time staying asleep due to bed. Staff friendliness was a coin toss...some were super friendly and some(surprisingly the GM) gave the impression that I was an inconvenience when approaching the desk. Overall..decent stay with cool perks like free parking, wifi and breakfast.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. Your feedback is important to us, as it helps us to better serve our guests. With that said, we are sincerely sorry we failed to meet your expectations during your recent visit. We are glad you enjoyed our breakfast, parking and internet.

Summary: I loved everything about this hotel.  Everyone who worked there was extremely helpful and always pleasant.  The room setup was perfect - especially the built-in cubicles outside the bathroom for organizing clothes for the family.  Even though we had free parking at Disneyland, the hotel shuttle was so much easier to take.  After leaving this hotel we traveled to Carlsbad and stayed at a Hampton Inn.  All I could think about was how I wished there was an Ayres in Carlsbad.  I highly recommend this hotel and can't wait to go back.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write us a review!  We appreciate you sharing with our reviewers about your experience at our hotel.  We are very pleased to read that our staff was very helpful and pleasant!  We look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary: The hotel was reasonably comfortable and quiet - nothing fancy, but clean and adequate...  but there were NO DRAPES to block the city lights at night, just sheers and fake drapes at the ends that do not close.  If you like some darkness at night, don't stay here.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete a review for our property.  I am surprised to read this review as all of our rooms are equipped with blackout drapes which are located behind the sheer ones.  I am sorry for any inconvenience you had encountered during your stay.

Summary: We had a great experience in our stay. Very helpfull staff, clean rooms, great breakfast,  great location ( couple of blocks from Outlet stores) and 10 min driving from disney...the only downside was that we stayed in a room facing to a busy street/freeway.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We are so happy to hear you had a great experience at our Hotel.  We look forward to having you stay with us again!

Summary: My family recently stayed her for our annual trip to Disneyland and it was a fabulous stay. The staff was professional, helpful, and couteous and also helped to accommodate all of our requests. The rooms were spacious and clean. The shuttle for Disney stopped right outside the front doors with no stops on the way to the park and only one stop on the way back. The breakfast each morning was hot and fresh and perfect for both adults and kids. It was also great to come home from the park each night to hot and fresh cookies. There is a Starbucks, Wendy's, and Quizno's right next door. I would highly recommend this place to anyone and will definitley come back here next year for our trip to Disneyland:)
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of our hotel and your recommendations!  We are pleased to read that you found our hotel to be the best accommodation for your annual trip to Disneyland. We thank you for your stay and we hope you visit us soon again!

Summary Heading: Perfect for visiting UCI Medical Center
Summary: Ayre's Inn is located opposite the UCI medical center in Orange, CA. A nice lobby, all done up for Halloween and clean adn comfortable rooms with all essential amenities. Free Wifi in rooms and a simple breakfast spread. A Best Buy is located right next to the hotel and the Outlets at Orange are a 10 minute walk away. The Outlets offer some good shopping and eating options. The Disney resort area is a little farther away but the Anaheim Resort buses make a stop at this hotel. Overall a good and comfortable stay with pleasant staff.
Manager Response: We thank you for taking the time to write a review and we look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: Stayed there for my residency interview at UCI Medical Center, and it was better than I expected. Enchanting. From the cookies at the lobby to the handsome furnishings in the room, it was extremely pleasant. Would definitely stay here again when in Orange County for Disneyland, or any other business. Fabulous stay overall.
Manager Response: We are happy to read you were very satisfied with your stay at our hotel!   Thank you for sharing with our reviewers the features that make our hotel have a great value.  We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: I have never met a more friendly group of people.  My pants ripped and they negotiated a local quick fix.  I was running late and they drove me to my train.  They are amazing.  You should stay here.  I mean it's the best.  Also the free breakfast was awesome.
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review!  I am so happy to hear our staff provided you with excellent service.  We look forward to your future stay with us!

Summary: I booked through Hotwire and got this hotel. At first I was a little disappointed about how far the hotel was from Disneyland, as that's where I was going, but when I arrived it was just a few minute drive down the freeway. When I checked in, the front desk guy was all nice and smiley until he pulled up my reservation and realized I had booked with Hotwire. After that, he was extremely rude. However every other staff member was very friendly. The room was very clean and the complimentary breakfast was delicious. Aside from the rude front desk guy, I had a wonderful stay at the hotel and would definitely go back.
Manager Response: Thank you for leaving a review for our hotel.  I want to start by apologizing that my staff member had treated you poorly during the check in process but I am happy however to hear you received friendly service from everyone else.  We appreciate the feedback from our guests as it helps us improve our future guests' experience.  Thank you again for the review as we truly appreciate our guest feedback.

Summary: Outstanding hotel.  Have stayed there in 2011 for more than 11 weeks and it continues to be a superb hotel,  Breakfasts are very good and substantial.  Rooms very clean and have new closet arrangements that are very practical.  Anytime, I am in this area,I will always choose Ayres inn Orange.  They continue to treat me as family and the staff give you a feeling of a home away from home.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for naming us as your Anaheim/Orange hotel of choice!  We thank you for being a loyal Ayres Inn Orange guest.  We are very happy to read you have continued to come back year after year.  Thank you for choosing the Ayres Inn Orange as your place to stay when visiting the Orange/Anaheim area and we look forward to having you stay with us again soon!!

Summary: We stayed here for 6 nights in October 2014.  After an initial mess up with our reservation, they somehow put a different name on the reservation but got us a room for the night till we could work out the mix up with a call to our travel agency, we had a perfect stay! We were here with a large group on a extended family vacation.  Ayers Inn is the ideal place for a Disneyland vacation with the family.  Some of the most friendly staff we have ever had at a hotel and they keep the rooms very clean.  We loved meeting in the beautiful lobby every morning, after a wonderful breakfast, for the rest of the family, to go to Disneyland.  The breakfast is a nice difference from the other hotels we stayed at on our trip.  What a plus to wake up and have a nice HOT breakfast every morning.
Manager Response: Thank you for your amazing review!  It was such a pleasure having you and your family stay with us.  We were so excited to see you all dressed up in your costumes for the Disney Halloween Party and that you let us put the picture up on our Ayres Inn Facebook page.  We look forward to having you all stay with us again!

Summary Heading: Perfect for travelling with a pet.
Summary: Great location for a workshop across street with covered parking available as well.  Free breakfast was very good and restaurant exceeded our expectations with good wine too.  Easy off freeway and close to Disneyland as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for leaving a review for our hotel.  We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and look forward to having you stay with us again.

Summary Heading: Excellent choice for chapman college visit
Summary: Staff were cheerful, friendly and helpful. Reasonable rates, breakfast buffet included. Rooms with views, free parking. Shuttle to Disneyland if that's your purpose. Easy access to freeways. Quiet hotel
Manager Response: Thank you for mentioning our friendly staff, breakfast and shuttle service.  We look forward to your next stay.

Summary: I was very impressed by the service,  room quality,  and general appearance of this hotel. Very nice. I stayed at the inn which is in the same parking lot as the hotel. They're not too far from Disneyland and there's a Krispy Kreme down the street. All in all a central location to fun times.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We look forward to having you stay with us again.

Summary: We enjoyed our 2 night stay at the Ayres Hotel...The hotel  lobby was so welcoming  with with pleasant hotel staff to greet you..at first room kinda had a weird smell to it ..but once we put the fan on and the  air conditioner on it was fine..The beds were comfortable...The breakfast was really good  and the price was great! We will definitely be coming back....
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of our hotel and we look forward to welcoming you again soon!

Summary: I stayed here due to location and these alleged amazing reviews. From the moment I stepped foot inside, there was horrible service.  My family had to wait 14 minutes to even be seen and get our hotel keys. We had four suit cases in which we were directed to use the dolly ourselves as there was nobody to help us with the luggage. We then checked into a room which wasn't cleaned from the previous guest. I had to go down with my two children and husband along with our four suitcases and given the option to wait approximately 30 to 45 minutes for the room to be cleaned or take a room on the bottom floor. And we were then blamed for this as they said "we weren't expecting you until formal check in". When we finally checked into this outdated room facing a lot and noise from the
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. Your feedback is important to us, as it helps us to better serve our guests. With that said, we are sincerely sorry we failed to meet your expectations during your recent visit and we apologize for the inconvenience you received during the initial check in process as well as your interactions with the staff during your stay.

Summary: Ayers Inn was a great hotel for my family vacation. They had a great breakfast each morning and the rooms were awesome! Their beds were AMAZING!!! The hotel staff was always very friendly and accommodating, they also put out cookies each evening to share with their guests. Overall Ayers Inn is A+.
Manager Response: We are glad you and your family enjoyed our wonderful beds and that our staff was always attentive and friendly.  We can't wait for your next trip to the Anaheim/Orange area.

Summary: we had a very nice stay here, it includes breakfast and free parking and wifi. We requested a top floor and away from elevator and the room was very quite at night. The beds were great and had the full enclosed zipper liner to prevent bed bugs from surviving and there were no signs of bed bugs (even when I looked inside of liner with flashlight).and we did not have any bites. I only say this cause there is a recent review on bedbug registry that says this hotel has them and we did not see or get any bites after two nights stay.  It is only about a 10min drive to Disneyland or you can take the public shuttle for $5 each way right from the hotel. They had a very nice lobby and separate eating area with two large rooms for the free breakfast. The breakfast had a very extensive
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us.  Thank you for mentioning our ART shuttle service as well as our complimentary breakfast.  We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future.

Summary: Stayed here when I was interviewing across the street at the hospital.  I got a pretty good discount rate from the hospital and had a good stay.  Staff is real friendly, rooms are clean, and breakfast was decent for a free meal.    One down side was the annoying AC, which was loud and often had to readjust the temperature to avoid feeling too hot/cold.    Overall would recommend this hotel.  Also check out the new Ayres Hotel next door, seemed nice as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review.  We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay while visiting UCI Medical Center.  I am sorry to hear the AC unit was loud during your stay.  We look forward to you staying with us again in the future.

Summary: I stayed at the Ayres for one night while attending a class in the area. The rate was fair for the room. Clean, basic and comfortable. The TV did not have on demand movies, only basic cable and two HBO channels. The staff was very accommodating and friendly. Warm chocolate chip cookies are kept at the registration desk, very nice! Breakfast was good. My main disappointment was no room service since I was tired and wanted to eat in my room. Otherwise, it was a comfortable stay. Right across from shopping, restaurants and theaters as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We appreciate you mentioning our staff was accommodating and friendly and that you enjoyed our breakfast and fresh baked cookies.  We look forward to having you stay with us in the future.

Summary: So, I've stayed at the Ayres in Manhattan Beach and now the Ayres Inn Orange.    Hotel Rooms:  The rooms at both properties are similar and feature Dark wood "old school" European style furnishings) The beds are comfortable, and both rooms came with a small fridge.    Dining:  I think the Ayres Orange has a nicer dining room! the food quality is about the same, and I would rate it at slightly above average, but I only had breakfast.    Pool and Fitness:  Yes to both!  I would have liked a slightly larger Fitness area, but still better than many other large "chain" hotels.   Overall: I think Ayres Hotels are a great value for the money.  Both properties offered free parking (outside) and they both have these great nostalgic photos of LA from back in the 1920's to the post war
Manager Response: We thank you for your feedback and we are delighted to read you enjoyed your stay at the Ayres Inn Orange!  Thank you for sharing that our breakfast and food from Anepalco's (restaurant on site) was delicious!  Thank you for giving us the opportunity to serve you.  We look forward to your return visit to our hotel!

Summary: Good location, above average services and friendly staff, thats is what you would appreciate about this small but relatively well maintained hotel.  They are undergoing expansion as well and, their location at a lively junction makes them a good place to stay in.   Only suggestion to the hotel, please reconsider your breakfast menu and keep varying it, else it becomes very boring.
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and that our staff was friendly!  We look forward to your next stay!

Summary: This was my second time staying at this hotel. They are always ready with my room no matter what time I check in and are so polite and helpful. The rooms are very clean and we have had 2 wonderful stays so far! I highly recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review!  We love having our Chapman Parents return for Parents Weekend.  We look forward to having you stay with us again!

Summary: If you're trying to balance amenities/convenience/price ... this is your hotel. Central to everything, super clean, lovely rooms, free parking, free wi-fi, AMAZING hotel restaurant (you must try Anepalco's Mexican/French fusion!) Loved it. Will definitely return. Didn't love the pillows, but that's SO incredibly minor.
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review!  We love receiving feedback from our guests on their stays.  We look forward to having you stay with us again!

Summary: I stayed here in June from the UK with my girlfriend on our first trip to the states together. I can't recommend this hotel highly enough.   * Firstly, the staff were extremely helpful and friendly (particularly Chase and Amy) and went out of their way to help us with lists of things to do, see and eat in and around LA which. * The location is ideal for Disney and is just off the highway for a 40 minute average drive to Hollywood. * The rooms were clean and spacious and were regularly turned over. * The morning breakfast buffet was varied and delicious.  Overall, perfect for our stay and great value for money. I would personally consider this a 4 star hotel in terms of service and quality and it will be my first choice for when we next come back to California.
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review! We are so happy to hear you received great service from Chase and Amy.  We love receiving feedback from our guests especially when they had a great time at our Hotel.  We look forward to your future stay to California.

Summary: This is my 3rd sty at the Inn. As I've said before there is no better place -esp. if visiting one of the local colleges. Got the 'Chapman rate'-large room with one king bed and queen pull out sofa-more than adequate for my son. Same friendly faces there to great one on arrival. Location is excellent-close to major highways. FULL breakfast-egg/meat/fruit/bagels/coffee cake plus more- all included in my $105 per night base rate. Starbuck next door/plenty of free parking insight. Also the Santa Anna River trail easy to access- borrowed my daughters bike and road north to the Anaheim Hills area. South takes one all the way to Huntington Beach. Only negative is that the WIFI is often slow/bogged down- needs to be improved. Also Disney Bus comes frequently to take one directly to the
Manager Response: We love reading our guests had a great experience at our hotel.  Thank you for sharing with our reviewers the great value our hotel has because of our breakfast, and our location to Chapman University!  We thank you once again for your review and we hope to see you the next time you visit Chapman!

Summary: This was our first time at this hotel and unlike many other hotels in the Disneyland area, this property was not tired looking at all!  Room was awesome, very comfy bed.  The full breakfast was great, important when you have growing boys like me. I really liked that the ART (Disney) shuttle stopped right at the front door.  My boys LOVED the homemade cookies that the front desk had in the late afternoon/evening.  Very friendly and helpful front desk staff.  Thanks for a great stay, we will be back!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay, and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary: I have lost count of how many times we have stayed at this property. We really like it. Great breakfast and they start serving early (6:30 a.m.) for early risers like us.  Clean, really friendly staff, and very convenient to everything in Orange. Their new hotel right next door is lovely too; we took a tour. If  you are in town to visit Chapman University, you can't pick a better hotel at a better price. You just can't!
Manager Response: We thank you for being a loyal Ayres Inn Orange guest.  We are very happy to read you have continued to come back year after year.  Thank you for choosing the Ayres Inn Orange as your place to stay when visiting the Orange/Anaheim area.

Summary: Arrived here late at night from UK for 13 nights booked on-line.  Told they had no booking for us even though we had a copy of our e-mail confirmation. We were given a voucher for 1 night stay at the new Ayres Hotel next door. Luckily the manager there sorted everything out for us and we stayed there for the whole 13 nights.  Would probably not book at this hotel again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. Your feedback is important to us, as it helps us to better serve our guests. With that said, we are sincerely sorry we failed to meet your expectations during your recent visit and we apologize for the inconvenience you received during the initial check in process.

Summary: We had a great experience here! Hotel was clean, decor was very nice. Free parking, free wifi and free breakfast were awesome! Best free hotel breakfast I've ever had. Pancakes, french toast, sausage, eggs, breakfast potatoes along with all the usuals. Location was convenient to get to Disneyland, which is why we were there. Only cons were the TINY elevator and the water pressure in the shower was low. Neither of these would deter me from staying here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review!  We appreciate you mentioning all our lovely complimentary amenities and the convenience of our location to Disneyland.  We look forward to having you stay with us again.

Summary: It was an amazing stay.... The hotel staff was friendly and smiling.  The breakfast was really good quality food.  The beds were very comfortable.  I can't think of anything they could have done different to make it better.  We will be staying at this hotel again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your amazing review!  We love to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and our staff and breakfast met your standards.  We look forward to having you stay with us again.

Summary: Stayed at Ayres Inn Orange for four nights to visit Disneyland and see an Anaheim Angels game. The hotel is located in a safe area. We walked to the Angels game from the hotel. The hotel is very clean and comfortable. Served breakfast but mainly same food each day. Took the ART shuttle to Disney 3 days for $36.00 for 3 adults. Will stay at this hotel again when we return to Disney. Thanks Ayres for a pleasant stay.
Manager Response: We look forward to having you stay with us again for your next Disney trip!

Summary: If you get a discounted rate this location is a super deal and decent quality rather than staying at the Disneyland Hotels or other venues that might be closer.  They had a great breakfast and things were clean even though they were not updated.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We look forward to your future stay!

Summary Heading: Great stay, amazing staff, delicious food!
Summary: The beds are very comfortable and the room and bathroom are clean and smell fresh. Everything in our room works perfectly (AC, Bathroom fan, lights, TV, fridge etc...). The morning breakfast is delicious, the coffee is amazing and the staff is very friendly. Keep up the great work everyone at the Orange, CA. Ayres Inn
Manager Response: It is great to hear that you enjoyed your stay at our hotel and that our breakfast and rooms met your standards.  We look forward to having you stay with us again.

Summary Heading: Great hotel for location and price
Summary: The Ayres is a great hotel for the price, location and amenities.  Most hotels near Disneyland are overpriced because of their location - Ayres is considerably lower in price ($120 Disney Passholder Rate) and includes parking, FULL breakfast (food is made there on site and is not just an oatmeal and dry cereal breakfast but includes fresh made eggs, bacon / or sausage and pancakes / or waffles ALONG with the usual continental stuff - cereals, breads, fruits, yogurt, etc)  Its not walking distance to the Park but is about a 3min drive. This is the first time we stay at Aryes Orange, we normally stay at Aryes Anahiem and I must say, the rooms at Orange were considerably smaller than Anaheim - Anahiem is more of a suite, with an extended area that includes a sofa, coffee table and
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review.  We truly appreciate our guest feedback.

Summary: The Ayres Inn Orange was perfect for our trip.  The staff was helpful and pleasant.  The rooms were clean and comfortable. The location was great for shopping and access to Disneyland.  I would recommend this hotel for  both business and families.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review!  We look forward to having you and your family stay with us again in the future!

Summary Heading: best sleep on our trip thru CA
Summary: I had to be in both NorCal and SoCal for work, and so my wife and I took the opportunity to drive down the PCH.  Awesome experience, and highly recommended trip by the way (especially CA Hwy 1 between Carmel & Cambria, and CA Hwy 128).  Back to the hotel ... this was our best sleep during the trip, and we stayed at well-reviewed places the whole time.  Also, the location was perfect for the last bits of work I needed to do, with easy access to the freeways in Orange County.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review.  We have amazing Ayres Dream Sleeper mattress for our hotels and are happy to red that you had the best nights sleep while staying with us.  We look forward to your future stays!

Summary Heading: Clean, professional & we will be back
Summary: I booked this hotel through Expedia and I was very happy with how nice this hotel is and how great we were treated by the staff. This is a 4 star hotel really close to Disneyland. I will would highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We are happy to hear you enjoyed our hotel and we look forward to having you stay with us again in the future.

Summary Heading: 3.5 Stars.       A great stay at a decent price
Summary: The location is right next to a freeway, but we did not hear the traffic.  The views were just okay, higher floors are better, but it's not a tall building.  The pool is next to the freeway/freeway exit, but it was not too nosy and it was very well kept and had outdoor showers for rinsing off. The staff were friendly and efficient, we needed a few things every now and then, never waited long. Arrived really late one night, staff present and helpful, warm cookies always ready? Yes. That was nice, my son's favorite part of the stay. Room was clean, fridge worked great, decent size space plenty of room for two adults, and two 10 year olds. Continental breakfast was okay, not amazing, not terrible but okay. Included all the basics, fruit, eggs, meats, potatoes etc and a few extras
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review.  We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and for mentioning all our amenities and surrounding area details.  We look forward to having you and your family stay with us again in the future.

Summary: This hotel was perfect for our visit. They were very accommodating to put all of us attending the same event in the same hall. With that being said, the rooms were pretty sound proof. Also, the free breakfast was better than mosts.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We look forward to having you stay with us again soon!

Summary: We stayed here 14Sep2014 through the 26th. Everybody from the time we checked to check out were so friendly and helpful. Cory was so great as was Jon.   I had requested a ground floor room when the reservation was made. We checked in early and they had our room ready.   We had a ground floor room with a view of the inside walk way to the pool area. So pretty to look at.  The room was large and we had plenty of room. The room consisted of a king bed, leather sofa, desk and chest of drawers. When you first walk in the room, there is the closet and other shelves, made storing our items very easy.   The bathroom was small which made it hard for 2 people getting ready in the mornings.   For the most part the room was surfaced cleaned each day. The dusting never rally happened after
Manager Response: We thank you for taking the time to complete our survey. We truly value your feedback as it allows us to improve our operations. We have shared with our housekeeping staff and breakfast staff your feedback. We will re-train our team on the proper procedures with cleaning rooms and also in regards to the breakfast. We thank you again, for bringing this to our attention. Please feel free to contact me directly, should you have any further concerns.

Summary: I'm so glad I found this hotel to stay in while my husband had surgery at UC Irvine. I felt very safe and comfortable here for five nights. So close to everything I needed during my stay. The staff was wonderful!- so helpful and courteous! Great bed, breakfast, and very clean. I will stay here again when I visit Disneyland.
Manager Response: We appreciate your kind review.  We look forward to having you stay with us on your next trip!

Summary: I had originally made reservations at Disney Grand Adventure Hotel but after a few days price remorse set in and I cancelled my reservation. I searched for hotels and after reading many reviews I decided on Ayres Inn. For the price, you cannot beat it! The staff including front desk and maid service was excellent. The attached restaurant that serves French/ Mexican was different and delishious!  Can't  beat the warm and fresh breakfast! The fresh fruit salad was unexpected and everything else was really delishious! It was really nice to sit outside on their porch and enjoy the breakfast. We enjoyed the pool between visits to Disneyland. Hot baked cookies were a treat! The shuttle service was timely and friendly.  Forgot to mention that the room was quite nice and very clean.
Manager Response: Thank you for your awesome review!  We are so happy to hear you enjoyed our complimentary hot breakfast, evening cookies and ART shuttle service.  We look forward to having you stay with us again for your next trip!

Summary Heading: Mary T., Highland, CA. Loved it!  Friendly staff, clean and a very attractively decorated hotel.
Summary: My husband had surgery at the UCIrvine Hospital which is right across the street from the hotel.  We chose it based on the proximity to the hospital but liked it so much that we would come back again for leisure.  The hotel is very clean, great staff, fresh baked cookies in the early evening, classic European style, great art work, and close to so much.  Block of Orange (large mall and theater complex) within walking distance, Disneyland and Knotts close by.  And a full hot breakfast that was delicious.  I'm thinking about getting a few friends together and staying for a couple of days for some fun and relaxation.  Would highly recommend the hotel!!!  And.... the price was lower than other hotels in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay, and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon for a relaxing getaway!

Summary: Across the street from UC Irvine & walking distance to outlets, huge movie theater & Starbucks. Covered parking, clean large rooms, nice pool. Staff were great.  I would definitely recommend for Orange area. Free breakfast was standard but they did have fresh fruit.
Manager Response: We thank you for taking the time to write us a review and we look forward to serving you in the future!

Summary: Very clean and comfortable. Good Location - went to the Anaheim Angels game. Everyone was very friendly and the breakfast was full service.  The bed was very comfortable and the room was spacious. Would definitely stay again maybe when I visit Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay while in town for the Angels Game.  We look forward to having you stay with us again!

Summary: From the moment I called until we left (4 days later) the hotel was wonderful!!!  Hot breakfast each morning with a trained and friendly staff.  The front desk especially Chase were very warm and friendly and called me by name each time they saw me.  Housekeeping did a wonderful job of keeping our room pristine.  Warm cookies were an added bonus and made us feel like we were family.  Having the access to a shuttle was great, kept the car parked the whole time!  We will be back next year!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review.  We are happy to read that you enjoyed our complimentary amenities like our Hot breakfast, parking and fresh baked cookies as well as our shuttle services.  We look forward to having you and your family stay with us again on your next Anaheim/Orange trip!

Summary: Out of all of the properties that I stayed at the past 6 months, The Ayres Inn was my favorite. It was close to work, the room was great. I had a king room with a couch.  The couch made the difference in the stay.  I was generally there for 6+ days working. The staff is stop notched. The warm cookies at night are great and the breakfast is good.  Fresh fruit, real eggs, rotating breakfast meat was a great way to start the day. Their housekeeping staff is top notch.  The Ayres chain is great. If you are planning a drip to Anaheim/Orange for business or pleasure, check them first.  They do offer plans if you have a Disneyland Annual pass. Each location is different.  Again, when traveling in Southern California, The Ayres is our first choice.  In addition to my work, I am also a
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review! We are ecstatic to read you find our hotel to be your favorite!  We appreciate you sharing that our staff was friendly and that our breakfast was just right for a 6+ stay.  We hope to have you stay with us again on your future travels to the Orange/Anaheim area.

Summary Heading: Best SoCal hotel we have stayed at!
Summary: We are currently staying here for 9 nights. We love it! The staff are courteous and accommodating. Upon reading the online reviews/comments, I asked @ check-in if we could stay on the top floor so we could see the Disney fireworks. They told me that that floor was completely full cuz so many other families already requested the same thing and that I should request it at least 24 hrs before my stay. I told them that I wasn't aware you could do that. We stayed on another floor the first night and the next AM they notified us that a family checked-out of the top floor early at 8AM, that the maids would clean it when they arrived at 8:30AM, and by 9:30 AM they had moved our room to the top floor for the rest of our stay. If you have toddler age children, they will love the firework
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review!  We are happy to read your families experience with our hotel was a great one and you enjoyed the fireworks from one of our higher floor rooms.  We are delighted you found our hotel rooms to be clean, quiet and our staff to be friendly.  We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future.

Summary: Clean & comfortable. Great location. Everything was good about the hotel other than the fact that they are not understanding of medical conditions. It is a non smoking hotel and there is a smoking section outside. I followed the rules and smoked my medicine outside. The hotel would not return my cash deposit because my room had smelled like marijuana. The form I signed agreed to not smoke in the room and I didn't. I am a medical patient , and I feel that I have been robbed by these people.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are glad you enjoyed the cleanliness and comfort of our hotel, as well as the convenience of our proximity to many local attractions and dining.   Please feel free to contact me directly, should you like to discuss your experience with our smoking deposit. You may reach me at szuno@ayreshotels.com.

Summary: I got into town a couple of hours before check-in and Cory was very accommodating and helped me to get an early check-in.  Very nice staff.  Room was quiet with no issues at all!  Conveniently located.  I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  I am happy to hear Cory was friendly and accommodating when you arrived.  We look forward to having you stay with us again.

Summary: Before going to Ayres Inn Orange, I was going to the Best Western down the street (The City). Wasn't happy with my accommodations at Best Western.  I go to Orange to attend my daughter's school events (she attends Chapman University).  Ayres Inn reps attended a school function in February 2014. After the function, I immediately went to tour the Inn. Very nice. So, I decided to make reservations this time around. Glad I did. Very nice folks and because it's family-owned, it has a feel of pride and history.  Also, they serve a wonderful breakfast--with the works--bacon, eggs, waffles, pancakes, etc.  Not just "continental breakfast" fare.  If you  are a Chapman parent/alumni, this is a good place to rest. And if your child is residing at Panther Village, the Inn is just about 1
Manager Response: We love reading our guests had a great experience at our hotel.  Thank you for sharing with our reviewers the great value our hotel has because of our breakfast and our location to Chapman University!  We thank you once again for your review and we hope to see you the next time you visit Chapman!

Summary: Have stayed here many times,...all updated and nice.   New ayers next door didn't se it.  Staff nice.  Only complaint...air conditioning not effective enough...needs to cool better and constantly.  Nice breakfast...plenty to choose from.   Recommend
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future.

Summary: The hotel's location is handy right off Chapman. Overall look/feel is nice.  We were there for work and didn't have time to visit the pool. Room doors are not heavy and didn't fall closed on its own so we always had to make sure we pulled the door tight. Bathroom was very small, hard for two people to get ready at the same time. Blow drier is weak, shower drain didn't keep up so we stood in water as we showered.  Floor was all wet around air conditioner but the a/c worked and room was cool, so we didn't complain. Cleaning crew did make the bed and clean up, but certainly weren't perfectionists...carpet wasn't vacuumed, coffee pods didn't get refilled so we didn't have coffee after the first morning, coffee maker didn't get cleaned, they missed replacing the water glasses.
Manager Response: We thank you for taking the time to complete our survey. We truly value your feedback as it allows us to improve our operations. We have shared with our housekeeping staff your feedback. We will re-train our team on the proper cleaning program. We thank you again, for bringing this to our attention. Please feel free to contact me directly, should you have any further concerns.

Summary Heading: I've rarely encountered such a good staff
Summary: My stay at this hotel began with desk agent Chase.  Not only did he make me feel welcome but he also seemed genuine in his interaction with me.  He also remembered me and greeted me every time I came through the lobby.  I'd also like to compliment the AGM (I wish I knew her name) on her professionalism  Because I made the error of booking through a consolidator I was given a less desirable room, but the next morning the staff offered to move me to a better room: fantastic!  This is an older property but Ayers does a great job in keeping it fresh.  The room was very clean, the bed was comfortable and the location was very convenient to where I needed to be.  The breakfast spread is quite comprehensive and is included in the rate paid.  I would have no hesitation in staying in an
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review!  I am so happy to hear we provided you with great service and you enjoyed our complimentary amenities such as our breakfast, parking and internet.  We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future!

Summary: This Ayres is, for the price, the best stay my partner and I have had in the Anaheim Area. twice before we reserved rooms at this property by chance through the priceline express deals, but have been so happy with the stays that this time we decided to not leave it to chance and booked on the hotel website directly. We stayed in 401, a single king, and it was clean, well appointed, the bed was soft and dreamy, and we had a great night of sleep before a big day in the DIsney Parks.  The breakfast is consistently tasty and filling, and the dining area clean and comfortable.  We took the ART shuttle for $5 round trip (Bought day passes from reception) which made the trip to and from the parks easy and efficient.  The Main draw for us is the free parking and included breakfast.  We
Manager Response: Thank you for your awesome review!  We appreciate you mentioning all the perks of staying with the Ayres Inn Orange.  We are happy to hear you enjoyed our comfortable rooms, shuttle services and also our yummy breakfast!  We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future.

Summary: Needed an overnight stay at a hotel near Angels Stadium. This hotel did not disappoint. Nice, clean room and great amenities. There was a yummy breakfast with French toast, scrambled eggs, various breads, cereal, sausage and fruit salad and free parking. Would definitely recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We hope you stay with us again for your next Angels Game!!

Summary: We got this hotel through hot wire and only paid 70 bucks a night. This is a well run place. The front desk could not be more helpful. The room was impeccably clean. The free breakfast daily was hot, plentiful and tasty. The shuttle worked well and was comfortable. The Outlets at Orange mall was only a three minute drive. Good restaurants there. WiFi was also free.   Overall you could not do better and I would highly recommend this place. Chase, Irving and Xochitl were extremely good at customer service and we thank them for all their help.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review!  I am so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and that our staff provided great customer service.  We look forward to your future stay!!

Summary: This is our first visit to this Inn.  Really enjoyed our stay.  Rooms were roomy and clean.  The spa was just the right temperature. Having a full breakfast instead of what most hotel/Inns serve was a surprise.  We had egg, bacon,potatoes, pancakes, various types of bread, cereal, milk, juice and ice water.  We would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and we look forward to having you stay with us again!

Summary: Love this hotel.  It has so many personal touches to make it look less generic like most hotels.  Loved the artwork and the find furnishings.  The breakfast was good, the room was clean and spacious and the staff was very helpful.  Also, loved that I could use a shuttle to Disneyland.  I would highly recommend this to anyone visiting the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review!  We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your recent stay with us.  We look forward to having you stay again in the future.

Summary: My family and I, recently stayed in room 205 of the Ayres Inn Orange, in Orange County, California on Feb 2014.  And due to my previous experiences having found bedbugs in a newer hotel a few years back, I routinely try and perform a very thorough check for room cleanliness and evidence of bedbugs before staying in any room.  The bedbug search procedures I try to follow were recommended from my workplace by watching YouTube videos on Molecular Biologist David Cain, and the following review is how I rated this hotel room after my searching:  On a cleanliness scale, I rate this room a 6/10, and I give it a “Medium” bedbug risk rating due to the fact that the area between behind the mattress, the wall, and under the bed skirts were found to be very dirty, as I found an old dirty
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review.  We truly appreciate our guest feedback.

Summary Heading: Not as nice as some Ayres
Summary: This was a clean and comfortable room.  The staff were friendly and very helpful.  It is across from the UC Irvine Medical Center, so occasionally you will hear sirens.  There are two properties here, Ayres Hotel and Ayres Inn.  The Hotel looked newly renovated.  I have stayed at two other Ayres properties, and they both seemed newer than this property.  This Ayres did have a good breakfast: eggs, sausage, potatoes, pancakes, (on Sunday French Toast), various breads, cereal, fresh fruit and yogurt.  But it wasn't made to order like other Ayres. Lots of storage and electrical outlets. Our toilet sprayed water from where the tank connected to the bowl, whenever it was flushed.  I might try the Hotel next time, but this place was still very good.  There are six floors and the
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We appreciate your loyalty to Ayres Hotels.

Summary: We spent 8 nights at the Ayres in early August, and once again it was a fantastic stay. Once again the hotel staff was as friendly as ever.  They are always very gracious and helpful when we arrive at the hotel.  The rooms are always very clean and have never had to wait long, even when arriving a little early.  The rooms have been updated since our last stay at the hotel and they have done a great job.  The only thing lacking is an update to the very small bathrooms.  This is the biggest complaint that my family of girls had, not enough room for all of them to get ready.  The breakfast at this hotel is always good (typically eggs, bacon or sausage, and pancakes, with an assortment of bagels, and cereals). It's a great way to get started each morning. The employees in this area
Manager Response: We thank you for taking the time to write a review. We are thrilled to hear you loved your stay at our hotel! Thank you for sharing about the cleanliness of our rooms, the friendliness of our staff and the proximity of the nearby attractions. We'd love to have you visit us again. We hope to see you soon!

Summary: We booked this as a basic base for our weeks trip to California before moving on to out more luxury hotels in Hollywood and Vegas and were pleasantly surprised.  The rooms were clean and comfy, the breakfasts were good and the location was great only a short shuttle trip to Disney and about a 5 minute walk to a great shopping area.  We are planning another trip to California and will definitely be looking at staying here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your awesome review!  We are so happy to hear your enjoyed your stay with us and we look forward to having you stay again on your next California trip!

Summary: This was my second time staying at a Ayres Hotel and the experience was even better than the first time.  We stayed at the Ayres Inn Orange and loved every minute of it.  The locale is great but it is the friendly staff that truly make your stay amazing.  We had a very large room with a very comfortable King size bed and leather sofa  (with a pullout).  The morning breakfast, which was included was perfect to get the day started.  Other amenities in the hotel including a pool and a small gym make the experience complete.  Now on to the staff.  From the time I made the reservation, the staff was nothing short of amazing.  I initially tried to make the reservation online but there were some issues in the system which gave me conflicting messages.  I dialed the hotel number and the
Manager Response: Your review was a pleasure to read.  Thank you for sharing about your wonderful experience at our hotel.  We are thrilled to read our staff was extremely friendly and helpful.  We look forward to having the opportunity to serve you on your next visit to the Anaheim/Orange area.

Summary: It doesnt matter if its not right next to disneyland because it's compensated with the super comfortable beds, the excelent breakfast and the in room coffee! Plus, there's a bus stop right in front of the hotel and the bus leaves you in disneyland in 15 minutes or less so the distance doesnt matter at all!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your wonderful review!  We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future.

Summary: What a beautiful hotel!! From the moment you walk in with in soft music playing & the friendly staff, you feel comfortable & relaxed. We arrived really early & they got our rooms ready extra fast.  Staff was phenomenal - customer service is obviously well taught. Great little breakfast - simple (fresh fruit, pancakes, eggs, sausage) but well done! I'd rather have less food & it be good! The restaurant is phenomenal as well. If they have the jalapeno soup HAVE IT!!! I was doubtful & opted for a salad. I regretted it ;)  The rooms are big, clean, peaceful. Has a coffee maker & a fridge. Lots of space for cloths! Nice toiletries.  You are across from the Orange Outlet  mall. If you go there get a Hagendas ice cream (doulche leche was the best) and Wetzel pretzel bites!! Mmmmmmmm
Manager Response: We appreciate you leaving us such a great review!  We thank you for mentioning our friendly staff, our amazing restaurant we have on site and our other complimentary amenities.  We look forward to your future stay!

Summary: Had a very nice stay at the Ayres Inn Orange.  The room was large, with a leather sofa, work table, and king size bed that was very comfortable.  The included breakfast was very good also.  The staff was friendly and efficient.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We look forward to having you stay with us in the future.
