Summary: We stayed at the Ayres Inn for seven nights Aug. 2 - 9th. Myself, my boyfriend and my granddaughter. Our room was spacious with two queen size beds. Very clean and comfortable. No complaints. The breakfast was very good, plentiful and very satisfying better than most hotels with their donuts and coffee at least there's was real food. The lobby was well furnished with nice fixtures, and the rugs were clean and soft. The interstate was very close so it made traveling convenient.  The only complaint I have is that there was a medical center located across from the hotel so you can hear the ambulances arriving at the center but other than that I would defiantly stay there again. The staff were very friendly and happy to assist me with directions to anywhere I wanted to visit
Manager Response: Your review was a pleasure to read.  Thank you for sharing about your wonderful experience at our hotel.  We look forward to seeing you next time you visit the Anaheim/Orange area.

Summary: I took the kids to Disney Land and stayed there for 1 week. Staff were great,rooms were clean  and breakfast was decent. We have no complaints, everything was great. I recommend Ayres when traveling to Disney. They are close to the park and have shuttle service, plus there parking is free. We absolutely loved it!
Manager Response: It is great to hear that you enjoyed your stay at our hotel and that our staff took great care of you.  We look forward to having you all stay with us again in the future!

Summary Heading: Nothing wrong with it but don't get all of the great reviews
Summary: We stayed at the Ayres Inn for four nights as a family of four at the end of July.     There was nothing wrong with the hotel.  However, there wasn't anything all that great either.  Basic hotel. The room was comfortable and clean. There was a free breakfast and while it was more "real food" than many breakfast buffets it was a rather small selection and nothing exciting.  The pool was ok but nothing much.  The location was fairly convenient through it could be a bit difficult to get in and out because of the traffic patterns.    The front desk was helpful and responsive though it took a really long time to check in for reasons that weren't obvious.  I certainly wouldn't avoid this place, because it was comfortable and clean but it just isn't a top hotel as the overall ratings
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review.  We truly appreciate our guest feedback.

Summary Heading: great location, clean and very comfortable
Summary: we stayed at Ayres Inn Orange for three nights in early August.  It is in a great location for the I-5 and 22.  Also the bed was extremely comfortable, as were the pillows.   the room was clean.  These are the three things I demand in any motel/hotel.  the windows are double glazed so facing the freeway is not a problem.   We would stay there again.
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear you enjoyed our comfortable beds and pillows!  We can't wait for your next stay here at the Ayres Inn Orange!

Summary Heading: Price is right and staff is nice
Summary: We stayed here for three nights while visiting Disneyland. The price was excellent, especially when you factor in free breakfast and parking, both of which are a rarity in the Disney vicinity. I waited several days before booking via Hotels.com, there was a $25 per night difference from what I initially saw to what I actually booked.   The good:   -Staff was very nice and accommodating.   -Laundry facilities on site were great, we were able to do a full load of laundry for $3.50.   -Breakfast was tasty and plentiful.They don't have anything fancy like a waffle or omelet bar, but there's enough food to fill you up until lunch.    -Parking was great, never a lack of space.   -The room had plenty of storage, including a dresser and multiple shelves.   -The ART shuttle was helpful,
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are so happy to see that you enjoyed our breakfast as well as our complimentary parking and shuttle services.  We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future.

Summary Heading: Hotel is Nice BUT Staff is another story
Summary: This was our 1st time at Ayres. It's a nice hotel for the price. The parking is free, free WiFi, free hot breakfast which consists of Pancakes or French Toast (they vary each day), Eggs, Potatoes, Sausages, Yogurt, Cereal, Fruit, assorted breads, Coffee, Juice & Milk. Get there early though because food goes fast. They have the ART shuttle that takes you to Disney. $5 a day or they give you a discount if you're going for several days but it has to be consecutive days. It picks you up & drops you off at the entrance of hotel as well as the entrance of Disney. Can't get better than this. The pool and hot tub are nice & clean. They also have a small gym and laundry facility. If you forget to take your own detergent, they sell small boxes there. The room we chose had a king bed with
Manager Response: I would like to start off by apologizing for the issues you experienced during your stay with us. I appreciate your honest feedback. We take reviews such as yours very seriously, as it allows us to know what areas need improvement.  Thank you again for the review.

Summary Heading: Great Experience at the Ayres Inn Orange
Summary: We recently stayed at this hotel for 5 days while our son played in a basketball tournament.  Loved the hotel, the breakfast was excellent!  Great location within walking distance of the Orange County Outlets - tons of restaurants to pick from!  There are many food choices within walking distance.  The rooms are large and very comfortable.  Great location to get to the beaches as well.  The pool is a little small, but the courtyard is lovely.  I would highly recommend staying here and wouldn't hesitate to use this hotel again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our Hotel.  We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and took advantage of all our location attractions and amenities.  We look forward to having you and your family stay with us again in the future!

Summary: This was my daughter and I first trip to Los Angles and our stay at the Ayres Inn was excellent! The staff was amazing. Cory went over and beyond to help us plan our Hollywood tour. I also like that the ART bus takes your right to Disneyland. We enjoyed the complimentary breakfast and the room was clean and comfortable.  Thank you Ayres Inn for making my mini-vacation so GREAT!
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review of our Hotel!  We agree with you that our staff is amazing.  I am so happy to hear Cory went above and beyond to accommodate you and your daughter while here on your trip.  We look forward to having you and your family stay with us again in the future.

Summary: This hotel was a great find for our family's days at Disneyland!  The ART shuttle to the park was very convenient. The desk staff at this hotel are very friendly and accommodating. We wanted some pillows that were a little firmer than the ones in the room and they brought them up to us right away. The complimentary breakfast at the adjoining restaurant was also great. Two thumbs up from our family!  We will definitely stay here again when we return.
Manager Response: We are happy to read you experienced the great value or hotel has.  We are delighted to read you found our staff to be friendly and the ART shuttle to be just right for your needs.  We hope to have the opportunity to serve you again in the future.

Summary: I stayed with my wife and 2 children (8 & 14) and let me tell you, this may not be the closest hotel to the park but it is one of the best! And with the ART shuttle that stops at the hotel entrance and the free breakfast buffet, you cant go wrong!!! Rooms are very clean and quite. And the beds are super comfortable!!
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear you and your family enjoyed your stay with us!  We hope to have you all stay with us again!

Summary: I thought that this was a terrific hotel for the price.  Among the tell-tale signs of quality:  the towels were thick and fluffy; the TV worked perfectly with an excellent channel menu on the side table; the free Wi-Fi was fast and reliable; plenty of parking spots out of the sun; very friendly staff; and a good restaurant.
Manager Response: We appreciate you leaving us a review.  We thank you for mentioning our friendly staff, our amazing restaurant we have on site and our other complimentary amenities.  We look forward to your future stay!

Summary: This is our first time staying here. Great place! The hotel is older but very well kept. Kids had a great time at the pool. Wonderful sugar cookies at the front desk. Friendly staff, complimentary breakfast was delicious and the ART bus picks you up right in front for Disney! Two nights left!
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review!  We are so happy to hear that your kids enjoyed their time at the pool, utilized the shuttle services and also our yummy evening cookies!  We hope you stay with us again in the future.

Summary: I enjoyed my stay here. The rooms are well maintained and the staff is very professional and accommodated our special request. See, we had arrived in CA prior to the hotel's check-in time and called round noon to see if any room was available with little expectation that there would be. A team member promised to call back if something came up and guess what ... they did! We were able to get unpacked by 2pm and get to the beach. From that point on, we took advantage of everything the hotel had to offer during our stay. We used the swimming pool, the hot tub and the exercise room several times during that week. By the way, the exercise equipment is extremely limited (3 machines in total - a treadmill, elliptical and weightlifting bench). Right next door to the hotel is a Wendy's
Manager Response: Your review was a pleasure to read.  Thank you for sharing about your wonderful experience at our hotel.  We hope to have the opportunity to serve you on your next visit to the Anaheim/Orange area.

Summary Heading: Good breakfast, plenty of parking spaces
Summary: We were assigned a quiet room at the very end on the top floor. However, we could still hear noise from neighboring rooms.  The bed was not firm enough for us. We like that there is a refrigerator in the room. The breakfast was good with hot food, like: eggs, sausage, hashbrown;cold cereal, mixed fruit, bread, juice, coffee, tea, milk.   There is plenty of parking spaces, outdoor and indoor. The staff was friendly.  Since we got the express deal, so it was worth the stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review.  We are happy you enjoyed your stay with us and that you utilized our complimentary breakfast.  We look forward to having you stay again.

Summary: The Ayres Inn in Orange is a family friendly but more sophisticated hotel than most of the local chains. We enjoyed the European style decor, cleanliness, comfortable room, nice little swimming pool and hot spa, and buffet style breakfast every morning in a tasteful breakfast room or refreshing outdoor patio. The location is very easy to find and accessible to the major freeways and John Wayne Airport. Staff was helpful and friendly. Hot drinks and cold water available in the lobby at all times, and the occasional plate of cookies were added niceties. Just two miles from the hotel is the charming old Downtown Orange with lots of good restaurants, antique shops, clothing boutiques, and many fine examples of sweet Craftsman style homes in a neighborhood friendly to walkers. Our
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review!  We are happy to read that you enjoyed your stay with us and also our surrounding area attractions.  We look forward to having you all stay with us again!

Summary: Me and my family really enjoyed our stay at this hotel. The hotel exceeded my expectations. They were every friendly & helpful. It was in a great location to go to Disney & other places. The beds were very comfy & the room setup was AWESOME! I will stay here again & tell others about my stay here...
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review!  We are so happy to hear that you and your family enjoyed your stay and we look forward to having you stay with us again in the future!

Summary: Stayed here twice now. Always very good. Great staff very helpful and very freindly. Close to the theme parks and good shops.  Good sized clean rooms. Would reccomend to anyone. Most enjoyable stay in a hotel in a long time.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us again!  We appreciate your kind review and look forward to having you return soon!

Summary Heading: I am so happy we stayed here
Summary: Loved this hotel.  Staff is friendly and helpful.  Pool and hot tub are great.  Shopping and restaurants within walking distance.  ART shuttle to Disneyland is convenient and inexpensive.  Only downside was that they do not offer option to rent movies on TV.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review!  We are so happy to hear you enjoyed our hotel and our staff was helpful.  We look forward to having you all stay with us again in the future.

Summary Heading: Good Location, Great Breakfast, Very Clean
Summary: Stayed here while antiquing in Orange. (Great place by the way) Good breakfast, clean rooms and the location is very central. Hospital right across the street if you had someone there. Parking can be a bit tough, get there early. Very nice desk people. Very friendly.
Manager Response: We thank you for your wonderful review of our hotel and we look forward to welcoming you back the next time you visit!

Summary Heading: Comfortable Rooms Great Hotel Great Rates
Summary: Great Hotel, Great Rates, clean & comfortable room, off major Freeway,  close to local attractions. Great Breakfast buffet included, parking at No extra cost. Many Restaurants within A mile of Hotel. Only one complaint we booked room for 2 nights after the First night they came in and did Excellent Job cleaning our Room, but didnt restock our bathroom Supplies, I had to go to front desk to get bar soap & toilet paper. Great Staff Very Helpful! We Would Definitely Stay Here Again!
Manager Response: We thank you for taking the time to complete our survey. We truly value your feedback as it allows us to improve our operations. We have shared with our housekeeping staff your feedback. We thank you again, for bringing this to our attention and are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay.

Summary Heading: Very nice stay, close to Disney
Summary: Very good stay the Ayres. Loved the $5/person shuttle to Disney. Came every half hour which allowed us a nice mid-day break. Breakfast was great. Room was comfortable. Parking was free. Breakfast was free. Enjoyable stay.
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear you enjoyed our complimentary amenities such as our breakfast, parking and internet.  The ART shuttle is a great added feature for your quick transportation to and from the Disney Theme Parks.  We look forward to your future stay!

Summary: I did not expect much from the hotel I book for my vacation.  Usually it's the same old same sold expectation you have come to expect from most hotels.  The Ayres Inn far exceeded my expectations.  The staff was very nice and informative when you needed it.  The rooms are great for the price you pay and the complimentary breakfast buffet is really great.  Onsite laundry makes for convenience when you find you forgot to pack enough clothes.  If I find myself back in Orange, I'll be checking in again to the Ayres.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review!  I am so happy to hear we provided you with great service and you enjoyed our complimentary amenities such as our breakfast, parking and internet.  We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future!

Summary: This is such a great hotel. I was impressed from the second I walked in, great decor and super friendly staff. Drew checked us in, very professional and courteous, offered us a room with view of the Disneyland fireworks, how thoughtful! Room was very clean, the bed was comfortable.  Hotel offered free breakfast - eggs, bacon, sausage, biscuits and gravy to pancakes, french toast, fresh fruit, bagels, croissants, coffee, tea, juice, milk and cereals. The hotel has a restaurant attached with a patio. This was such a great experience for our first California vacation and I will definitely look forward to coming back to this awesome, awesome place.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We are very pleased to read you had a great stay and that you agree with us that our staff is great!   We appreciate you enjoying the amenities we offer, such as our free breakfast, free parking and clean rooms.  We look forward to your upcoming stays with us.

Summary: The staff was very efficient and helpful. The rooms were absolutely comfortable and very clean. Staying at The Ayres for the first time I was very satisfied and will likely choose The Ayres for any future visits.
Manager Response: It is great to hear that you enjoyed your stay at our hotel and that our staff took great care of you.  We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future!

Summary: The staff was so polite and wonderful. We had arrived 3 hours prior to checkin and they let us use the facilities and swim with our children in the pool. The room was to be ready at 3:00, they were rather busy and it was not ready until 3:30. But in the meantime, they cleared out their meeting room so that we had a place to get dressed and freshen up. On top of that, when the fresh baked cookies were ready, they delivered them to our room. It was a beautiful hotel, clean room, felt safe and quiet. The complimentary breakfast the next morning was delicious and fresh!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  I am so happy to hear our staff was able to accommodate you and your family with pool time and also a room to change in prior to your check in.  We always strive to make our guests experience a pleasant one and I am glad to hear we succeed on your recent stay.

Summary Heading: had to cancel however just speaking to staff made such a good impression
Summary: cancel my reservation, because another hotel opened up where I could use my points and there would be no charge, and also we are platinum members of the hotel that opened up for points.  but I really had to write a review of this hotel because they have such a nice staff, I had spoken to Amy, Julio, And Christopher each time making changes and then finally canceling, but each time these three people were so nice and patient with all my changes and request.  I can tell you this would be my choice given there great rates, free parking and free breakfast and fantastic staff.  even though I would call during busy times they would always be patient answer all questions and never tried to rush me.  Christopher even invited me to one day be a guest at this property even though I just
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We are very pleased to read your experience with multiple staff members was a great one!   We appreciate you your review even though you were unable to stay with us and we hope to have you as our guest in the future!

Summary: Very enjoyable and comfortable.  A really good place to stay when in the Anaheim area. The breakfast is the best in town but make sure you get down early as the later you go the busier it gets.  We will definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review!  We look forward to having you stay with us again!

Summary: This is a great hotel. I was in town for business a couple days and stayed a night here. The lobby staff were very helpful and polite, and the rooms were clean and classy. Good Wifi access too. Because of the nature of my stay I did not take advantage of extra amenities they may have had. The only reason why this isn't 5 stars is that I found the continental breakfast 'meh' - not a ton of variety and not as fresh as I like. Also, the room I stayed in had two queens. One of them you could see a visible sag along - I chose the other one! The spread on the queens looked old and wore out - could use some new ones. I'd recommend this hotel. Close to the Block at Orange and I think I saw a Disneyland shuttle too pull up out front.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay, and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary: The hotel did an amazing job of meeting our needs when our son was hospitalized while on vacation.  What a great group of people, and what an great property.  Make sure you tell them the nature of your visit so they may assist you with items needed for your stay.
Manager Response: We thank you for staying at the Ayres Inn Orange; we hope to see you soon again!

Summary Heading: I Had High Expectations -- Unfortunately, Unfulfilled
Summary: Earlier this month we had stayed at the Ayres Suites in Mission Viejo, which was excellent.  By comparison, the Ayres Inn was mediocre.  We were given a room on the second floor which has a wonderful view of the vents on the roof of the restaurant.  The pool was cold -- which was why there were about a dozen people crowded into the spa.The breakfast was so so -- and unlike other Ayres properties, it didn't have a weeknight reception with snacks and wine. While the staff at the other Ayres property were very attentive and friendly, the staff at the Ayres Inn  always seemed to be too busy to give much attention to the guests.  Also, they are building a new Ayres hotel next door, and they had construction going on in the parking lot.  Once we had difficulty getting out because to
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. Your feedback is important to us, as it helps us to better serve our guests. With that said, we are sincerely sorry we failed to meet your expectations during your recent visit.

Summary: I had a lengthy stay (almost four weeks) at Ayres Orange in April and May 2014.  I was recuperating from treatment across the street at UC Irvine Hospital.  First, the staff were very helpful.  On many occasions they went out of their way to help me.  I extended my reservation.  The staff helped me make travel arrangements.  There was a good free breakfast every morning.  There is a good restaurant in the hotel.  The hotel gave me a reduced rate because I was being treated at the hospital.  I will stay here again.  Ayres are building a new hotel on adjacent property.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We are very pleased to read you had a good stay at our hotel.  We appreciate you enjoying the amenities we offer, such as our free breakfast and also our restaurant on site.  We look forward to your upcoming stays with us.

Summary: It was great experience . Hotel is very clean with large rooms . We were given a room with a reception area that has large sofa , office table kitchenette and large TV .  Buffet breakfast was included in our rate . Buffet was great and the food variety can support you till late time lunch or dinner. We paid $85 per night for couple ,which really I consider it a theft. I recommend this hotel for families or individuals alike .
Manager Response: We are happy to read you are very satisfied with your stay at our hotel!   Thank you for sharing with our reviewers the features that make our hotel have a great value.  We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: My family and I stayed for the weekend. We booked 2 rooms so Grandpa could stay next to our room with myself, my wife and two daughters. The rooms were clean, the beds comfortable and the location of the hotel was easy to get to from many areas of Orange County. The complimentary hot breakfast was delicious. A great way to start each day. We will plan another stay here.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review.  We look forward to having you and family stay with us again soon!

Summary: Recently stayed here for business. Got in early and staff was able to check me in at 11:30 by changing my room. The only drawback to the available room was the tiny bathroom. But the room was plenty spacious.The room and bathroom were spotless. Stayed for 3 nights and 4 days and room was cleaned promptly. Staff was very friendly. There is a nice restaurant on site open all day. Ate several meals there and was very pleased. Centrally located to an outdoor mall, the stadium and Disneyland (I could see the fireworks from my room at night). Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: We thank you for your wonderful review of our hotel and we look forward to welcoming you back the next time you visit!

Summary: I have stayed at other Ayres properties before, but this was my first time staying here. Easy access to Disney. Well priced. Good breakfast. Kudos to staff member Chase who went above and beyond. Restaurants and stores across the street was convenient. The few issues that I had were fixed quickly.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  I am so happy to hear Chase went above and beyond to help you and your family during your stay.  We look forward to having you stay with us again!

Summary: Beds are so comfortable we loved the down pillows, the location is excellent with shuttle it's a 5 min ride to disneyland an a block or 2 from the outlets. breakfast is absolutely wonderful, the staff members specifically Sandra, and Cory were so helpful and eager to please, it's simply a wonderful place!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind feedback.  We appreciate you taking the time to write a review.  We are ecstatic to hear that Cory was helpful and friendly.  Thank you for your recent stay with us.  We look forward to your future visit!

Summary: My husband and I stayed two nights in June at the Ayres Inn.  This was our first time staying there and chose this hotel due to online reviews, reasonable cost, and because they are dog friendly (we were traveling with our Chihuahua son).  All of the staff were very friendly, accommodating, and hard working.  We were impressed with Cory, the manager on duty, and Christopher, the guest services manager, along with the rest of the front desk staff, Drew, Julio, Irving, and Amy.  Socorro, the housekeeping manager and her staff were wonderful.  The room was exceptionally clean, the bed was very comfortable and included extremely comfortable pillows, and there was a cubby hole storage unit which made it very easy to organize and access our things.  There was a refrigerator in the
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your kind feedback!  We appreciate you taking the time to let our reviewers see why our hotel has such a great value.  We are very happy to read you had a perfect stay because of our complimentary Full American breakfast buffet, free parking, comfortable rooms and friendly staff.  We look forward to having the opportunity to serve you once again in the future.

Summary: Well-located hotel. The rooms and hotel in general was spotless. Rooms were quite comfortable although at this location the décor is pretty dated, although it's in great condition. Everything in the room worked. Complementary breakfast was good and fresh--much better than the typical free breakfast. Lots of free parking. Lobby and service were adequate, nothing special. Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We look forward to having you and your family stay with us again!

Summary: We had a wonderful stay at the Ayres Inn. The room was very comfortable and centrally located to everything we wanted to visit on our recent trip to the Anaheim, CA area. The staff was very helpful and kind. We had a problem with the lock on our door and it was fixed right away. Breakfast in the morning was very good.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful feedback.  We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay!  We look forward to having you stay with us again in future.

Summary Heading: Fantastic!!!!! They treat every guest like a VIP!!!
Summary: We purchased annual passports to Disney this year and like to go alot. We like to get the most for our money so why stay at a 300 to 400 hundred hotel or motel for 1 weekend when we went once in may and our booked for Thanksgiving  holiday for the same price.   Free parking Free wonderful breakfast........ That oatmeal is soooooo good!!!  Free wifi Nice cool cucumber water, coffee and tea complimentary in the lobby  They treat you like family no matter how you booked!!!  The Disney shuttle picks you up right out in front!!!  Our whole family loves this hotel it should be rated a 3 1/2 to 4 star.  The inn is clean rooms planned out well. Housekeeping here is the best!!!! The extra touches they did were so special. Our pillow pet goofy was sitting on the bed holding the remote.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review!  We are very happy to read we provided a wonderful stay for you and your family.  We thank you for mentioning our incredible staff, our delicious breakfast and our comfortable rooms.  It was our pleasure having you as our guest and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: This is the only hotel we'll stay at when we visit Disneyland
Summary: This past weekend was our third stay in two years and there is definitely a reason why we keep coming back. Clean rooms, nice staff and close to everything you can possibly want. Free parking, free Wi-Fi and free breakfast. The area is clean and safe. Right next to a Wendy's, Starbucks and a few other restaurants but not a congested area at all. A few blocks from Disneyland but the shuttle stops right in front at it's about a 15 minute ride to the main gate.   The last time we stayed was for my son's birthday in January. I called ahead of time and they had a Happy Birthday sign and a few other goodies in the room when we arrived. He was thrilled. We purchased an Annual Passport to Disneyland and will definitely stay here every trip. (Check out their rates for AP holders.) Beds
Manager Response: Thank you for your loyalty to our hotel!  We are thrilled to read that you had a great stay with us .  We are really glad we continue to exceed your expectations.  Thank you for choosing the Ayres Inn Orange as your place to stay when visiting the Orange/Anaheim area.

Summary: We come up to Orange County for the Newport Beach Jazz Festival each May.  We travel with a kitty who needs morning and night meds, so want a nice, reasonably close pet-friendly place to stay at while we are there, and the Ayres Orange comes through every time. Great property (with parking and breakfast) that offers certain pet friendly rooms -- which we really appreciate!
Manager Response: We thank you for being a loyal Ayres Inn Orange guest.  We appreciate you mentioning our hotel features, such as our complimentary Full American breakfast, free parking and our pet friendly rooms.  We thank you for taking the time to write a review and we look forward to seeing you again next May.

Summary: We traveled into town for a wedding and we stayed at this hotel at the recommendation of the Bride.  As we left town we discussed how nice and comfortable the rooms were, how accommodating the staff was and delicious the free breakfast was all at a VERY reasonable price!.  We were very happy and look forward to stay at Ayres Inn in the future
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We thank you for your stay at our hotel and look forward to serving you in the future.

Summary: This is my favorite place to stay when going to Disneyland. My family and I just got home from our 3rd stay at this hotel. Free parking and free breakfast with a shuttle to Disneyland. You can't beat the price. They even offer a discount for annual passholders! The staff is always super friendly and the breakfast is delicious! Can't wait for our next trip!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We are very pleased to read you had a great stay and that you agree with us that our staff is great!   We appreciate you enjoying the amenities we offer, such as our free breakfast.  We look forward to your upcoming stays with us.

Summary: The staff were very friendly and helpful.  Our room was quiet.  The buffet breakfast offered, eggs, sausage, French toast, cereals, pastries, fruit, cereal and yogurt. The hotel is older but has had some upgrades and is clean. It new hotel appears to be close to finished, next door will be fantastic. The hotel is a short drive to Disneyland and a short walk to the outlet stores and the Angels Stadium.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your kind feedback!  We appreciate you taking the time to let our reviewers see why our hotel has such a great value.  We are very happy to read you had a good stay because of our complimentary Full American breakfast buffet, comfortable rooms and friendly staff.  We look forward to having the opportunity to serve you once again in the future.

Summary: Nice hotel - free parking, free internet, free breakfast buffet, cookies and shuttle to Disneyland!  we enjoyed the pool and the delicious breakfast and took an early shuttle to get to Disneyland when they opened.  Also loved that we could leave our car safely in the structure while at Disneyland :)
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Ayres Inn Orange for your vacation!  We are thrilled to read that our amenities helped make your trip a great one!  We look forward to having you both stay with us again in the future.

Summary: Stayed here with the family on a recent trip to Disneyland. The room and facilities are older but are as clean as can be. The room was very spacious and comes with a fridge. Floors with ice/vending also have microwaves available to use. They is construction going on (which did not pose any problems for us), a new building which looks twice as big as the current one and is set to open in July 2014.   Daily breakfast is included with your stay and offers included eggs, pancakes, bacon, cereal, various pastries, yogurt, coffee and some juice options. This definitely saved us time and money during our trip.  Parking and internet is free. We did not encounter any parking troubles, even when returning late at night.  Many hotels in the area charge for parking and/or have a resort fee.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your kind feedback!  We appreciate you taking the time to let our reviewers see why our hotel has such a great value.  We are very happy to read you had a good stay because of our complimentary Full American breakfast buffet, free parking, comfortable rooms and friendly staff.  We look forward to having the opportunity to serve you once again in the future, hopefully when the new hotel has opened.

Summary: This is a hotel I have stayed in many times. It is an extremely great place to relax. The rooms are clean and pristine. The staff is always curtious. The nice thing is they are not far from Disneyland. I love this hotel!
Manager Response: Thank you for your loyalty to our hotel!  We are thrilled to read that you had a great stay with us.  We are really glad we continue to meet your expectations.  Thank you for choosing the Ayres Inn Orange as your place to stay when visiting the Orange/Anaheim area.

Summary: I was here on Business and added a little please. Good location. Great Staff, clean rooms, wonderful on site restaurant. Had one of the best, fresh, free breakfasts here. Since I had time to kill I went to Disney. I was allowed to keep my car at hotel and take $5 transportation round trip. Very convenient! I have plans to go back to this hotel for two nights in July.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We are happy to hear you enjoyed our hotel and our yummy breakfast.  I am glad you were able to utilize the ART shuttle service to Disney during your stay with us.  We look forward to having you stay with us again in July.

Summary Heading: This is a great place if you want to stay in Anaheim
Summary: This place is a great deal, especially if you get it in the $80-100/night range. We stayed here two nights. It's interior is very nice, it's staff are very good. The location is right off I-5, literally. It's walking distance to the Angels stadium (around 15 minutes) and very close to Disneyland. The hotel offered a daily breakfast which was actually very good, with many options. The rooms were clean and nice looking, and there was plenty of free parking. Only downside was the distance from LA proper and the elevators can use an upgrade.  But really it's tough to go wrong here.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your wonderful review.  We appreciate you giving our reviewers great detail regarding your stay at our hotel.  We are glad you enjoyed our rooms and our Full American Breakfast Buffet.    We hope to have you stay with us again in the future.

Summary: I booked our stay at Ayers Inn from Sydney, Australia.   I would like to mention that the hotel staff is VERY professional, friendly and helpful. My first interaction was with Julio when I rang the hotel from Australia. Julio was very friendly and helpful - This was my first impression of Ayres Inn and I was very impressed .  When we reached the hotel we were given a VERY warm welcome by Chase who is also very friendly. We stayed at Ayers Inn for 5 nights. Every single morning Chase greeted us and asked if he could be of any help. I think this is GREAT customer service and shows how Ayres Inn values its guests.  I would also like to mention about Christopher and Cory who were also very nice in their dealings. Cory in fact went out of the way to drive us all the way to Grayline
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review. We are very happy to read we provided a wonderful stay for you and we thank you for mentioning our incredible staff and our yummy breakfast.  It was our pleasure having you as our guest and we hope to see you all again soon!

Summary: Back int town to move my daughter out. Greeting at check in by staff who remembered me from the first time I stayed with them back in August. Had flown in very early and called ahead about early check in. Called me back before noon to say a room was ready.Large clean room-plenty of space to unpack/repack bags. Got up early-had a delicious breakfast out on the patio/reading the paper in shorts-something I don't get to do too often in Seattle. Checked out -bill was under$120-where else can you find this kind of experience???? Looking forward to our return for parent weekend mid October
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful response!  Our Guest Service Agents are great at remembering our guests and are always so happy to see people return.  I am so happy to hear you enjoyed our breakfast and also your experience with the ART shuttle service.  We look forward to having you stay with us again when you return to the Anaheim/Orange area.

Summary: This was our first stay at Ayres Inn Orange. We have stayed at other Disney Good Neighbor hotels. While the rooms could use some new paint, and the bathroom was a bit cramped (five in the family)...the staff was very accommodating. We requested a microwave for our room which they gladly supplied. Even though I ended up sick in bed for a day, (and my son) they were certainly respectful of the "do not disturb" sign. The beds were very comfortable and Queen sized, not double like most of the neighboring hotels. Our maid service was wonderful! They surprised us one day, by adding my granddaughter's stuffed toys arranged cutely on the bed. (I felt bad for our maid service, with us being sick, we weren't too organized and often left a mess in our room). Hot tub was a nice place to
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review!  We are delighted to read that you enjoyed your stay at our hotel, and that we were able to assist in making your family trip to Disneyland convenient and memorable. We look forward to welcome you back next time you visit Disney!

Summary: We have stayed at this property on several occasions. Since my last review there have been some changes, some good, and some not so good.   The good: They are close to completing the expansion of the hotel. I would expect that the new side will be updated from the existing place.   The parking structure provides good shade for your vehicle, especially if you are leaving it for extended periods. Hopefully they will complete the concrete and asphalt work to smooth it out.  Parking is still free.  The ART service to the park is great. Check the schedule though, during the day the off-peak schedule could go into effect. ART does not have it on their website and the desk may or may not know what the off peak schedule is. Ask the driver!  The A/C was great! We had a heat wave while we
Manager Response: Thank you for your suggestions to our reviewers. We appreciate you staying with us for a second time during your visit to Disneyland. As you mentioned, we do offer complimentary parking and shuttle service at a low cost to Disneyland.  We are sorry to read that you did not have good internet reception throughout your stay.  Like you said, we switched providers recently and had not experienced problems since the change.  Our Wi-Fi support team will look further into this matter.  In regards to the breakfast quality, we have added and improved our breakfast menu in the last six months.  We welcome additional suggestions to continue improving our breakfast quality.  Please feel free to reach out to me directly at szuno@ayreshotels.com. Thank you again for your feedback, and we look forward to having the opportunity to welcome you back the next time you visit Disneyland.

Summary: The rooms look neat and clean. Breakfast is very good Wlan speed is OK People at the Reception are very helpful and nice. Cookies at the Reception are special bonus--tastes very good. ART comes directly to the Hotel. Not very far from Disneyland. so many possibilities for a food nearby.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We are glad to read that you enjoyed your stay, and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Excellent hotel, caring staff and very good rooms
Summary: We are staying at this hotel for about 3 weeks and I must stay that it is in the best location for University of Irvine Medical Center and very close to Disneyland with transportation every 15-20 minutes. It is within walking distance of many restaurants and shopping centers. It is safe and the neighborhood is upscale with the Hilton and Embassy Suites close by. It is within walking distance of the Medical Center which is very convenient for the families of doctors, patients and other employees. They actually have a discount for them. The reception area and lounge are very well appointed, comfortable. There is a nice piano on one side and the toilets are very clean. There is a glass fresh water dispenser with cups: a very thoughtful gesture because of the heat. They also have
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay at the Ayres Inn Orange, for the extended part of your visit to UCI Medical Center. It is great to hear that we lived up to your expectations, and our staff has provided you with excellent customer service. Please let me know if there is anything else I can personally assist you with during your stay. We appreciate your recommendation to our reviewers.

Summary: This is my go to hotel for my trips to DL.  The rooms are very comfortable.  You get free WiFi, parking, breakfast and cookies!  I like that the ART picks you up at the front door and is one of the closer pick ups at the resort.  Staff has always been very friendly with me and any needs have been met quickly.
Manager Response: We are ecstatic to read we are your hotel of choice when you visit Disneyland!  We are glad you enjoyed some of our wonderful hotel services and that our staff is always attentive to your requests. Thank you for your review of our hotel and we look forward to welcoming you again soon!

Summary: Great hotel, clean and friendly staff. Not to far from Disneyland. Shuttle was on time everyday. Free hot breakfast was pretty good. Laundry room was a plus. I would recommend this hotel. Wendy's and Starbucks next door, very short walking distance.
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review and recommendation.  We are happy to read you experienced the great value or hotel has.  We are delighted to read you found our hotel to be very clean, our staff to be friendly and the ART shuttle to be just right for your needs.  We hope to have the opportunity to serve you again in the future.

Summary: I haven't stayed at other places in Anaheim but have been to plenty of other hotels all over the world and this is fine, but not as great as I expected from other reviews. Decor is very old school, like my grandma would choose, the pool was small and lacking foliage, and the breakfast was just serviceable. Had dinner in the restaurant  - bizarrely dark, just ok. Positives- very friendly service, afternoon cookies, perfect location for trip to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of our hotel.  We are glad you were pleased with your overall stay, and that our staff was very friendly.  We would like you to know that we take your feedback into great consideration as far as what areas we need to improve on. Please feel to contact me directly at szuno@ayreshotels.com if you have any further concerns.

Summary: We are travelling through the States during three weeks.  More than 12 days here already and we stayed in 10 hotels.  2-, 3- and 4-star hotels, all inspirered by Tripadvisor.   Everything went fine up till now.  Up and till we stayed in the Ayres Inn.  Boutique hotels are normally good ons but this one isn't.  We got a noisy room, food smells entered our room after midnight and from the start we saw that the room was dusty. We booked months ahead so we were very disappointed.  We mentioned all of this very calmly when we checked out and ... the guy just said "Ok, there are no extra's so you are all set".  A major example of a retoric "How was your stay ?" question. Breakfast was good but we want to forget the rest of our stay.  By that I mean the hotel, not Orange.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. Your feedback is important to us, as it helps us to better serve our guests. With that said, we are sincerely sorry we failed to meet your expectations during your recent visit and we apologize for any miscommunication that may have occurred between you and our staff.  I would like to discuss your stay in further detail, please contact me at szuno@ayreshotels.com.

Summary: We chose this hotel because it was within easy walking distance to the Angels' baseball stadium.  The hotel was clean, quiet and comfortable with free parking.  Our original room had a loud a/c unit, but they quickly and graciously gave us another room.
Manager Response: It is great to hear that our hotel was a perfect fit for you.   We are glad that you saw the value in staying at our hotel, and that enjoyed your stay. We look forward to forward to having you stay with us again on your next visit to an Angels' game!

Summary Heading: Angels game only to see Derek Jeter
Summary: The room was very comfortable.  In the morning the room stayed nice and dark and with the cool air and warm comforter we had to force ourselves out of bed.  The staff was helpful, getting us a cab when needed.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay, and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Long weekend to DLR and SoCal
Summary: This was a quick trip down to the Disneyland Resort and SoCal.  We needed a home-base for our adventures and this fit the bill perfectly.  It was clean and comfortable with large rooms.  Parking is free which is a HUGE plus, especially if you plan on driving to Disneyland.  We didn't try to breakfast so can't comment on it.  The staff are professional and courteous.  There is a Starbucks within walking distance, though, which we definitely took advantage of.  I highly recommend the Ayres Inn and will likely stay there again on future visits to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of our hotel.  We are glad that our hotel featured the amenities to provide value to your stay. We look forward to welcome you back during your next visit to DLR and SoCal!

Summary: always a great stay- price, comfort, location to Disneyland is excellent with out all the resort zone fees!! Hotel provides discount to Disney Pass holders= Bonus- free parking and cooked hot breakfast= Money saver-- Loacation to the block- food and great BBQ up the street at Lucille's another Bonus
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us while celebrating your Birthday!  It is great to hear that we lived up to your expectations.  As you mentioned, one great thing about our hotel is our proximity to the shopping mall Outlets at Orange, with many great restaurants, a movie theatre and even bowling alley, making for an easy 10-15 minute walk. Thank you for your review and we look forward to seeing you next time you visit Disneyland!

Summary: Ayres is great Hotel!. I have stayed at the other one on Katella Ave before, which is also a great hotel. Arrived late on Thursday night and parking was plenty, as they have parking structure, and area seemed safe. Check in was fast and easy made it to our room and it was perfect. Clean, clean, clean...Beds were clean, bathroom was clean, carpet was clean. Never made it to breakfast in the morning as we like to sleep in, but hotel has a restaurant on site. Front desk was awesome and housekeeping was on it. Free Internet that actually works, free parking, free breakfast ( if you get up early enough), great service, great area. Right off freeway I-5 makes it easy 5 mins back and from Disneyland and also a Wendy's, Quiznos, Starbucks within walking distance. Will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of our hotel. As you mentioned, our hotel is a great value for our guests because we offer complimentary amenities such as a Full-American breakfast, Wi-Fi and parking- just to name a few!  Thank you for staying at Ayres Hotels when visiting Disneyland.  We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Excellent facilities, staff, almost everything. A family run hotel that shows a personal touch in all areas, and a good value. The exercise room is a bit small and limited, and the only elliptical machine had no arms.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review!  We are very pleased to hear you had an excellent experience and were impressed by our facilities and level of guest service you received from our staff.  We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary: Our stay was very nice and the room was large, comfortable and clean.  The staff sets them apart from the cookie-cutter chains. One hour after checking out of the hotel, I realized that I had left my 2 diamond rings(one of them had belonged to my recently deceased Mother) in the bathroom of our guestroom.   I called in an absolute panic and Sandra the supervisor called me back within 5 minutes. The rings had already been turned in by the room attendant. My relief was unbelievable and I cried tears of relief. Even prior to this incident the staff was so personable and caring.   This is our new "go-to" hotel.  The staff makes all the difference!!
Manager Response: Thank you for recommending us to other reviewers.  We thank you for your feedback and we are delighted to read we provided you with outstanding service!  Thank you for becoming a loyal Ayres guest! We look forward to your future visits!

Summary: checked in very late (2am) from almost 7 hrs drive..went tothe front desk and the guy looked like he just woke up and does not want to be disturb.. no smile but a smug! i asked him a little question regarding disneyland but all answer i get was buy a ticket at disneyland.. asked for the hotel map and he said you wont get lost just got tp the elevator and ur room is at middle.. parking was huge and he never mention there was a door near that to enter the building so we have to walk all the way to lobby from the back parking.. we're so tired i dont want to argue with him..morning reception was way better.friendly and more informative.. alos breakfast was good and the location is great..
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. Even though you found our hotel to be disappointing, we truly appreciate constructive feedback.   I would like to apologize for your encounter with our Night Guest Service Representative.  We sincerely value guest service at our hotel and never want our guests to walk away feeling the way you did.  As you can see in many of our guest's reviews on Trip Advisor, the service our team provides is normally one of our greatest strengths, so it is very surprising to read that you did not have the same experience.   I would very much appreciate if you would contact me so that I could gather more information in depth from your past stay. Please contact me at your earliest convenience at (714) 978-9168 or by email at szuno@ayreshotels.com.

Summary: Rooms were great.  The breakfast buffet provided significant value ( though additional variety would be welcome ).  The dining room is undergoing renovation and seemed a little unkept.  We plan to book again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your brief review.  We are happy to read you experienced the great value or hotel has because of the complimentary breakfast.  Our dining room is undergoing a renovation and is expected to be completed by the end of May.  Thank you for choosing the Ayres Inn Orange as your place to stay when visiting the Orange/Anaheim area.

Summary Heading: Two month stay due to home renovations, was wonderful!
Summary: We had to stay here while I was 7 months pregnant because of a house flood and the staff was amazing. They catered to our needs. Room was clean and housekeeping was on point and the morning breakfast was great. Clean lobby, helpful staff. Very happy here, highly recommended.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review of our hotel!  We are glad you enjoyed your stay at our hotel, and we hope to welcome you back sometime in the near future!

Summary: —One of the classier chains.  Stayed four nights while visiting our son at Chapman U. It was easy to get to the hotel since it was just off the freeway, and easy to get to the school since it is on Chapman Blvd. Clean lobby with a pleasant sitting area. Room was clean, as was the bathroom.  The housekeeping staff did a great job each day.  Not so close to Disneyland that it is mobbed with kids. The breakfast was pretty good, with a selection of cold cereal, pancakes, scrambled eggs, bacon or sausage, bagels toast. But what I particularly liked was the coffee; it was strong and Hot! It's hard to find someplace with fresh, hot coffee, and it was so nice to sit oitside on the patio in the morning when it was just a little cool and savor the coffee.  Little things like that can make
Manager Response: We are ecstatic to read that you choose to stay at the Ayres Inn Orange when visiting your son!   Thank you for mentioning the features that add great value to our hotel; such as our hotel location, our hotel clean and comfortable rooms, our full American breakfast buffet and specially our coffee!   We thank you for your review and we hope to see you soon again!

Summary: This was our first experience with this hotel. Everything was great. The staff was amazing the breakfast was great and the rooms were very nice. I only had one issue and that was that it is located near a hospital and the windows aren't very sound proof. We heard a lot of sirens while we were sleeping. Other than that it was an amazing place to stay.
Manager Response: We appreciate you leaving us a review.  We thank you for mentioning our incredible staff, our amazing breakfast and our comfortable rooms.   We are sorry to read about your dissatisfaction with the sirens during the night.  If you have any special requests for your future reservations, such as a room in a quiet area, please feel free to contact me or one of our Guest Service Representatives at the hotel directly.   Please know our staff will try their best at accommodating your requests.   We thank you for staying at the Ayres Inn Orange; we hope to see you soon again!

Summary Heading: Second time here and still a really great place to stay
Summary: The rooms are clean and comfortable.  The staff does a great job of being friendly and courteous.  The complimentary breakfast is outstanding.  Easy to get around Anaheim with the ART stop right in front.  This is our favorite place to stay in Anaheim.  Would recommend this excellent value hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of our hotel.   We are very happy to read our staff provided you with excellent service!  We are also thrilled to read that we have become your favorite hotel in the Anaheim area! We thank you for your loyalty and we look forward to welcoming you back on your next Disney trip!

Summary: For our first time traveling to Anaheim, this hotel was just what we needed. It was easy to find, near a mall and by a lot of great restaurants! Best restaurant for us was the Native Foods (a vegan eatery if you're vegetarian or vegan) which was only about 10 minutes away.   Also very close to Disneyland. Not walking distance but only a short drive away.  Over-all, a great hotel. The room we had came with a fridge but no microwave. but the hotel has a community microwave that you can use, which was cool for us. The complementary breakfast was great, the hotel was clean and we got a great deal on the hotel, what more could you ask for?
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review! It is great to read that you enjoyed your stay at our hotel. We are glad you were able to take great advantage of all of our hotels' amenities, to assist in making your stay a great one. We look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to the Orange/Anaheim area!

Summary: This was our second stay at the Ayres Anaheim.  The room was clean and comfortable. The staff was very helpful and the breakfast very satisfying. We didn't use the shuttle this time because of the number in our party. It was less expensive to drive our 7 passenger vehicle to the park. ($16 per day)
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to read that our staff provided what you needed for a great stay!  Thank you for mentioning how satisfying our breakfast is, it is one of our most popular amenities that guests love. We thank you for your stay and we look forward to serving you in the future!

Summary: This was our first time staying at the Ayers Inn and we will definitely be back.  It was the perfect home base for our Disneyland trip.  The staff was always warm and welcoming and every one of our needs was met to the fullest extent. They even offered us a late check out our last day without me even asking.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of our hotel. We are very pleased to read that you enjoyed every bit of your trip!  We are glad that your stay at our hotel added to your excellent experience while visiting Disneyland.  We look forward to welcoming you again soon!

Summary: The hotel is warm and inviting.  The staff was friendly, answered all of my questions and were very accommodating with my request.  The bathroom was small but the rooms were clean.  It was fairly inexpensive considering the distance to Disneyland.  I would certainly return.  Thank you for the hopitality!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and recommendation of our hotel! It is excellent to read that you had a wonderful experience during your stay with us.  We do our best to accommodate our guests’ needs and make their stay enjoyable. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: This is the first time we stayed in Ayres and we would definitely like to stay again. Staff is very friendly and helpful. Complimentary breakfast was good, complimentary tea and coffee 24/7 available at the front desk, cookies in the evening. Shuttle at the door to Disney for $5 per adult and $3 kids or 3 day pass. Walking distance to Orange outlet mall.Overall a great place .
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of our hotel and your recommendations!  We are pleased to read that you found our hotel to be the best accommodation for your trip to Disneyland. We thank you for your stay and we hope you visit us soon again!

Summary: We booked this property for our recent vacation to Disneyland and had 3 rooms for our families. The property was very clean and the people who worked there were friendly. The floors were clean, as was the entire room in general, and the beds were super comfortable. We all appreciated that the breakfast felt high quality--not the typical sugar stuff that you find with most free breakfasts. I liked that they rotated between pancakes, french toast, and biscuits/gravy. The pool area was adequate, although may feel too small when the new addition to the Ayres is complete. Hopefully this is an area that will also expand to accommodate more guests. The ART was convenient for access to the Disney parks and it was nice that this particular line only services a couple of properties; we
Manager Response: We appreciate your wonderful comments about our hotel. It is great to read that your family enjoyed their stay.  We are one of the few hotels in the Orange/Anaheim area that offers complimentary parking, one of our greatest amenities! Our complimentary breakfast, wireless internet and in-room refrigerators add great value to our guests' experience as well.  We thank you for taking the time to write us a review and we look forward to serving you in the future!

Summary: This is a place to stay if you are on a vacation to the area.  Staff is friendly and helpful.  Want to get to Disneyland, they will make it easy with shuttle information.  Pre-buy your tickets at the front desk and ride right to the front gate.  No cost parking at the hotel.  They make it easy to get around the area from their Hotel.   Room are fresh and comfortable and lots of room. Nice bedding package. Quality maid service.  The best part of staying here is the Breakfast.  Lots of choices and its free.  Staff has to almost run back and forth to keep up with the demand.  We will be back, thanks for everything.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write us a review!  We appreciate you sharing with our reviewers about your experience at our hotel.  We are very pleased to read that you were impressed by our amenities and staff service.  We look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary: We always enjoy our stays at Ayres Hotels.  Great staff, clean rooms.  This hotel however, can be noisy due to location.  It is next to freeway and large hospital.  We did hear ambulances quite often during the night.  We were impressed that the staff gave our daughter a See's Candy Box upon noticing her "Birthday Badge" from Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for your loyalty to Ayres Hotels!  We are very pleased to know that you were happy with the cleanliness of our hotel and the level of guest service you received from our staff. We thank you for taking the time to write a review and we look forward to seeing you again!

Summary Heading: Favorite Place to Stay In Southern California
Summary: My wife and I have stayed at this hotel 6 times over the last year, and we LOVE it. The hotel staff and management are exceptionally friendly and go out of their way to help with whatever you need. The FREE breakfast is absolutely delicious (it's one of the things we look forward to most when we visit S. California!). The rooms themselves are very clean and quiet, and plenty spacious for us. If you are looking to book a hotel in Orange County, I highly recommend staying here for incredible accommodations at a great price!
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review of our hotel and for your loyalty to the Ayres Inn Orange!  We are ecstatic to read that our staff is exceptionally friendly!  We thank you for sharing with our reviewers about our guestrooms cleanliness and comfort, as well as how great our complimentary breakfast is. We are happy to be your home away from home, any time you visit the Southern California area!

Summary: We arrived at the hotel around 2pm and we were able to check in with no problem. The room was very nice, very clean. We had a a 2 Queen room. Beds were comfortable. This hotel was convientient to the Convention  Center which was the reason for our stay as well as the Disney attractions.  It was also not far from LA and the beaches. It was just far enough outside the real hustle of the theme parks. The staff was super friendly and the free hot breakfast was very good and a huge savings from having to eat out everyday. I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: We are happy to read you enjoyed your first stay at our hotel!  We are pleased to read that our staff was able to check you in early.  As you mentioned on your review, our close proximity to the Convention Center, Disney parks, outlet shops and restaurants, along with our comfortable rooms and amenities make our hotel an excellent choice for business travelers and families.  Thank you for your review of our hotel and we look forward to welcoming you again soon!

Summary: I've stayed here twice on business. Many Disney travelers here, lots of kids. They are at the hot breakfast in their Disney regalia. Breakfast is hot and good and staff is friendly. It has a rich feel with lots of wood and pictures on the walls. Many are old historic phones of the Ayres family, one of the original Orange County developers. There is a small pool, and they have a shuttle service. Outlet mall within walking distance and many restaurant choices. The restaurant in the hotel is very good for dinner. The room was clean, comfortable and well appointed, but no microwave or safe.
Manager Response: Thank you for your staying with us once again!  We are pleased to read that our hotel amenities serve as a perfect fit for you. As you mentioned on your review, we do not have safes or microwaves in our guestrooms.  We do however have safes at the Front Desk as well as a community microwave on one of our floors. We are sorry you were not advised of this during your stay.     We thank you for your wonderful review of our hotel and we look forward to welcoming you back the next time you visit!

Summary: We stayed at Ayres Inn for two nights last weekend.  I'll start by saying the free parking and free Wifi was a huge plus for me.  Depending upon how discerning your palate is, you can either appreciate or do without the free breakfast.  Fortunately, there is a Starbucks within walking distance.    Prior to staying at this hotel I was not familiar with it at all.  I was surprised - and am still surprised - that it is rated #1 on TripAdvisor for the area.  For the price, this hotel is a decent option, but I don't believe it is the best.  The rooms are comfortable and clean.  Pool and jacuzzi are ok.  Overall, the hotel could use some refreshing.  Convenient $5 per person roundtrip shuttle to/from Disneyland.  This is probably (hopefully) an isolated incident but pushing my son in
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. Your feedback is important to us, as it helps us to better serve our guests. With that said, we are sincerely sorry we failed to meet your expectations during your recent visit. We are glad you enjoyed our clean and comfortable rooms and the convenience of the Anaheim Resort Transit.  We are continually making improvements to our hotel, if there is anything else you feel could help us better serve you please contact me directly at szuno@ayreshotels.com.

Summary Heading: This hotel made my UC Irvine Med visit as comfortable as home
Summary: I found this hotel to be a very comfortable place to stay for my family and myself while I was being treated at UC Irvine Medical Center.  The staff was universally friendly and accommodating.  Having Ayres Inn Orange as our home base helped make a stressful time much more endurable.
Manager Response: It was our pleasure having you!  Thank you for choosing us to be your home away from home.  Thank you for your kind feedback.  We are thrilled to read that our staff made a lasting impression on you.  We hope to have the opportunity to serve you once again in the future!

Summary: I used to stay here when I traveled for business about 4-5 years ago.  I am now back traveling for business again, and I am back.  The staff is friendly, the place is clean and hot breakfast included, it is a heck of a deal. One sad thing is it appears the secret is out about this place.  I now have to book rooms a couple of weeks in advance to get the dates that I need, but it is still one heck of a place.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review and for your loyalty to our hotel!  We appreciate you taking the time to review our hotel. We are happy to welcome you to back!

Summary: Loved the hotel, but they need more luggage carts. I think they only have 2 for the entire hotel. It was a real pane checking out.  The staff is incredible helpful and the hotel is great for a Disney Land trip.
Manager Response: We are thrilled to read that you loved our hotel!  Thank you for taking the time to let reviewers know about your stay with us.  We are sorry you had to wait a bit for a luggage cart.  In the future, please feel free to ask the Front Desk for assistance.  Our staff would be glad to assist in locating one or assisting to bring luggage down.  Thank you for giving us the opportunity to serve you.  We look forward to seeing you on your next visit to Disneyland!

Summary: We are very satisfied with the hotel and 5 min ride to Disneyland by shuttle. Interesting that the rooms did not have microwaves there was a community one on each floor. Breakfast was excellent full hot breakfast. Will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: We are happy to read you are very satisfied with your stay at our hotel!   Thank you for sharing with our reviewers the features that make our hotel have a great value.  We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Stayed here for a night, right after Disneyland at first I thought it was to far but what made a differences is the great customer service. Clean rooms, friendly staff. Which was perfect for my kids. Cory Irwin was one of the guest service agent and he helped me out find a package that we were going to missed and get it forwarded back to our house.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind feedback.  We appreciate you taking the time to write a review.  We are ecstatic to hear that Cory made your experience at our hotel memorable.  We will make sure to celebrate his exceptional service as we are very lucky to have team members that go above and beyond the call of duty every day.  Thank you for your recent stay with us.  We look forward to your future visit!

Summary: A pleasant experience. Everyone was so nice and very helpful. All the services provided were much needed. My room was beautiful and clean. I would stay at Ayres if I find myself in Orange County again.
Manager Response: We are very happy to read our staff provided you with excellent service!  We appreciate you mentioning our beautiful and clean rooms.  We thank you for taking the time to write a review and we look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: Very convienent location and the staff was wonderful!! Room was neat, clean and very nice! They served a free breakfast that was delicious and a nice variety of food! The only thing I wish was different, that they served decaf coffee at breakfast! All in all it was a wonderful stay and we will stay there again!!
Manager Response: We are glad you found us!  Thank you for your kind feedback.  We are delighted to read our staff exceeded your expectations.  We look forward to your next stay at our hotel!

Summary: We stayed for 4 nights for our visit to Disneyland.  At first the location wasn't what we expected, right off the freeway and across from a hospital and next to a Best Buy but that would be a forgotten thought! The front desk employee was very friendly and welcoming, check in was quick and simple. Our room was on the third floor and was very spacious, the bathroom was a tight squeeze but that was the only downside but it's not even worth complaining about. The beds were so comfortable, so easy to fall asleep after a long day at the theme parks. The breakfast was great! Eggs, bacon, pancakes, cereal, fruit and juice. We took advantage of the ART shuttle for disney and paid $5 for an all day pass, the shuttle was very punctual and the drivers were all friendly as well. We will
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We appreciate you sharing with our reviewers how much you enjoyed the comfort of our rooms, our great Full-American breakfast, the convenience or the ART shuttle.  We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us, and we look forward to welcoming you back the next time you visit the Orange/Anaheim area!

Summary: We booked AYRES INN ORANGE, because we needed a stress free weekend away. My girlfriend was taking a very important class over the weekend & we thought from past experiences Ayres would be the best choice for us. HOW WRONG WE WERE ! We contacted the hotel with a request of a king bed, when we showed up on Friday at 6:00pm we were told we would be getting a single queen. We went to our room, & it was about half the size of what was pictured at the front desk. The room was at the end of the hallway and was cut nearly in half because the stair well was running in front of it. We went back down to tell the front desk this was nothing like the picture, he laughed ! My gf said that's not funny, so the girl "Amy" at the front desk moved us. She moved us 4 floors higher to a room with
Manager Response: Ayres Inn Guests  This review and the review titled "tiny room...nothing like the photos" are both by the same guest.  Below is my emailed response to the guests.  The initial issue was the size of the room the guest had booked through Priceline.  When my employee did not identify and then resolve the issue, the situation escalated and the guest's  natural frustration and disappointment became evident in the two reviews.  "Between the 2 Trip Advisor reviews, lengthy messages to Sandra and myself, voicemail messages back and forth, calls to corporate and the time that it is has taken to investigate and interview all involved, I would like to cut-to-the-chase and get this incident resolved.  •	 You booked a Queen room through Priceline; you called the hotel in advance and requested an upgrade to a King room, hotel was full and we were unable to fulfill your request •	The key words in your email that struck me were “it was half the size of the room that was pictures at the front desk.”  The room pictured at the Front Desk was a King room, but I went further and looked at the Priceline website. •	On the website, Priceline has used the same picture depicting it as a Queen size bed and room.  I have contacted Priceline regarding their error. •	I am very sorry that you did not receive the size of room that you thought you were booking through Priceline. I have called them and asked them to refund the credit card you used when booking for a full night’s room and tax. •	I take serious note of your other comments regarding guest service and will be resolving those issues on an internal basis.  Please let me know if there is anything else I may do for you and your girlfriend."  I am very sorry that my staff did not understand that there was a misrepresentation of rooms through the pictures shown on line.  I have scheduled a meeting with the entire desk staff to go over this incident and to use it as a learning tool to prevent future incidents from occurring.  The hotel as evidenced by our high Trip Advisor rating take Guest Service very seriously and I again apologize for this incident not being handled quickly and correctly.  Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Tiny room..nothing like the photos show..feels like a closet. Small bed no view and not very friendly.
Summary: We requested a king bed and got a small queen. Our room is next to the stairway. We asked to be moved to a larger room, as the stairway cuts of a portion of tge room. They moved us to a higher floor, on the other side of the stairway, which was the same room..just a different floor!!! They said we booked a queen single, which we did not do.We called ahead and requested a King bed. We booked through priceline and maybe that is why we can't have a king bed. Very disappointing. The view is of Best Buy parking lot. I have stayed at other Ayres and the customer service and charm was always wonderful. Not here. I will go to a different brand from now on.
Manager Response: Dear Guest I am very sorry that you found the Queen room too small, unfortunately when you booked the room through Priceline that is the type requested as shown below.  You did call the hotel in advance to request a larger Sofa King room and as was explained we did note your request and let you know the request would be honored based on availability. Unfortunately we were sold out of King Sofas rooms on the date of your arrival and were not able to offer an upgrade.  We did offer an Executive King room at $30 more per night the following day when we had a cancellation (normal rate $189.00) but you declined. We make every effort to upgrade our guests who book through 3rd party sites when the hotel is not running full and do so more often than not.  I received your voice message this morning and will call you to further discuss this situation in person.  Christine Smith General Manager  Reservation Information     modify     resend email     rate overwrite    Confirmation No:    WWW-193708892  GDS/OTA PNR No:    NQIVXG (WORLDSPAN)  Arrival Date: 02/21/2014  Depart Date: 02/23/2014  Room Type: Deluxe 1 Queen Pillowtop   (SQ)  Rooms: 1  Rate Plan: Priceline Package   (PLPK)   Sell Code:   Sell Code Rate Type:   Business Channel: WORLDSPAN    Market Segment: DISC  Adults:   2 Children:   0  Book Date: 02/18/2014  Comment: PIN79604337159039$IKXXX0615519039$PHR17345037393$NSM RM PRFD  Cancellation Reason:

Summary: I booked this hotel through hotwire.ca and for the price this hotel was awesome.  clean, beautiful and confortable. If you go to the parks, I recommend this hotel as a first option. It offers shuttle to disneylan for 5 buck a day...
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review.  We are happy to read our hotel met all of your family needs.  We look forward to seeing you the next time you visit the Disney parks!

Summary: Comfortable, Clean, best staff that cares for its guests.  Yes, there is more Disney families staying here, but I have been staying at this hotel over 15 years for business stays. I bring others I work with from all over the world to stay here. It is a hotel that all would and do return to for its comfort and friendly staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for your loyalty to our hotel Mr. Cook!  We are thrilled to read that our staff provides you with outstanding service every time you visit.  We thank you for taking the time to write us a review amd we look forward to seeing you again next month.

Summary Heading: Budget priced surprise. Great value = smiles all round.
