Summary: I probably wouldn’t have picked the Ayres as a preferred hotel but we arrived in Anaheim a day earlier than initially intended and needed a cheap overnighter before moving to a hotel that we had already booked and paid for that was closer to Disney. The Ayres was a bargain – one of those secret deals. And. Free parking + breakfast +Wi-Fi  (winning!)  We were kind of surprised when we arrived. We expected a bit of a roach motel but the Ayres was anything but. It definitely ticks the box on all of its three stars and perhaps a bit more.  Rooms have been refurbished in recent years and were more than comfortable. Great bed and a modernised bathroom. Not fancy but definitely more than we’d expected. The pool didn’t look amazingly appealing but was clean and there was a whirlpool.
Manager Response: Thank you for your taking the time to write a review.  We are happy to read you experienced the great value or hotel has because of the complimentary breakfast, free parking and free Wi-Fi.  We are delighted found our rooms to be very comfortable and the ART shuttle to be just right for your needs.   We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Recently stayed for a few days for a family wedding. I was most impressed w all of the staff and how helpful and welcoming they were. Room very clean. Storage shelves are a nice convenience. Appreciated ability to open windows. Complimentary breakfast is very good and in a lovely sunroom area. Also nice they have complimentary lemon water, hot tea and coffee all day long. Cookies in afternoon a nice touch. Easy to get to Disney. Only negatives were mattress too soft, shower pressure painfully weak and missed having a microwave in room.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review!  It is such a pleasure to read our staff delivered excellent customer service for your family and friends.  We are glad you were able to enjoy our clean rooms, complimentary breakfast and freshly baked cookies.   Thank you for choosing to stay at the Ayres Inn Orange, and we hope you allow us the opportunity to serve you again in the future.

Summary: I was very impressed with our stay at Ayres Inn Orange. We  booked our stay through hotwire and had never heard of this hotel before that time. We have had the experience of staying in several well-known chain hotels, and so I was a little nervous about giving this one a try. I found a very pleasant staff that gave 110% to make our stay great. The beds were a little small but very comfortable and clean. The pillows were like resting your head on a cloud! I really appreciated the delicious hot complimentary breakfast each morning, the cookies in the evening, and the free parking. I will definitely visit again. Thanks for making my stay so great!
Manager Response: Thank you for giving the Ayres Inn Orange a try!  We are glad that you found our hotel to be the perfect place to stay from now on, when you visit the Orange area.  We thank you for sharing with our reviewers about our clean and comfortable rooms, our complimentary Full American breakfast buffet, our free parking and our evening cookies!  It was our pleasure having you stay with us and we look forward to welcoming you back during your next visit!

Summary: Extremely courteous, friendly staff; fantastic free hot breakfast; clean, comfortable room; free parking; yummy, warm cookies! Our stay couldn't have been better! We will definitely stay again!... And again!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of our hotel. It is wonderful to hear you love our hotel! It was our pleasure to be your home away from home during your vacation. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Very comfortable room the mattresses are the best! Probably will buy one from them for our home.we visit this hotel frequently. Have yearly passes to disneyland. It's very convenient for theis area of town.
Manager Response: It was a pleasure having you stay with us again.  Thank you for your loyalty to the Ayres Inn Orange! You’re right- our Ayres Dream Sleeper mattresses are very comfortable!  If you'd like to inquire about where to order one, please feel free to contact me directly at szuno@ayreshotels.com or by phone at 714-978-9168 x702.  Thank you for taking the time to write us a review and we look forward to your next stay!

Summary: We were celebrating our 10 year old's birthday at Disneyland.  Found this hotel on Priceline, actually, and I was pleasantly surprised at how friendly the staff was.  There was some renovation going on, but there was disturbance to our stay.  I would definitely recommend this hotel and stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your excellent review and recommendation of our hotel!  We are pleased to have been a part of your child's celebration.  We look forward to seeing you again on your next visit to the Anaheim/Orange area!

Summary: It is a great hotel, great personel, very clean. It has a lot of stuff to do near de hotel like malls, fast food, starbucks etc. I strongly recommend the Ayres Inn Orange. It has a very good shuttle if you are also going to Disneyland.
Manager Response: We thank you for recommending us to other reviewers.  We are very happy to read you had a GREAT stay because of our friendly staff, hotel cleanliness, proximity to many shops and restaurants.  Thank you for taking the time to write us a review and we look forward to having you stay with us next time you visit the Orange area.

Summary Heading: Clean, good position, excellent value for money
Summary: Stayed Jan 2014.  2 adults.  Nothing to fault.  Some people have criticised the breakfast but we found it value for money and very convenient.   Great position for Outlets of Orange, just minutes walk away.  Nice sitting area with thoughtful complimentary tea, coffee and water.  Shuttle to theme parks is public not the accommodations own but only costs $3 each way and is regular.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write us a review!  It is great to hear that everything went well with your stay, and that our hotel was of great convenience for you.  We look forward to seeing you again on your next visit to the Orange area!

Summary: The customer service is superior, the rooms are very clean and the morning breakfast is the best.I would recommend staying here if you're looking for great price and great customer service. I like the fact that the sales staff call you by your name no your expectations and accommodate you in any way they can. I stay here once a month and I wouldn't choose anywhere else to go, this place you will love.
Manager Response: We thank you for your kind feedback and for being a loyal Ayres Inn Orange guest!  We are very happy to read our staff provides you with excellent service every time you stay with us.  We look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: The beds at this hotel were more comfortable than one of the resort hotels we stayed in last year. We slept like babies. Super clean rooms and hotel. Staff was kind and helpful. Breakfasts were beyond wonderful. We will stay here again for our Disneyland trip.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to let our reviewers see why our hotel has such a great value.  We are delighted to read you found our hotel to be the best accommodation for your family’s trip to Disneyland!  Thank you for recommending us to others.  We look forward to your next stay at our hotel!

Summary: I've been to Disneyland many times with my family and we hope to come again.  We are always on the lookout for a good value with a good breakfast to boot.  They have some hot items but no individual yogurts.  Also there is no variety of fruit, just chopped melon. It would have been nice to have the waffle maker that other hotels have but that was absent.  The bathrooms are small if you have a family.  On the other hand, this hotel has the friendliest, most helpful staff of all the hotels I've been to in the area.  If the breakfast menu was expanded, I'd stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of our hotel. I am glad you were pleased with your overall stay, and that our staff was very friendly and most helpful. As you mentioned, we offer a hot buffet breakfast every morning.  We recently expanded our breakfast menu, it varies daily and it includes scrambled eggs, country-style potatoes, pancakes, bacon or sausage, breads, bagels, yogurt, cereal and a few more items.   Thank you again for taking the time to review our hotel, and we hope to welcome you and your family back again next time!

Summary: We really enjoyed our stay.  The complimentary breakfast is better than most hotels. Good selection of food and the items change everyday.  Location is good with convenient shuttles to Disneyland and proximity to the outlet.  Friendly staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review of our hotel. We are thrilled to read you really enjoyed your stay with us, and we look forward to welcoming your family back on your next visit to Disneyland!

Summary: My family and I were in Orange visiting my daughter, who's a junior at Chapman University.  It took me three years to discover Ayres and what a gem it is.  In the midst of suburban sprawl it's a breath of fresh air.  Professional and friendly staff, lovely rooms and with a charm reminiscent of a European boutique hotel.  They've got great contracted rates with Super Shuttle from SNA and LAX as well.  This will be my go-to spot whenever I go back to visit.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review of our hotel! It is especially encouraging for our staff to hear such kind words from our Chapman University parents.  We are thrilled to hear you have become a loyal Ayres Inn Orange guest.  We look forward to being your new home away from home each time you visit your daughter.

Summary: This is the only hotel we stay in when we go to Disneyland!!  The breakfast is wonderful and filling!!!  The rooms are perfect!!!  We love this hotel!!!!!  Perfect location for Disneyland as well!!  Service was great and the loud people in the room across from us were taken care of immediately after informing the front staff!  We will never stay any where else!!
Manager Response: We are thrilled to read that you had a fantastic experience during your stay with us!  Thank you for your review, and we look forward to welcoming you back the next time you return to Disneyland!

Summary: I was worried because of the picture (looking like a motel); but, when you get here there is no trace of "motel" anywhere. This is a very nice "inn" equivalent with what you might get at a Doubletree, including the warm cookies. The only difference really is the free breakfast, free internet, personable touch (including actually seeing the general manager - very obvious she cares about those who work for her but also the details of her hotel), free parking, noon checkout. The room is clean, elevators are cleaned it seems everyday twice (?), the breakfast is mostly the same each morning (but good  selections) .There is ample room for sitting. The location is excellent, right in the middle of everything - Disneyland, not too far from Knotts/Medieval Times/Little Saigon. There is a
Manager Response: Thank you for your words of encouragement. We are pleased to read that you enjoyed our hotel amenities, and most importantly, our staff service. Thank you for your excellent review and we hope to see you during your next visit to the Orange/Anaheim area!

Summary: We went to Disneyland over Christmas holiday and chose Ayres Inn Orange for our stay. The staff was excellent, the complimentary hot breakfast has variety and was nice. We would definitely stay at Ayres Inn Orange again.  The property offers complimentary coffee, tea and water 24 hours a day but it would be nice to have a vending machine available for other drink options. I never made it to the pool but was told it was heated. The hotel is across the street from a hospital so there is an occasional sound of sirens. Thank you Ayres Inn for a great value!
Manager Response: We are happy to read you enjoyed our complimentary Full American breakfast buffet.  We are delighted you found our staff to be excellent.   We'd like to advise our reviewers that we do have a vending machine on our second floor.  We are sorry you were not advised of this during your stay.  We thank you for your review and we hope to have the opportunity to serve you again in the future.

Summary: My family has been to Disneyland many, many times. This time we chose to stay a little further away and use the shuttle. We were hesitant but were delightfully surprised at what we found.  The hotel was very welcoming. The service was excellent, right down to the free cookies and tea! There were only two elevators but we never waited long, the halls were clean and so were the rooms.  The pool and hot tub were very nice and the breakfast in the morning was good. I honestly can't think of a single thing to say negatively about this hotel. We loved using the shuttle after a long day of walking at Disney and the outlet stores weren't far away either. Directly beside the hotel is a Wendy's, a Starbucks and sub place.  The wifi worked and when it went down due to a power outage the
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Ayres Inn Orange.  We are honored to be named one of the best!  It is our pleasure to do our part in making your stay enjoyable. We are glad you enjoyed the great features our hotel offers and our freshly baked cookies, our Full American breakfast buffet and our excellent service!   We thank you for your recommendation and we look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel the next time your family comes to visit the Orange/Anaheim Area.

Summary: Overall, the Ayres Inn Orange was a good value. Excellent location, friendly staff and good housekeeping.  A few small things that could be improved: - Internet is unreliable and often excessively slow.  - Continental breakfast is only okay. Variety in fruit or one or two more healthy options would help. It would also be nice to be able to take breakfast back up to your room.  - Pool hours are a bit later than expected. It would be lovely if it opened at 9am instead of 10am.  - Coffee is horrible. Both in the room and at breakfast the coffee leaves a lot to be desired, as well, there is a lack of decaf options.   Other than those things, we had a very pleasant stay and would recommend this hotel.   One small oddity to note, the elevators did not have a valid and current
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  I am glad our hotel met your family’s needs, and you enjoyed our good housekeeping, great location and friendly staff!    I wanted to mention that we are upgrading our Internet this week.  With this upgrade, the Wi-Fi signal will be stronger and with high speed.   Thank you for your suggestions regarding our breakfast menu and coffee.  We will try and improve the areas in where we failed to exceed your expectations.  Our goal at the Ayres Inn Orange is to exceed the expectations of all our guests.  Please feel free to contact me directly, should you have any further concerns regarding your stay.  My contact information is szuno@ayreshotels.com or 714-978-9168 x702. Thank you again for taking the time to review our hotel and I hope you give us the chance to welcome you back!

Summary Heading: Only redeeming point is its location
Summary: This hotel has got to be one of the worst places my girlfriend and I stayed in the Anaheim / Orange area. The rooms are small, the service is terrible, and there's a foul smell to the place. The worst part of all is their staff. We had our Do Not Disturb sign out for a nap but two members of the staff knocked on our door repeatedly just to give us a notice about a power outage for that night. There was not even an apology for the disturbance. I would NOT recommend this place to anyone. Like the title says, the only redeeming point is its location being just off of the 5.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review.  We take every guest incident, issue or inquiry very seriously. Here at Ayres Inn Orange, we take pride in our hotel as we strive to exceed all of our guests’ expectations. I'm sorry we failed to exceed yours. We apologize for the short notice regarding the power outage during your stay.  We were advised of the details of the power outage by Southern California Edison that same day.  In order to provide our guests with detailed information and a flashlight for the 45 minutes that there'd be no power, we did bypass the Do Not Disturb signs on our guestroom doors.  We wanted to ensure our guests planned their evening accordingly, the night of the power outage.  We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused.  Please feel free to contact me directly at szuno@ayreshotels.com, so I can assist you with your concerns. Thank you for giving us the opportunity to serve you.

Summary Heading: Great Service, Great Property for our Family Disney Trip.
Summary: My family of five stayed here for 6 nights in December for our trip to Disneyland.  The staff is top notch and they run a tight ship.  There were several times during our stay in which they went above and beyond.  One night as we were waiting for the bus to Disney one of the staff members ran out to stop our bus because he thought they were leaving without us, actually the bus was just  pulling forward a bit to accommodate my wife's electric scooter.  The staff was also kind enough to store the scooter lobby overnight each night to recharge.  My daughter left her favorite doll at the hotel and they shipped it back to us, complimentary.   It's the little things that made our stay pleasant.   We visit Disneyland every year or so and we have stayed at several different properties.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing such great details of our hotel!  This is great information for our future guests.  It is our pleasure to do our part in making your stay enjoyable. We look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel the next time you get away for the weekend and visit the Anaheim/Orange Area.

Summary: I was going into the hospital for surgery.  My husband and I live 2 counties away and needed to stay in a hotel near the hospital.  This hotel is across the street from the hospital.  The staff was so friendly, courteous,  and accommodating.  We were stressed, scared, and uncertain how long my hospital stay would be.  The staff made every effort to accommodate us, including letting us day by day tell them what our needs were, and allowing us to cancel the last day without penalty.... when I did indeed get released from the hospital.  Old fashioned customer service that is difficult to find these days.  Beyond that the room was clean and comfortable and suited our needs perfectly.  The price was also good, and special discount applied to hospital patients and families. I will be
Manager Response: Thank you for your pleasant review.  We are really glad you have chosen the Ayres Inn Orange as your preferred hotel when coming to UCI Medical Center.  We thank you for letting our other TripAdvisor reviewers of wonderful staff and our clean and comfortable rooms.  We look forward to having you stay with us next time you visit the Orange area.

Summary: This hotel was perfect for our family.  It is super convenient to the park and the freeway.  The rooms are extremely clean and very nice.  The beds are comfortable.  Only one negative about the room is the bathroom was a little cramped for several people trying to get ready in the morning.  Their complimentary breakfast was very good, the selection was good and the food was good.  The only negative about the breakfast was the people eating it, I am always surprised at how inconsiderate some people are.  The staff at the hotel were all great.  The ART shuttle to the park was very convenient, picks up and drops off right outside the door.  Every evening they have cookies at the front desk this was a nice treat.  I would highly recommend this hotel for anyone coming to stay in the
Manager Response: We are ecstatic to read you loved your stay with us!  We appreciate you taking the time to let our reviewers see why our hotel has such a great value.  We are very happy to read our staff provided your family with outstanding service and that you enjoyed your stay because of our complimentary Full American breakfast buffet, our great location and our clean and comfortable rooms.  We thank you for your stay and we look forward to having the opportunity to serve you once again in the future.

Summary Heading: Good Value If Under $100 - Breakfast Buffet Isn't Great
Summary: I stayed here with family for three nights.  It's convenient to Disney (5 minutes) and is right off the freeway in a safe business section of town.  It's noisy at night with sirens and traffic pretty loud.  The place is very clean inside and outside.  There is a parking garage so it is easy to find parking.  The staff is very friendly and accommodating in all places except the dining room.  The breakfast buffet is pretty bad. It lacks presentation, taste and you feel like you're in a low end dining hall with outdated furniture.  Eating outside on the patio is very nice.  Unfortunately, the general manager watches the food like a hawk to make sure no one leaves the room with even a piece of fruit.  I could not make a plate of breakfast for my wife or me and eat in the privacy of
Manager Response: none

Summary: We had a great time and Sandra and Cory really took care of us. The cookies at night were a nice touch along with the tea.. This was the 7th or 8th time we stayed at this hotel.  And the 2nd time this year.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words Ms. Fullmer!  It was our pleasure being of service to you and your husband.  We really enjoyed talking to you both every morning you were here.  We thank you for your loyalty to the Ayres Inn Orange!  We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Rooms were comfortable, the pillows are VERY soft which isn't my preference but still slept well. Very Clean. Breakfast was delicious, hot, and fresh.  Took the ART to Disneyland, since the hotel is not within walking distance and it was perfect. Always on time! However, that is an additional cost that you will want to purchase ahead of time.  My only concern was that they only have security cameras on the front and side of the building.  Sadly, a family was the victim of a very random break-in (Suburban bench was stolen) while we were there.  However, they said the hotel comped their stay and gave them a voucher for a free stay next at any of the Aryes hotels.  Which was very generous of the hotel.  Apparently there will be more security cameras in the very near future as they
Manager Response: Thank you for your taking the time to write a review.  We are happy to read you experienced the great value or hotel has because of the complimentary breakfast.  We are delighted found our hotel and our rooms to be very clean and comfortable and the ART shuttle to be just right for your needs.  We do regret the incident that occurred to the family you mentioned in your review.  We did our best in responding to the situation and assuring the family that this is not the typical stay at this hotel.  We thank you once again for your feedback and we look forward to serving you on your next visit to the Orange/Anaheim area.

Summary: For the second consecutive year my wife and I chose to stay at Ayres Inn while we visited Disneyland.  Again, we were not disappointed during our four night stay.  We love the location of the hotel and the nice decor in and out of the rooms.  They provide a great breakfast and even have freshly baked cookies each afternoon.  Corey, one of the front desk personnel, kindly saved my wife a cookie as they were a little delayed with the baking and we had headed back to Disneyland.  The entire staff from the general manager to the housekeeping staff do a great job.  Without a doubt we will return when we journey back to Disneyland.  I would not hesitate to stay at  any of the other Ayres properties in southern California based on our two postive experiences.
Manager Response: We thank you for your kind feedback and for becoming a loyal Ayres Inn Orange guest.  We are very happy to read our staff exceeded your expectations during both your visits. Thank you very much for returning back to our hotel!  We look forward to your upcoming stays with us.

Summary: When you walk into a hotel and all you smell is clean, you know it is going to be a good start.  Everyone was so friendly and helpful, room were clean and very spacious.  The little touches like the cookies and lemon water in the entrance is a big plus.  I love the beds and would really like to know what kind of brand are they?  The breakfast was good, not a lot to choose from but more than enough to fill you up.  The only reason I didn't comment on the spa is because we didn't use it.
Manager Response: You’re right- our Ayres Dream Sleeper mattresses are very comfortable!  Please feel free to contact me directly at szuno@ayreshotels.com or by phone at 714-978-9168 x702, to provide you with ordering information.  We thank you for staying at the Ayres Inn Orange; we hope to see you soon again!

Summary Heading: Good if you get it for a bargain
Summary: We stayed for 4 nights on a Disneyland trip.  This is an older, but very well maintained hotel right off I-5 a few exits south of Disneyland.  My fiancée and I liked the staff.  It was great to see the general manager out in the breakfast room helping to clear dishes.  The management clearly places a high value on customer service; the staff was uniformly friendly throughout our stay.  Though the hotel is on the older side, it was very clean, and it looked like the bathrooms were recently renovated.  However, the low flow toilet was impossible to flush.  It took at least 3 pulls of the handle each time to get it to fully flush.  The shower head was equally ridiculous - the water was very aerated and neither of us felt very clean coming out of the shower.  One piece of advice -
Manager Response: We thank you for sharing the experience you had at our hotel.  We are happy to hear you were pleased with our hotel's friendliness, cleanliness and our proximity to the Disney parks!   We appreciate your feedback regarding our low flow toilet and water pressure in the shower.  We will look further into this matter.  Please feel free to contact me directly should you have any further concerns.  We hope to have the opportunity to serve you once again in the future!

Summary: We stayed here for 2 nights this weekend and loved it! The hotel has been recently updated and construction is now complete on all of the rooms. Our bed was comfy, the room was clean, and there's lots of parking. We chose this hotel because it was affordable close to Disneyland and had a buffet breakfast. Plus, we didn't have to deal with parking and walking to the park because there is a $5 shuttle that takes you right to the front gates every thirty minutes ($5 pp per day). The staff were also very nice, interacted with about 6 different employees on our stay and all were very nice and helpful. We will definitely be staying here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for providing such great details of our hotel!  This is great information for our future guests.  It is our pleasure to do our part in making your stay enjoyable. We look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel the next time you get away for the weekend and visit the Anaheim/Orange Area.

Summary: The hotel is charming and quant with a feel of a small European hotel with American style amenities.  The staff is quite helpful, pleasant and willing to ensure a comfortable stay.  I use this hotel whenever in the area.  Convenient to Disneyland Resort and other LA area attractions.  Across the street from the UC Irvine Medical Center.  The free WiFi, breakfast and parking are a great plus.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review, and your loyalty to our hotel.  It is encouraging to receive such positive feedback from our repeat guests.  We appreciate you sharing with our reviewers the great features our hotel offers.  We thank you for your stay and we look forward to seeing you soon again!

Summary: Very nice hotel to stay at.  it is close to the outlet mall.  we walked to the mall and dinner.  very close to Starbucks as well.  We will stay again the next time we are back in the area.  The manager there is also very accommodating!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review.  We are ecstatic to read you enjoyed your stay at our hotel!  Thank you for sharing your experience at our hotel with our reviewers.  You are right, many options to dine or get a cup of coffee.  Both the Starbucks and the Outlets at Orange restaurants are at walking distance.  We thank you for your stay and we hope you stay with us soon again!

Summary: This is probably the cleanest hotel we have stayed in.  Not only did the housekeeping service do well everyday, but the furniture and carpet was clean in new condition, even though you could tell it was an older hotel.  I had no problem with my kids rolling on the carpet.  That never happens.  This hotel provides free parking, internet and breakfast.  So hard to find in this area.  The breakfast was a real breakfast and very good.  Breakfast area was a little small, but I understand they are working on renovating the area to be nicer and work better.  The staff is phenomenal.  I always enjoy supporting establishments that take time to hire worthwhile employees that deserve their jobs.  Worth every penny!
Manager Response: We thank you for taking the time to write a review. We are thrilled to hear you loved your stay at our hotel! Thank you for sharing how clean our hotel is, the hearty breakfast we offer and especially about our very friendly staff.  We'd love to have you visit us again. We hope to see you soon!

Summary: It was a great stay here for 3 nights during the Thanksgiving holiday. We requested a quiet room at the upper floor, and we got one on the top floor corner not facing the street. We are satisfied. The breakfast needs to be improved.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Ayres Inn Orange, over the Thanksgiving holiday.  We are glad you enjoyed your stay!  We do our very best to make our guests’ stay enjoyable, and accommodate our guests needs. Thank you again for your review, and we look forward to welcoming you back during your next visit to Disneyland!

Summary: Brought the GF for her birthday to nearby Disneyland for her birthday and stayed here.  Very close to Disneyland, large rooms, clean, and some nice touches including tea and coffee.  The free breakfast also helped save a few dollars for souvenirs!  And thanks to the Ayres staff for the unexpected box of chocolates for the GF...it helped make our stay special.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of our hotel.  We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay at our hotel.  We hope to have you visit us again soon!

Summary: We stayed here as it is close to Disneyland. It takes about 10 mins on the bus which picks you up directly outside. The hotel itself is lovely. Nice and clean with good rooms. Irving on check in was super helpful. The breakfast was very good. Proper plates cups and cutlery! So much nicer than plastic! The young lady who attended to he breakfast room really did a great job. I would reccomend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind feedback.  We are ecstatic to hear that Irving made your experience at our hotel memorable.  We will make sure to celebrate his exceptional service.  We are glad you were able to enjoy our breakfast and the transportation service to Disney.  We thank you for your recommending us to other reviewers! We hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: Free breakfast and late checkout upon request and for a price.  Nice clean conferrable rooms. Not all Ayers Hotels have room service but this one dose.  Close to the Block in Orange and lot to do in walking distance.  But stay for your hard earned dollar
Manager Response: We thank you for taking the time to write a review.  We are glad to hear you enjoyed your stay at our hotel!  Thank you for sharing with our reviewers how clean our hotel is and the great features our hotel offers.  We'd love to have you visit us soon again!

Summary: Great stay and I just love the pillows!  Every staff person is friendly and helpful.  The breakfast in the morning offers more than the usual continental affair.....every time I visit southern California, I stay at an Ayres!
Manager Response: Thank you for your loyalty to the Ayres Hotels!  We are pleased to read that you love our pillows, breakfast buffet and most importantly, our staff's service!  We thank you for your feedback and we look forward to seeing you soon again!

Summary Heading: Clean and friendly, though not special
Summary: A clean and new-feeling hotel, priced reasonably, near Disneyland with an extremely friendly staff  Room was spacious enough and well laid out, though it would have been nice if they had taken some space from the entryway to add to the bathroom.   Some gotchas that are typical of many hotels in this price range. Drinking cups are crumply plastic, wrapped in plastic - an actual glass would be nice. "Free Wifi" worth its price (i.e., essentially unusable) - very spotty coverage throughout the hotel, and the speed very slow even when a connection is made. Fitness room a tiny afterthought with ceilings so low you bump your head from the elliptical. Free breakfast edible enough, but served in a tiny cafe room far too small to handle the capacity crowd (and the several signs pleading
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review.  We are sorry to hear that our hotel did not meet your expectations.  Your feedback is very important to us, as it helps us identify areas we need to improve on.  In regards to our breakfast room, I do want to advise you we anticipate the expansion of the restaurant to be completed by the end of January.  We will also re-visit ideas to better our fitness center.  We are pleased to read that you found our hotel to be clean, new-feeling and that our staff provided excellent customer service.  Please feel free to contact me at szuno@ayreshotels.com to further discuss your concerns. Thank you in advance for your time, and I look forward to hearing from you.

Summary: I am not one to travel and stay in hotels very often since my husband and I have a motor home.. but when I have and because of seeing family or actually a family emergency, I've chosen Ayres.  I've stayed at an Ayer's in Yorba Linda many times and of course have nothing but great things to say.  This time I drove to CA. alone for a family emergency and stayed at the Ayers in Orange close to St. Josephs Hospital in Orange.   I was alone and am a 63 year old gal.  I am always so comfortable at Ayers.. The rooms are always very clean and I'm a VERY picky!   For whatever your reasons are I would highly recommend Ayers.  I would go to this hotel or the one in Yorba Linda in a heartbeat!
Manager Response: Thank you for your loyalty to the Ayres Hotels!  It is wonderful to read that our hotels are your favorite choice.  It has been our pleasure to be your home away from home during your visit to the Orange area.  We hope you come back and visit us again soon!

Summary Heading: A Relaxing & Comfortable Respite from the Hospital!
Summary: One of my relatives had surgery at the UCI Medical Center across the street from the Ayres Inn Orange.  The location is excellent and with the free parking, I was able to leave the car at the hotel and walk to the hospital daily.  The hot buffet breakfast was very good and they changed several dishes daily, so one would not have to eat the same thing every morning.  That staff was very very accommodating and very friendly.  One delightful perk was the chocolate chip cookies they had at the front desk in the evening!  Unfortunately, sometimes my stay at the hospital didn't allow me to return until later in the evening, so I missed the cookies :-(.  However, after a couple of missed cookie evenings, I asked the front desk if they could save some cookies for me...which they
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with our reviewers about your experience at our hotel.  We are delighted to read that our hotel was an excellent choice while you visited family at the UCI Medical center.   We are happy to read our staff took well care of you and that we even saved you some cookies!  We do aim to please, here at Ayres Inn Orange and look forward to having you stay with us again!

Summary: Excellent hotel.  Normally stay across the street from Disneyland, but this hotel was far superior.  Clean, modern rooms with lots of shelf space in the closet area of the room (much more than most hotel rooms).  Very bright, modern bathrooms.  Free parking (hard to come by in the Disneyland area) with 2-storey parkade on site.  Quick trip to Disneyland available every half-hour on ART shuttle with only 1 stop between hotel and Disneyland.  Next door to Wendy's and Best Buy.  Close to Outlets at Orange and 5 minute drive to other nearby restaurants, Target, Von's, etc.  Only 1 complaint which is beyond the hotel's control:  cable company programs in-room TV's so that additional devices cannot be connected.  Highly recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of our hotel.  We take pride in our hotel as we strive to exceed all of our guests’ expectations. We are so pleased to read our hotel exceeded yours!  Thank you for highlighting the great features our hotel has to offer. We look forward to welcoming you back during your next visit to Disneyland!

Summary: Short stay one night, but this place was more like a hotel than a inn besides size. Rooms and bathrooms were good size, breakfast was amazing with eggs, pancakes, sausages, and more. It was not standard bagel breakfast. You could easily fit family of 4 in one room and still have relatively enough space to move around. Definitely felt like a home away from home including flat screen television and great closet space. Bathroom was clean upon arrival, so great housekeeping staff.
Manager Response: We are really happy to read you had an excellent stay at our hotel!  We are glad you found the great value our hotel has because of all the amenities we offer!  Thank you for taking the time to enjoy our clean and comfortable rooms and our complimentary breakfast buffet.  We thank you for staying at the Ayres Inn Orange and we hope to see you soon again!

Summary: nice room.  nice employees.  nice selection of breakfast foods AND we would come back again.  our ONLY suggestion is make it easier to get into and out of the hotel entrance/exit. thanks for a lovely stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with our reviewers about your experience at our hotel.  We love reading that our guests' had a lovely stay at our hotel!  We look forward to seeing you next time you visit the Orange/Anaheim area!

Summary: I was pleasantly surprised with the Ayres Inn Orange. The room interior, with its wooden cubby hole spaces that reached from floor to ceiling, felt more like a home away from home than a sterile place to bunk for an evening. Adding to the feeling of home was the real breakfast that comes as part of the package. I'm not talking Cheerios and toast, but a full mini-buffet complete with all the basics you'd expect from a hearty and relaxing breakfast. Also, the guests politely bussed their own tables when done. The free parking was a welcome pleasantry. I'm used to having to shell out more money at places this caliber and above. The housekeeper even left me a Thank You note for the daily tip I left. Of course, that made me happy and I increased the tip.  This is a hotel done well.
Manager Response: We are very pleased to hear that you felt at home at our hotel!  Thank you for sharing the highlights of your stay.  Our comfortable rooms, complimentary Full American hot buffet breakfast every morning and our complimentary parking are all great features of our hotel.  Thank you for your review.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay if going to Disneyland
Summary: This hotel exceeded my expectations.  The staff were all very friendly and the breakfast was delicious.  It takes about 15 minutes to get to Disneyland by ART and the shuttles don't run as often so be sure you know the schedule before you go.  The room was comfortable and although we could hear a little noise here and there, it was nothing out of the ordinary.  We would definitely stay again!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of our hotel.  We take pride in our hotel as we strive to exceed all of our guests’ expectations. We are so pleased to read our hotel exceeded yours!  Thank you for your review, and we look forward to welcoming you back during your next visit to Disneyland!

Summary: We stayed here 2 nights for our Disney trip. Customer service is excellent. The staff was always smiling and pleasant. The Inn is older but our room was very clean and the beds were comfortable. My only complaint is the bathroom sink counter. I did not have enough space for my toiletries. Our bathroom did not have the long counter sink as shown in the pictures. If we stay here again, I will ask for the bigger bathroom. Our room was close to the elevator so we heard the noise of people getting on and off. If you are a light sleeper, this could be a problem. Specially during peak time. Our room included a refrigerator which was nice for keeping our drinks an leftovers. A hearty breakfast is included with several choices, including pancakes, eggs, fruit, meats and bagels. The
Manager Response: We are really happy to read our staff provided excellent service!  We are  also glad you found the great value our hotel has because of all the amenities we offer!  Thank you for taking the time to enjoy our comfortable rooms, our complimentary breakfast buffet and complimentary parking.  We thank you for your recent stay with us and we hope to see you soon again!

Summary: Clean; well managed; efficient front desk; typical free breakfast; proximity to main traffic ways (5 freeway, Chapman Avenue, City Drive) and to major hospital emergency room, an inordinate amount of noise late into the night.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We are glad you found our hotel to be of good value for your business stay in the Orange/Anaheim area.  We look forward to having the opportunity to serve you again in the near future!

Summary: We loved this hotel! They were very accommodating. It was very clean and the staff was very friendly and helpful.  The pool and hot tub was a hit and very welcomed after a long day at Disneyland!  They are in walking distance of the outlet mall. They serve a free hot breakfast that is very good!
Manager Response: We are ecstatic to read you loved our hotel!  I am very pleased to read that our staff was very accommodating, friendly and helpful to you. We are glad you enjoyed our complimentary Full-American breakfast buffet and our pool and spa. Thank you for your review of our hotel.  We look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel during your next visit to the Anaheim/Orange area!

Summary Heading: Nice place to stay but breakfast ends to early
Summary: Nice hotel, comfortable beds, rooms had wifi, coffee machine, hairdryer, iron etc. Nice clean pool area & hot tub with provided towels. Good location with bus service provided to disney for $5 that runs into the early hours. Breakfast could be improved by having more choice of food & by it all being in one room rather than having most of the food in one room but the toast/bagels & toaster in the other. Breakfast runs until 9 but staff were keen to pack everything away at 9 so you have the be up early or there's nothing left & breakfast is then gone, I think it's a bit early to be honest. Reception staff were helpful & friendly. There is building work currently going on to expand the hotel which did wake me up early every morning but our room was right on the corner facing the
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review.   Thank you for sharing with our reviewers the features that make our hotel have a great value.  We are happy to read you enjoyed our comfortable beds, in-room amenities and the convenience of the Anaheim Resort Transit.  I would like to take this time to touch on some of the topics you mentioned: You mentioned our breakfast menu options.  Just this last week, we have added a variety of breakfast items.  We are now changing our breakfast menu daily.  We have added items such as French toast, biscuits and gravy, potatoes O'Brien, yogurt and a few more items.  We look forward to having you stay with us again, so you can enjoy our new breakfast menu.   You also mentioned being awakened by the building work next door.  I'm very sorry to hear that your nap was interrupted.  Please know we try our best to keep our construction hours from 8am to 5p, Monday-Friday.  We also highly encourage our guests to contact us without hesitation, when there is a concern. We want you to have a relaxing & enjoyable stay, so we are more than happy to correct what we can ASAP.   Feel free to contact me directly at szuno@ayreshotels.com or by phone at 714-978-9168 x702 to discuss your concerns.  We thank you for giving us the opportunity to serve you.

Summary Heading: Great Hotel in the Disneyland area
Summary: We had a great stay at the Ayres Inn Orange.  The hotel room was nice and the hot breakfast each morning was such a treat from the traditional continental fare found at most other hotels.  We also appreciated the cookies that were baked fresh daily.  Our only issue involved the ART (Anaheim Resort Transport) which had nothing to do with rating the hotel.  At pick-up time at Disneyland, the wrong shuttle was parked in our shuttle's spot.  We got off at what we thought was our Ayres Hotel, however it was a different Ayres Hotel.  Our hotel was contacted and they came right over in the Hotel Shuttle and picked us up.  Overall, a great stay.
Manager Response: We are happy to read you had a great stay at our hotel!   We thank you for sharing on Trip Advisor about your experience at our hotel.  We are glad you found our rooms to be comfortable and the quality of our breakfast to be great.  Thank you for staying at Ayres Inn Orange.  We hope you come back and visit us again soon!

Summary: My wife and I stayed for a week at Anaheim. This is the place to be if you are keen on customer service. There isn't a single staff member who I dealt with caused a bad experience. There are individuals who went above and beyond, including Amy and Cory at the front desk, and Claudia from the restaurant at breakfast time. They are all very professional, patience, and always seem to want to go above and beyond. You will never get a yes or no answer from them, even though they cannot give me what I want, they seem to offer an alternative. The management staff should be proud. Free parking, breakfast, and Wi-Fi, I searched the area around and I don't believe there is another hotel that can match this, as they charge extras for any of the above services. This is a three star hotel,
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind feedback.  We are ecstatic to hear that Amy, Claudia and Cory made your experience at our hotel memorable.  We will make sure to celebrate their exceptional service.  We thank you for your stay with us and we look forward to your future visit!

Summary Heading: Nice hotel but be up early for breakfast
Summary: We spent 3 nights here as part of a tour of the west coast.  Reception staff were excellent, rooms very comfortable and very convenient for Disney which is 10 mins away - the hotel offer a shuttle service at $5 per person which runs all day and into the early hours of the morning for those who choose to stay at Disney until midnight.  Only real downside are the breakfast arrangements - during the week it finishes at 9am which is too early if you want to lay in after a tough day walking around LA, Disney etc the day before.  In addition the staff are very clean to switch everything off at 9 and so you really need to have finished your breakfast by this time.  Nice pool and hot tub.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to let reviewers know about your recent stay at our hotel.  We are happy to read our staff provided you with excellent service!  We are very sorry you missed breakfast with us.  I wanted to advise you that because Anepalco's restaurant opens for lunch, we must turn around our breakfast area shortly after our breakfast hours end.  We thank you once again for your feedback and we look forward to serving you on your next visit to the Orange/Anaheim area.

Summary Heading: Great hotel for Disneyland, great breakfast
Summary: We booked this hotel through Hotwire, so we didn't know what we were getting until we paid for the booking. But it was a great experience. Free parking. Easy shuttle to Disneyland. Great free breakfast with eggs and bacon or sausage, etc. Easy to drive to Disneyland if you want to drive. Reasonable rates. Nice staff, clean and modern rooms.
Manager Response: We are thrilled to read you had a great experience at our hotel.  Thank you for sharing with our reviewers the features that make our hotel have a great value.  We hope you visit us soon again!

Summary Heading: Wonderful Staff and Conditions at Ayres Inn Orange CA
Summary: We stayed for a period of 3.5 Weeks due to my Husband being an Emergency Patient at UCI Hospital across the road. Being from Australia we had no Family or Friends , hence no where to stay .The Hospital Staff recommended Ayres Inn , and we were so blessed to have the Fabulous Hotel so close by. The Staff and Hotel were just what we needed in our Situation and we recommend it to all who visit Orange CA ,. Disneyland is very close and they have the Shuttle Bus pick up's every hour.  A very Family friendly Hotel. Grace and Bob Baile. Australia.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your wonderful review Mr. & Mrs. B!  We miss you around here, but we are so glad Mr. B is doing much better and that you made it back to Australia safely.  We were glad to be your home away from home for those four weeks.  We thank you for staying with us and we hope to see you again!

Summary: The hotel is a very good hotel. Then the day my family got woke up by people hammering and moving beds out of the next room. Also the lobby was very nicely decorated and the cookies were great! The free breakfast was yummy,my favorite part of the breakfast was the sausage and eggs! Thank you.
Manager Response: Thank you for comments. We are glad to read you were able to enjoy our great breakfast and our cookies in the evenings!  I'm very sorry for the inconvenience caused due to loud noise on the morning of your check out.  We thank you for advising us that morning, we are glad we were able to address your concern immediately.  We want our guests to have a relaxing & enjoyable stay.  We thank you once again for your comments and we look forward to having the opportunity to serve you in the future.

Summary: We thought it was a fantastic hotel. We stayed for 4 nights for our Disneyland trip for a family reunion, all 24 of us stayed there. We loved the breakfast, the shuttle service was awesome, the staff was friendly and helpful. We had a wonderful stay. We will make sure if we plan a return trip to book this hotel and I will be and have already been recommending it to others that might be planning a stay in the future.
Manager Response: We are thrilled to read that all 24 members of your family found our hotel to be fantastic!  We thank you for your kind feedback, we do our very best to make our guests’ stay enjoyable, and accommodate our guests needs. Thank you again for your review, and we look forward to having the opportunity to serving all of your family again in the future.

Summary: We stayed there from Oct. 23rd-27th. The staff at the desk, the cleaning crew & the breakfast crew were excellent! Our room was very nice. Our decision to stay there is based on proximity to Disneyland, tripadvisor reviews posted for this location, parking and breakfast included w/in price. All benefits provided w/in price is Not something easily found w/in the entire area unless you want to pay a lot more. The breakfast turned out to be a LOT more than what I was expecting and very good. This Inn is family run and they definitely care how their guests are treated. They made fresh sugar cookies every day for all guests....a little extra touch....We definitely recommend this place and would easily stay there again!
Manager Response: We are very happy to read you had an excellent stay at our hotel!  We appreciate you recommending us to others.  We thank you for your review and we hope to see you soon again!

Summary: We stayed for one night so that we could attend the Disneyland Halloween party, the room itself was pretty nice, it was clean and pretty well appointed.  We arrived really early and the room wasn't ready yet which was sort of expected, they said they would call us when the room was ready, (which they never did) but when she looked at our reservation to get the phone # so she could call us to tell us the room was ready my husband said she was condescending when she saw we booked through Expedia which was disappointing.  She also needed a credit card to put a hold for expenses which was fine except for the fact that she didn't say anything about the fact that it was twice what we paid for the reservation, it would've been nice if they had advised us of that.  Like I said though
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review.  We appreciate your honest feedback.  I would like to apologize for any miscommunication that may have occurred between you and our staff.  We do our best to accommodate early check-ins as best as we can.  We apologize if you felt we treated you unfairly because you booked through Expedia.  Please be assured the amount of early check-ins we are able to grant correlates with how busy our hotel is.  I would like to personally apologize that our hotel did not exceed your expectations.  I invite you to please contact me directly so that we can discuss your stay in further detail. You can reach me at szuno@ayreshotels.com. Here at Ayres Inn Orange, we take pride in our hotel as we strive to exceed all of our guests’ expectations.  I regret that we failed to provide you with anything short of excellent customer service. Thank you for your time. I look forward to hearing from you.

Summary: Clean rooms and very friendly staff that were willing to help with any and all questions.  The breakfast was pretty good and the staff their were also terrific.  Over all it was a pleasant stay and I would probably stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of our hotel.  I am very pleased to hear that our front desk and breakfast team were very helpful to you during your stay with us. It is great that you enjoyed our complimentary Full-American breakfast buffet that is served from 6:30am-9:00am Monday through Friday, and 7am-10am Saturday and Sunday. Thank you again for your review of our hotel, and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Decent place to stay but nothing "WOW"
Summary: Just returned from a weekend in Disneyland and had stayed at Ayres Inn Orange. It was a decent place to rest at night but there's nothing "wow" about this inn. It's old and dated, and personally I'm not a fan of the decor. The plus side: breakfast was included (scrambled eggs, sausage or bacon [depending on the day], potatoes, pancakes, cereal, croissants, toasts, fruits) and plenty of parking available. There's a parking structure onsite and construction/expansion of the inn currently underway. The housekeeping also did a great job during our stay!  There were a couple downsides during one of our nights. The walls are thin and you can easily hear conversations from next door. Friday night of our stay, there was a large wedding party staying at the inn. Those guests were rowdy
Manager Response: Dear K Y,  Thank you very much for taking the time to leave a candid review of your experience at our hotel on TripAdvisor. It is nice to know that we were your haven to recuperate after your fun filled days. However, our sincerest apologies if one of your nights was disrupted by fellow guests. We truly strive to make every one of our guest's stays as pleasant as possible and are so very disappointed we did not succeed in that goal with your visit. Also, we do apologize if it seems that we did not give you a preferential room because you booked with a third party website. Typically, rooms are given based upon availability on arrival. Please be assured we would have given you a room right near your parents had it been available. Again, our deepest apologies if your stay was anything less than exceptional. We do hope you will reconsider staying with us in the future and thank you again.  Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary: I couldn't recommend Ayres Inn Orange more highly.  The staff is so courteous.  The room are clean and well furnished.  Our housekeeper made the beds every mornind and tucked the kids' stuffed animals into their bed.  The free breakfast had plenty of good food.  The pool area isn't huge, but it is clean and the hot tub is nice.  The location is far enough away from Disney not to have chaos and traffic, but a close shuttle ride to the park.  The ART picks up every 30 minutes and cost our family about $14 for 2 adults 2 children.
Manager Response: We love reading our guests had a great experience at our hotel!  We are happy to read you enjoyed your stay at our hotel.  Thank you for sharing with our reviewers how great our breakfast is, how clean and comfortable our rooms are and how easy it is to get to and from Disneyland.  Thank you for recommending us to others.  We look forward to your next stay at our hotel!

Summary: The staff was refreshingly accommodating and helpful. We had a few problems with the room: A/C wasn't working, ceiling fan was off kilter, light bulb burn out; however the staff got on it right away and took care of the matter. The outdoor pool is chilly when not in the sun yet the hot tub is pleasant. Breakfast is consistent daily with scrambled eggs, toast, bagels, croissants, fresh cut melon and either bacon or sausage. Peanut butter and jelly is available to make a sandwich. The workout room is smll, however it had a decent elliptical machine, recumbent bike and treadmill. A TV and fan were available in the room. Fridges in all rooms and a microwave on the second floor for use. Hotel is near the Orange Outlet Mall and Red Robin.Starbucks and Wendy's next door. Easy ART
Manager Response: Your review was a pleasure to read.  Thank you for sharing about your wonderful experience at our hotel.  We appreciate you recommending us to our other reviewers!  We look to seeing you next time you visit the Anaheim/Orange area.

Summary Heading: Small touches make this a great hotel
Summary: Wasn't sure what to expect when visiting this hotel as none of my colleagues or friends have stayed here before, but I was pleasantly surprised and cannot say anything bad about my stay. When we walked in, the lobby was clean and beautiful with an accommodating and friendly front desk staff. The lobby bathrooms were clean and close by which was appreciated after a long travel while we got our paperwork in order.   The room we had included a king sized bed and sofa bed (not used) which was comfortable and had really nice sheets. Not sure if they are in every room but ours included an iron, ironing board, single cup coffee machine, hangers and an open wardrobe, a large sized TV, and a writing desk. A card was left on the bed giving you an option to reuse your sheets if desired,
Manager Response: Thank you for comments!  We are happy to read you found our rooms to be comfortable, our quality of our breakfast to be great and our Front Desk staff to be friendly.  Thank you for staying at Ayres Inn Orange.  We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: Do not stay here if you want to work out
Summary: The work out room is tiny, windowless and depressing. If you want to go outside to run or bike... the "bike path" near there looks like a nuclear holocaust has swept through... pebbles sand concrete... depressing. The path gets better a few miles away.   Also, the hotel is located off the highway between giant street X and giant street Y. No place to run or enjoy around there at all.  If you eat even mildly healthy, the breakfast is.... less than marginal. soggy pancakes stacked in a steamer... your basic eggs and fatty meat and greasy potato, cereal choices ok (they had raisin bran). Bagels that were really just round pieces of white bread.. nothing actually like a bagel.  Fruit salad, yes. Mediocre sugar pastries of some sort. I would have appreciated ANY hard boiled eggs,
Manager Response: Dear CanarsieGal,  Thank you very much for taking the time to leave a candid review on TripAdvisor to let others know about your recent experience at our hotel. Our sincerest apologies if you felt our hotel was not agreeable to your lifestyle. We truly strive to offer the best possible accommodations, including a fitness facility, and are saddened to see that we did not meet your expectations. As for the breakfast, we do try to offer some health conscious options but are so sorry if they did not satisfy. Again, we truly apologize for any inconveniences during your stay and hope that you will reconsider staying with us in the future.  Sincerely, Christine Smith General Manager

Summary Heading: Great hotel for your trip to Disneyland!
Summary: Great hotel for your out of town trip to Disneyland, business trip or a weekend with friends. Very accomodating staff. Great location.  They are currently adding on to the hotel; but it poses no problems for guests.
Manager Response: It is great to hear that you enjoyed your stay at our hotel and that our staff took great care of you. Thank you for your review and we hope to see you the next time you visit the Anaheim/Orange area!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay when visiting Disneyland
Summary: Just returned from Ayres Inn.  We were quickly greeted and were pleasantly surprised with our room.  It was large, very clean and had a fridge.  We enjoyed the free breakfast each morning which helped us save money.  After a long day at Disney, we loved the big container of ice water with lemon and free cookies available in the lobby.  Even though the Ayres Inn is a little further away from Disney-it is well worth the drive.  It also has an Wendy's next door which was convenient.
Manager Response: We love reading our guests had a great experience at our hotel.  Thank you for sharing with our reviewers the great value our hotel has because of our breakfast, clean and comfortable rooms are of course because our cookies!  We thank you once again for your review and we hope to see you the next time you visit Disneyland!

Summary: This hotel is a good place.  My husband and I stayed and our stay was good.  The parking is safe and free.  The complementary breakfast is good but make sure you are there at least 30 minutes before close as the food runs out about that time and they don't refill it.  The beds are good and we had good sleep.  The bathrooms are also pretty clean.  The only constructive feedback would be that they have only two ice machines in the hotel for customer and one wasn't working when we were there.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to write a review.  We are glad you had a good stay and that you enjoyed our complimentary Full American breakfast buffet and our clean and very comfortable rooms.  We appreciate your constructive feedback regarding the ice machines.  Both ice machines are in service now.  Thank you again for your review, and we look forward to seeing you during your next visit to the Orange/Anaheim area.

Summary: The Ayres on Chapham was not the hotel we planed to stay at, first. But it turned ou to be first choice. Though from the outside not that nice it was fine inside. Starting from the helpful staff: everytime we were greeted friendly. They helpted us making our four night stay the hightlight of our Cali-trip. Room was on fifth floor, spacious and well equipped. Everything was spotless. Wifi worked fine. There was some noise from traffic but - hey, you're in LA. Bargain price including free parking (not to be taken for granted, so close to Disneyland), free wi-fi, free full breakfast (including bacon, eggs, fried potatoes, fruits, cereals, juice and strong coffee). The pool and hot tub were small but well kept. Nice walk through a small park. Though there's a construction site on
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind feedback.  We are very happy to read our hotel is your first choice now.  We are thrilled to read that our staff was one of the highlights of your trip!  Thank you for letting our reviewers know of our complimentary parking, WiFi, breakfast and the proximity our hotel has to many attractions.   We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: we could tell that this hotel takes great pride in itself based off the care and quality provided and the manager responding on here. we found it to be a very charming hotel. we are now in a hampton inn close by for an event and we miss the Ayers Orange...we checked out this morning from there. my only suggestions would be to update the dining area and perhaps air freshener to freshen up the hotel.we were very pleased and would stay there again and again.
Manager Response: Thank you for saying our hotel is charming!  We are very happy to read you really enjoyed your stay at our hotel.  We thank you for your feedback, we will see how we can improve our breakfast area and our lobby.  We hope you visit the Ayres Inn Orange soon again!

Summary Heading: The only place I stay while in Orange/Anaheim area
Summary: I make several visits to the area each year and always stay at the Ayres.  The staff are helpful and friendly.  The premises are clean and updated.  The rooms are spacious and clean.  The breakfast that is included in the price is wonderful. All the rooms are non-smoking, what a joy!
Manager Response: We are ecstatic to read your review.   We thank you for making the Ayres Inn Orange as your hotel of choice when you visit the Orange/Anaheim area!  We thank you for sharing with our reviewers our hotel features that make us have the best value in the area.  We look forward to seeing you again!

Summary Heading: The hotel that doesn't treat you like a stranger.
Summary: The staff is warm and friendly.  Fresh coffee and cookies are waiting for you.  The rooms are clean, comfortable and quiet. Shuttle service is a great convenience to Disneyland.Breakfast included is always a bargain.  They treat you like family.  Do yourself a favor give them a try. You won't regret it.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your kind comments.  We are very lucky to have team members that truly care about our guests.  Thank you for sharing your experience at our hotel.  We look forward to having you stay with us again!

Summary Heading: Great Hotel but booking through hotwire.com has its drawbacks
Summary: Our experience at the Ayres in Orange was VERY good. The staff was friendly and were totally helpful in all areas. The rooms were clean and nice looking. We saw the new-build in the back, but were never disturbed by any construction noise. We were greatly disappointed though to not to have obtained a room with two beds by booking through hotwire.com. We had a room with a hide-a-bed (as two beds are not guaranteed through hotwire.com) and there has never been a hide-a-bed that I know of that has been comfortable for anyone, even small children. I am glad, however that we were able to experience an Ayres Inn and it's hospitality at a reduced rate and now that I know what kind of place it is, I would definitely recommend it. Lastly, the breakfast is a good, hearty one.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your comments.  We are very happy to read you enjoyed our hospitality, our hearty breakfast and our hotel cleanliness.  We do apologize you did not receive a room with two queen size beds.  Our guests are welcome to contact the hotel directly to confirm the room type after they have booked a reservation through a third party.  We thank you for recommending us to our reviewers.  We look forward to seeing you again!

Summary Heading: Clean, safe, comfortable-- especially the beds!
Summary: The place is very nice, friendly staff, clean premises and pretty easy to get to and out of; decent parking too. Rooms are comfy, esp the beds- wow, Extremely nice! There is a big new building going up next door and so it's kinda' messy around property, but I am guessing the new hotel will be very nice and that perhaps old one will lower rates on their rooms!?! The only negatives are no microwave in our room, fridge froze everything we put in it; and the breakfast was bland and unimaginative--no yogurt with toppings and such.
Manager Response: We are very pleased to read you had a great stay at our hotel.  Thank you for sharing your experience with our reviewers!  We are happy to read you really enjoyed our rooms, our comfortable beds and our friendly staff.  We hope to have you visit us again soon!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay near Disneyland
Summary: This place was clean, rooms nicely decorated. Staff was very friendly. Location was close to food and shopping. Not too far from Disneyland. WE have been here before and everything is always consistent with the staff and rooms.  Love the cookies!!
Manager Response: We are very happy to read our staff provided you with excellent service!  We thank you for being a loyal Ayres Inn Orange guest.  We appreciate you mentioning our hotel features, such as our complimentary Full American breakfast, free parking and our clean rooms.  We thank you for taking the time to write a review and we look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: Started off this trip at the wrong hotel.  I thought I had booked the Ayres Anaheim but tried to check in there and found out that I had booked Ayres Orange. The hotel is under construction so beware there is construction noise during the week very early.  The room was a standard hotel room.  I had a room with two queen beds and they were very comfortable.  I also like the fact that the pillows were a nice size.  We did have a connecting door and our neighbors were a room full of teenage girls who did not go to bed until 3 am and were having a blast with each other.  Just make sure when you make your res that you request a room that does not share a door.  Also If you are a driver that uses the handicap parking spaces, these spaces were blocked during our stay and the handicap
Manager Response: We thank you for taking the time to write a review.  We are very sorry to hear that our hotel did not meet your expectations. I would also like to apologize for any miscommunication that may have occurred at the time of reservation.  I'd like to advise our reviewers that there is construction towards the back of our hotel.  The construction is due to Ayres Hotels expansion.  We are excited for the new Ayres Hotel being built and expected to open in the Spring of 2014.   Please feel free to contact me at szuno@ayreshotels.com to discuss the details of your stay. We appreciate your feedback, as it helps us improve. Thank you in advance for your time, and I look forward to hearing from you.

Summary: Pleasant hotel. Good service. Clean rooms. Free breakfast and wifi even though internet speed is sometimes slow. I would recommend this hotel. Also good to mention, the hotel is located about 5 minutes from Disney Park and there is a shuttle bus service every ten of fifteen minutes.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review.  We are happy to read you had a great stay at our hotel while on business.  We appreciate your recommendation and information about our hotel to our reviewers.  We hope you visit us again on your next visit to the Orange area.

Summary: This is a great hotel in a nice location close to Disney. It's very clean and the staff is excellent. You can't beat free parking and free hot breakfast for the area. The beds are one of the most comfortable beds I have slept in! I would highly recommend.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  I am very happy to read that our staff provided you with excellent service!  Our goal at Ayres Inn Orange is to exceed all of our guests' expectations.  Thank you for giving us the opportunity to serve you.  We hope to see you soon again!

Summary: We regularly visit this hotel with our 2 kids 1-2 times a year from San Diego.  This time we came for a no-kids trip to Disneyland and booked a King bed room.  We are always happy with our visit and was hoping this would not be any different.  It wasn't.  Everything was awesome. The website mentioned construction on the property, which I called to inquire about.  I was told the existing hotel was not being affected, but was in the back on the parking lot. The last thing you want is to stay at a hotel with construction and noise, etc.  He was 100% accurate,  The back parking lot is under construction, putting up a NEW hotel!  The current property would remain intact and untouched during the work.  I was told that both properties would coexist and cater to slightly different
Manager Response: We are thrilled to read you loved your stay once again!  Thank you for sharing with our reviewers the features that make our hotel have a great value.  We hope you visit us soon again!

Summary: Pleasant Hotel, Clean.  The elevator was very small and one of the 2 was out of order, so the wait was sometimes long.  Also the laundry was often full since there is only one for guest use.  The bed was comfortable and the breakfast was good.  Real scrambled eggs, sausage, fried potatoes, bagels, toast, juice and fresh fruit.    There was a small child across the hall who was screaming, but once inside the room it was very quiet.  No problems with hearing other guests.  Slightly farther from Disneyland than we had expected, but still within a 10 minute drive.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We are very happy to read our hotel was just right for you.  We appreciate you mentioning all the great features our hotel offers.  We look forward to welcoming you back the next time you are in town for work in Santa Ana. Thank you for your review!  Your feedback is very important to us, as it helps us identify areas we need to improve on. We are glad to read you had an overall pleasant experience at our hotel.  I welcome you to contact me directly at szuno@ayreshotels.com, should you have any further concerns.

Summary: I stayed at Ayers Inn Orange during a work trip to downtown Santa Ana.  Apparently, a lot of people stay there to visit Disneyland.  It is also close to UC Irvine and Children's Hospital of Orange County (CHOC) medical facilities, with easy freeway access.  There is adequate free parking.  The staff were very friendly and helpful.  There are free cookies when you check in.  The rooms are good sized and clean, and have a small refrigerator.  I agree with the person who would have liked a full-sized mirror.  There was free wifi access in the rooms and it worked well. There is an exercise room. The breakfast was good and there is a large seating area.  I didn't eat at the restaurant, but there is one on site.  The room service menu looked interesting.  Price was reasonable.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We are very happy to read our hotel was just right for you.  We appreciate you mentioning a few of the great features our hotel offers.  We look forward to welcoming you back the next time you are in town for work in Santa Ana.

Summary Heading: No closet with doors or full length mirror
Summary: I did not like that anyone who enters your room can see all your clothes because there aren't any doors on the closet.  Also no full length mirror so had to stand on a chair several times to see bottom half.  Room was too far from elevator and having MS the long walk from the elevator wore me out.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review.  We are sorry to hear that our hotel did not exceed your expectations.  We will see how we can best improve our rooms and see if we can add a full length mirror.  Please feel free to contact me directly at szuno@ayreshotels.com to discuss your concerns.

Summary Heading: Great stay at the Ayres Inn
Summary: My family of 5 recently stayed at the Ayres and loved it.  We got a fantastic rate on a 6 night stay through Get Away Today.  The overall feel of the hotel is very nice, breakfast was great, and the location convenient for Disneyland, the beach and dining.  I was apprehensive about taking ART to and from Disneyland, but it proved very reliable and easy.  The room was a good size, and the mud-room style shelves were much handier than a closet.  I prefer a bathroom that has the toilet and tub seperate from the vanity and sink, especially when trying to get everyone up and ready in the morning, but it wasn't a deal breaker.  I also wasn't crazy about the fact that this is a pet friendly hotel; I prefer not to trip over or smell Fido on my way to my room, but I did not see a dog the
Manager Response: We thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback.  We are delighted to read you enjoyed your stay at our hotel! We appreciate you sharing with our reviewers the great value our hotel has.  Our Full American breakfast buffet and the ART shuttle are great advantages for families visiting Disney.  We hope you visit us soon again!

Summary Heading: First time at Ayres Hotel - Orange
Summary: We had read about the Ayres Hotel through Tripadvisor and we were very pleased with the hotel. We are very picky with out hotels and we were not disappointed at all. The staff are very courteous and are there to offer assistance as needed. One day, we were late for the free breakfast, but the General Manager (forgot her name) went to the back and brought us a couple of bagels and some milk for our daughters to have cereal. We were very appreciative. Never used the pool so can't comment on that.  There was only one glitch and it was taken care of promptly. Also, if you are a TV fanatic, the channels are not quick to change and it gets irritating. Since we were out most of the day, this wasn't a huge deal for us. The hotel is about a mile and a half from Disneyland and you have to
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing  your experience at our hotel.  Christine Smith, General Manager,  truly sets the example for our team.   Our staff's goal is to exceed all of our guests' expectations.   We look forward to seeing you on your next visit to the Orange/Anaheim area!

Summary: We stayed here for 2 nights over Labor Day weekend. It's very reasonably priced due to location. It's close to everything in Anaheim. I would not say "walking distance" but there's a lot of public transportation (bus or cab). Free parking and welcome cookies are added bonuses! The rooms are large if you get a King or double room.
