The freshly baked cookies in the lobby each evening were good too.  We felt like the breakfast was lacking in variety.  Scrambled eggs, potatoes (not hash browns), pancakes, bacon
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your feedback.  We appreciate you giving our reviewers great detail regarding your family stay at our hotel.  We are glad you enjoyed you found our rooms to be clean and comfortable and that you enjoyed our freshly baked cookies.  We will try and improve the areas in where we failed to exceed your expectations.  Our goal at the Ayres Inn Orange is to exceed the expectations of all our guests.  Please feel free to contact me directly, should you have any further concerns regarding your stay.  My contact information is szuno@ayreshotels.com or 714-978-9168 x702.

Summary: I love this hotel. My husband and I have been staying there on multiple trips for over 5 years. It is great to see the same wonderful faces year after year which speaks so well of the management. The staff is friendly and the rooms are clean. The beds are the most comfortable we have found and we travel a lot! Breakfast is nice and I love that they offer California fruit every day! Very easy to get to and from Disneyland and other attractions.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for naming us as your favorite hotel!  We thank you for being a loyal Ayres Inn Orange guest.  We are very happy to read you have continued to come back year after year.  Thank you for choosing the Ayres Inn Orange as your place to stay when visiting the Orange/Anaheim area.

Summary: We stayed this past Saturday night at the Ayres Inn Orange. This was our first time staying at an off-Disneyland property. We were tired of paying astronomical Disney Hotel prices and decided to try something new. I researched online and found the Ayres Inn Orange. It was a perfect deal. Very affordable and great accomodations. Parking is free along with breakfast which is a plus, especially compared to other hotels within Disney vicinity. The ART transit stopped right in front of hotel and was only $5 per adult and $2 per child for an all day pass! It dropped us off right in front of Disneyland! Seems as if it Disney parking lot and hotels were longer walks than this.   The room was very comfortable and had coffee maker and refrigerator in rooms. Hotel staff was very friendly
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your kind feedback!  We appreciate you taking the time to let our reviewers see why our hotel has such a great value.  We are very happy to read you had a perfect stay because of our complimentary Full American breakfast buffet, free parking, comfortable rooms and friendly staff.  We look forward to having the opportunity to serve you once again in the future.

Summary: My husband and I stayed in three nights on 2012 December and we had a very nice stay.  The staff are friendly and helpful . The room is very cousy, clean and fresh with a wonderfull view. As we traveled for work, the quick check-inn and check-out helped a lot.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your wonderful feedback!  We love reading that our guests had a wonderful stay at our hotel.  Thank you for letting our other TripAdvisor reviewers know how friendly our staff is and how comfortable our hotel is.  It was our pleasure having you stay with us.  We hope you visit us again soon!

Summary: The staff are super friendly and helpful.   The lobby was beautifully decorated for Christmas and was warm and inviting and homey without being stuffy. There is constantly some cool water as well as coffee available which is nice.  The rooms were spacious and linens were crisp, white, and fresh, including the towels, that were ample and fresh. The pillows were comfortable and I had a better night's sleep than at home! The TV worked and had many channels, there was an adjustable thermostat which functioned great, and I did not hear any of my neighbors (if I had any). There was a coffeetable and couch area in my room that was great. The whole place was very clean.  I saw they had gym facilities but I did not use them.   Overall, I had a wonderful stay and recommend this place to
Manager Response: We love reading our guests had a wonderful experience at our hotel!  We are happy to read you enjoyed the decor and homey feel of our hotel.  Thank you for sharing with our reviewers how clean and comfortable our rooms are.  Thank you for recommending us to others.  We hope you visit us again soon!

Summary Heading: Excellent hotel and staff - we'll be back
Summary: Our family stayed for two nights in November while visiting Disneyland.  Room was clean with modern furnishings.  The lobby was cozy with the fireplace lit, complimentary coffee, newspapers and fresh cookies, as well as ice water with lemon. The front desk staff was very accomodating with all our questions and requests.  The pool was well heated and clean and fresh pool towels were provided.  The bus to Disneyland picks you up right at the front door of the hotel and drops you off at the Disney entrance, so it is extremely convenient.  You just purchase your bus ticket from the hotel desk.  The complimentary breakfast buffet was lovely, with lots of variety and fresh quality items.  We only wish our stay had been longer.  We look forward to returning!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your feedback and we are glad to read our hotel and staff was excellent!  We are very happy to read you thoroughly enjoyed our hotel.  Thank you for taking the time to enjoy our complimentary breakfast, morning newspaper and fresh baked cookies.  Glad you got to enjoy our heated pool and the ART shuttle as well.  We love to read that our staff was very accommodating.  We too wish your past stay with us was longer, but we now look forward to your return!

Summary: Good location and  great staff.My reservation through Travelocity was lost but Christine Smith (General Manager) personally called them and took care of everithing.Stayed there the week before Thanks Giving.The people at the front desk were nice.Sandra,Cori,Luis... all of them were very helpful.They deserve all the great reviews.
Manager Response: We are very happy to read that you received excellent service from many members of our staff.  We truly have team members that enjoy serving our guests!   We will make sure to celebrate Cory and Luis for their outstanding service.  We thank you for your recent stay and look forward to serving you once again in the future.

Summary: The room was nice, clean and roomy.  Staff was friendly.  Location was great.  We will stay there again.  Oh and the breakfast is really good.  Very convenient to be able to eat there and get on with your day of fun!
Manager Response: We are thrilled to read you loved your stay.  Thank you for mentioning how good our breakfast is and how nice and comfortable our rooms are.  We are happy to read our staff was very friendly as well.  We look forward to your future stays with us!

Summary: Fantastic hot breakfast with great variety, well stocked, very convenient.  Plenty of options for all kinds of eaters...Very friendly, helpful staff.  fresh baked cookies in evening.  very clean rooms.  Construction was not a problem in terms of noise or access.  right next to freeway on ramp so Disney access not too bad.  obviously not as convenient as a hotel within walking distance, but shuttle to disney comes twice an hour or driving wasn't too bad either. For the price and quality, you can't beat this hotel.  so nice to start day at disney on a belly full of warm, nutritious food...helped lessen amount of expensive park food we had to buy.  I was pleasantly surprised and left feeling so well cared for that I wanted to write a review to encourage business here.  excellent
Manager Response: We love reading we surpassed your family’s' expectations!  We are happy to read your family fully enjoyed our hot breakfast buffet, fresh baked cookies, our clean, comfortable rooms and our very friendly staff!  It was our pleasure having you stay with us and we look forward to having you stay with us again in the future.

Summary: We have stayed at both Ayres hotels in the Orange area before. This trip we were here for a full week. Some things we liked: convenient location, friendly staff--for the most part, family friendly and close to many amenities such as Starbucks, Wendy's, and free breakfast daily. Dislikes include: sirens from hospital across the street, parking was a bit difficult, especially on the night before black friday, mildew smell in bathroom which we remedied by buying hydrogen peroxide and rubbing alcohol and pouring it down the sink, leaky toilet, and breakfast menu was exactly the same everyday. At the Ayres Hotel in Anaheim, we remember that the breakfast had more variety and a larger selection of foods. Overall, we had an enjoyable stay as we went to Disneyland, visited our daughter
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay at our hotel!  We are sorry to read we did not exceed your expectations.  We strive to have our guests leave completely satisfied with their stay.  I'll try and explain on a few comments you noted.  You mentioned that parking was very limited during your stay with us.  Because of the construction in the back side of our hotel, the parking is a bit limited.  We ask our guests to please stop by the Front Desk when they do not find a spot.  We will then direct our guests on where to park.  We are monitoring our lot and checking parked vehicles are for registered guests only.  In regards to the concerns regarding your bathroom, I welcome you to contact me directly as soon as possible, so that we may resolve these issues.  We thank you once again for your feedback as it allows us to improve our future guests' experience.  My contact information is szuno@ayreshotels.com or 714-978-9168 x702.

Summary: We stayed here for our recent Disneyland vacation. Room was clean, breakfast was free, shuttle to Disneyland came regularly and was a pleasant, short ride. Starbucks and fast food was nearby when we needed it, and outlet shopping was just a block away as well. Overall, a great experience at this hotel!
Manager Response: Thank you for leaving us your review.  We are glad to read you and your family found the great value our hotel has because of the complimentary breakfast, proximity to restaurants, outlet stores and Disney.  We are happy to have given your family a great experience.  We hope you visit us again soon!

Summary: Access to the hotel from Interstate 5 is extremely simple.  The offramp leads straight to the portico.  I am always treated like family here.  Staff is friendly, caring,  and capable.  The lobby daily newspaper is most welcome.  In addition to the staff the other guests are quite friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your short and sweet review Mr. O.  You know you are family to us!  Thank you for letting our reviewers know the close proximity to the 5 freeway. We would like to also let our reviewers know that the 57 and the 22 freeways are less than half a mile away as well.  We thank you once again for your feedback and we will see you here next time you visit!

Summary: My wife and I stay here mostly because of the great location. It is across the street from UCI Medical Center where I have to have a medical procedure performed about every 3 to 4 months so we try to make it a romantic getaway and mix business with pleasure. The only thing I require at a mid level hotel like the Ayres is a good night sleep due to having to get up very early for my medical procedure at UCI across the street. Its always very stressful. My only complaint is the excessive amount of noise in the hallways at all hours. I realize this hotel is near the theme parks in the O.C. so a lot of families with small children will be staying here but the staff need to make an effort to stress to the adults that they need to keep their kids in check. They run rampant up and down
Manager Response: Thank you for your thoroughly written response.  We would like to apologize for your recent experience at our hotel.  Please know we try our best to routinely check the hallways and pool to avoid noise complaints.  We also highly encourage our guests to contact us without hesitation, when there is a concern. We want you to have a relaxing & enjoyable stay, so we are more than happy to correct what we can as soon as possible.  We thank you for giving us the opportunity to serve you.  Feel free to contact me at szuno@ayreshotels.com for future bookings.

Summary Heading: Hotel management and it's staff cares about its guests and it shows!!!
Summary: Our family of 4 were greeted with a very friendly front desk staff....and cookies!   When arriving into our room we were happy to find a very clean updated room. The swimming pool was warm and the kids had fun. My wife said the Disney shuttle bus ($5.00 each person) was nice and driver was very friendly. The cafe looked great and seemed busy at night. Wanted to go and sit on the outdoor patio but didn't have enough time.  The "cafe" menu did look a little unusual to me. Maybe us being from Wisconsin, we don't know Cali cuisine? The complimentary hot breakfast buffet was exceptional...complete with bacon, eggs, hash browns, pancakes, fresh fruit, bagels and toast. We had a slight problem with our room not being cleaned in error. The manager took it upon herself to help make it up
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your kind review.  We really do care about our guests!!  It was our pleasure having you stay with us.  Here at Ayres Inn Orange, we strive to exceed our guests’ expectations and by the looks of it, it seems like we did just that!  We thank you for advising us of the behavior from our breakfast team.  We assure our guests, this will not happen again.  Thank you for your recent stay.  Please visit us again, when your travels bring you to the Orange/Anaheim area!

Summary: Our room was clean and comfortable. I forgot the toothbrushes and tooth paste at home. I told the front desk staff and they gave us complimentary brushes with tooth paste! Thank you so much for that. The breakfast was very good. I loved loved the oatmeal. The cookies and fresh lemon water were a bonus after a long day at Disney. The shuttle picks up right out front. The shuttle on this route was never over crowded. Housekeeping went above and beyond. What a treat to come back to our room with our Disney pillow pets and blankets placed so sweetly on the bed. Wifi was easy to get on and worked great for our needs. We loved it so much we tried to book for Thanksgiving but they only had a 1 king left :(. We our however coming back for winter break!
Manager Response: We are thrilled to read we exceeded your family's expectations!  Thank you for taking the time to have breakfast with us, use the ART shuttle and have some our cookies!  Like you advised our reviewers, in case our guests forgot some things at home, we do have toothbrushes, toothpaste, shaving kits, combs, sewing kits and a few more things.   We thank you for booking your December reservation with us!  We look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: Ayers is a great stay for a good price when visiting Disneyland. I don't mind the ten minute or less drive, either. The ART stops here, so you can use the shuttle to go to the theme park if you want to avoid extra parking fees,  Rooms are nice and spacious, but the bathroom seems just a tad small, yet it's the right side to do the basics and enough counter room for your toiletries. The restroom is clean too to bottom, and uv light inspection showed no serious residue in the bathtub.   The living area is quite lovely and spacious. The room passed our white glove and bed sheet exam. Also, no dust was found in the whole room, so their cleaning is impeccable. They provide enough channels for entertainment, a large room fridge for your needs, and a cute closet dresser to hang
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your detailed review!  We thank you for advising our reviewers of our hotel's cleanliness, breakfast and restaurant hours.  We appreciate your feedback regarding our Front Desk team and parking.   We are sorry that a member of our staff was not friendly.  We assure you this is not typical of our staff.  Our entire staff's goal is to exceed our guests' expectations.  Regarding parking, we suggest for our guests to contact us ahead of time, so that we may advise them the best way into the hotel and the best place to park.  As you stated, it will definitely improve after the construction is finished.  Thank you for your recent stay and we hope to serve you in the future.

Summary Heading: Nice alternative to the usual chains
Summary: We stayed at Ayres Inn in Orange during our trip to Disnyeland. We chose it because they offer free parking and a cheap suttle to the park.  We had no problems with our room; it was comfortable, clean, odor-free and quiet. The property was nice and the staff was very polite. Being able to get to and from the park for $4 round-trip on the ART system was great. The only things we'd like to see improved are more than one person staffing the front desk - there were a couple of times we had to wait in line behind lengthy transactions - and improve the complimentary breakfast, which was disappointing considering the many great reviews here. The coffee was brackish, there was no bacon, the eggs and pancakes were dry. We were also kinda disappointed that there were no movies available
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review.  We are glad you enjoyed the complimentary parking, the ART shuttle and your clean, quiet and comfortable room.  We are also happy to read that our staff was very polite. Thank you for bringing to our attention the Front Desk staffing, breakfast quality and TV channels options.  We will further look into how we can improve all these areas, to provide a greater experience to our future guests. We look forward to having the opportunity to serve you once again in the future!

Summary Heading: Even in construction this is a good value
Summary: My husband and I have stayed here 5+ times while visiting our daughter at Chapman University.  LOVE that the parking is free and it is a nice bonus to have WI-FI and a free breakfast.  The hotel is renovating and expanding, but we found the construction to be active when we were out of the hotel, so it did not bother us.  The front desk people remember you and say hello and goodbye when you go in and out.  This location is close to the university, a shopping area with lots of places to eat and there is a Wendy's right next door for a quick bite.  They have a restaurant on site for lunch and dinner, but we did not eat there as we were always meeting other people at another location.  It was packed all the time though.  We will stay there again when in SoCal.
Manager Response: Thank you Chapman University parent, for your kind feedback!   We thank you for being a loyal Ayres Inn Orange guest!  We are very happpy to read that our staff remembers you!  Thank you for letting our reviewers know of our complimentary parking, WiFi, breakfast and the proximity our hotel has to so many attractions.   We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: We enjoyed the room & accomodations, although parking was limited in areas close to the front of the property. The front desk personnel were very helpful and the property was convenient to the Crystal Cathedral.
Manager Response: We thank you for your review.  We are very happy to read you enjoyed your stay with us!  We are glad you found our Front Desk staff to be very helpful and your room accommodations to be just what you were looking for when visiting the Crystal Cathedral.  We hope to have you visit us again in the near future!

Summary: I'm not sure what was wrong with our floor, we stayed in room 204. The whole floor smelled really musty and the room was bad unless we opened the window. I'm thinking they probably needed to change the pads in the a/c units or maybe there was mold? I'm not sure.   Other than that we had a great time here. The pool was nice, breakfast was good, and the hotel staff was very friendly. It was a great place to stay while we were visiting Disneyland. The ART (Anaheim Resort Transit) was the perfect way to get to and from the park, and this route only had 3 stops on it! It was wonderful.
Manager Response: Thank you for your time to give us your feedback. We apologize as it seems we failed to exceed your expectations.  In regards to the scent of the second floor, we asked our Executive Housekeeper and Chief Engineer to look further into this concern.   On another note, we are very glad you had a great time at our hotel.  We are always very happy to read that our entire hotel staff was very friendly and that our hotel met all your needs.  We hope to see you on your next visit to the Anaheim/Orange area

Summary: Room was very clean and comfortable. Staff was courteous.  I would highly recommend this hotel chain to friends and family.  Attached restaurant served an excellent dinner.  Breakfast was included and was above average.
Manager Response: Your review was a pleasure to read.  We are very happy to read you left very satisfied with your stay at our hotel!   We are delighted to read that you highly recommend us to your friends and family!  We are very proud to read that our staff was courteous and that you enjoyed both our breakfast and Anepalco's!  We cannot wait to see you again!

Summary: PROs: very comfy beds very friendly and helpful staff fresh baked cookies in the late afternoon close to DL has onsite restaurant that rocks! (Anepalcos)  CONS: Room 300 is very noisy because it is right next to stairs.  temperature of swimming pool is very cold!  * Not the hotel's fault but Anaheim Resort Transportation is not very timely. Either they arrive late or leave early. Very rarely on time. if you're patient and dont mind the possibility of waiting, this should not be an issue. ART is supposed to arrive 2 times per hour.  This hotel is great in that the staff is very friendly and helpful. My daughter lost her beloved stuffed unicorn and one of the staff members found it and displayed it so the owner could find it. My daughter was so heart broken when she lost it and
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind comments regarding our friendly and helpful staff!   We are very happy to read that our staff responded very quickly to your concerns.  We are also glad you enjoyed the comfort of our beds, our fresh baked cookies and Anepalco's restaurant.   We are sorry to read that you experienced noise coming from the stairwell.  In the future, feel free to ask for a room further down the hallway.  We will try and monitor our stairwells routinely, so that doors aren't slammed. In regards to the pool temperature, we apologize it was cold.  This is not usual, should it occur again, we can always turn up the pool temperature upon our guests’ request.   We hope to have you visit us again, when your travels bring you to the Orange/Anaheim area!

Summary: A recent trip to Disneyland took us to the Ayers Inn Orange. My choice for this hotel was based on the value. For the price per night with the added free hot breakfast,free wi-fi, free parking and door to Disneyland ART Transport, the value was great! Especially compared to many other hotels. There were a couple of places within quick walking distance, Quiznos, Wendy's and Starbucks, so the location was ok. As I had read in previous posts, we found our room was exceptionally clean. The decor was a bit dated, but well kept. The front desk was very helpful to explain we could not only get our ART passes there, but have them added to our room charges. It was ART Route 14, and took around 15 minutes to Disney twice an hour. Our van never seemed as full as the other ART routes since
Manager Response: We are glad you found the great value our hotel has!  Thank you for taking the time to enjoy our complimentary breakfast buffet, complimentary Wi-Fi and complimentary parking.  Your restaurant suggestions and ART information is very helpful to our reviewers!  We are sorry you experienced some noise during your stay with us.  In the future, you are welcome to ask if a room further away from the elevators is available.  We thank you for your recent stay with us and we hope to see you soon again!

Summary: My family and I stayed at ayres inn during our trip to disneyland. We loved the hotel.  Every morning we had a lovely breakfast for free, eggs, bacon, potatoes cereal ,bagels, pancakes, assorted juices, milk and coffee.  The room was great for our family, one king bed and a pull out couch for the kids.  It was very clean. The pool was great, the hot tub with jets was a plus.  To get to disney the art bus drives right infront of the lobby. You do have to pay, but worth every penny so you dont have to deal with traffic and parking. The receptionist can sell you the passes, add them to your room. It comes by every half hour, there are really only 2 stops along this route (#14).  Overall I can see why ayres inn is #1. Ps the cookies at night are yummy!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for letting our reviewers know why you loved our hotel!  You gave great details about our complimentary breakfast buffet and the ART service.  We are also glad you enjoyed the comfort of our king room, the pool and our cookies!  We hope to have you visit us again soon!

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for about a month and it was superb!! I cannot stress how wonderful and accomodating the hotel staff were. It was always a pleasure walking in the front doors with a welcoming smile from the staff. We got to know Luis, Cory, Sandra and Christopher from the staff throughout our stay and they were wonderfully friendly and accomodating to all our questions. If we needed any extra sheets or toilet paper late in the night, they would always attend to our needs. The rooms were great as was the pool and jacuzzi. Plus, there were cookies on the front desk at various times during the day so that was always a nice treat. Our stay, which was about a month long, was extremely pleasant and we will return again when we are back in the area.
Manager Response: It was our pleasure having you!  Thank you for choosing us to be your home away from home.  Thank you for your kind feedback.  We are thrilled to read that Luis, Cory, Christopher made a lasting impression on you.  We are really fortunate to have team members that truly care about our guests.  We hope to have the opportunity to serve you once again in the future!

Summary: We loved the Ayres Inn, Orange from our first glimpse of the lit up palm trees on the patio at night to everything else that followed. The hotel has lovely decor and is very inviting. The staff were always very helpful and accommodating and there was no wait time in regards to service. The courtyard outside is beautiful and the pool looked very inviting but since it was a business trip, there was no time to enjoy that feature. We did however enjoy the scrumptious hot breakfast in the morning and the hot and fresh breakfast cookies at reception! Our room was spotlessly clean and inviting and everything was up to par. We loved the Ayres Inn, Orange and highly recommend!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review.  We love reading you had a wonderful stay!  We are glad you got to enjoy our freshly baked cookies and that you took advantage of our complimentary hot breakfast.  Thank you for mentioning the cleanliness and lovely decor of our hotel.  We thank you for highly recommending us to everyone!

Summary: Free breakfast, free wifi & free parking? What more could you ask for? I am amazed at any bad review regarding customer service here. I have been here for 3 days now, have 3 more to go.  These people go above & beyond to be friendly & helpful. Luis & Cory checked us in & were very accommodating & got a portable crib for our baby, even offered to bake us fresh cookies since we missed them.  They offered cabs for us, towels for the pool and gave info on where to buy supplies for our baby.  We have always been greeted by every employee, even all the cleaning staff.  We have really been made to feel at home here.  They have a laundry room on our floor which has been very handy as well as a microwave on the 2nd floor for us to use.  We have a larger than typical fridge in our room &
Manager Response: We love hearing from our guests!  Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts with our other reviewers!  We are really happy to hear that our Cory and Luis were friendly and helpful. We will make sure to celebrate their outstanding customer service!  Thank you for mentioning how clean, quiet our rooms are and how great our breakfast is!  It really is a great value for our guests.  We thank you for your recent stay with us.  We hope to have the opportunity to serve you once again in the future!

Summary: We stayed at the Ayres to attend an Anaheim Angels game.  We arrived at around 11 a.m. and had no problem checking in early in the same type of room we had reserved.  The front desk clerk gave us easy and clear directions to walk to the game and nearby shopping.  Everyone was polite and very helpful - we got extra coffee from a housekeeping staff member in the hallway.  The bed was very comfortable and the room very clean.  Really no complaints at all.  We did take advantage of the free breakfast buffett and it was more than a continental breakfast as there were hot eggs, sausages and potatoes.  However, they ran out of coffee and I had to go to the lobby to get some.  Also, they got a bit behind on keeping the tables clean in the dining area and the patio.  I don't consider
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with our reviewers, the great value our hotel has!  We are happy to read you found our rooms to be comfortable, our quality of our breakfast to be great and our Front Desk staff to be friendly.  Thank you for staying at Ayres Inn Orange.  We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: My wife and I booked a room months in advance needing a room with 2 beds for ourselves and our teenage neice and her friend. When we checked into the room, we only had 1 bed. So I called the front desk and told him we booked a room for 4 people and needed 2 beds. When I suggested getting a different room, he was rude and told me that all the rooms were booked for the night as well as for the rest of our stay. When I informed him that we booked  the room months in advance and we were from out of state, His only suggestion was to book another room with 2 beds at a different hotel and to get a refund from hotwire. I informed him there were no refunds from hotwire, his attitude was take it or leave it. When I informed the hotel management after we returned home about the poor
Manager Response: We thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We truly apologize that you had such an experience.  During your visit, we were sold out unfortunately.  The option of changing you into a room with two beds, was not possible.  I would like the privilege to follow-up with you in more detail to prevent this from happening again.  At your earliest convenience, please contact me at: 714-978-9168 or by email at: szuno@ayreshotels.com.

Summary Heading: GOOD BUT NOT THE BEST AYRES
Summary: The best part of my stay was the close proximity to the Orange County attractions and the reasonable price for a weekend stay with parking, breakfast and internet included.  The downside of this place from my perspective was the lack of cold air coming from the room's a.c. unit as well as the musty smell throughout the hallways and room.  It generally lacks the charm and tidiness of other Ayres locations and it was pretty cramped too.  The free breakfast is a plus but it, like a lot of hotel breakfast set ups, is understaffed so items sometimes weren't being refilled or cleaned up promptly enough.  Overall, this place would work if you really don't plan on spending too much time at the hotel and want to be within ten minutes of anything in Orange County.  It wouldn't hurt to
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay at our hotel.  We love reading that you are a loyal Ayres guest!  We are very sorry that our hotel didn't exceed your expectations.  Please know we take our guest feedback very seriously.  I'd like to have the opportunity to review your concerns with you.  At your earliest convenience, please contact me directly at 714-978-9168 or szuno@ayreshotels.  We thank you for your loyalty!

Summary Heading: Good location for Orange area...FREE Breakfast and FREE Parking
Summary: I selected this Ayres because the other location on Katella was SOLD OUT...  The room was clean and had a mini fridge. Beds and pillows were comfy. Convenient computer with internet in the lobby. Free plentiful parking and free breakfast. I liked the old-fashioned decor.  This location is near the freeway, across the street from the Outlets at Orange Shopping Mall, a few miles from the antique stores in Historic Orange, and of course, driving distance to Disneyland.  Free hot breakfast was very tasty. My only complaint is that the staff needs to either monitor the self-serving area a little better OR post a few signs on the table or on the wall to inform guests to take a NEW plate each time...I observed two guests re-using their dirty plates instead of getting a fresh clean
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review.  We appreciate your feedback and are happy to read you are a loyal Ayres guest!  Thank you for highlighting the cleanliness of our rooms, the comfort of our beds and the amenities our hotel offers, such as the free Wi-Fi, parking and breakfast.  We will use your feedback to improve our future guests' experience.  We hope to have the opportunity to serve you once again in the future.

Summary: Me and a friend stayed 4 nights and have zero complaints. The staff we encountered were very pleasant and helpful. The breakfast buffet they offer was quite lovely (eggs, breakfast meat, pancakes, potatoes, cereal, fruit, toast/bagel, juices/coffee/tea/hot chocolate). We didn't use the pool or Jacuzzi, so I can't comment on that, but there was a cute little walkway with a fountain and stone bench on your way to the pool. The beds were comfortable and the room & bathroom were clean. Ours had a mini-fridge that we didn't really use, but I can see how it could come in very handy. All the halls were decorated with multiple paintings, which I found to be a nice touch. Whether you like the specific art or not, it was nice to have something to look at. It's right off I5, so it's easy
Manager Response: We are delighted to read you really enjoyed your stay with us!  Thank you for your kind feedback.  Seems like you noticed even the small details our beautiful hotel has.  We are really glad you enjoyed our hotel thoroughly.  We look forward to seeing you on your next stay!

Summary Heading: Nice and pleasant place to stay
Summary: The area is not worth it, but if you need to stay in the neighborhood, it's a good choice. Clean, nice staff and roomy rooms, The pool is nice too. And the price is ok. I mean, it's not some place I would go for itself, but it's pretty pleasant to stay there. nice medium size Inn.
Manager Response: We thank you for your recent stay at our hotel.  We are glad to read you had a pleasant stay at our hotel.  We look forward to having the opportunity to serve you on a future visit to the Anaheim/Orange area.

Summary: My stay was about 2 weeks ago and it was excellent. The staff was great. Rooms very clean.. And even all the construction wasn't all that bad!. Just when coming back from Disneyland in the scorching heat my Ac did not work.. But I called the front desk and in a matter of minutes your guys maintenance man Sergio was his name fixed it in no time..so my stay was cooler than ever.. Thank you guys and will be reccomending and staying for future visits.:)
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your kind comments!  We are really happy to read you had an excellent stay.  We will make sure to celebrate Sergio for his exceptional service.  We are very lucky to have employees that take pride in their job.  We thank you for recommending us to others and thank you for becoming a loyal Ayres guest!

Summary: We reserved this hotel through a package deal and got a very good price.  The beds were exceptionally comfy and had lovely "sink in" pillows which ensured a great nights sleep. Didn't use the free shuttle as we weren't here for Disney but the car park and surrounding area always felt very safe. There is a complimentary computer in the lobby as well as free wi-fi. Overall, I liked the hotel for it's location, secure area, and cleanliness. I think they can work on a few simple things to make the experience better.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your feedback!  We are very happy to read you enjoyed the comfort and cleanliness of our rooms.  Thank you for noting complimentary internet services we offer.  Sorry you didn't get to ride the Anaheim Resort Transit shuttle to Disney.  The fee for the shuttle service is really minimal.  Thank you for having stayed with us recently.  We look forward to serving you once again in the future.

Summary: I stayed at this Hotel for a conference in a neighboring city. The last night I was there, I returned to my room, opened the door and found a filthy cleaning towel in the doorway. The towels above the toilet were a mess and not folded and there was a pillow case on the nightstand. I called the desk and they apologized and said they would talk to the cleaning staff. They told me I could put the dirty towels in the hallway. Really?? This is an old Hotel and the elevator is like an old Alfred Hitchcock movie. Very small and scary to ride in!
Manager Response: We thank you for taking the time to write a review.   We are very sorry that you are unhappy about your recent stay at our hotel.  Please know we take your comments very seriously and will use them to improve our future guests' experience.  Please feel free to contact me directly, so that we may address your concerns.  We thank you for having stayed with us.  We hope to get the opportunity to serve you once again in the future.

Summary: While most of the folks staying at the hotel were either families with small kids going to "The Happiest Place on Earth" or families with teenage boys there for a basketball tournament, we were there to visit Chapman University with my daughter.  With all of that going on, the place was spotless, and every single staff member was as nice as can be!  Everyone was very friendly and accommodating…from the front desk to the housekeeping staff (some prankster decided to turn around our “Service Now” tag to “Privacy Please”, so housekeeping had dutifully left our room alone.  The wonderful lady I spoke to said it was absolutely no problem and took care of our room right away.)  The breakfast was great too…all of the food was hot and fresh and the tables were being promptly cleared.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind feedback!  We are so glad you chose to stay with us while visiting Chapman University.  We are very happy to read that you enjoyed your stay.  We try our best to be on top of things even with families, sports teams and our exciting addition to the Ayres hotels going on in the back side of our building.  We hope to have the opportunity to serve your family again in the future.

Summary: I have an affinity for the Ayres in Seal Beach. They were sold out, and the other hotel lost my reservation, so I found this location had a room available, and I decided to try it out. It was a nice location. The employees were fine. I didn't get the same "coming home" feel, but I know that this one is in the middle of the city, so have to have the parking passes and tickets for breakfast.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments.  Your feedback assists us improve our future guests' experience.  We thank you for your loyalty to the Ayres hotels!  We thank you for giving us the opportunity to serve you!

Summary: We stayed here for four nights. Super comfy bed. Very clean. The bathroom was on the small size but functional. We got back from Disneyland too late every night for cookies...darn. By staying a few miles farther out we got great rates. Only took 5 minutes to get to Disneyland.
Manager Response: We are happy to read you enjoyed your stay with us!  Thank you for mentioning the proximity our hotel has to Disney, the comfort and cleanliness of our rooms.  We are sorry you missed our delicious cookies every night.  On your next visit, we will make sure to hold some for you, just let us know.  Thank you for staying with us!

Summary Heading: Exceptional price for a hotel near Disneyland
Summary: This hotel was the number one hotel in orange. But that doesnt mean it will stay there forever. The hotel room itself felt very french-euro styled and i loved the old fashioned lobby. It brings me back to my roots abit. One of the things that were issues was that when you turn on the faucet, the water spits out too fast. Another thing was that the wall near the tub seemed to have considerable water damage. The shower head was disjointed from the wall, so if i tried to adjust it, then the hole would be showing.   The good: free full breakfast everyday, eggs, bacon, sausage, pancakes and all the other standard stuff. The price per night was lowest among the other hotels nearby so another plus. Nice pool, however there was a bigger pool that was closed. Spa is open, free wifi!
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback as it allows us to improve our future guests' experience.  We hope to have the opportunity to serve you again once again in the future.

Summary: My 12 yr. old son and I visited Disneyland to celebrate our Birthdays. We stayed at the Ayre's Inn Orange for 2 nites. The staff was wonderful, we received a gift in our room at arrival and they did all that was possible to make our 2 nites in Anaheim the best they could be. We will be back to Ayre's the next time we go to Disneyland! Thank you to Sandra and all the staff!!!!! <3
Manager Response: We are delighted to read you had a wonderful stay!  Thank you for sharing about your recent experience at our hotel.  We hope you celebrate another birthday with us again!  Hope to see you soon!

Summary Heading: Manager busses tables - that tells you something.
Summary: Loved this hotel. Great value for the money. Room was clean, spacious and well-decorated. Very comfortable beds, great shower.  Good breakfast, altho it was the same everyday.  Shuttle to Disney works efficiently.  Front desk people are friendly and helpful.  The hotel manager was in the breakfast area clearing tables each morning. That tells me she cares and sets a good example of pitching-in for her staff.   Convnient location, but no highway noise.  Great choice.
Manager Response: We are happy to read you loved our hotel!  Thank you for giving us the opportunity to show you the great value our hotel has.  I have to agree with you, Christine, our General Manager is amazing!  She is a great leader for the entire staff.  We hope you visit us again soon!

Summary: We are Disneyland Annual Pass holders and we have stayed in the Anaheim area several times in the past few months.  Of course durring the summer all the hotels in the area raise their rates and it takes a little more work and research to find what your looking for and at the price you need.  After days of research and stumbled upon the Ayres Inn Orange.  Yes, it is in the city of Orange, not Anaheim... but don't let this concern you.  It is less than 2 miles away from the gates of Disneyland and is on the Anaheim / Disney shuttle bus route.  Bus drops off and picks up every 30 minutes and takes about 10 minutes to arrive.  We arrived very early, around 12noon on a Sunday... A room wasn't ready yet so we went to the onsight restaurant and had brunch outside on the enclosed patio.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind feedback.  We appreciate you taking the time to write a review.  We are ecstatic to hear that Luis and Cory made your experience at our hotel memorable.  We will make sure to celebrate their exceptional service as we are very lucky to have team members that go above and beyond the call of duty every day.  We are glad you were able to enjoy the Anepalco's restaurant, our freshly baked cookies and our breakfast.  Thank you for your recent stay with us.  We look forward to your future visit!

Summary Heading: What a Great Place to Stay
Summary: First of all, my wife and I are from out of state but have been to Disneyland about 50 times during our marriage.  We have stayed at dozens of different hotels near Disneyland including all 3 Disney hotels.  We always found that the hotels near the park were somewhat "worn" (except Disney properties).  Getting to the park easily was one of our main concerns.  We have tried everything.  We each purchased a 3 day ART (Anaheim Resort Transit) ticket for 10 bucks.  It is good for going to and from the park as many times as you want for 3 days.  My wife thought being that far from Disneyland (2-3 miles) would be a problem.  The route is #14 and it picks you up twice an hour at the 19 and 49 minute mark.  Believe it or not, there is no stop until you arrive at Disneyland.  It is like
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your detailed feedback for our reviewers.  We are very happy to hear that the Anaheim Resort Transit, complimentary breakfast and our in-room amenities were just right for you.  We are thrilled to hear that our staff was very friendly and helpful.  We hope that in your future visit to the Disney area, you choose to give us the opportunity to serve you again.

Summary: Stayed here 7/2-7/6. Was disappointed that this was not as new or nice as the property closer to Disneyland. Breakfast was good, but crowded.The restaurant offers a great dinner menu-mexican. Its a good local hang out as well. The Jacuzzi took forever to turn on, and it wasnt very warm. The check in was smooth and fast. I asked for "something special" for our anniversary. When we got to our room, we had 4 chocolate roses and a nice wine. good job. Very impressive. Parking was sufficient. The ART shuttle picks up at the front door in a timely matter. Would stay here again. The eye sore behind the new pool is the old pool that's fenced.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay at our hotel.  We are sorry to read we did not exceed your expectations.  We strive to have our guests leave completely satisfied with their stay.  I'll try and explain on a few comments you noted.  You mentioned that our property wasn't as new or nice as the property closer to Disney.  Our building is older than the Anaheim property and the difference we do see, is our guestroom bathrooms since they are a bit smaller.  The decor of the Ayres hotels is nearly the same.  Though it may seem like the Anaheim property is closer to Disney, both properties have the same distance to the theme parks main gate.  The fenced off pool, is part of our exciting new addition to the Ayres hotels.  We are adding a parking structure as well as a new hotel tower towards the North side of our building.   We are glad you enjoyed having dinner at the restaurant on site, Anepalco's, its French-Mexican cuisine is quite unique and delicious!   We are glad you were very impressed with our staff arranging a special something for your anniversary.  We hope to have the opportunity to serve you once again in the future.  Please feel free to contact me directly, so that I may assist you with your reservation.

Summary: A great find! I had read positive reviews, and this hotel turned out to be just right. It's convenient to the freeway, they have a great breakfast, the room was clean, comfortable and well equipped, and the staff was friendly and accommodating. You really can't expect much more than that from a hotel! We're glad we stayed here, and I've already booked a room here for a return visit.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for choosing to stay with us again!  We love reading that our hotel was just right for you!  We are happy you found our staff to be friendly and our hotel to be convenient, clean and comfortable.  We will see you soon again!

Summary: This hotel is very nice. If you have a car, it is easy to get to Disneyland. It is also convient to Angels stadium. The beds were comfortable, and the room had plenty of space. The breakfast was very generous. There were eggs, potatoes, bacon, pancakes, fruit, and toast. My husband especially liked the chocolate cookies in the evening.
Manager Response: Thank you for comments.  We are happy to hear your family had fun!  Glad to read you were able to enjoy the comfort our rooms, our great breakfast and our cookies in the evenings!  We look forward to your future stay, whether your family chooses to visit the Angel stadium or Disneyland!

Summary: we stayed here for 5 nights w/ 2 other families and we all had a king w/ sleeper sofa we wanted a double queen room but they were sold out..,. when both beds are pulled out it's very small in the room. the fridge was nice but there was not a microwave so reheating leftovers didn't work. the pool area is nice but literally next to the road and close to the freeway. there is a hospital within a block so yes, you hear sirens off and on all night. the a/c worked well and wasn't noisy so that helped block some noise and there is a ceiling fan to keep the cool air circulated. there is shopping and some restaurants nearby. there is a krispy kreme donut down the road if you are interested. a Vons grocery is down the road and this hotel is next to a Wendy's restaurant. the Crystal
Manager Response: We value your feedback.  Thank you for taking the time to write a review.  Your comments will assist us improve our future guests' experience.  You mentioned not having a microwave to reheat leftovers.  We actually do have a microwave available for our guest's to use.  It is on our 2nd floor, in the same room that the ice and vending machines are in.  We are sorry this was not communicated to you during your stay with us.  You mentioned it took some time to reach the Disneyland main gate.  The theme parks have different parking structures and we find that it does take some time to finally reach the main gate.  We find that the ART does save you some time when trying to reach the parks.  It picks up our guests from outside the lobby doors and it takes them straight there.  On the return, it does take approximately 20 minutes to reach the hotel because it is the last stop before it heads back to the parks.  We are the third stop on route 14.  We thank you for all of your suggestions and we are glad to hear our staff was kind and made you feel welcome throughout your stay.  We hope to have the opportunity to serve you again in the future.

Summary Heading: Hard to do better for the price
Summary: The location was good and the room was clean but a bit crowded. Didnt like the coffee pot being in the bathroom. The bed and sofa bed were comfortable and the staff for the most part were friendly and helpful. The breakfast was great although was sad that they ran out of bacon the first morning we were there and didnt have any the next day either. Christine the General Manager was warm, friendly and helpful. With her as the example, the majority of staff followed her lead. The fresh baked cookies if you were around the lobby in the evening were amazing. I'd be happy to stay again and would recomend it to friends who want a cheap but pleasant place to stay when you have a busy schedule. I wouldnt like to have to spend a great deal of time in the room but as we only needed a place
Manager Response: Thank you for your thoughts regarding your recent stay at our hotel.  We are glad our hotel was ideal for you.  You mentioned Christine, and I have to agree with you.  She is a wonderful General Manager and we are very lucky to have her as our boss.  She truly leads by example.  You also mentioned the placement of our coffee makers; we will try and see if there is a better location for it.  We thank you for choosing to stay at our hotel, as we know you have many others to choose from in the Anaheim/Orange area.  We look forward to your future visit!

Summary: I've been wanting to stay at Ayres for quite sometime but didn't have a chance until now.  I have to stay this is a great place to stay if you do not want to be close to Disneyland but are headed that way.  It is not in Anaheim but is located fairly close to The Block (outlet mall), UCI Hospital, and freeway access.  It's on the corner of Chapman and The City Drive which is a fairly busy intersection considering it is across from UCI Hospital and about a block away from the outlet mall.    Parking requires a parking permit and there is not many spaces in the front of the hotel there are quite a few in the back but we never had to park there as it didn't fill up as fast as it would say if we were at a location closer to Disneyland.  I believe they used to have a free shuttle to
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your detailed feedback.  We are thrilled to hear you finally had the chance to stay with us.  You seemed to have nailed every detail noted about our hotel.  The proximity to many points of interest, i.e. UCI hospital, the "Block at Orange" shopping center and Disneyland.  Yes, we now use the "ART" shuttle to Disneyland.  It is a service that runs continuously throughout the day, every thirty minutes for a minimal fee.  Reading that our hotel met all your needs and that our staff was friendly and helpful is what we strive for.  Thank you for taking the time to write your review.  We look forward to having the opportunity to serve you again in the future.

Summary: Every year, my husband and I attend the C&MA conference at Chapman University.  A few years ago, a Tripadvisor representative recommended us to check out the Ayres hotels, only available in Southern California. We usually stayed at the big chain hotels but when we came to Ayres, we immediately fell in love with the French/European Flair of these boutique hotels. So far, I have tried the Orange and Anaheim hotels, they are both very nice and provide excellent service; but Orange has better/easier access to the freeways ; at Anaheim, we could have a bit of traffic on the Honda Center or Angels Stadium event days. Located on the main street -Chapman Av- and being a family hotel, yet inside the Orange property is pretty quiet.  The staff is excellent, very courteous and friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for your loyalty Tweety Dao!  Thank you for your kind feedback.  We are thrilled to read that Christine, Luis, Christopher, Julio and Maria made a lasting impression on you.  We are really fortunate to have all of these team members working for our hotel.  They truly care about our guests as if they were family.  Thank you for mentioning how great our breakfast and Anepalco's restaurant are!  Thank you for noting our close proximity to the many freeways, the quietness of our rooms as well as the cleanliness of our rooms.  We thank you for your recent stay and look forward to seeing you soon again!

Summary: We chose Ayres because we have stayed at another location before and knew that they were first rate. Our room was large, clean and comfortable. When you factor in the free wi-fi, breakfast and parking, the rate is excellent.  The breakfast is much better than some other "free breakfasts" you get at other chains. For one, they use real eggs! I swear that sometimes I think other places have used powdered eggs. The staff was great and we felt right at home. We will be back!
Manager Response: Thank you for your great comments!  We are ecstatic to read you felt right at home during your stay at our hotel.  We are a bit biased and have to agree with you that our hotel is "first rate".  We find our hotel rooms to be spacious, clean, comfortable, plus it can't get any better with the complimentary breakfast and Wi-Fi we offer.  Thank you for your recent stay with us!  We look forward to your future visit.

Summary: Super comfortable and clean hotel.Every time I come to disney I stay at this hotel.The beds are super comfortable & the breakfast is super good. Helps save money. Super close to disney. Defeinetly recommend it.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments!  We are so happy to hear your family found the great value our hotel has because of the complimentary breakfast, proximity to the park, the cleanliness and comfort of our rooms.  We thank you for staying with us!  We hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: Two to three times a year since 2008 I have been traveling to Orange CA.  I always stay at the Ayres Inn Orange.  The staff is first rate, pleasant and helpful, the rooms are comfortable and clean, the breakfast is fantastic, and the price is right.
Manager Response: Thank you for your considering us your "home away from home"!  It is a pleasure having you stay with us!   Thank you for loyalty to the Ayres Inn Orange!  We look forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: Hotel of Choice When In Anaheim
Summary: We have been staying at the Ayres Orange since 2010 and won’t stay anywhere else when visiting the Disneyland/Anaheim area.  The front desk staff is always extremely pleasant and helpful and the property clean and inviting.  Our most recent stay was in May 2012 and again we were extremely satisfied.  The rooms are very spacious and we always look forward to a good night’s rest at the end of the day.  Until recently they had a complimentary shuttle service provided by the hotel but now use the Anaheim Resort Transportation which is well-priced.  We didn’t have any challenges with the company and enjoy taking the shuttle rather than having the hassle and expenses of parking at Disneyland.  One of the other main draws is the complimentary breakfast which we hope never changes!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for the kind feedback!  We love hearing that you won't stay anywhere else when visiting the Anaheim area.  Our staff strives to exceed all of our guests' expectations, so we are happy to read that we've exceeded yours.  Thank you for telling our reviewers about how spacious our rooms are, how great our complimentary breakfast is and how accessible the ART shuttle service really is.  We thank you for your loyalty and look forward to seeing you soon!

Summary: We stay at Ayres Orange every time we're overnight anywhere near there.  The staff is pleasant, helpful, courteous, the rooms are great, the breakfast is fantastic, and the price is right.  Never had a disappointment, and we're picky!
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind comments.  We know you have many hotels to choose from in the Orange/Anaheim area.  Thank you for making us your preferred hotel!  We look forward to seeing you soon!

Summary Heading: This is where the locals put their guests.
Summary: I live in the area, and when people come to visit, the question is always where to put them. Occupancy problems and the awful traffic nearer Disneyland mean I don't usually suggest places along Harbor Blvd., but we've found a nice reliable place at Ayres in Orange.  Hot breakfast, a new cafe that has astonishingly good Mexican and French-inspired food (try the chilaquiles!), pleasant staff. The rooms are a little dated, but it's not trying to be the Ritz. The price is usually $40 cheaper than the Honda Ponda/Angel Stadium-adjacent Ayres on Katella, and the place is nicer.  We've never had any complaints, and many compliments, so I'm glad it's nearby.
Manager Response: Thank you for recommending us to your friends and family when they come to visit the Orange/Anaheim area.   We are delighted to hear we are the just the right place for you!  I have to agree with you, Anepalco's is awesome!  Anything I try from their menu is delicious!  Thank you for letting our reviewers know about our hot breakfast, the Anepalco's restaurant and the close proximity to many points of interest.  We look forward to hosting you and your friends again soon!

Summary: Very clean, nice hotel for the price.  Short shuttle ride to Disneyland but even after paying for shuttle still a better deal than stay closer than Disney. Breakfast was mediocre.  Eggs, salsa and cheese were good but the pancakes and potatoes tasted like preprepared items and left something to be desired.  Make sure you are outside for the shuttle, if noone is outside, it will not even slow down much less stop.  We were in the lobby waiting and we saw it pull in and grabbed our stuff but it didn't even slow down so we missed it.  The hotel staff was very friendly.
Manager Response: We thank you for sharing the experience you had at our hotel.  We are happy to hear you were pleased with our hotel's friendliness, cleanliness and the great value it has!  We will look further into how we can improve our breakfast and the ART shuttle service.   Thank you for giving us the opportunity to serve you!  We look forward to having the opportunity once again in the future.

Summary: We spent 8 nights at the Ayres in early June, and once again it was a fantastic stay.  This hotel has become our hotel of choice for the Disneyland area.  We continue to come back because the rooms are clean, the pool is great, the breakfasts are wonderful, and the staff is very nice and helpful.  We arrived a little early and were able to check into our rooms with no problem.  Once we got to the rooms they were clean and ready for us.  The rooms are not huge, but plenty of room for our family of 4 and all the luggage that comes with a family of females.  The only complaint the girls had was the bathroom was a little small for all of them to get ready in the mornings, but a little adjustment and the desk and everyone was happy.  The breakfast at this hotel is always good
Manager Response: Thank you for being a loyal Ayres Inn Orange guest!  We love giving our guests a fantastic experience when they visit our hotel!  Sounds like you had a great 8 nights vacation.  Glad our rooms, pool and breakfast were just as you expected!  Thank you for your great review and we look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: Very comfortable stay at a great price!
Summary: I was pleasantly surprised at what an enjoyable stay I had for the price point.  Front desk staff was extremely friendly, accomodating and always had a nice smile to greet me.  They had fresh baked cookies at front desk throughout the day.  The free breakfast was a great way to start off my day, it included eggs, hash browns, pancakes, bacon, fresh fruit and more.   Had a nice pool to relax near after a long day at work.  Hotel was also centrally located, many restaurants within walking distance, including the The Block at Orange that has great shopping, bowling alley, movie theatre, and many food options.  Overall a great stay!  Will definitely keep this hotel in mind for future business trips and vacations!
Manager Response: It was our pleasure having you stay with us!  Thank you for your kind comments!  We are very happy to hear that our staff was extremely friendly.  We are glad you got to enjoy our freshly baked cookies that we offer during the evenings.  We like that you had an enjoyable stay and that you took advantage of our complimentary hot breakfast, pool and took a short walk to the shopping center that is just two stop signs away.  We thank you for keeping us in mind on your next visit to the Orange/Anaheim area!

Summary: We stayed at this hotel as part of a large volleyball group of families.  The hotel was clean and the staff organized and friendly.  The rooms were adequately appointed.  Breakfast was included in our room rate and the restaurant was able to accommodate a large group of people in a short period of time.  There was a nice mall with activities for kids and teens as well as several fun restaurants within walking distance.  Disneyland was a 5 minute drive away.
Manager Response: We thank you for your recent stay at our hotel!  We are glad to hear our hotel met the volleyball group needs.  Thank you for your comments regarding our hotel staff, cleanliness and the short distance to the many shops and restaurants.  We hope your volleyball team chooses us as their hotel of preference, when visiting the Orange/Anaheim area!

Summary: We stayed 06/09-06/16 in room 500 and loved it! We booked thru Hotwire and got an awesome deal ($72/night) for our Disneyland trip. Rooms were comfortable (we had a King and hide-a-bed couch) and it was roomy enough for our family of 6. Bathroom was a little on the small side, but no other complaints about it. Good water pressure, clean ,etc. We had a great view of Disneyland fireworks which was great for the kids. The room was clean and quiet! The only time we heard noise was when a loud group walked by to the elevator, which was right outside our door. No noise between rooms at all! Breakfast was great! Same items daily which got a little old, but it was free, so who can complain...scrambled eggs, potatoes, sausage/bacon (alternated daily), pancakes, coffee cake, cereal,
Manager Response: We love hearing from our guests!  Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts with our other reviewers!  We are really happy to hear that our staff was extremely helpful and polite and that you had an excellent experience at our hotel!  Thank you for mentioning how clean, quiet our rooms are and how great our breakfast is!  We also would like to let our reviewers know how close we are to many shops and restaurants!  In fact, the Outlets at Orange are two stop signs away.  We thank you for your recent stay with us.  We look forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: Reasonable rates, nice room and pleasant staff
Summary: I stayed at the Ayers Inn in Orange for a two day business trip.  Check in was quick and seamless (which can't be said for all Disney area hotels).  The lobby is pleasant and the staff professional.  The hotel has an older, colonial theme.  It is very clean.  My room was comfortable with a sitting area, desk, table, frig and spacious bathroom.  The bed was above average.  Nice flat screen with HBO.  Morning breakfast was a nice hot meal with meats, eggs, breads, fresh fruit, juices and good coffee.  Certainly a cut above.  The hotel is also within walking distance to a few places to eat and shop.  It's filled with families and excitement over Disneyland.    My only complaint is that the hotel bones are older and not very well insulated.  Toilet flushes above and next to me,
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review.  We are ecstatic to read you enjoyed your stay at our hotel!  We are happy to hear that our hotel met all your needs during your business trip.  We hope you stay with us again in the future, whether you travel for business or leisure to the Orange/Anaheim area.

Summary: Pluses: --Very good, free hot breakfast that includes scrambled eggs, bacon, sausage, pancakes, fruit salad --Friendly, accomodating staff --Very clean room --Comfortable beds  Minuses: --Rooms and elevator are a bit on the older side, though nicely appointed.  The room we were first given only had 2 towels (booked for a family of 4), and when we tried to call down for more we realized we did not have a working phone.  However, the young man at the front desk did his best and moved us to a different room with 2 queens beds. --Monday through Wednesday the ART seemed to get bogged down with passengers from hotels at previous stops, so after 9 AM it came less frequently than every half hour.  Thursday this was no problem, however (I'm guessing because it was early morning entry
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review.  We are glad to hear our staff was friendly and that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast and the comfort and cleanliness of our guestrooms.  Our guests' satisfaction is our #1 goal!  We thank you for advising us of your concerns regarding the first room that was given to you and the Anaheim Resort Transit (ART) service.  We will work with housekeeping and with management of the ART to fine our operations in the hope that upon your next visit, we will meet or exceed your expectations. Thank you for giving us the opportunity to serve you.

Summary: Did not know what to expect, but what we saw in pictures over the internet. We were very happy with the hotel, the staff and our room! The room was nice and clean and very nicely decorated. The beds were very comfortable and the pillows were divine, felt like feather pillows plump and soft. We were greeted warmly by the staff with freshly baked chocolate chip cookies, as we did not arrive until around 7:30pm. The breakfast in the morning was great and quite extensive and the hotel had our advance request for shuttle service to St.Joseph Hospital all ready to go. Very well run, efficient and friendly hotel that I would stay in again or recommend to anyone. Good job, thank you for such a pleasant stay.
Manager Response: We are thrilled to know we have exceeded your expectations!  Thank you for taking the time to let reviewers know about your recent stay at our hotel.  We are happy to hear you found our staff to be really friendly and our rooms to be clean and comfortable. Thank you for giving us the opportunity to serve you.  We hope to see you again in the near future!

Summary: The room was perfect for our needs.  Enough space to spread out and store our shopping.  The bed, linens and pillows were very comfortable.   We also really loved the access to a washer and dryer.  Maid service was very good and they accommodated our schedule in cleaning the rooms.  Thanks for a great stay.  Will return.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us!  We are thrilled to hear our hotel met all your needs.  Thank you for mentioning about how spacious and comfortable our rooms are.  We agree with you about how accessible the guest laundry is for our guests.  We look forward to making your every stay with us, a perfect one!

Summary: Didn't stay long, but great service at the front desk, and enjoyed the brief stay overall.  Nice breakfast buffet in the morning, however, they need to do a better job enforcing who is actually staying at the hotel.  Someone could've easliy walked in from the street into the room to get a free breakfast.  Walking distance to Angels Stadium.  Close to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback!  We are glad to hear the front desk team provided great service to you.  Thank you for enjoying our breakfast.  We will keep a closer eye in our breakfast area, so that only registered guests enjoy it.  Thank you for mentioning about the short distance it is from our hotel to the Angels Stadium and Disneyland.  We hope to see you on your future stay to the Anaheim/Orange area!

Summary: We really like staying at Ayres Inn Orange. It is conveniently located near Angels stadium, Disneyland and Chapman University, all of which we have visited more than once over the past few years. The complimentary breakfast was a great deal with our son going to football camp. We find the service is always really good and very friendly. We also find the rooms to be just fine. The remodeled rooms are really great. The kids have enjoyed the pool and spa. We like the complimentary wine on the weekend evenings. I think the overall style of the hotel is charming. There are plenty of dining choices nearby. We have never had a bad experience at Ayres Inn Orange and we have stayed there at least ten times for several days each stay. I definitely recommend it for the price.
Manager Response: We thank you for being a frequent guest!  Thank you for letting our reviewers know about our proximity to many attractions and restaurants.  We are glad to hear you took advantage our breakfast, pools and spa.  We no longer have the Manager's reception at this hotel.  Please feel free to contact me directly at szuno@ayreshotels.com, so that I may inform you of our new restaurant in the hotel.  We look forward to your future visit!

Summary Heading: Great first impression & lasting throughout our stay
Summary: Let's get the less than desireable portion over with first!   Pillow cases are strange, as they feel rough on the face. Asked for something softer, but this is all they have.  Old fashioned heat and air unit on the floor. You would think the guests eating the complimentary breakfast hadn't eaten in days.  Crowding around and in front of other people, over flowing food on their plates like it was going to be taken away from them at any moment.   It was too crazy and crowded for me.   Very attractive lobby (as they usually are) but smaller than the photo shows.  Incredibly clean, attractive and good condition furnishings.  Front desk employees are very professional acting and kind. We had executive king room on 6th floor facing the freeway.  The room is larger than others and
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review.  We are very happy to hear we had a great first impression!  Sounds like you stayed in one of our Executive King rooms.  Thank you for highlighting the amenities, condition and cleanliness of this room.  We will also celebrate the Front Desk for their kindness and professionalism.  We thank you for informing us of the condition of the pillow cases, we will look how we change the feel of them.  We look forward to having the opportunity to serve you again!

Summary: We usually stay at the Aryes in Seal Beach but they were sold out.  I'll start with the good, the staff were great.  The rooms were tiny and smelled.  The bathroom door was dirty.  While we were eating a panhandler came into the breakfast area and asked for money for coffee.  After someone took him over to the coffee pot he got mad, cursed and walked out.  We won't stay here again.
Manager Response: Your feedback is greatly appreciated.  We are happy to hear that our staff provided great service!  We are sorry to hear we failed to exceed your expectations.  We take pride in our hotel as we strive to exceed all of our guests’ expectations.  Our guests’ comments assist us improve our future guests' experience. We will make sure to keep a closer eye in our breakfast area.  Please feel free to contact me directly at szuno@ayreshotels.com, so I can assist you with any further concerns. Thank you for giving us the opportunity to serve you

Summary Heading: Finally stayed at an Ayres property!
Summary: We loved our stay at the Ayres Inn Orange! The staff was very friendly, and although they were completely booked the night before our arrival, checked us in early. We absolutely loved Luis at the front desk. He was so kind and helpful, we felt great being greeted by him after our long days at Disney. The breakfast was perfect every morning with sausage or bacon (alternating), potatoes, scrambled eggs, salsa, shredded cheese, pancakes, various cereals, milk, juices, various breads and bagels for toasting (with cream cheese and peanut butter), coffee cake and a huge bowl of delicious mixed melon pieces. The breakfast seating area was very large, but we wound up eating on the patio most mornings. Also, fresh, hot chocolate chip cookies every evening at the front desk. The ONLY
Manager Response: Thank you for finally staying at our hotel!  It was our pleasure having you.  Thank you for your kind feedback.  It really means a lot to us, when our guests take the time to write a review.  We are ecstatic to hear that Luis made your experience at our hotel memorable.  We will make sure to celebrate his exceptional service.  We are glad you were able to enjoy our breakfast out in our beautiful patio.  Thank you for becoming a loyal Ayres guest!  We look forward to your future visit!

Summary: Everything about our stay was positive.  The only caution to offer--the fitness center only has room for four people.    But the front desk helped me get on line when I couldn't, the cookies are always a plus, and I enjoyed the comfortable lobby for reading in the early mornings with coffee from nearby Starbucks.  Apparently there are plans to build an adjoining high-rise, so a larger fitness center might be included.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback!  We are very happy to hear our team assisted you with your needs.  Thank you for your suggestions regarding our fitness center.  We will look into how we can further improve our fitness center.  We are delighted to hear you had a very nice stay!  We look forward to having the opportunity to serve you in the future.

Summary: We stayed for a week and were very satisfied. Rooms were absolutely clean, staff at the front desk was always helpful. Only minus is the sound of ambulance cars getting to the hospital near by, get a room facing the other side if possible. Very close to Disneyland, Angel Stadium and I-5!
Manager Response: We thank you for taking the time to write a review.  We are thrilled to hear you loved your stay at our hotel!  Thank you for sharing about the cleanliness of our rooms, the friendliness of our staff and the proximity of the nearby attractions.  We'd love to have you visit us again.  We hope to see you soon!

Summary: We have enjoyed the Ayers company for years and we find their hotels and Inns always excellent quality for the money.  This time we stayed at the Ayres Inn Orange, one of their older properties which is still very nice.  We love the beautiful European style of the lobby, the fresh hot cookies when you arrive.   The superb hot breakfast which is included features scrambled eggs, bacon or sausage, pancakes, potatoes, cereal, bagels, juice, coffee, fresh fruit, hot cereal.  I only wish they served for another hour - it's 6:30-9 right now.  But sometimes you just want to sleep in longer.    One major change is their shuttle is part of the Disney shuttle service and costs $4.00 per day per person.  We decided with four of us to pay for Disney parking at $15.00 day instead.    Our
Manager Response: none

Summary: Ayres Orange is always my first choice for staying in the Anaheim area. The staff are friendly and helpful, they have a pretty good hot breakfast with everything you would need, the pool is great, the rooms are perfectly adequate with wifi and very comfy beds, and you can't beat the location. I've been staying here for a few years now. I also get a good rate when staying here, so that is important to me.  They do have frigs in the room, but still no microwave - but there is one on the 2nd floor you can pop your food, popcorn etc. in. That is about the only thing I wish they would add...
Manager Response: none

Summary: I had stayed here in the past and was happy with the staff and the amenities offered; full breakfast, shuttle, great staff, and a cookie to greet you. Although my family preferred to stay closer to Disneyland, the attraction of the amenities convinced them to give it a try. Overall our experience was positive, with only a few small glitches. Pros: full breakfast that was delicious offered every day of our stay, including the day of checkout; friendly accommodating staff in reception area; nice rooms; refrigerator in every room ( helpful for the baby's bottles); microwave and ice machine available on the second floor; in room coffee; free parking; Starbucks, Wendy's, Best Buy and shopping mall nearby. Cons: the rooms were nice overall, but in of the rooms the pillow case was
Manager Response: none
